bhagīº ṭīº | nanu svakīyamānasapratyakṣaviṣayenānāvacchedake-
'līke saṅketagrahaḥ syādityata āha | na ca sarva iti | paraspareti |
mayā yortho'vagataḥ sa evānenāpīti saṃvādābhāva ityarthaḥ |
aparārthatveti | śaśaviṣāṇapadaṃ yadyanyasādhāraṇasaṅketavattayā jñāna-
viṣayo na syāt parārthaprayogaviṣayo na syādityarthaḥ | tādṛśaśca
saṅketagraho vyartha ityāha | na hīti | paravyavahāre parakīya-
saṅketagrahasyāhetutvādityarthaḥ | tarhi paro'pi saṅketaṃ grāhyatāmityā-
vyavahārābhāvādityarthaḥ--pāº 2 puº |
śaṅkya saṅketagrahopāyābhāvamāha | na ceti | upadeśaśabdenātro-
palakṣaṇātideśaprasiddhapadasāmānādhikaraṇyayorapi saṃgrahaḥ | yadvo-
padeśaḥ sākṣāt parampaparayā ca paramparā copamānadvāretyarthaḥ | tarhi
paro'pi saṅketamurarīkṛtyānumānaṃ vā tato na pūrvāparagranthavirodhaḥ |
saṅketagrāhakopāyāntarasyāpi vyavahāropajīvakatvāt tadabhāva-
māha | na ca gāmiti | prayojakavākyoccāraṇānantaraṃ prayojya-
pravṛttidarśanāt taddhetujñāne bālena śaktirgṛhyate | na cālīke
pravṛttiryaddarśanāt taddhetvalīkajñāne saṅketo gṛhyetetyarthaḥ | sākṣā-
dupadeśābhāvamāha | na cāyamiti | nātra viśeṣatvena viśeṣa-
śaṅketagrāhakaḥ śabda ityarthaḥ | upamānadvārakasya tasyābhāvamāha |
na ca yatheti | gavayatvasya pravṛttinimittasyopalakṣaṇaṃ gosādṛśyaṃ
tasyātideśaḥ kathanamityarthaḥ | anumānadvārakopadeśābhāvamāha |
na ceheti |
raghuº ṭīº | dvitīye tvāha | paraspareti | svasvakṛtasaṅketasyā-
nyonyamajñānena parārthatvaṃ parārthabodhopayogitvaṃ na syādityarthaḥ | tarhi
grāhyatāṃ paropi saṅketamata āha | na ceti | upadeśaḥ pravṛttini-
mittaviśiṣṭe vācyatābodhakaṃ vākyaṃ yathā pikaḥ kokilaḥ
ayamasāvaśva ityādi paramparayā saṅketagrāhakavākyasyāpyupalakṣaka-
midaṃ pravṛttinimittopalakṣakasāmānādhikaraṇyena vācyatābodhaka-
mupalakṣaṇātideśaḥ ||
tadamūḥ śaśaviṣāṇādikalpāḥ nāsatkhyātirūpā-
stathātve kāraṇābhāvāt mūkasvapnavadāsāṃ vyāvahāri-
katvaprasaṅgācca tasmādanyathākhyātirūpā eveti | naitadanu-
rodhenā1pyavastuno niṣedhavyavahāragocaratvamiti | bhavatu
vāsatkhyātistathāpi na tato vyatirekaḥ prāmāṇikaḥ ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | prakṛtamupasaṃharati | tadamūriti | na ca sarve
pratipattāraḥ svasvavāsanayetyādau dūṣaṇamuktaṃ siṃhāvalokitavyāyena
prakārāntareṇa smārayati | mūketi | svapneti | asatkhyātirūpatā-
vyatirekamupasaṃhṛtyānyathākhyātirūpatāmupasaṃharati | tasmāditi |
tadanurodhenāpīti śaśaviṣāṇādipratyayānurodhenāpītyarthaḥ | nanu
sattvakṣaṇikatvayoḥ pramitatvāttadvyatirekāvapi pramitāveva | tathā
cāprāmāṇikepyāśraye vyatirekagrahostu yadāha kīrttiḥ |
tasmādvaidharmyadṛṣṭānte neṣṭovasyamihāśrayaḥ |
tadabhāvepi tanneti vacanādeva tadgateḥ ||
ityatobhyupagamyāpi nirasyati | bhavatu veti | asatkhyāti-
rāśrayāṃśe | yadvā nanu naiyāyikairapi śuktirajatatādātmyasyāsata eva
bhānamaṅgīkriyate ityata āha | bhavatu veti | yadyapi śuktirajata-
tādātmyaṃ ca tatra bhāsate tacca sarvaṃ sadeva | na cāsadviṣayatvaṃ bhramatve
tantraṃ kiṃ tu prakāravaiyadhikaraṇyamātraṃ tathāpi saduparaktamasadvibhāsata
iti pakṣe'bhyupagamavādo'yaṃ na tata iti na tatretyarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | sarve pratipattāraḥ svasvavāsanayā 'sadarthaprati-
pattibhāja ityatra dūṣaṇamupasaṃharati | mūketi | naitaditi | na
na tadanurodhena--pāº 2 puº |
kevalaṃ pramāṇābhāvādapi tu śaśaviṣāṇādivikalpārthabodhādapi tasya
śaśaviṣāṇāroparūpatvamityarthaḥ | bhramasya śuktirajatatādātmyaviṣayatve-
'pi nāsatkhyātiḥ śuktirajatayoriva tādātmyasyāpi sattvāt | na
ca tayostādātmye'satkhyātau ca tādātmyaṃ cetyatodhikasya tasyābhāvāt
teṣāṃ ca sattvāt sadviṣayatve'pi bhramatvaṃ na hyasadviṣayatvena bhramatvamapi
tu viśeṣyāvṛttiprakārakatvāditi bhāvaḥ | nanu sādhyaviparītadharma-
vatyeva dharmiṇi vyatireko na kiṃ tu tadabhāve'pi vyatireko
gṛhyate tasyāpi tadviṣayatvaṃ dharmatvāviśeṣāt tasmād vyatirekayo-
rvyāptiralīkarūpa evāśraye gṛhyatāmityāśayenāha | bhavatviti |
kṣaṇikasattvavyatirekayorapyalīkatayā vyāptigraho na pramāṇena śakya
ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | upasaṃharati | tadamūriti | naitadityādi |
apirbhinnakrame śaśaviṣāṇādivikalpānāṃ vinā'satkhyātiṃ
durupapādatayā tadanurodhenopetatayā tayā avastuni dharmāntarā-
bhāvagrahāt | tasyāpi niṣedhavyavahāragocaratvamiti netyarthaḥ |
śaśaviṣāṇe ghaṭatvādikaṃ nāstīti vikalpānāmasatkhyātau kāraṇā-
bhāvenānyathākhyātitvadhrauvyādvastuna eva niṣedhavyavahāragocaratvaṃ nāva-
stunaḥ apiḥ pramāṇāntarābhāve samuccayāyetyapyāhuḥ | na tataḥ
tasminnasati kramayaugapadyayoḥ sattvasya ca vyatireko virahaḥ ||
tathāhi ko'yaṃ vyatireko nāma yadyato vyatiricyate
tasya tatrābhāvo vā tadabhāvasvabhāvatvaṃ vā | tatra na
tāvat kramayaugapadyayoḥ śaśaviṣāṇe abhāvaḥ pramāṇa-
gocaraḥ vṛkṣarahitabhūmṛtkaṭakavat kramayaugapadyarahitasya
śaśabiṣāṇasya pramāṇāgocaratvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yadyato vyatiricyata iti | vyatiricyate
bhidyate | yathā bhūtalādbhinnasya ghaṭasyābhāvo na bhūtala iti
svamate | prābhākaramate tvāha | tadabhāveti | tathā ca bhūtalāde-
radhikaraṇasyaiva ghaṭādyabhāvasvarūpatvamityarthaḥ | adhikaraṇabhinno
vā'bhāvo'dhikaraṇasvabhāvo'dhikaraṇasvarūpaṃ veti vikalpārthaḥ |
apavyākhyānamanyat uktiretādṛśī paranayena | na tāvaditi |
parvatanitambe yathā vṛkṣābhāvo yogyānupalambhena gṛhyate na tathā
vyatirekagrahaḥ prakṛte sambhavatītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadyata iti | yadvastu yanniṣṭhābhāvaprati-
yogitvena jñāyate tatra tasyābhāva iti na sādhyāvaiśiṣṭyam |
yadvā yad yato vyatiricyata ityanena kṣaṇikasadanyonyābhāvaḥ
śaśaviṣāṇādāvuktaḥ sa ca vaidharmyanirūpyaḥ tacca dharmasyātyantābhāvena
nirūpyata ityāśayenātyantābhāvamāha | tasya tatrābhāva iti |
krameti | kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāyā ityarthaḥ | vṛkṣeti
vyatirekadṛṣṭāntaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | yato'dhikaraṇāt vyatiricyate vyāvarttate yada-
vṛttīti yāvat yadadhikaraṇaṃ yato yaddharmavato vyatiricyate
bhidyate tatra tasya dharmasyetyanye | kevalamadhikaraṇamabhāva iti
matenāha | tadabhāveti | tasya adhikaraṇasya | krameti | artha-
kriyānukūlakramayaugapadyayoḥ kramādikaṃ sattvasyāpyupalakṣaṇam |
evamagre'pi ||
nāpi kramayaugapadyābhāvarūpatvaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasya prāmā-
ṇikaṃ ghaṭābhāvavacchaśaviṣāṇasya pramāṇenānupalambhāt |
ghaṭābhāvo'pi na pramāṇagocara iti cet na tasya
tadviviktetarasvabhāvasyāpi pramāṇata eva siddheḥ asiddhau
vā tatrāpyavyavahāra eva |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | dvitīyaṃ nirasyati | nāpīti | syādevaṃ yadi
śaśaviṣāṇe kramayaugapadyābhāva iti pratītiḥ kenāpi pramāṇena
syānna tvevamityarthaḥ | ghaṭābhāvavaditi vyatirekadṛṣṭāntaḥ adhikara-
ṇasvabhāvatvepyabhāvasya pratītiretādṛśyevābhyupeyeti bhāvaḥ | nanu yathā
pramāṇāviṣayasyāpi ghaṭābhāvasya vyavahāraḥ sarvajanīnastathā
kramayaugapadyābhāvavyavahāropi syādityabhiprāyeṇa śaṅkate | ghaṭā-
bhāvopīti | pariharati | tasyeti | ghaṭaviviktaṃ ghaṭabhinnaṃ bhūta-
lādi | tadatiriktasvabhāvasya ghaṭābhāvasyetyarthaḥ | yathādhikaraṇā-
tirikto ghaṭābhāvaḥ pratyakṣata upalabhyate | naivaṃ kramayaugapadyābhāva iti
bhāvaḥ | nanu bhūtale ghaṭo nāstīti pratītirapyasatkhyātirevetyata
āha | asiddhāviti | tatrāpi ghaṭābhāvepi | pramitasyaiva vyava-
hāryatvāditi bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | dvitīyaṃ kalpaṃ nirasyati | nāpīti |
ghaṭābhāvavadityayamapi vyatirekadṛṣṭāntaḥ | nanu bauddhānāṃ ghaṭā-
bhāvo'pi na prāmāṇika iti sarvatrāprāmāṇiko lokavyavahāra
ityāha | ghaṭābhāvo'pīti | atiriktābhāvasya sādhanīyatvena
svamatamāśrityāha | tadvivikteti | tasmādabhāvādvivikto bhinnaḥ
pratiyogī ghaṭastaditarasvabhāvasyetyarthaḥ | tadvivikto ghaṭaviviktaḥ
paṭādistaditarasvabhāvasyetyanye | guruvacanamāśrityottaramityapare |
tathā hyatiriktābhāvasyāprāmāṇikatve'pi bhūtalādirūpastannaye vyava-
hartavyaḥ prāmāṇika evetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ghaṭābhāvavaditi vyatirekeṇa dṛṣṭāntaḥ tasyā-
siddhimāha | ghaṭābhāvopīti | tathā ca pakṣaḥ sthiro bhāva iva
sapakṣādirapyaprāmāṇika upayujyata iti bhāvaḥ | tadviviktetareti |
tadviviktastadbhinnastaditarasvabhāvasya pratiyogivadabhāvasyāpyatadvyāvṛtta-
svabhāvasya pramāṇasiddhatvācca kevalamadhikaraṇamanyo vetyanyadetaditi
bhāvaḥ | tatrāpi ghaṭābhāve'pi ||
ghaṭastāvat svābhāvavirahasvabhāvaḥ pramāṇasiddhaḥ
tādrūpyeṇa kadācidapyanupalambhāt | etāvataiva tadabhā-
vo'pi ghaṭavirahasvabhāvaḥ siddha iti cenna ghaṭabhāvasya
tadabhāvavirahasvabhāvatvānabhyupagamāt | na cānyasya
svabhāve pramāṇagocare tadanyo'pi siddhaḥ syādati-
prasaṅgāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pramāṇāviṣayasyāpi ghaṭābhāvasya vyavahāryatva-
mupapādayati | ghaṭastāvaditi | tādrūpyeṇeti | svābhāvarūpataye-
tyarthaḥ | na hi bhavati ghaṭābhāva hava ghaṭa iti pratītiriti
bhāvaḥ | ghaṭavirahasvabhāvaḥ siddha iti | na tu svātantryeṇa pramita
iti rahasyam | gūḍhābhisandhirāha(?) | ghaṭabhāvasyeti | kvacidghaṭā-
bhāvasyeti pāṭhaḥ | sa ca ghaṭaścāsāvabhāvaśceti kathañcidupapādyaḥ
abhāvasyāprāmāṇikatve ghaṭasya svābhāvavirahasvābhāvyasthāviprati-
padyāmaha iti bhāvaḥ | doṣāntaramāha | na ceti tathā ca
stambhe pravarttamānaṃ pramāṇaṃ kumbhamapi sādhayedityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu cāprāmāṇikenāpi vyavahāraḥ na cāti-
prasaṅgaḥ yaḥ svābhāvavirahasvabhāvaḥ prāmāṇiko bhavati tadabhāvenā-
prāmāṇikenāpi vyavahāra ityasya niyāmakatvādityāha | ghaṭastā-
vaditi | tādrūpyeṇa pratiyogyātmatvenetyarthaḥ | etāvataiveti |
yadi ghaṭābhāvo ghaṭavirahasvabhāvo na syāt tadā ghaṭasyāpi
svābhāvavirahasvabhātvaṃ na syāt tathā ca tathaivopalabdhetetyarthaḥ |
ghaṭo na ghaṭābhāvaviraharūpo virahasya tvanmate'līkatayā ghaṭasya
tadrūpatve'līkatvaprasaṅgādityāha | ghaṭabhāvasyeti | ghaṭarūpo bhāvo
ghaṭabhāvastasyetyarthaḥ | kvacid ghaṭābhāvasyeti pāṭhaḥ | tatra tadabhāvo
ghaṭastathā ca ghaṭābhāvasya ghaṭavirahasvabhāvatābhyupagamelīkatvavyāghā-
tastasyāsvabhāvatvādityarthaḥ | dūṣaṇāntaramāha | na ceti | ghaṭasya
svābhāvavirahasvabhāvatvagrāhakamānena ghaṭābhāvasyāviṣayīkaraṇāda-
viṣayasiddhau cātiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | asiddhe vyavahārābhāva iti satyam abhāvastu
pratiyoginaḥ svābhāvavirahasvabhāvasya siddhyaiva siddham ityāśaṅkate |
ghaṭastāvaditi | tādrūpyeṇa svābhāvarūpatvena | tathā ca
tadviruddhasvabhāvaḥ pratiyogyeva tadabhāvaḥ | pratiyogisattvagrahe
kadācidapyabhāvasyāvyavahārāt ghaṭābhāvopi ghaṭavirahasvabhāvaḥ
siddha ityatra tanmatavirodhamāha | ghaṭabhāvasyeti | tadabhāvo
ghaṭaḥ tadvirahaḥ tadabhāvastathā ca ghaṭābhāvasya ghaṭavirahasvabhāvatā-
yāstvayānabhyupagamāt abhāvamātrasyaiva niḥsvabhāvatayā tvayā tucchatvā-
bhyupagamāt | ghaṭābhāvasyeti pāṭhe tu ghaṭarūpasya svabhāvasya svābhā-
vavirahatvānabhyupagamādityarthaḥ | pratiyoginaḥ svābhāvavirahātmatve
prāmāṇike abhāvaprāmāṇikatāyā āvaśyakatvāditi bhāvaḥ ||
evambhūtāveva ghaṭatadabhāvau yadekasya paricchittira-
parasya vyavacchittiriti cet na ghaṭavadghaṭābhāvasyāpi
prāmāṇikatvānabhyupagame svabhāvavādānavakāśāt | pramā-
ṇasiddhe hi vastuni svabhāvavādāvalambanaṃ na tu svabhāva-
vādāvalambanenaiva vastusiddhiriti1 bhavatāmeva tatratatra
jayadundubhiḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | atiprasaṅgaṃ paro vyudasyati | evaṃbhūtāveveti |
pratiyogini pravṛttaṃ pramāṇamanuyoginamapi viṣayīkarotyatra
pratiyogyanuyogībhāva eva niyāmaka iti nātiprasaṅgo na
vā'bhāvasya svatantrapramāṇaviṣayatvamiti bhāvaḥ | ghaṭavaditi | vyati-
rekadṛṣṭāntaḥ | svabhāvo hi svarūpaṃ tacca niḥsvarūpasya pramāṇa-
pathānavatīrṇasya na sambhavatītyarthaḥ | tvayāpi pramāṇasiddha eva
svabhāvāvalambanamaṅgīkartavyamityāha | pramāṇasiddhe hīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yadyapyanyasya pratītiranyaparicchittirna
bhavati tathāpi ghaṭatadabhāvayorekasya pratītiranyavyavacchittirna
bhavati tathāpi ghaṭatadabhāvayorekasya pratītiranyavyavacchittireva
bhavati na hi pramāṇapratītameva vyavacchedyamityasti niyamaḥ para-
matasyāvyavacchedyatvāpatteḥ atiprasaṅge ca svabhāva eva śaraṇamityāha |
evambhūtāviti | evaṃsvabhāvāvityarthaḥ | ghaṭavaditi vyatireka-
dṛṣṭāntaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | api ca ghaṭasya ghaṭasvabhāvatvena sidvyaiva tada-
bhāvasya siddhiḥ svābhāvavirahasvabhāvatvena siddhyā vā ādye na ceti
svabhāvabhedasya niyāmakatvānnātiprasaṅga ityāśaṅkate | evambhūtāviti |
evaṃsvabhāvovityarthaḥ | paricchittirnniścayaḥ | vyavacchittirabhāvāvadhā-
vastuvyavasthitiriti--pāº 1 puº |
raṇam tathā ca ghaṭaparicchittau svābhāvatairaścinyena ghaṭābhāvopi
siddha ityarthaḥ | nirākaroti | ghaṭavaditi | vyatireke dṛṣṭāntaḥ
svabhāveti | niḥsvabhāvatvenābhyupagamāt abhāve sasvabhāvatvābhyupa-
gamavirodha iti bhāvaḥ ||
tat kimidānīṃ svābhāvavirahasvabhāvo ghaṭaḥ
pramāṇānnaiva siddhaḥ tava dṛṣṭyā evametat ghaṭo hi yādṛk-
tādṛksvabhāvastāvat pramāṇapathamavatīrṇastasya tu yadi
paramārthato'bhāvo'pi kaścit syāt syāt paramārthataḥ
so'pi tadvirahasvabhāva iti tathaiva pramāṇenāveditaḥ
syāt | na caitadabhyupagamyate bhavatā tasmād ghaṭavat
tadabhāvasyāpi prāmāṇikatvenaivānayoḥ parasparaviraha-
lakṣaṇavyatirekasiddhiḥ aprāmāṇikatve tvanayorapi na
tathābhāva iti śaśaviṣāṇādiṣvapīyameva gatiḥ ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tatkimiti | tathā sati svābhāvābhāvo naiva
ghaṭaḥ syāditi sākṣepaparābhiprāyaḥ1 | tava dṛṣṭyeti | dṛṣṭirdarśanam |
tvaddarśane cedabhāvo na prāmāṇikastadā tadvirahasvabhāvo ghaṭo'pi na
prāmāṇikaḥ syādityarthaḥ | yādṛktādṛksvabhāva iti | avayavī
paramāṇusvarūpo vetyarthaḥ | tathaiveti | svābhāvavirahasvabhāvatvenetyarthaḥ |
ubhayoḥ prāmāṇikatvamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi | anayorghaṭatada-
sāpekṣābhidhānābhiprāyaḥ--pāº 2 puº |
bhāvayoḥ | na cānayoranyonyāpekṣāyāmanyonyāśrayaḥ ghaṭatvena ghaṭe
gṛhyamāṇe tadvirahānapekṣaṇāt tadvirahasyāpi prameyatvādinā jñāne1
ghaṭhānapekṣaṇāditi bhāvaḥ | na tathābhāva iti | nānyonyaviraha-
svabhāvatvamityarthaḥ | śaśaviṣāṇādiṣvapīti | śaśaviṣāṇādīnāṃ
prāmāṇikatve paratantrakramayaugapadyavirahanirūpaṇaṃ nānyathetyarthaḥ | tathā
ca pramāviṣayasyaiva vyavahāraviṣayatvāditi yadupakrāntaṃ tatsiddhamiti
bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tat kimiti | tathā ca ghaṭaḥ svābhāvā-
tmakaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ | tava dṛṣṭhyeti | abhāvasya prāmāṇikatve
ghaṭastadvirahātmakaḥ | na cābhāvastava mate prāmāṇika ityarthaḥ |
tasmāditi | nanu ghaṭatadabhāvayoḥ prāmāṇikatve yadi paraspara-
viraharūpatvaṃ tadā parasparāpekṣapratītikatayā naikasyāpi pratīti-
ranyonyāśrayāt | maivam asti hi ghaṭasya ghaṭatvaṃ svābhāvābhāvātmakatvaṃ
ca rūpaṃ tatra yadyapi svābhāvābhāvatvena pratītau pratiyogyabhāva-
nirūpaṇāpekṣā tathāpi ghaṭatvena rūpeṇa pratītau na tadapekṣā anyathā
bhāvābhāvayorabhedaprasaṅgaḥ tathā prameyatvenābhāvapratītau na pratiyogi-
jñānāpekṣā abhāvatvena tatpratītau tadapekṣā abhāvābhāvatvaṃ tatra
dharmāntaraṃ vartata ityanye | śaśaviṣāṇādiṣvati | yadi śaśaviṣā-
ṇādi prāmāṇikaṃ syāt tadā kramayaugapadyavyatirekastadrūpatvaṃ
ca prāmāṇikaṃ syānna caivamityarthaḥ |
bhāne--pāº 2 puº |
raghuº ṭīº | atha bhāva evaitādṛśakhabhāvo yadetasya paricchi-
ttireva tadabhāvavyavacchittiriti cet bhāvaparicchittestadabhāva-
vyavacchittirūpatāyāḥ prāmāṇikatve tadabhāvasyāpi prāmāṇikatvama-
rjanīyam | dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate | tatkimiti | tathā ca ghaṭaśūnya iva
ghaṭavatyapi ghaṭābhāvavyavahāraprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ | nirākaroti |
tadetyādi | tadeva vyutpādayati | ghaṭo hīti | yādṛgiti |
paramāṇupuñjo'vayavī ceti | so'pi ghaṭopi tadvirahasvabhāvaḥ
svābhāvavirahasvabhāvaḥ tathaiva svābhāvavirahasvabhāvatvenaiva bhāvasya
svābhāvavirahātmakatāyāḥ prāmāṇikatve vābhāvaprāmāṇikatvadhrauvyāt
anayorghaṭatadabhāvayoḥ vyatireko virodhaḥ tadīyatvenaiva ca
nirūpaṇe tajjñānamapekṣyate nānyatheti vināpyabhāvajñānaṃ tadabhāvā-
tmanobhāvasya nirūpaṇaṃ nānupapannam ||
nanu kālpanikarūpasampattirevāstvanumānāṅgaṃ tanna
tasyāḥ sarvatra sulabhatvāt | nanu pakṣasapakṣavipakṣāstā-
vadvastvavastubhedena dvirūpāḥ tatra ye kalpanopanītāstatra
kālpanikā eva pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekāḥ pramāṇopanīteṣu
tu prāmāṇikā eveti vibhāgaḥ | tadiha kālpanikā-
nniragneryadyapi prameyatvādervyāvṛttiḥ kālpanikī siddhā
tathāpi prāmāṇikājjalahradādeḥ prāmāṇikyevaiṣitavyā
sā ca na siddheti kutastasya hetutvam | evaṃ prāmāṇike
śabde pakṣīkṛte prāmāṇika eva hetusadbhāvo vaktavyaḥ |
na cāsau cākṣuṣatvasyāstīti so'pi kathaṃ hetuḥ evaṃ kṛta-
katvasyāpi vastvekaniyatasya dharmasya vāstava evānvayo
vaktavyaḥ vastuno vipakṣācca vāstava eva vyatirekaḥ ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu sattvakṣaṇikatvayorvyatirekaḥ kalpanayā
tāvadupanīta etāvataiva tadanumānaṃ pravarttatām kiṃ vyatirekasya
prāmāṇikatvagraheṇetyāha | nanviti | parvato vahnimān prameyatvā-
nmahānasavat | śabdo'nityaścākṣuṣatvāt ghaṭavat | nityaḥ śabdaḥ
kṛtakatvādityatra vyabhicārāsiddhivirodhānāṃ yathākramaṃ hetvā-
bhāsatayā'sādhakatvaṃ tvayā yaducyate tadapi na syādityāha |
tasyā iti | kālpanikarūpasampatteḥ sarvatrodāhṛteṣu sulabhatvādi-
tyarthaḥ | nanu niragnikāt kūrmaromādervipakṣāt prameyatvavyāvṛttyā
vipakṣādvyāvṛttiḥ kālpanike śabde cākṣuṣatvasattvena pakṣasattvaṃ kālpa-
nike nitye gaganāravinde kṛtakatvasattvādanvayo nityatvakṛtakatvayo-
riti kālpanikī rūpasampattiryathā tvayocyate | tathā hrade vipakṣe
prameyatvasya sattvādvipakṣagāmitvaṃ vāstave śabde cākṣuṣatvasyāsattvāda-
pakṣavṛttitvaṃ nitye vastuni kṛtakatvasyāvṛtterviruddhatvamata uktānāṃ
hetūnāṃ kathaṃ gamakatvaṃ syādityāśaṅkate | nanviti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yanna kṣaṇikaṃ tannārthakriyākārītyatra
yadyapi prāmāṇikī vipakṣād vyāvṛttirnāsti tathāpi kālpani-
kyeva sānumitijanikāstāmityāha | nanviti | rūpaṃ pakṣasa-
ttvādi | tathā sati savyabhicārāsiddhaviruddhānāmapi kālpanikīṃ
rūpasampattimādāyānumitijanakatvaṃ syādityāha | tasyā iti |
bauddhānāmanaikāntikāsiddhaviruddhāstrayo hetvābhāsāstatra krameṇa
kālpanikarūpasampatteragamakatvamāha | tadiheti |
raghuº ṭīº | rūpaṃ sapakṣasattvādi | tasyāḥ kālpanikarūpasampatteḥ |
sarvatrānaikāntikāsiddhaviruddheṣu tvadanumateṣu hetvābhāseṣu tatra teṣu
dvirūpeṣu pakṣādiṣu madhye | tatra teṣu kālpanikapakṣasapakṣavipakṣe-
ṣviti | tathā cāsattve sādhye kālpanikayoḥ pakṣasapakṣayoḥ sthira-
bhāvaśaśaśṛṅgayoḥ kālpanikameva kramayaugapadyavirahasya hetoḥ sattvaṃ
kṣaṇikattve ca sādhye sattvasya kālpanikaśaśaśṛṅgādau vipakṣe kālpa-
nika eva vyatireko gamakataupayikarūpamiti bhāvaḥ | tadiha vahnau
sādhye evaṃ śabdasyānityatve sādhye evaṃ nityatve sādhye | vastveka-
niyatasyeti ||
na ca tasya tau staḥ tat kathamasāvapi heturiti pralapi-
tametat nahi niyāmakamantareṇa sampadaṃ prati kalpanā
tvarate vipadaṃ prati tu vilambata iti śakyaṃ vaktum tathā
ca niragnikamapi kūrmaroma sadhūmamiti kalpanāmātreṇa
vipakṣavṛttitvāt dhūmo'pi nāgniṃ gamayet | vāstavyāṃ
rūpasampattau kimanena kālpanikena doṣeṇeti cet
tarhi vāstavyāmasampattau kiṃ kālpanikyā tayeti samānaṃ
virodhāvirodhau viśeṣa iti cet kuta eṣaḥ ubhayorekatra
vastvavastutvādanyatrāvastutvāditi cet tat kiṃ kālpa-
niko'pi dhūmo vastubhūto yena kūrmaromnastena saha
virodhaḥ syāt kvacidvastubhūta eveti nirdhūmatvamapi
kvacidvastubhūtamiti tenāpi virodha eva | tasmād
yathā kālpanikī vipattirna doṣāya tathā kālpanikī
sampattirapi na guṇāyeti vyatirekabhaṅgaḥ ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pariharati | pralapitametaditi | pralāpo'narthakaṃ
vacaḥ tathā ca tvadabhidhānamarthaśūnyamityarthaḥ | tadeva darśayati | na
hīti | kṣaṇikatvasattvayoralīke vyatirekasiddhiḥ kālpanikī tava
sampat | saddhetorapyasaddhetutvāpattirvipat | vipadameva darśayati | tathā
ceti | nanu vastuno vipakṣāddhūmasya vastuno vyāvṛttirastyeveti dhūmo
vahniṃ kathaṃ na gamayedityāha | vāstavyāmiti | sattvakṣaṇikatvayorapi
tvadupadarśitā vyatirekasampattiravāstavyetyāha | tarhīti | nanu
kūrmaromni vastusato dhūmasya vṛttau virodhaḥ kṣaṇitvasya kramayaugapadya-
virahasya cāsata evāsati kūrmaromni vṛttāvavirodha ityāha | viro-
dheti | ubhayoriti | dhūmakūrmaromṇorekatra dhūmānumānasthale vastva-
vastutvādanyatra tvadupadarśite vyatireke'vastutvāditi virodhāvirodhā-
dityarthaḥ | tatkimiti | avastubhūtasyaiva dhūmasyāvastuni niragnike
gatatvena vyabhicārasya mayoktatvāt kva virodha ityarthaḥ | kvaciditi |
hetutvenopātto dhūmo vastubhūta eva1 sa ca nāvastunīti na vyabhi-
cāra ityarthaḥ | tarhi nirdhūmatvamapi kūrmaromni kathaṃ vartatāṃ hradādau
tasya vastutvāt tathā ca niragnike'līke na dhūmavattvaṃ nāpi nirdhūmatva-
miti mahānvirodha ityāha | nirdhūmatvamapīti | vyatirekabhaṅga
iti | vyatirekavyāptigrahabhaṅga ityarthaḥ | tathā ca tvanmate nānvaya-
vyatirekagrahopi sattvakṣaṇikatvayoriti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yathā kālpanikī rūpasampattirgamikā tathā
tādṛśyeva liṅgarūpavipattiragamikā syādityāha | nahīti |
rūpavipattimevāha | tathā ceti | tayā kālpanikarūpasampattye
tyarthaḥ | nanu kalpanāpi na viruddhaṃ viṣayīkaroti dhūmasya hi
vastunaḥ kūrmaromnālīkena virodho'kṣaṇikatvakūrmaromnaścobhayora-
pyalīkatvānna virodha iti niyāmakaṃ syādityāha | virodheti |
ubhayoriti | niragnikamapi kūrmaroma sadhūmamiti śaṅkite
ubhayordhūmakūrmaromnorekatra dhūmenāgnyanumāne dhūmasya vastutvaṃ kūrma-
romnaścāvastutvamiti vastuno dhūmasyāvastunā kūrmaromnā sambandho
viruddhaḥ | anyatrākṣaṇikamarthakriyārahitamityatra vyatireke śaśa-
viṣāṇārthakriyārahitvayordvayorapyavastutvānna virodha ityarthaḥ |
tat kimiti | vastuno dhūmādavastudhūmo'nya eveti na tasyālīka-
tvena sambandho viruddha ityarthaḥ | nirdhūmatvamapīti | nirdhūmatvasya
jalahṛdādau vastuno yathā kālpanikena tena virodhastathā dhūma-
vastusata eva--pāº 2 puº |
syāpi kvacidvastutve'pi kālpanikena tena na virodha iti vipakṣe
kūrmaromādau vṛtterdhūmo'pi nāgniṃ gamayet yadi cālīko vahni-
rapi tatrāstīti na dhūmasya vipakṣe vṛttistadā śaśaviṣāṇe'vi
kālpanikaḥ sādhyasādhanasadbhavo'stīti na tayorvyatireka ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vastumātradharmasyāvastuni nitye 'līke'nvayo
virodhāt kalpayituṃ na śakyata iti sūcanāya tarhītyādi |
rūpasyāsampattau | tayā rūpasampattyā'sati vipakṣe sato dhūmasya
sattvaṃ kalpayituṃ na śakyate virodhāt śakyate punarasatoḥ pakṣasa-
pakṣayorasataḥ kramādivirahasya sattvaṃ satopi ca sattvasyāsati śaśa-
śṛṅge'sanneva vyatireko'virodhādityāha | virodheti | kuta eṣa
viśeṣo virodho'virodhaścetyarthaḥ | ekatra dhūmena vahnau sādhye | ubha-
yordhūmaśaśaśṛṅgayoranyatra kramādiviraheṇāsattve sattvena kṣaṇikatve vā |
pakṣahetvorhetusapakṣayorvipakṣahetvabhāvayoryādṛśaṃ kvacidvastubhūtaṃ tādṛśaṃ
yadyavastubhūtamapyavastuni kalpayituṃ na śakyate tadā nirdhūmatvaṃ
kvacidvastubhūtamityavastubhūtamapi tadavastuni na kalpeta vāstavaṃ tu
sutarāmaśakyakalpanamiti kālpanikavipakṣavyatirekavirahāt dhūmo
nāgniṃ gamayedityāha | nirdhūmatvamapīti | atha yadvāstavaṃ tasyaivā-
vastuni saṃsargo virudhyate na tu tādṛśasyāvāstavasyāpi hetuśca vāstave
vahnau vā eva dhūmo na cāsya kālpanikamapi vipakṣavṛttitvaṃ
virodhāditi cedvastvavastunoḥ saṃsargo viruddhyate nāvastunorityatra na
kiñcidapi pramāṇaṃ kalpanāmātrasya vaiparītyenāpi sulabhaṃ vastuno
dhūmasya vastuni jalahradādau kalpanaṃ ca durvāraṃ vāstavameva
ca pakṣasattvādikamanumānopayogiklṛptatvādanyathātiprasaṅgāt | nanu
kvacitkiñcidvāstavaṃ kvaciccāvāstavamapi niyāmakābhāvāt kalpanā-
gauravaprasaṅgaścetyabhisandhāyopasaṃharati | tasmāditi | vyatirekaḥ
kramādiviraheṇa sthirasya sattvavyatirekasādhanaṃ kṣaṇikatvasādhanasya
ca sattvasya śaśaśṛṅge vyatirekastayorbhaṅgaḥ | pratiyogyutarabhāvino
hi kāraṇasyāpekṣaṇīyatve satyapi pratiyogini tadvilambādvilambo
nāśasya syāt niraste ca tasmin bhāvasyotpattyanantarameva vināśaḥ
sa eva ca kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ ||
astu tarhi dhrubabhāvitvena vināśasyāhetukatve
siddhe1 kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ na vikalpānupapatteḥ | taddhi tādātmyaṃ
vā nirupākhyatvaṃ vā tatkāryatvaṃ vā tadvyāpakatvaṃ vā
abhāvatvameva veti | na pūrvaḥ niṣedhyaniṣedhayorekatvā-
nupapatteḥ | upapattau vā viśvasya vaiśvarūpyānupapatteḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | dhruvabhāvitve tu vakṣyata iti yaduktaṃ tatrāha
astviti | dhruvamavaśyaṃ bhāvo'syāstīti dhruvabhāvī vināśaḥ | etā-
vatā sattvakṣaṇikatvayorvyāptiḥ setsyatīti hṛdayaṃ vikalpeti | vikalpasya
prakṛtavicāraupayikasaṃśayasyānupapattoratyarthaḥ | yadvā vikalpānāṃ
vividhakalpānāṃ tvadabhimatānām anupapatterityarthaḥ | yadvā vikalpe
dhruvabhāvitvādvināśasyāhetukatvena--pāº 1 puṃº |
kriyamāṇe tvadabhimatapakṣānupapatterityarthaḥ | taddhīti | vināśasya
dhruvabhāvitvānāmityarthaḥ | yadyapi ete vikalpā dhruvabhāvitvasya na
bhavitumarhanti tadarthāsaṃsparśāt | tathāpi tātparyānusāreṇa kathaṃ-
cidvināśasyāhetukatvaprayojakā draṣṭavyāḥ bhāvānāṃ vināśo'hetukaḥ
dhruvabhāvitvāt yadyaddhruvabhāvi tadahetukaṃ tādātmyaṃ veti vināśasya
pratiyogitādātmyamityarthaḥ | nirupākhyatvamiti1 alīkatvamityarthaḥ |
tatkāryatvamiti | pratiyogikāryatvamityarthaḥ | vyāpakatvaṃ ceti |
pratiyogivyāpakatvamityarthaḥ | niṣedhyeti | nahi ghaṭa eva ghaṭavināśa
iti kasyacidanubhavo vyavahāro veti bhāvaḥ | nanu parīkṣitānā
tāvattadubhayamastītyata āha | upapattau veti | vaiśvarūpyaṃ vaicitryaṃ
tadanupapattiḥ | sarveṣāṃ ghaṭapaṭādīnāmabhāvaikasvabhāvatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | sattvakṣaṇikatvavyāptigrāhakaṃ mānāntaramāha |
astu tarhīti | sanmātrasyotpattimattādutpattimatāṃ ca vināśa-
dhrauvyasyobhayavādisiddhatvena prayogaḥ | yadyasya dhruvabhāvi tatra na
taddhetvantarāpekṣaṃ yathā jalaparamāṇo rūpaṃ yadvā dhruvabhāvitvena
vināśasyāhetukatvaṃ sādhyaṃ tacca pratiyogīvyāpakasāmagrīkatvaṃ vastuto
bhāvotpattyavyavahitottarakṣaṇaḥ dhvaṃsādhāraḥ bhāvotpattyavyavahitottara-
kṣaṇatvāt ubhayasiddhatadādhārakṣaṇavat | yadvā etadghaṭadhvaṃsa etadavyava-
hitottarakṣaṇotpattikaḥ etatkāryatvāt etadrūpavadityatra tātparyam |
tādātmyamiti | dhvaṃsasya ghaṭātireke dhvaṃsotpattau ghaṭatādava-
nirūpākhyamiti kvacit--pāº |
sthyāpatteḥ | anatirekasiddhau ghaṭotpādakasāmagrīta eva taddhvaṃso'-
pīti siddhaṃ kṣaṇikatvavyāpakatvaṃ sattvasyeti bhāvaḥ | nirupākhyatva-
miti | upākhyā dharmastacchūnyatvamalīkatvamiti yāvat | alī-
kasya ca kāraṇāpekṣitve'līkatvavyāghātāt siddhamahetukatvamiti
bhāvaḥ | tatkāryatvamiti | pratiyogijanyatvamityarthaḥ | tena prati-
yogītarahetvanapekṣattvaṃ sādhyamiti bhāvaḥ | vyāpakatvamiti | prati-
yogivyāpakatvamityarthaḥ | yadyasya vyāpakaṃ tatra tasya hetvantarāpekṣāyāṃ
vyāpakatvānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ | abhāvatvamiti | prāgabhāvadṛṣṭāntena
dhvaṃsasyāpyahetukatvādahetukatvamiti bhāvaḥ | niṣedhyeti | virudva-
yorbhāvābhāvayorekatve bhāvotpattikṣaṇe'pi tadabhāvāpatteḥ1 sarva-
śūnyatāprasaṅgādityarthaḥ | upapattau veti | virodhirūpavatorapyaikye
gavāśvādīnāmapyaikyaprasaṅgāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | yadi caivamutpattimatāṃ kṣaṇikatve siddhe'pi
nityatvena parairabhyupagatānāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ tanna siddhamiti vibhāvyate
tadā nityeṣu siddhavyāptikena sattvena teṣāṃ vināśitvaṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ vā
sādhayiṣyate ityāśayavānāśaṅkate | astu tarhīti | ahetukatvaṃ ca
tadutpattyuttarabhāvihetvanapekṣatvam | atra ca yo yasya dhruvabhāvī sa
tadutpattyuttarabhāvihetvanapekṣo yathā pūrvasya bījakṣaṇasyottaraḥ yathā vā
karmaṇo vibhāgaḥ, dhruvabhāvī ca pratiyogino vināśa iti vastutaste-
ṣāmabhimataḥ prayogaḥ | udakṣaramapi parakīyasiddhāntabhedānusāreṇa
tadabhāvotpatteḥ puº pāº |
vikalpya dūṣayati | taddhītyādi | tat dhruvabhāvitvam | tādātmyaṃ
pratiyogitādātmyam | na ca tadātmanastaduttarabhāvisāpekṣatvasambhava
iti bhāvaḥ | nirupākhyatvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvamalīkatvamiti yāvat |
alīkasya ca na kāraṇāpekṣitvaṃ vilakṣaṇameva ca tadalīkaṃ prati-
niyatadeśakālamiti nātiprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ | niṣedhyeti | mitho-
viruddhasvabhāvatvāditi bhāvaḥ | vaiśvarūpyeti | niṣedhyaniṣedhayoraikye
kvacidapi virodhāsiddhyā viruddhadharmasaṃsargocchede bhedasiddhāvadvaitameva
syāt syācca jagadevābhāvaśeṣaṃ svadeśakālayorapi tasyāsattvā-
dityarthaḥ ||
nanu kālāntare 'rthakriyāṃ pratyaśaktirevāsya nāstitā
sā ca kālāntare samarthetarasvabhāvatvameveti cet ?
nanvayameva kṣaṇabhaṅgastathā cāsiddhamasiddhena sādhayataḥ
kaste pratinandaḥ1 ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yadvā virodhinorapi tādātmye gavāśvādīnā-
mapi tādātmyāpatterityarthaḥ | prakārāntareṇa vināśasya pratiyogi-
tādātmyaṃ śaṅkate | nanviti | svotpattyavyavahitottarakṣaṇe bhāvo'rthakriyāṃ
pratyasamartha ityaśaktireva tadātanī nāstitā | tathā ca samarthetara-
svabhāvo bhāva eva nāstitā saiva ca nāśa ityarthaḥ | prathamakṣaṇe
sāmarthyamagrimakṣaṇe cāsāmarthyamiti viruddhadharmādhyāsena bheda eva
tava vivakṣitaḥ | tathā ca kṣaṇabhaṅga evānayā vacanabhaṅgyā tvayocyate |
pratimamallaḥ--pāº 1 | 3 puº |
sa ca pūrvoktasāmarthyāsāmarthyaprayojakaprasaṅgatadviparyayādhīnaśca, tau ca
dūṣitāvevetyāha | nanvayameveti | tathā ceti | tathā ca prakā-
rāntareṇa samarthetarasvabhāvattvamasiddhamasiddhena kṣaṇabhaṅgena sādhayata
ityarthaḥ | yadi ca ghaṭanāstitā ghaṭātmikā deśāntarakālāntara-
yoranuvarttate tadā tadrūpatayā ghaṭasyaivānuvṛttiḥ, atha tatra nānuvarttate
tadā svarūpata eva ghaṭānuvṛttiriti ghaṭādeḥ kālāntarakāryaṃ
pratyaśaktireva | nahi svakāle bījādi kālāntarakāryāṇi
karotīti svakālepi bījāderasattvaprasaṅga iti prathamavikalpārthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvalīkenābhāvena bhāvasya tādātmyābhāve'pi
vidhivyavahāraviṣayeṇābhāvāntareṇa tādātmye noktadoṣa ityāha |
nanviti | arthakriyākāritvaṃ sattvamiti tadabhāve'sattvaṃ paryavasyatī-
tyarthaḥ | tathāpyaśaktirnāstitā na tvabhāvātmiketyata āha | sā ceti |
samarthetarasvabhāvatvaṃ bhāvasyāsattvamiti prasaṅgatadviparyayasiddhau siddhyet
tayorevāsiddhirityāha | nanvayamiti |
raghuº ṭīº | nanu kālāntare samarthetarasvabhāvobhāva eva
vināśa iti noktadoṣa ityāśaṅkate | nanviti | sā ceti |
nāstitetyarthaḥ | kālāntaravarttī bhāvo hi sāmarthyaviraheṇa
samarthātprācobhāvādbhidyamāno lāghavāt tasya vināśobhyupeyate ?
athābhinna eva ? ādye nanvityādi | sāmarthyaviraho hi bhedaṃ
sādhayan kṣaṇabhaṅge paryavasyati na cāsāvadyāpi siddha ityarthaḥ |
vināśasya pratiyogitādātmyābhyupagamavirodhaścetyapi draṣṭavyam |
api ca deśāntarakālāntarānuṣaṅgiṇyasya nāstitā
yadyayameva ? nūnamanakṣaramidamuktaṃ yadayameva deśāntara-
kālāntarānuṣaṅgīti | yadi vā svadeśakālavat kālā-
ntaradeśāntarayorapi nāstitānanuṣaṅge'stitvaprasaṅgaḥ |
aśakteḥ kathamastu śakteḥ sattālakṣaṇatvāditi cet ?
atha kālāntarakāryaṃ prati svakāle'śaktirasattvaṃ kiṃ vā
svākāryamapi prati kālāntare'śaktirasattvam ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | svakāle'pi kṣaṇikatāṃ sādhayitumudyatasya
nityatvaṃ vibhutvaṃ ca paryavasitamityubhayataḥpāśā rajjurityāha | api
ceti | ayameva bhāva eva | nanu deśāntare kālāntare vā
bhāvasyāśaktiṃ brūmastathā ca tadubhayatra kathaṃ sattvamāpadyatāmiti
śaṅkate | aśakteriti | kālāntarakāryaṃ pratyaśaktirasattvamiti
cedbrūṣe tadā bījādeḥ svakālepi tasya bījādestādrūpyāt
kālāntarakāryaṃ pratyaśaktatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kiṃ ca samarthasvabhāvasya nāstitā deśāntara-
kālāntarasambandhinī na vā | ādye'pi sā yadi bhāvādabhinnā
tatrāha | api ceti | bhāvādbhede bhāvābhāvasya hetvantarādhī-
nalasiddhau sthairya eva paryavasānamiti bhāvaḥ | nanvarthakriyāśaktatvaṃ
sattvaṃ kālāntare ca tadabhāvāt kathaṃ sattvaṃ syādityāha |
aśakteriti |
raghuº ṭīº | dvitīye api ceti | deśasyāpi kṣaṇikatvā-
ddeśāntaretyuktam | abhāvasāmānyābhiprāyeṇetyanye | calasantānamabhi-
pretyetyapare | pūrvamaśaktiraśaktasvabhāvarūpā śaṅkitā, samprati śakti-
viraharūpatāmāśaṅkate | aśakteḥ kathamastviti | kālāntare'stittva-
miti śeṣaḥ | kālāntareti | kālāntarīyakāryāśakteḥ svakālepi
bhāvāt svakāla ityuktam | na tu vikalpāntargataṃ mantavyam ||
ādye svakāle'pyasattvaprasaṅgaḥ tadānīmapi tasya
tādrūpyāt | kālāntarakārya pratyevametaditi cet ? kimayaṃ
mantrapāṭhaḥ nahi yo yatrāśaktaḥ sa tadapekṣayā nāstīti
vyavahriyate | nahi rāsabhāpekṣayā dhūmo jagati nāsti,
tat kasya hetoḥ nahyaśaktasya svarūpaṃ nivartata iti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadānīmiti | tadānīmapi svakāle'pi |
evametaditi | etad bījādi | evaṃ svakālepi kālāntarakāryaṃ
pratyasadevetyarthaḥ kimayamiti | sadapi kiñcidapekṣayā 'saditi
virodhaparihāro mantrapāṭhaṃ vinā nopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ | vyava-
hāravirodhamāha | na hīti | vyavahāravirodhameva sopapattika-
māha | na hi rāsabheti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | ādya iti | kālāntarakāryaṃ prati yadya-
śaktirasattvaṃ tadetyarthaḥ | idānīmapi svakāle'pītyarthaḥ | tādrūpyāt
kṣaṇāntarakāryaṃ pratyaśaktatvādityarthaḥ | tathā ca sattvakāle'pyasattvamiti
virodha iti bhāvaḥ | nanu kiñcidapekṣyā'sattve'pi kiñcida-
pekṣayā sattvamaviruddhamityāha | kālāntareti ||
raghuº | ṭīº |
dvitīye tu yadi kālāntarādhārā'śaktiḥ kathaṃ tadā-
tmikā | tadādhārā cet tadaivāsattvaprasaṅgaḥ kālāntare
tu viparyayaḥ | tasmāt
vidhirātmā'sya bhāvasya niṣedhastu tataḥ paraḥ |
so'pi cātmeti kaḥ prekṣaḥ śṛṇvannapi na lajjate ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | svakāryamapi prati kālāntare'pi aśaktirasattva-
miti dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ dūṣayati | yadīti | kathaṃ tadātmikā-kathaṃ
pratiyogyātmikā | pratiyoginaḥ kṣaṇamātravṛttitayā dvitīye kṣaṇe
'sattvādityarthaḥ | tadādhārā cediti | pratiyogikālādhāretyarthaḥ |
kālāntara iti | svakālākārairanyadaśaktirasattvaṃ tadā svakālā-
tirikte kāle bhāvasya sattvaprasaṅga iti sthairyyamevāvarttata iti bhāvaḥ |
prathamavikalpaprasaṅgamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi | svabhāvābhāvayo-
rvidhāyakaniṣedhakapramāṇagocarayostādātmyaṃ sarvathā'nupapannamityarthaḥ |
prakṛṣṭā īkṣā prekṣā tayā vyavaharatīti prekṣaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | aśakteḥ kālāntaraṃ yadyavadhistatrāha | kathamiti |
bhāvasya bhinnakālīnāśaktitādātmyasvīkāre sthairyāpattiriti bhāvaḥ |
athāśaktirbhāvasattvādhikaraṇakālādhārā kālāntarārtha1nirūpaka-
mātraṃ tatrāha | tadādhārā cediti | tarhi bhāvasya sattvakāla evā-
sattvaprasaṅga iti virodha evetyarthaḥ | viparyayaḥ sattvamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | svakāryaṃ prati kālāntaranirūpitā tasyāśaktiḥ
kālāntaraniṣṭhā tanniṣṭhā vā ? ādyaṃ dūṣayati yadīti | katha-
miti | tasya tvayā kṣaṇikatvāṅgīkārāditi bhāvaḥ | dvitīye
tvāha | tadetyādi | tadātmikāyā aśaktestatkāla eva sattvā-
diti bhāvaḥ | abhede kathamādhārādheyabhāva ityapi draṣṭavyam |
tadādhāretyasya tatkālādhāretyarthaḥ iti tu kecit | viparya-
yo'sattvavyatirekaprasaṅgaḥ | upasaṃharati | tasmāditi | ātmā
svarūpamasya niṣedha ityanvayaḥ ||
astu tarhi bhāvasvarūpātiriktā nivṛttirnāstīti-
vākyasya2 sopākhyeti śeṣaḥ | nanvayamapi kṣaṇabhaṅgasyo-
dgāraḥ3 sa ca4 kaphoṇiguḍāyito varttate | bhavatu vā
ntaratvani--2 puº pāº |
nāstītyasya--pāº 2 puº |
syoddhāraḥ--pāº 2 puº |
sa ca--pāº 2 puº |
nivṛttirasamarthā tathāpyahetukatve tasyāḥ kimāyātam |
tucchasya kīdṛśaṃ janmeti cet ? yādṛśaḥ kāladeśaniyamaḥ |
so'pi tasya kīdṛśa iti cedevaṃ tarhi na ghaṭanivṛttiḥ
kvāpi kadāpi sarvatraiva sadaiva veti syāt ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nirupākhyatvaṃ veti dvitīyaṃ vikalpamutthāpya
nirākaroti | astviti | bhāvasvarūpātiriktā nivṛttirnāstīti
kīrtivākyaṃ sopākhyeti śeṣaṃ dattvā prajñākareṇa vyākhyātaṃ tena niru-
pākhyā nivṛttirityarthaḥ paryavasyatītyabhiprāyaḥ | etaddūṣayati |
nanvayamapīti | nirupākhyā cennivṛttirahetukā tadotpannamātrasyaiva
bhāvasya sā bhavediti kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiriti tavābhiprāyaḥ, sa ca
nivṛtteḥ sopākhyatvasādhanāt pūrvameva nirasta iti bhāvaḥ | kaphoṇiḥ
kūrparaḥ | tatparyantagatasya guḍasya yathā lehanamanupapannaṃ tathā bahudhā
nirastasya kṣaṇabhaṅgasya punarārambho'nupapanna ityarthaḥ | bhavatu veti |
nivṛtteralīkatvaṃ dhruvabhāvitvaṃ tena tasyā ahetukatvasādhanamanupapanna-
miti bhāvaḥ | tucchatvādevāhetukatvamiti śaṅkate | tucchasyeti |
yathā vastuno janmakālādi niyamagamyaṃ tathā tucchasyāpīti
pariharati | yādṛśa iti | so'pi niyamaḥ | tasya tucchasya |
evaṃ tarhīti | tucchāyā nivṛtterutpādābhāva ityarthaḥ | tathā ca
kṣaṇikatvasiddhyarthaṃ vināśasyāhetukatvaṃ dhruvabhāvitvenābhimataṃ nityatva-
meva bhāvasya sādhayediti śuddhā buddhiriti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | parakīyagranthe bhāvasvarūpātiriktā nivṛtti-
rnāstītyatra bhāvābhāvayostādātayānupapattyā sopākhyeti pūrayitvā
bhāvātiriktā sopākhyā nivṛttirnāstītyarthānnirupākhyā nivṛtti-
statra ca na kāraṇāpekṣeti kenacidvivaraṇakāreṇoktamupadarśayanneva
dvitīyapakṣamutthāpayati | astu tarhīti | tadapi nivṛtternānādeśakā-
lānugamādalīkatvamanalīkasya kṣaṇikatvasiddhau syāt tadeva tvasiddha-
mityāha | nanvayamapīti | siddhamabhyupetyāprayojakatvamāha | bhavatviti |
tucchasyeti | nirdharmakasyādyakālasambandharūpadharmāsambhava ityarthaḥ |
yādṛśa iti | alīkasya niyatadeśakālasambandhavajjanmāpyastvityarthaḥ |
so'pīti | alīkatvādeva deśakālaniyamo'pi tucchasya nāstī-
tyarthaḥ | nivṛtterdeśakālaniyamasya viśiṣṭasyābhāvo yadi deśakāla-
sambandhasva viśeṣaṇasyābhāvāt tatrāha | na ghaṭanivṛttiriti | atha
tatsambandhasattve'pi viśeṣyaniyamābhāvāt tatrāha | sarvatreti ||
raghuº ṭīº | dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ tadīyagranthāviruddhaṃ vyutpādayannā-
śaṅkate | astu tarhīti | śeṣaḥ adhyāharaṇīyo bhāgaḥ | tathā ca
bhāvasvarūpātiriktā sopākhyā nivṛttirnāstīti paryavasitavākyasya
nirupākhyā nivṛttiriti tātparyam | etaddūṣayati | nanvayamapīti |
nirupākhyā cennivṛttirahetukā tadotpannamātrasyaiva bhāvasya sā
bhavediti kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiriti tavābhiprāyaḥ | sa ceti | niru-
pākhyatvamevāsiddhamiti bhāvaḥ | kaphoṇiḥ kūrparaḥ | so'pīti |
tasya tucchasya ghaṭanivṛtterdeśakālasambandhaniyamo nāstītyarthaḥ |
ghaṭanivṛtterdeśakālasambandhaniyamaniṣedho hi kiṃ viśeṣaṇasya
sambandhāṃśasya niṣedhaḥ kiṃ vā viśeṣyasya niyamāṃśasya | ādyaṃ
vivṛṇoti | na ghaṭetyādi | dvitīye tvāha | sarvatraiveti | ghaṭa
nivṛttirityanuṣajyate |
bhavatu1 prathama eveti cet ? so'yaṃ bhāvanāstitā
svarūpapratiṣedho vā bhāvapratiṣedhena nivṛttisvarūpa2-
niruktirveti | ādye bhāvasyaiva sadātanatvaprasaṅgaḥ dvitīye
tu nivṛttereveti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | etadeva vibhāvayituṃ śaṅkate | bhavatviti |
prathama iti | na kkāpi bhāvanivṛttiritipakṣa ityarthaḥ | so'yamiti |
ghaṭanivṛttiḥ kvāpi nāstīti pakṣa ityarthaḥ | nāstitāsvarūpa-
niruktiriti | bhāvasya nāstitā na kādācitkīti nāstitāyā
eva svarūpaṃ nirucyata ityarthaḥ ādya iti | nivṛtterevābhāvapakṣa
ityarthaḥ | dvitīya iti | nivṛtteḥ sārvatrikatvasārvadikatvapakṣa
ityarthaḥ | evaṃ sati kadāpi bhāvo na syāditi bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bhavatviti | na kvāpi kadāpi nivṛttiriti
pakṣa ityarthaḥ | so'yamaniyamaḥ | nivṛttisvarūpeti | nivṛtteralīkatvaṃ
astviti kvācitkaḥ pāṭhaḥ |
pratiṣedhena ‘nāstitā’ svarūpa--vāº 1 puº |
deśakālasambandhena nirūpyata ityarthaḥ | ādya iti | nivṛttisvarūpa-
syaivābhāvādityarthaḥ | dvitīye tviti | bhāvānādhārakālavat tadā-
dhārakāle'pi nivṛttistulyeti kadāpi bhāvo na syādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | prathamo ghaṭanivṛttideśakālasambandhaniṣedhaḥ |
so'pi kiṃ deśakālasambandhasya niṣedhaḥ kiṃ vā ghaṭanivṛtteḥ |
nādyaḥ nivṛtterdeśakālāsambandhitvenāvirodhitvāt ghaṭasya sārva-
trikatvasadātanatvaprasaṅga iti | dvitīyamapi nivṛtterniṣedho vā
ghaṭasya veti vikalpya dūṣayati | so'yamiti | bhāveti vikalpa-
viṣayasya guṇatvenābhidhānamitaraphalakatvasūcanāya | nivṛttirūpaniru-
ktiparyavasāyī bhāvapratiṣedho vetyarthaḥ | nivṛttirūpamatyantāsatprati-
yogikatvam | bhāvodeśakālayoḥ sambandhastatpratiṣedhena nivṛtti-
rūpamalīkatvaṃ nirūpyata ityarthastu na yuktaḥ vakṣyamāṇasadātanatvaprasaṅgā-
saṅgateḥ | bhāvapratiṣedhena kvācitkatvakādācitkattvapratiṣedhena nivṛtti-
svarūpaniruktirityartha ityanye | taccintyam | prathamapakṣasya kvācitka-
tvādipratiṣedharūpatvābhāvāt | sadātanatveti sārvatrikatvasyāpyupa-
lakṣaṇam | nivṛtteriti sadātanatvetyādikamanuṣajyate ||
astu tarhi tatkāryatvameva dhruvabhāvitvaṃ ? na, tasyāpi
kārya iti pakṣe virodhāt tasyaiva kārya ityasiddheḥ |
yatkiñcidutpannamātrasya kāryaṃ sa eva tasya nāśa iti
cet ? tarhi yasyāḥ sāmagryā yat kāryaṃ tat tadariktāna-
pekṣamiti sādhanārthaḥ tamimaṃ ko nāma nānumanyate1
kāryameva vināśa iti tu kenānurodhena vyavahartavyaṃ kiṃ
tadvirahavattvāt kāryasya kiṃ vā tadviraharūpatvāt ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tṛtīyaṃ dhruvabhāvitvaṃ dūṣayitumāha | astviti |
etadghaṭadhvaṃsa2 etadavyavahitottarakṣaṇotpattikaḥ etatkāryatvāt
etadghaṭasvarūpavaditi tāvattava vivakṣitaṃ (tadā) tatra tatkāryatvā-
diti tasyāpi kāryatvādityarthe'piśabdena kāraṇāntarasamuccayaścettava
vivakṣitastadā tadvilambena dhvaṃsavilambena tadutpattyavyavahitottarakṣaṇo-
tpattikatvaṃ viruddhaṃ tanmātrakāryatvaṃ ca hetuḥ svarūpāsiddha ityarthaḥ |
yadvā etadghaṭadhvaṃsa etanmātrahetukaḥ tatkāryatvādityatra virodhāsiddhī
vikalpite draṣṭavye | asiddheriti | mudgarāderapi ghaṭanāśaṃ prati
kāraṇatvadarśanādityarthaḥ | nanu tasyāpi vā tasyaiva veti na samuccayo
navā niyamo vivakṣitaḥ kintūtpannamātrasya yatkāryaṃ tadeva tasya
vināśa iti mama mataṃ tadatirikte dhvaṃse mānābhāvāditi
śaṅkate | yatkiñciditi | tarhi kāryaṃ kāraṇātiriktānapekṣamitya-
hetukatvārthaḥ tadatra kāraṇapadena yadi sāmagrī vivakṣitā tadā
siddhasādhanaṃ ? tadekadeśaścet tadā bādhaḥ ‘na kiñcidekameka-
smāt sāmagryāḥ sarvasaṃbhava’ iti tavābhyupagamāt | evamabhyupagamo-
'pasiddhānto mābhūdata āha | ko nāma nānumanyata iti |
anumanute--pāº 2 puº |
etatpaṭadhvaṃsaḥ--pāº 2 puº |
kāryameveti | kāryamātrasya vināśitvābhyupagamo mama prauḍhivādeneti
bhāvaḥ | kāryasya kāraṇavināśātmakattvavyavahārabījaṃ vikalpayati |
kimiti | tadvirahavattvātkāraṇānyonyābhāvavattvāt | tadviraha
rūpatvātkāraṇavirahātmakatvātkāryasyetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tṛtīyaṃ kalpamutthāpayati | astviti | tatra
yadi tasyāpi kāryamiti vivakṣitaṃ ? tadā kāraṇāntarasyāpiśabdena
samuccayāt pratiyogītarakāraṇānapekṣatve sādhye virodha ityāha |
tasyāpīti | tasyaiva kāryamiti ca vināśasya pratiyogītarakāra-
ṇājanyatvasiddhau, tadeva tvasiddhamityāha | tasyaiveti | nanu samuccaya-
niyamau vinaiva kāryatvamātraṃ hetuḥ na ca sandigdhavipakṣavṛttitvama-
tiriktadhvaṃse mānābhāvāt pariśeṣeṇa yat yatkiñcidutpattyanantaraṃ
kāryaṃ janayati kāraṇaṃ tasyaiva tadvināśarūpatvādityāha | yat-
kiñciditi | yat yasya kāryaṃ tat taditarakāraṇānapekṣamityatra
vyabhicāra eva, sāmagrītaḥ kāryotpatteriti yatsāmagrījanyaṃ yat-
kāryaṃ tat taditarasāmagryapekṣamiti sādhyaparyavasāne siddhasādhana-
mityāha | tarhīti | tathāpi yadyadutpannamātrasya kāryaṃ tadeva
tasya vināśa ityatra kiṃ bādhakamityāha | kāryameveti | tadvi-
rahabattvāt tadanyonyābhāvavattvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tasyāpītyapiśabdena yadi taduttarabhāvi samucceyaṃ
tatrāha | virodhāditi | asiddheriti | aprasiddherityarthaḥ |
athāpinā hetvantaramātraṃ samucceyamavibakṣitaviśeṣaṃ tatkāryatvamātraṃ vā
heturityāśayenāśaṅkate | yatkiñciditi | tadvyaktikāryatvasya sandigdha-
vyatirekatayā tatsāmagrīkāryatvaṃ hetūkāryaṃ, parāmarṣaṇīyā ca tadā
tadvyaktisāmagrī tatra vyāptimanumanyāmahe na tu pakṣadharmatāmityāha |
tarhītyādinā | yasyāḥ--vyakteḥ | tadatirikteti taduttarabhāviparam |
yayā sāmagryā yajjanyata ityarthe??vameva | kecittu yathāśrutasyaitasyāpi
kārya ityādeścānurodhāditarakāraṇānapekṣatvamevāhetukatvaṃ varṇayanti,
tacca puñjātpuñjotpattiṃ vadato vaināśikasya kvacidapi vastuni na
prasiddhaṃ, sphuṭataravirodhavyabhicārāṇāṃ ca tattādātmyatatkāryatvata-
dvyāpakatvānāṃ tatra hetutvāśaṅkanamanucitamityupekṣitam | vyavaharttavyaṃ
svīkarttavyam | tadviraharūpatvāditi | tatkāryastadvirahastadvināśa
ityubhayasampratipannatvāditi bhāvaḥ |
na tāvat pūrvaḥ sahaṃkāriṣṭhapi tathāprasaṅgāt1
virahasvarūpānirukteśca | na dvitīyaḥ sa hi kāryakāle
kāraṇasya yogyānupalambhaniyamādvā bhavet vyavahārā-
nurodhādvā atiriktavināśe bādhakānurodhādveti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tathāprasaṅgāditi | vemādāvapi tantuvināśa-
vyavahāraprasaṅgāt tadanyonyābhāvavattvasya sattvādityarthaḥ | viraha-
tathā bhāva prasaṅgāt--pāº 2 puº | tathā vyavahāraprasaṅgāt--
pāº 3 puº |
svarūpeti | virahohyabhāvaḥ sa cālīka eveti tadvattā kāryasya
svalakṣaṇasya kathaṃ bhavediti bhāvaḥ | yadvā kāraṇaviraho yadi
kāryameva tadā kathaṃ tenaiva tadvattā | atiriktaścedabhāvastadā kima-
parāddhaṃ kāryasyātiriktapradhvaṃseneti bhāvaḥ | na dvitīya iti |
yadyapi bhāvasyābhāvatādātmyaniṣedhādevaitadapi nirastaṃ, tathāpi
prakārāntareṇāpi nirasyati | na dvitīya iti | sa iti |
dvitīyaḥ pakṣa ityarthaḥ | kāryakāle kāraṇaṃ sarvathāpi nopalabhyata
iti mūlaṃ kāryameva kāraṇavināśa ityarthaḥ | atirikteti |
kāryātirikta ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | sahakāriṣvapīti | tantūnāṃ yathā paṭe kārye
'nyonyābhāvastathā vemādiṣvapīti teṣvapi tantvabhāvavyavahāraprasaṅga
ityarthaḥ | kiṃ ca kāryasya tadvirahavattvādityatra yadi virahapadārthaḥ
kāryameva tadā virahapadavaiyarthyāpattyā tadvirahavattve kāryaviraha uktaḥ
syāditi svavacanavirodha ityāha | virahasvarūpeti ||
raghuº ṭīº | viraharūpeti | viraho yadyabhāvaḥ sa
bhavatāmalīka iti kathaṃ tadvattā vastunaḥ kāryasya, sadasatoḥ
saṃsarganiṣedhāt | athādhikaraṇasvarūpaḥ kathaṃ tenaiva tadvattā'sā-
dhāraṇyaṃ vetyarthaḥ || sa hīti | sa dvitīyaḥ kāryasya tadviraha-
rūpasvarūpaḥ ||
na prathamaḥ upalabhyante hi paṭakāle vemādayaḥ |
na te ta iti cet ? kimatra pramāṇam | abhede'pi viṃ
pramāṇamiti cet ? mābhūt tāvat sandehasthitāvapi
anupalabdhibalālambanavilayāt | na dvitīyaḥ nahi
paṭo jāta ityukte tantavo naṣṭā iti kaścidvyavaharati |
paṭasyānatirekāt tantumātrajanmani bhedāgrahādavyava-
hāra iti cet ? na tarhi vyavahārabalamapi1 | visa-
bhāgasantatau tāvadvyavahārabalamastīti cet naitadevam ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu paṭakāle ye vemādaya upalabhyante te
tadbhinnā eveti śaṅkate | na te ta iti | kṣaṇabhaṅge satyevaṃ (na) syāt |
sa cādyāpi na siddha ityabhiprāyeṇāha | kimatreti | yadyapi
pratyabhijñānaṃ tatra mānaṃ tathāpi tadanupadarśanepi na kṣatirityāśaye-
nāha | mābhūditi | kāryakāle kāraṇānupalambhaḥ sandigdha iti
tadbalaṃ tava bhagnamevetyarthaḥ | avayavebhyo'nanyatvamavayavina iti pakṣa-
mādāya śaṅkate | paṭasyeti | kāraṇābhāvatvena vyavahartuṃ yogye'pi paṭe
tantvātmake pūrvatantubhedāgrahānna tathā vyavahāraḥ yena tu parīkṣakeṇa
bhedo gṛhyate tasya tathā vyavahāro'styeveti bhāvaḥ | vyavahāro hi
laukikaparīkṣakasādhāraṇaḥ pramāṇaṃ sa ca prakṛte nāstītyāha |
na tarhīti | parīkṣakasya viparīta eva vyavahāro na kathamatreti
vyavahārāvalambanamapi--pāº 2 puº |
bhāvaḥ | nanu paṭe naṣṭe tantumālālakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ yatra jāyate tatra
paṭanāśapratītivyavahārau sta evetyāha | visabhāgeti | visabhāga-
santatāvapyetaddṛṣṭāntena tathonneyamiti hṛdayam ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadyapi paṭakāle vemādaya upalabhyante tathāpi
paṭotpattiprākvālīnavemādibhyo'nya eva paṭakālīnāsta ityāha | na
te ta iti | kṣaṇikatvāsiddhāvidamapyasiddhamityāha | kimatreti |
nanu ta evopalabhyanta ityamānakatvādasiddhamityāha | abhede'pīti |
yadyapyabhede pratyabhijñānameva mānaṃ vakṣyate tathāpyāpātataḥ sandehe
'pi na kāryātmatā vināśasya nirvahatītyāha | mābhūditi |
nanu tantubhinne paṭāvayavini mānābhāvāt tantava eva tathotpannāḥ
paṭatvena vyavahriyante, tathā ca pūrvāparatantūnāṃ mithastantutvasājātyena
bhedāgrahāt pūrvatantuvināśatvenottaratantavo na vyavahriyante ityāha |
paṭasyeti | nanu yattantubhistantavo janyante paṭo vā tatra tantu-
vināśādvyavahāro'pi, yatra paṭena tantavo janyante tatrotpanneṣu
tantuṣu paṭo naṣṭa iti vyavahārostyeveti tadanusārāt sabhāga-
santatāvapi kāryameva vināśa iti kalpyata ityāha | visa-
bhāgeti | visabhāgo visadṛśaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | na te ta iti | upalabhyamānā vemādayaḥ paṭapūrva-
kālīnebhyo bhinnā ityarthaḥ | paṭasyeti | tathotpannānāmeva tantūnāṃ
paṭatvāt teṣāṃ ca sausādṛśyena bhedāgrahājjanyatvāgrahaṇa na vināśa-
vyavahāra ityarthaḥ | visabhāgeti | samānāḥ sadṛśāḥ bhāgāḥ
sāntānikā yasyāḥ sā santatiḥ sabhāgā, visadṛśasāntānikā ca
visabhāgā, kāṣṭhāṅgārādisantatāvaṅgārādijanmani kāṣṭhādivināśa-
vyavahārāt kāryasya vināśatvasthitau sabhāgasantatāvapi kāryameva
vināśatvena kalpyate bādhakābhāvādityarthaḥ ||
yadi hi tantumālaiva paṭanivṛttiḥ kathaṃ tadāśrayasta-
dātmako vā paṭaḥ prāk | anyaivāsāviti cet ? na
tāvajjātikṛtamanyatvamupalabhyate1 vyaktikṛtaṃ tu nādyāpi
siddhyati | ata eva2 tatsiddhāvitaretarāśrayatvam |
tathāpi yadyevaṃ syāt kīdṛśo doṣa iti cet ? na
kaścit, kevalaṃ pramāṇābhāvaḥ vyavahārānanurodhaśca,
tadasiddhāvapi siddhyatastasya nimittāntarāpekṣaṇāt ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yadi hīti | tantumālāyāṃ paṭastāvadvarttata
ityanubhavasiddham | sā cettantumālā paṭanivṛttiḥ syāt tadā
svadhvaṃsa eva paṭo varttata ityāyātamiti svamate | paramate tvāha |
tadātmako veti | paṭopi tantumālā paṭanivṛttirapi tantumālā
tathā ca pratiyogyātmikaiva nivṛttiḥ syāditi virodha ityarthaḥ |
nanu pūrvatantumālāyā uttaratantumālā anyaiva tathā ca kathamayaṃ
manyadupalabhyate--pāº 1 puº |
ita eva--pāº kvacit | ṭīkārasammato'pi |
virodha iti śaṅkate | anyaiveti | tadvijātīyā vā tadbhinnā vā |
nādyaḥ tathā'nanubhavāt | nāntyaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgāsiddheriti pariharati | na
tāvaditi | yadyapi jātikṛtānyatvaṃ vyaktikṛtānyatve satyeva, na hyekasyāṃ
vyaktau krameṇa jātibhedaḥ sambhavatīti pṛthak vikalpānupapatti-
stathāpyupapattisaukaryādetaduktam | uttaratantumālā pūrvatantumālāto
bheda eva sati tannivṛttirūpā bhavati nānyatheti tatsiddhiritya-
trāha | ita eveti | pūrvāparatantumālayorbhede sati nivṛttirūpattvaṃ,
nivṛttirūpatāyāṃ ca satyāṃ bheda ityanyonyāśraya ityarthaḥ | evamiti |
uttaratantumālā pūrvatantumālānivṛttiḥ syāt ko doṣo nivṛttya-
ntarasvīkāre gauravamiti bhāvaḥ | pramāṇābhāva iti | uttara-
tantumālāyāḥ pūrvatantunivṛttirūpattve bhinnatve ca pramāṇābhāva
ityarthaḥ | na vā īdṛśo1 vyavahāra ityāha | vyavahāreti |
tadasiddhāviti | yatrāśrayanāśādeva paṭanāśastatra tantumālāyā
aprasiddhāvapi paṭanāśavyavahāro nimittāntarāt paṭadhvaṃsarūpādeva
vaktavya ityarthaḥ | tantumālāyā nivṛttirūpatvāsiddhābapītyanye ||
bhagīº ṭīº | svamatamāśrityāha | kathamiti | vināśasya
pratiyogyanāśrayatvādityarthaḥ | bauddhanayenāha | tadātmakattve veti |
vināśasya pratiyogyanātmakatvādityarthaḥ | anyaiveti | asau tantu-
mālā kāraṇavirodhinī kāryasantatirasyaiva vināśātmiketyarthaḥ |
na tāvaditi | tantuṣu jātibhedasya yogyānupalabdhibādhitatvādi-
tādṛśa iti 1 puº pāº |
tyarthaḥ | vyaktikṛtaṃ tviti | siddhau vā tatsādhanāya hetvabhidhāna-
vaiyarthyamityarthaḥ | kāryasya vināśatve siddhe vyaktibhedasiddhistatsiddhau
ca kāryasya vināśatvasiddhirityarthaḥ | yadyevamiti | yadi kāryameva
vināśaḥ syādityarthaḥ | tadasiddhāviti | tantumālāyā nivṛtti-
rūpatvāsiddhāvapi siddhyatastasya paṭanivṛttivyavahārasyetyarthaḥ |
nimittāntaraṃ kāryabhinnaṃ dhvaṃsarūpamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ekatra bādhakabalādatirikte vināśe siddhe
visabhāgasantānepi tathaiva kalpyata ityāśayavān bādhakamāha | yadi
hīti | tantubhinnatvābhinnatvavipratipattāvapi durapahnavastāvatsarvānu-
bhavasiddhaḥ paṭo dharmī, bhavitavyaṃ ca tasyāvaśyaṃ kādācitkasya sato
vināśena, sa cedatiriktaḥ, siddhamīhitam | atha tantumālāmātraṃ
kiṃ vā tadviśeṣaḥ | ādye kathamiti | tadāśraya iti svamatena |
tadātmaka iti paramatena | dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate | anyaiveti | paṭā-
kārebhyastantubhyo'nyaiva taduttarakālīnā tantumāletyarthaḥ | ita
eveti | vartamānatantumālāyāḥ pūrvakālīnatantumālāvyāvṛtteḥ paṭa-
nāśātmakatve siddhe bhedasiddhiḥ siddhe ca bhede tatsiddhirityarthaḥ |
nanvevamapi sandehe na bādhakabalamata āha | tadasiddhāvapītyādi |
upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat | tatsiddhāvapyasiddhyata ityapi draṣṭavyam | paṭo hi
yādṛśastādṛśo bhavatu, gṛhyate tāvat tantubhyo bhinnatvena tajjanyatvena
ca, na ca tathāpi tantuvināśabuddhivyapadeśau bhavataḥ, bhavataśca tantu-
mālāyāḥ pūrvatantuvirahābhinnatvena gṛhyamāṇe 'gṛhyamāṇe ca paṭa-
janyatvenābhāvātmani ca paṭajanyāntare paṭasya tāviti siddhyati
kāryabhāvādanya eva bhāvasya vināśa ityarthaḥ ||
api ca tantuvināśaḥ sāmānyatastantuvirahasvabhāvo
vā syāt tadviparīto vā | ādye kathaṃ tantvantaraṃ,
na hi sāmānyato nīlamanīlaviruddhasvabhāvamanīlā-
ntaram | dvitīye kathaṃ tadvirodhī, na hi nīlaṃ sāmā-
nyato'pi nīlāntaravirodhi | viśeṣamātra evāyaṃ
virodha1 iti cet ? tat kiṃ sāmānyato'nubhayasyabhāva
eva vināśaḥ | omiti bruvato'nyataramupādāya vinā-
śavyavahārānupapattiḥ | sāmānyasyālīkatvāt tatra
virodho'pi kiṃ kariṣyatīti cet ? vilīnamidānīṃ
viruddhadharmādhyāsena bhedapratyāśayā, tasya tadāśrayatvāt ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tantuvināśa iti | tanturūpo vināśastantvantarasya
tantutvāvacchinnasyaiva yadi virodhī tadā tantvantaraṃ kathaṃ bhavet | na
hi sāmānyata evānīlaviruddhasvabhāvaṃ nīlamanīlaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ |
dvitīya iti | sāmānyato na tadvirodhīti yadi tadā tantuḥ
sāmānyataḥ tantuvirodhī kathaṃ bhavet | na hi nīlaṃ nīlatvena
kadācinnīlavirodhi bhavatītyarthaḥ | nanu na tantutvenaiva tantostantu-
viśeṣa evātra virodha--pāº 1 puº |
virodhitvaṃ brūmaḥ, kiṃ tu pūrvatantoruttaratanturvirodhītyācakṣmahe
iti na virodha iti śaṅkate | viśeṣa eveti saptamī |
viśeṣāśrito virodho na sāmānyāśrita ityartha | anubhayeti |
sāmānyato na virodhī nāpyavirodhītyarthaḥ | sāmānyato virodhitve
tantureva na syāt avirodhitve tantunivṛttirūpo na syāditi
bhāvaḥ | nanu bhavatu tantuḥ sāmānyato'nubhayasvabhāvaḥ kiṃ naḥ chinnaṃ
viśeṣata eva virodhānnivṛttirūpatā bhavedityata āha | omiti |
anyatareti | virodhamādāya tantuvyavahārānupapattirityavirodhapakṣa
āśrayaṇīyastathā ca vināśavyavahārānupapattirityarthaḥ | nanu
sāmānyato virodhyavirodhicintā tadā bhavet yadi sāmānyaṃ
bhavet tadeva tu nāstītyāha | sāmānyasyeti | evaṃ sati
gotvāśvatvalakṣaṇaviruddhadharmādhyāsābhāvādevāśvādīnāmabheda āpadyete-
tyāha | vilīnamiti | tasya bhedasya | tadāśrayatvāt tada-
dhīnatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tantumālātmaka eva paṭaḥ pūrvatantumālāyā
vināśa ityatra dūṣaṇāntaramāha | api ceti | tantuvināśaḥ
pūrvatantuvināśatvenābhimatastantuviśeṣa ityarthaḥ | sāmānyata iti |
tantutvena rūpeṇa tantorvināśasvarūpatvamityarthaḥ | tadviparīta iti |
na sāmānyena rūpeṇa tantostathātvamityarthaḥ | kathamiti | tanto-
stantutvenaiva rūpeṇa tantuviruddhatve tantuviśeṣatvaṃ na syādityarthaḥ |
sāmānyato nīlatvenaiva rūpeṇetyarthaḥ | nanu tantutvenāviruddhatve'pi
viśeṣata eva virodhaḥ syāt tatkāraṇasya tantoreva tatkāryatantuvi-
rodhaḥ, tathā ca tantujātīyo'pi tantvantaravirodhī syādityāha |
viśeṣeti | evaṃ sati sāmānyatastantuvināśo na tantuvirahasvabhāvo
na vā tadviparīta ityubhayānātmakatvaṃ viruddhaṃ ‘parasparavirodhe hi
na prakārāntarasthiti’riti nyāyādityāha | tatkimiti | yadi
ca sāmānyatastantuvināśobhihitapakṣadvayānātmako viśeṣata eva
virodhāṅgīkārādityupeyate tadānugata1vināśavyavahārānupapattiḥ
kāryameva vināśa iti hānāpattiścetyāha | omiti | nanu
tantutvādisāmānyamalīkatvānna viruddhatvāvacchedakaṃ na vā'līka-
svalakṣaṇayoḥ sambandhaḥ sambhavatītyāha | sāmānyasyeti | evaṃ sati
viruddhadharmādhyāmādbhedo na syādviruddhadharmasyānugatatvenālīkatayā sva-
lakṣaṇenāsambandhādityāha | vilīnamiti | tasya bhedasya | tadā-
śrayatvāt viruddhadharmāśrayatvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | sabhāgasantāne kāryasya vināśatve bādhakāntara-
māha | api ceti | sāmānyatastantuvināśatvena | tantostantusāmānyasya
viraho'nyonyābhāvaḥ svabhāvo yasya sa tathā | tantuvināśaḥ tantuvināśa-
tvāvacchedena tantusāmānyabhinnastantusāmānyābhinno veti vikalpārthaḥ |
ādya iti | tatsāmānyabhinnatvāvacchedakarūpavatastadviśeṣatvāyogāt na
hyanīlasāmānyabhinnatvāvacchedakarūpanīlatvavannīlamanīlaviśeṣo bhavi-
tumarhatītyarthaḥ | virodho bhedaḥ | dvitīye bhasmādilakṣaṇavisabhāga-
viśeṣa iti puº pāº |
santānīyastantuvināśaḥ kathaṃ tantusāmānyavirodhī, tatsāmānyābhinna-
tvāvacchedakarūpavatastatsāmānyabhinnatvāyogāt | na hi nīlasāmānyā-
bhinnatvāvacchedakanīlatvaśāli nīlaṃ nīlasāmānyabhinnamityarthaḥ |
nīlapītādivattantuvināśayoḥ sāmānyato na virodho'pi tu
vyaktiviśeṣayoreveti na tantuvināśasya tantuviśeṣatvānupapattirityā-
śaṅkate | viśeṣamātra eveti | yathā bhavatāṃ janyavināśinorasmākaṃ
vā kalamāṅkurakurvadrūpayoḥ sāmānyato na virodho nāpyavirodhaḥ
kvacitsamāveśasya mitho vyabhicārasya ca darśanāt, tathā tantu-
vināśayorapītyabhyupagame 'nyataratantumādāyā'nugatatantuvināśavyava-
hārānupapattirityāha | omitīti | nanu na tantusāmānyaṃ na
tantumātraṃ vā tantuvināśavyavahāranimittam ? ādye tantutantu-
bhasmanorvyabhicārāt, paraṃ tu sabhāgo visabhāgo vā tatkāryasantāna
eva, evamanyatrāpīti cet | na | santānatvasya durvacatvāt | nanu tantu-
tvādisāmānyasyālīkatvādupādhisāhityenānugatatantuvināśavyavahāra
ityāśayena śaṅkate | sāmānyasyeti | apikārādavirodhaḥ | tasyeti |
tasya bhedasiddhyupayogino virodhasya tadāśrayatvātsāmānyāśrayatvāt |
sāmānyamanugato dharmaḥ | ayamarthaḥ ekamātravṛttidharmayorvirodho
nāśrayabhedamagṛhītvā śakyagrahaḥ gṛhīte tu tasmin virodhānu-
dhāvanamanarthakamataḥ sāmānyayoḥ sāmānyāvacchinnayorvā āśrayāntare
virodho gṛhītavyaḥ taccedalīkatayā na virodhopayogi, na tarhi
viruddhadharmādhyāsena bhedasya siddhiriti ||
nanvatiriktābhāvapakṣe yathā paṭaḥ paṭāntarābhāvavāṃśca
tajjātīyaśca abhāvo vā paṭavirodhī paṭāntarasaha-
vṛttiśceti na kaścidvirodhaḥ tathā kāryābhāvapakṣe'pi
bhaviṣyatīti | naitadevaṃ, pratiyoginā hi tādātmya-
saṃsargaikajātīya1tvāni neṣyante apratiyogitvaprasaṅgāt
bhinnakālatvāt sāmānyato viruddhadharmasaṃsargācca, aprati-
yoginā tu saṃsarge ko doṣaḥ na hi bhedavijātīya-
taikakālatāḥ saṃsargavirodhinyaḥ tādātmyaṃ hi saṃsargitve
viruddhaṃ virodhitvaṃ ca te ca neṣyete eva | nāpi
bādhakānurodhastadabhāvāt ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | paṭāntarābhāvavānityantarapadaṃ sphuṭārtham | yathā
paṭaḥ paṭābhāvavānapi paṭajātīyastathā tanturapi tantunivṛttirbhavet |
paṭavirodhyapyabhāvaḥ paṭāntarasamānādhikaraṇastvayā yatheṣyate tathā
tantuvināśopi tanturmayeṣyata ityarthaḥ | kāryābhāvapakṣa iti | kārya-
rūpābhāvapakṣa ityarthaḥ | pratiyoginā hīti | svābhāvatādātmyaṃ sva-
saṃsargābhāvasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ svābhāvasamāna(ā)jātīyatvaṃ viruddhaṃ tacca
na mayeṣyata ityarthaḥ | abhāvasya pratiyogitādātmyābhāve hetumāha |
apratiyogitveti | pratiyogyanuyogibhāvasya bhedaniyatattvāditi
bhāvaḥ | vināśasya pratiyogyasaṃsarge hetumāha | bhinnakālatvāditi |
abhāvasya pratiyogyaikajātyābhāve hetumāha | sāmānyata iti |
sambandhaikajātīya--pāº 2 puº |
pratiyogyabhāvayoḥ sāmānyato viruddhadharmasaṃsarga evānubhūyate | sa
caikajātye na syādityarthaḥ | apratiyoginā tviti | na hi nīla-
ghaṭasaṃsargiṇaḥ pītaghaṭābhāvasya nīlaghaṭa eva pratiyogī yena
tatsaṃsargo na syādityarthaḥ | na hīti | bhedavaijātyaikakālatve sati
saṃsargasyānubhavasiddhatvādityarthaḥ | nanu tvatpakṣavanmatpakṣepi syādabhāva-
saṃsarga ityata āha | tādātmye hīti | tvayā pratiyogitādātmyama-
bhāvasyeṣyate pratiyogyaviruddhatvaṃ ca | tacca mayā neṣyata1 iti na
matpakṣe doṣāvakāśa iti bhāvaḥ | virodhitvaṃ cetyatra viruddha-
mityanuṣajyate | atiriktābhāve bādhakānurodhādveti yaduktaṃ
tatrāha | nāpīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | abhāvo veti | yathā tasminneva tantau bhāvinaḥ
paṭāntarasya prāgabhāva utpannaśca paṭa ityarthaḥ | tathā kāryeti |
kāryamevābhāva iti pakṣe 'pi tadvirodhitvaṃ tajjātīyatvaṃ ca syādi-
tyarthaḥ | pratiyogināsamamabhāvasya tādātmyānabhyupagamahetumāha |
apratiyogitveti | pratiyogyanuyogibhāvasya bhedādhiṣṭhānatvādi-
tyarthaḥ | bhinneti | prāgabhāvapradhvaṃsayoḥ pratiyogyasamānakālatvādi-
tyarthaḥ | sāmānyata iti | pratiyogitāvacchedakānuyogitāva-
cchedakayorabhede pratiyogyanuyogibhāva eva na syādityavaśyaṃ
tayorviruddhadharmasaṃsargo vācyaḥ | na hīti | bhedavaijātyasamānakālatve
sati sasargadarśanādityarthaḥ | tādātyaṃ hīti | hiśabdastuśabdārthe
te ca mayāneṣyete--pāº 2 puº |
saṃsargasya bhedādhiṣṭhānatvādityarthaḥ | virodhitvaṃ ceti | saṃsargitve
viruddhamityanuṣajyate virodhasyaikatrāsaṃsarganiyamanirūpakatvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | yathā bhavatāmananugatā eva tattattantuvināśāstantu-
vināśatvenānugatā anugataṃ tantuvināśavyavahāramarjayanti tathā-
smākamapi sarūpāṇi virūpāṇi ca tantukāryāṇi tantukāryatvena
tantuvināśatvena vā anugatāni, yathā ca bhavatāṃ viśeṣato virodhepi
sāmānyato na tathā, tathāsmākamapītyāśayena śaṅkate | nanvityādinā |
paṭāntarābhāvavān paṭhāntarabhinnaḥ paṭābhāvo vā svapratiyogipaṭa-
virodhī svāpratiyoginā paṭena sahaikatantvādivṛttiriti saṃsarga
ekakālāccavacchedenaikadeśavṛttitvaṃ dhvaṃsapratiyoginostādātmyādyana-
bhyupagame krameṇa hetūnāha | apratiyogitveti | sāmānyataḥ ādye
tantau visabhāgasyalīyatantunāśe ca tantutvatantuvināśatvayoḥ viro-
dhāvadhāraṇādityarthaḥ | bhāvatvābhāvatvalakṣaṇaviruddhadharmasaṃsargādityapare |
tādātmyaṃ hīti | histvarthaḥ | tādātmyavirodhitve tu saṃsargitvaviruddhe
ityarthaḥ | virodhitvaṃ sahānavasthāyitvam | nanu yathā janyatvena
kādācitkatvādinā abhāvatvena vā tantostatprāgabhāvasya vā
sajātīyopi kaścit taddhvaṃsastathā tantujātīyopyastu upadarśitaśca
mitho vyabhicāriṇorapi samāveśa iti cedevamapi tṛtīyādita-
ntūtpāde prāthamikāditantostṛtīyavisabhāgasantānotpāde ca prātha-
mikasantānasya vināśavyavahāro na syāt tajjanyasya vilayāt |
sarva etatsāntānikastadudīcyastasya vināśa iti cet | na | santānasya
durvacatvādityuktatvāt calasantānotpannaśālini sudūrepi deśe
deśāntaravilīnasya prāthamikasya vināśavattāvyavahāraprasaṅgāt
anantasāntānikānāṃ vināśatvakalpanāmapekṣya ekasyaiva vināśasya
kalpanāyāḥ nyāyyatvācca | athaivamanantaghaṭavyaktīnāmabhāvatvakalpane
gauravāt ghaṭasāmānyābhāvasthāpyabhāvo'tiricyeteti cenna | ghaṭagrahe
ghaṭābhāvasyāgrahādabhāvavyavahārācca ghaṭatvenānugatā ghaṭavyaktaya eva
tadabhāvatvena svīkriyante evamanyonyābhāvānāṃ pratiyogitāvacchedakā
eva dharmā iti | abādhitābhāvapratītyanurodhādabhāvasyāpyatirikta
evābhāvo na cānavasthā tayoḥ parasparaviraharūpatvāṅgīkārāt | evaṃ
dhvaṃsaprāgabhāvayorapi prāgabhāvadhvaṃ sāvityapyekadeśinaḥ | anyonyā-
bhāvasyāpyanyonyābhāvastvanavasthābhayādanāyatyā tattadadhikaraṇarūpaḥ
tattadvṛttidravyatvādirūpo vā svīkriyata iti ||
nanu ghaṭābhāve ghaṭo'sti na vā ? ādye ghaṭavati
tadabhāvaḥ kapāle ghaṭo'stīti tānyapi tadvanti prasajye-
ran, nāstītipakṣe'navasthāprasaṅgaḥ, abhāvāntaramantareṇa
tatra nāstitāvyavahāre bhāvāntare'pi tathā prasaṅgaḥ | na,
bhāvāntarasya (sa)svajātīyatvenāviruddhasajātīyatvāt
viruddhajātīyasya vā samānajātīyatvānupapatteḥ, anyatva-
mātreṇa tathā vyavahāre tadvatyapi prasaṅgāt | abhāvasya tu
viruddhasvabhāvatayaivābhāvāntarānubhavatarkayorabhāvāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | atiriktābhāve bādhakamāśaṅkate | nanviti |
kapāleṣu prāgabhāvasya pradhvaṃsasya vā sattvena tadubhayakāle'pi kapālāni
ghaṭavanti syuḥ evaṃ ghaṭābhāvavati ghaṭe ghaṭo'pi syāt | svābhāva-
vati svasatvaṃ svasminnapi syādevaṃ tatra tatrāpīti ghaṭaparamparāpatti-
riti bhāvaḥ | anavastheti | abhāve abhāvāntaramevaṃ tatra tatrā-
pītyarthaḥ | bhāvāntare'pīti | bhūtalādāvapi ghaṭābhāvavyavahāro-
'dhikaraṇasvarūpeṇaiva syādityarthaḥ | na bhāvāntarasyeti | sajātī-
yatvena bhāvajātīyattvenā'viruddhajātīyatvādabhāvādhikaraṇatvāviro-
dhitvādityarthaḥ | viruddheti | abhāvādhikaraṇatāvirodhenābhāva-
jātīyatvānupapatterityarthaḥ | nanu pratiyogibhinnatvenaiva bhūtalādīnāṃ
ghaṭābhāvavyavahārapravarttakatvamastu kimatiriktābhāvasvīkāreṇetyata
āha | anyatveti | evaṃ sati ghaṭavatopi bhūtalasya ghaṭābhāvavyavahāra-
pravarttakatvaṃ syādityarthaḥ | nanūktamabhāve'pi tarhi svīkriyatāmabhā-
vāntaramityata āha | abhāvastha tviti | abhāve'bhāvāntaraṃ tāva-
nnānubhūyate yadbalenābhāvāntaramaṅgīkriyeta | yadi ghaṭābhāvo ghaṭā-
bhāvavān na syāditi tarkopi nātra prabhavati | yataḥ pratiyogi-
viruddhasvabhāvatayā prathamābhāvādeva ghaṭābhāve ghaṭo nāstīti
vyavahāropapatterdvitīyābhāvakalpanāyā anavakāśāt adhikaraṇasyā-
bhāvarūpasya dvairūpyābhāvācca | na hyabhāvaḥ kadāpi pratiyogimānapi
bhavati yathā bhūtalādiḥ | dvitīyābhāvābhyupagame 'navasthāpatti-
ścettyarthaḥ | apavyākhyānamanyat | kecittu abhāvepi abhāvāntaraṃ,
na cānavasthā tṛtīyamādāya tadāpatteriti vadanti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | atiriktavināśapakṣe bādhakamāha | nanviti |
ādya iti | dhvaṃsaprāgabhāvayoḥ pratiyogisamānadeśatayā ghaṭasama-
vāyikāraṇe kapāle vṛttestayośca vṛttau ghaṭasahitadhvaṃsavatkapālaṃ
syādityarthaḥ tathā ca ghaṭadhvaṃsādikāle'pi ghaṭa upalabhyeteti bhāvaḥ |
bhāvāntarasyeti | atra sajātīyatvaṃ bhāvasajātīyatvaṃ, viruddhajātīya-
tvamabhāvajātīyatvam | tathā ca bhūtalāderbhāvajātīyatvena bhāva-
pratikṣeparūpatayā bhānāsambhavādādhārasvarūpātiriktābhāvaścābhyupeya
ityarthaḥ | nanu ghaṭavadbhūtalasvarūpādvilakṣaṇabhūtalasvarūpeṇābhāva-
vyavahāraḥ syādityata āha | anyatvamātreṇeti | tadvatyapi prati-
yogimatyapi | ghaṭavadbhūtalāntarasyāpi bhāvatvāt tenāpyabhāvavyava-
hārāpatterityarthaḥ | etattarkasahito bhūtale ghaṭo nāstītyabādhi-
tānubhavo yathā'tiriktābhāve mānaṃ na tadvadabhāvepyabhāvāntare mānaṃ
adhikaraṇadvairūpyābhāvāt tenaivābhāvavyavahārānyathāsiddherityāha |
abhāvasya tviti |
kecittu pratītestaulyena ghaṭābhāve'pyabhāvo vartata eva na
cānavasthā, dvitīyatadaṅgīkāre tadabhāvāt | atha dvitīyamā-
dāyaivānavasthā ? tarhi prathamamādāyaiva seti tulyam | ghaṭābhāvo
yadi ghaṭātyantābhāvavānna syāt ghaṭavān syāditi tarkasyāpi
sattvāt | abhāvāntarānubhavatarkayoriti ca viṣayasaptamī | abhā-
vādityasyātiriktābhāvasvīkārādityarthaḥ | tathā cānubhavatarkarūpa-
jñānaviṣayībhūto 'bhāvo'bhyupeya ityarthaḥ | yadvā sa evābhāvastatra
vartate prameyatvavat pramāṇasiddhatvādityāhuḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | bādhakamāśaṅkate | nanviti | ghaṭābhāve ghaṭa-
dhvaṃse | tadvatītyasya paraṃparayetyādi | tathā ca ghaṭadhvaṃsakāle'pi ghaṭaḥ
syādupalabhyeta ceti bhāvaḥ | bhāvāntarasyeti | atra sajātīyatva-
viruddhajātīyatve bhāvatvābhāvatvābhyām | anyatvamātreṇa pratiyogya-
nyatvamātreṇa | tathā vyavahāre pratiyogyabhāvatvavyavahāre | tadvatyapi
pratiyogimatyapi | tadabhāvatvavyavahārasya prasaṅgāt atiprasaṅgācca
pratiyogini | tadvadanyatvena tathā vyavahāra iti cet anyatvasya
svarūpabhedatvenānanugamāt | abhāve abhāvāntaraṃ nirasyati |
abhāvasyeti | abhāve abhāvāntaraṃ na tāvadaviruddhasvabhāvena, nāpya-
dhikaraṇasvarūpeṇābhāvavyavahārajanane pratiyogimatyapi tadāpattyā
svīkāryam abhāvasya viruddhasvabhāvatvena tadayogāt, nāpyanubhava-
balādbhedasiddhiḥ nāpyabhāvavatvapratyayāt abhāvāntaropagama anyonyā-
śrayacakrakānavasthānāmanyataraprasaṅgena lāghavādātmāśrayasyopagamāt |
etena ghaṭābhāvo yadi ghaṭabhāvavānna syāt ghaṭavān syādityāde-
starkasyāpyāpādakāsiddhyā abhāvāditi ||
bhinnābhāvajanmani ghaṭatāddyaktyaṃ doṣa iti cenna |
ghaṭatādvyaktyaṃ hi yadi ghaṭatvameva abhimatameva tat |
na hyabhāvajanmani ghaṭo'ghaṭatāmupaitītyabhyupagacchāmaḥ |
tatkālasattvaṃ cenna tarhyabhāvo jātaḥ kālāntare ghaṭāna-
vasthānasvabhāva eva hi tadabhāvaḥ | astu tarhi niru-
pādānatvaṃ bādhakaṃ janmana upādānavyāptatvāt iti
cenna | dharmigrāhakapramāṇabādhāt bhāvāvacchedācca vyāpteḥ |
etena nirupādeyatvaṃ vyākhyātam | guṇādisiddhau cānai-
kāntikatvāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu yathā paṭe jāte'pi ghaṭastadavastha eva
tathā dhvaṃse jāte'pi ghaṭastadavastha eva syādanyatvāviśeṣāt tathā
ca pratiyogitādātmyameva vināśasyābhyupeyamityāha | bhinneti |
tādavasthyamiti | ghaṭajātīyatvaṃ vā ghaṭasya dhvaṃsānantarakāla-
sthāyitvaṃ vā | ādyamāha | evametaditi | tadevopapādayati |
nahīti | dvitīyam āha | tatkāleti | dhvaṃsakālasattvamityarthaḥ |
dhvaṃsasya pratiyogyasamānakālīnatvasvābhāvyādityarthaḥ | atiriktā-
bhāvapakṣe bādhakāntaramāśaṅkate | astu tarhīti | dhvaṃso na jāyate
nirupādānatvādākāśavadityarthaḥ | upādānaṃ samavāyikāraṇam |
ihedānīṃ ghaṭo naṣṭa iti pratyakṣeṇa dhvaṃsasyotpannatvameva viṣayī-
kriyate, tathā cānutpāde sādhye dharmigrāhakamānabādha ityarthaḥ |
nirupādherbādhasyānavakāśādupādhimāha | bhāveti | yadyapyabhāvāntare
sādhyāvyāpakoyamupādhistathāpi dhvaṃsetaratvamihopādhitvena viva-
kṣitam, na ca pakṣetaratvaṃ, bādhonnītasya tasyānumatatvāt | nanu dhvaṃso
na jāyate nirupādeyatvāt gotvādivadityastvanumānamityāha |
eteneti | nirupādeyatvaṃ dharmigrāhakapramāṇabādhena bādhonnītapakṣe-
taropādhigrāsena ca nirākāryatvena vyākhyātamityarthaḥ | guṇakarmā-
deśca guṇibhinnatvena middhau tatrānaikāntikaṃ kāryatvāśritatva1-
mityāha | guṇādīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yadi ghaṭādbhinnastadabhāvastadā tadatpattā-
vapi ghaṭasya na kiñciddhīyata iti ghaṭaḥ syādeva, nahi yo yadbhinnaḥ
sa tadabhāvātmā paṭotpāde'pi ghaṭasya nivṛttyāpatteḥ ato'bhāva-
syaivābhāvatādātmyasupalabhyata ityāha | bhinneti | astu tarhīti |
atiriktābhāva iti śeṣaḥ | janmanaḥ samavāyikāraṇavyāptatvāt
dhvaṃsasya cāsamavetatvena tadabhāvāt janmaiva nivarteta tathā ca dhvaṃso
na jāyate nirupādānatvāt prāgabhāvavadityarthaḥ | taddharmigrāhaka
mānabādhitaṃ dhvaṃsasya pratiyogijanyābhāvatayā tadgrāhakamānena
janyatvasyāpi viṣayīkaraṇādityāha | dharmmigrāhaketi | yadyapi
bhāvatvamupādhirabhāve sādhyāvyāpakaṃ tathāpi bādhonnītapakṣetaratva-
mupādhiranenopalakṣyata ityāśayenāha | bhāveti | yadyapi sphuṭe
vyabhicāre niṣphala upādhistathāpi nirupādherbādhānavakāśa ityu-
pādhiruktaḥ | bādhakāntaraṃ nirākāryatvenātidiśati | eteneti |
(tadu)upādeyaṃ samavetakāryaṃ tannirgataṃ yasmāt tat tathā tasya
bhāvastattvam | atrāpi dharmmigrāhakamānabādhonnītapakṣetaratvamupādhi-
rityarthaḥ | nirākaraṇāntaramāha | guṇādīti | yasya nopādeyaṃ
tanna jāyata iti guṇāderguṇyādibhyo bhedasiddhāvanaikāntikaṃ
tadasiddho vyāpyatvāsiddhamityarthaḥ ||
kāryānāśrayatvamiti 2 puº pāº |
raghuº ṭīº | bādhakāntaramāśaṅkate | bhinnābhāveti | nahya-
kāryotpāde akāraṇaṃ nivarttate ghaṭotpāde paṭanivṛttiprasaṅgādataḥ
kāryameva vināśa āsthīyata iti bhāvaḥ | bhinnamātra iva
kāryamātre'pi vināśabuddhivyavahārayorabhāvāt kāryaviśeṣa eva
vināśa āsthīyata ityāśayavān nirākaroti | neti | bādhakā-
ntaramāśaṅkate | astu tarhīti | janmana iti | janmavyāpakasya
sopādānatvasya nivṛttervyāpyasya janmano nivṛttiriti | dharmigrāha-
keti | ghaṭāderiva dhvaṃsasyāpi janyatāyāḥ pratyakṣasiddhatvāditi |
bhāveti | bhāvajanmana eva sopādānatvaniyamādityarthaḥ ||
astu tarhi vyāpakatvaṃ dhruvabhāvitvamiti cenna | atā-
dātmyāt atatkaraṇatvācca asmaddiśāpi vyāptigraho
na sāhityaniyamena virodhitayā viṣamasamayatvāt |
nāpi janmānantaryaniyamena tadasiddheḥ, siddhau vā tata
eva kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddheḥ | kimanena, bhaviṣyattāmātreṇa
vyāpakatvamastīti cedastu, na tvetāvatā hetvantarāna-
pekṣatvasiddhiḥ adyatanaghaṭasya śvastanakapālamālayaivānai-
kāntikatvāditi1 |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | caturthaṃ dhruvabhāvitvaṃ nirākarttuṃ śaṅkate | astviti |
vyāpakatvaṃ pratiyogivyāpakatvaṃ vināśasyetyarthaḥ | tathā ca siddha-
anaikāntāditi 2 puº pāº |
mahetukatvaṃ nāśasyeti bhāvaḥ | paramate tādātmyatadutpattibhyāmeva
vyāptirityabhipretyāha | atādātmyāditi | yadā pratiyogī tadā
dhvasa iti kālagarbhāpi na vyāptirityāha | viṣamasamayatvāditi |
yaḥ pratiyogī sa eva vināśa iti tu pūrvameva nirastam | yatra
pratiyogī tatra dhvaṃsa iti deśagarbhāpi na vyāptirāśrayanāśajanya-
dravyādidhvaṃse vyabhicārāditi bhāvaḥ | svotpatyavyavahitottarakṣaṇa
eva dhvaṃsa ityapi niyamonāstyasiddherityāha | nāpīti | tata
eveti | etanniyamabalādevetyarthaḥ | tathā ca dhruvabhāvitvādahetukatva-
mahetukatvācca dhvaṃsasyāgrimakṣaṇa evotpāda iti prakriyāgauravamiti
bhāvaḥ | nanūtpannasya vināśo bhaviṣyatyavetyapi niyama evetyā-
śaṅkate | astviti | etādṛśadhruvabhāvitvenāhetukatva vā pratiyogi-
bhinnahetvanapekṣitvaṃ vā sādhayituṃ na śakyata ityarthaḥ | kuto na śakyata
ityata āha | adyataneti | śvastanakapālamālāyā avaśyaṃbhāvinyā
api mudgaraprahārādirūpahetvantarāpekṣitvanānaikāntyādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bauddhānāṃ tādātmyatadutpattibhyāmeva vyāptigrahaḥ
na ca dhvaṃsaḥ pratiyogyātmā na vā tatkāraṇamityāha | atā-
dātmyāditi | na dhvaṃsasya pratiyogimātrajanyatayā vyāpakatvaṃ tasya
sāmagrījanyatayā tadasiddheriti bhāvaḥ | asmanmatenāpi yadā
yadā pratiyogī tadā tadā dhvaṃsa iti na kālagarbhā vyāptiḥ
dhvaṃsapratiyoginorbhinnakālatvaniyamādityāha | asmaddiśeti | na
ca pratiyogyavyavahitottarakṣaṇabhāvitayā dhvaṃsasya vyāptigrahaḥ tasya
sādhyatvenāsiddherityāha | nāpīti | vyāptigrahaḥ ityanuṣajyate |
siddhau veti | tadgrāhakādeva mānāt kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhirityarthaḥ |
bauddhamatena vyabhicāramāha | adyataneti | śvastanakapālamālāyā
ghaṭaṃ prati bhaviṣyattāmātreṇa vyāpakatve'pi hetvantarāpekṣatvādityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | pareṣāṃ tādātmyatadutpattibhyāmeva vyāpyatvagrahā-
dvyāpakatvamapi tadātmakatatkaraṇayoreva gṛhyate | na ca dhvaṃsaḥ prati-
yogyātmeti prāgevāveditaṃ na vā pratiyogikāraṇamiti natadvyāpa-
katvagraha ityāha | atādātmyādityādi | sāhityaniyamo hi
deśato vā syātkālato vā ? deśopi saṃyogī vā samavāyī vā ?

bhagīº ṭīº | bhāvāvacchinneti | atra prāgabhāvāvacchinna-

sampradāyavidaḥ | yadvā pūrvāparitoṣeṇāha | prāgiti | abhāvapadaṃ

mānabādhaḥ pratiyogijanyābhāvasya dhvaṃsatvāt, tathā prāgabhāvo
jāyata ityatrāpi, tathāhi tantuṣu paṭo bhaviṣyatīti buddhiḥ

yo'yaṃ paṭādirutpadyamāno dṛśyate sa pūrvamapyutpannaḥ kiṃ tu

atrāyathārthatve bādhakamāha | ayathārthatva iti | kālaviccheda-

nupapatteḥ |
