dharmijñānepi kaściddharmo gṛhyate kaścinnetyupakārabhedānniyamaḥ syāt,
evamupakārepi kartavye upakārāntarasya śaktāvapi śaktyantarāpekṣāyā-
manavasthetyupakāraśaktyorabhedo vācyaḥ, tathā caikopādhiviśiṣṭadharmi-
grahe sakalopādhiviśiṣṭatadgrahaḥ syādityarthaḥ | tadāha |
ekopakārake grāhye nopakārāstatopare |
dṛṣṭe tasminnadṛṣṭā ye tadgrahe sakalagraha iti |
sāmagrībhedāddharmibodhepi kasyaciddharmasya bodhepi kasyacidabodhaḥ
syāditi sandigdhānaikāntikamityāha | upādhitadvatāmiti ||
raghuº ṭīº | bodhanatvaṃ bodharūpatvaṃ bodhajanakatvaṃ ca,
vyutpattibhedāt | tathā ca vikalpe dharmābodharūpatvena dharmibodha-
rūpatvābhāvaḥ śabde ca dharmābodhakatve dharmibodhakatvābhāvaḥ sādhya
iti | athāsiddho heturgodharmagotvabodhanatvāt tayorata āha |
nīleti | tathā ca yatkiṃciddharmābodhanatvaṃ heturna tu dharmamātrā-
bodhanatvamiti bhāvaḥ | niyamaṃ sādhayati | dharmīti | dharmāṇāṃ madhye |
etaduktaṃ bhavati, jñāyamāne dharmiṇi dharmasya jñānaṃ dharmiṇi sattā-
mātreṇa, dharmmijanitajñānānukūlopakāraśālitvena vā, ādye yuga-
patsarvadharmmagrahaṇadhrauvyaṃ, antye dharmiṇopakārasya janane svarūpeṇa
tadanukūlaśaktiśālitvena vā | ādye avirodhātsarvatropakārādhā-
nādyugapatsarvagrahaṇam | dvitīye'pi śaktirekā anekā vā | ekā
cet pūrvoktamanuvarttate | anekā cettajjananāyānekaśakyantarābhyapa-
game'navasthā | dharmisvarūpamātrādhīnatvena dharmikāraṇādhīnatvena vā
śakterbhedānupapattiḥ, śaktiyaugapadyāccopakārasya jñānasya ca yaugapadya-
māvaśyakaṃ, taduktaṃ--
ekopakārake grāhye nopakārāstato'pare |
dṛṣṭe tasminnadṛṣṭā ye tadgrahe sakalagrahaḥ | iti
ṭīkākāropadarśitastu grantho vistarabhayānneha prastūyate iti
pramāṇaṭīkāyāmevānusaṃdheya iti | tasya bhāvavaicitryasya | svakāra-
ṇeti, janyamupādhimadhikṛtya | tasya kāraṇasya | syādetat |
siddhe bodhakasāmagrīpratiniyame tanniyāmakasvabhāvavaicitryamāstheyaṃ,
tadeva tu kuta ityata āha | tasyāpīti | tadā vyavahitasya
guṇībhūtasyāpi sāmagrīpratiniyamasya parāmarṣo yogyatābalāt |
kāryye dharmmiṇi gṛhyamāṇe kadācideva kasyacidupādhergrahaḥ anvaya-
vyatirekābhyāṃ kāraṇatvagrahepi aparidṛśyamānakāraṇasya kathaṃ siddhi-
rityata āha | tasyāpīti | ityapi kecit ||
yattu śakterabhedādityādi, tattadā śobheta yadi
dharmimātrādhīnastadbodhamātrādhīno1 vā tāvanmātrabodha-
sāmagyradhīno vā yāvadupādhibheda2bodhaḥ syāt, na
caivam |
dhīnastāvaº iti 1 puº pāº |
upādhibodhaḥ iti 1 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | śakterabhedādupakārābhede sarvopādhisahita-
bodho'bodhoveti dūṣayati | yattviti | yadyapi dharmimātrādhīnatve
tadbodhādhīnatve ca yaugapadyabodhaniyamo na bhavati, tathāpi tadapi
neṣyata iti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tadbodheti | yadyapi dharmabodhasya dharmibodhā-
dhīnatvena dharmābodhanatvena dharmibodhanatvābhāvasādhanaṃ sudūranirastaṃ,
tathāpi yugapadaśeṣadharmagrahāpādakatvābhāvāttannirasyata iti bhāvaḥ |
tāvanmātraṃ dharmimātram ||
etena bhedāddharmiṇaḥ pratītāvapi śabdaliṅgadvārā
dharmāṇāṃ cedapratītiḥ, indriyadvārāpi mābhūdityādikaṃ
tu karṇasparśe kaṭicālanamapāstam | tattadupādhyupalambha-
sāmagrīvirahakāle prasañjitasyeṣṭatvāt | vicitraśakti-
tvācca pramāṇānām, liṅgasya prasiddhapratibandhaprati-
sandhānaśaktikatvāt, śabdasya samayasīmavikramatvāt,
indriyasya tvarthaśakterapyapekṣaṇāt | na tu sambaddho'rtha
ityeva pramāṇaiḥ pramāpyate,1 atiprasaṅgāt | yasya
tūpādherupalambha eva yena pramāṇena dharmyupalabhyate tasyā-
nupalambhe sa tena nopalabhyata iti paraṃ yujyate, sarvo-
pādhyanupalambhe vā, tathā ca siddhasādhanamiti saṅkṣepaḥ ||
pratyāppate iti 1 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | bhedāditi | dharmadharmiṇorbhedādityarthaḥ |
śabdaliṅgābhyāṃ yathā vahne rūpaparimāṇādikaṃ na gṛhyate, kiṃ tu
vahnisvarūpamātraṃ, tathā pratyakṣamapi dharmimātraviṣayamastu, pramāṇānāṃ
tulyapratibhāsasāmānyā1diti bhāvaḥ | śabdaliṅgasvābhāvyaṃ karṇasparśaḥ,
tadvadeva pratyakṣasvābhāvyāpādanaṃ kaṭicālanam | yadvā yāvaddharmāṇāma-
grahaṇaṃ karṇasparśaḥ, tadvadeva dharmiṇopyagrahaṇāpādanaṃ kaṭicālanam |
yadvā yāvaddharmaviśiṣṭadharmyagrahaṇaṃ cediti karṇasparśaḥ, tadā vikalpa-
kānāmatadvyāvṛttiviṣayatāpādanaṃ kaṭicālanam | yathā śabdaliṅge
upādhiṃ na gṛhṇītaḥ, tathā pratyakṣamapyupādhiṃ na gṛhṇīyādityāpādane
vaiyyadhikaraṇyānmūlaśaithilyamuktvā iṣṭāpādanamāha | tattaditi |
tarkamūlavyāptāvupādhimāha | vicitreti | śaktivaicitryānna tulyā-
bhāsaniyama ityarthaḥ | vicitraśaktikatvamevāha | liṅgasyeti |
prasiddho dṛḍhatarapramāṇāvadhārito yaḥ pratibandhastatpratisandhānaṃ
pakṣadharme saiva śaktiryasyetyarthaḥ | samayaḥ saṅketaḥ | saiva sīmā maryādā
tadāyattovikramaḥ pravṛttiryasyetyarthaḥ | arthaśakteriti | tathā cendri-
yārthasannikarṣādijanyaṃ pratyakṣamato yāvadbhirupādhibhiḥ sannikarṣastāva-
dupādhiviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇo grahaṇaṃ syādevetyarthaḥ | nanu rūpasparśa-
saṅkhyāparimāṇādiviśiṣṭasyaiva vahnervyāpyo dhūmaḥ śabdaśca vastugatyā
tāvadupādhiviśiṣṭa eva saṅketita iti tābhyāmapyupādhi2viśiṣṭa
dharmigrahaḥ syādityata āha | natviti | tāvadupādhivaiśiṣṭyena na
sāmarthyā--pāº 1 puº |
tāvadupādhi--pāº 1 puº |
vyāpakatā na vā vācyatetyarthaḥ | yadvā nanu yāvadupādhīndriyasanni-
karṣe cettāvatāmupādhīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ tadā sarvopādhiviśiṣṭagrahaṇaṃ
pratyakṣeṇāpādyata ityata āha | na tviti | tatrāpi dṛṣṭānti-
kānuvidhānānniyama ityarthaḥ | vyāpakatāvacchedakasya śakyatāvaccheda-
kasya vā vahnitvāderupalambha eva liṅgaśabdābhyāṃ vahnirbhāsate iti
tadanupalambhe vā vahnirna tābhyāṃ bhāsatāmiti cet sādhyate tadā
siddhasādhanamityāha | yasyeti | sarveti | kasyāpyupādheranupalambha
ityarthaḥ ||
bhagī ṭīº | eteneti | dharmāṇāṃ bhinnasāmagrībodhyatvavyutpāda-
nenetyarthaḥ | ekasya pramāṇasya dharmaviśeṣābodhakatvenānyasyāpi tasya
tadbodhakatvamiti bhrāntirupahāsabījam | na tviti | cakṣuṣā
rūpagrahe, tadgatagatyādigrahaprasaṅgādityarthaḥ | nanvevaṃ dharmadharmiṇorbhedā-
dbhinnasāmagrībodhyatvena kadācinnirddharmakasyāpi dharmiṇo bodhaḥ
syāt, na caivam, antataḥ sattvasyāpi grahādityata āha | yasya
tviti | yena karaṇenetyarthaḥ | sarvopādhyanupalambhovetyatra nopalabhyata
ityanuṣañjanīyam ||
raghuº ṭīº | etena dharmāṇāṃ bhinnasāmagrībodhyatvena |
bhedāccedapratītirityanvayaḥ | pramāṇānāṃ dharmibodhakatvāviśeṣe
dharmabodhakatvābodhakatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣaḥ kutastya ityata āha |
vicitreti | pratisandhānaṃ pakṣadharmatāniścayaḥ | arthasya śaktiryogya-
tādiḥ | atiprasaṅgāt rūpādipratītau rasāderapi pratyayaprasaṅgāt |
ekasyeva sarveṣāmapi dharmāṇāmagrahe dharmigrahaṇāpattirata āha |
yasya tviti | yena pramāṇena | yathā gṛhyamāṇe eva rūpe nayanena
dravyaṃ vyāpakatāvacchedake ca liṅgena vyāpakamiti | sa dharmī |
sarvopādhyanupalambhe vā sa nopalabhyata iti yujyate ||
syādetat | yadīndriyeṇa samānaviṣayāveva liṅga-
śabdau, tataḥ pratibhāsabhedo'nupapannaḥ | ekaviṣayatvaṃ
hi pratibhāsābhedena vyāptaṃ savyetaranayanadṛṣṭavat dṛṣṭam,
na ceha tathā, yathā hi pratyakṣe cetasi deśakālāvasthā-
niyatāni parisphuṭarūpāṇi svalakṣaṇāni pratibhānti,
na tathā śabde laiṅgikavikalpepi | tatra hi vijā-
tīyavyāvṛttamiva parasparākārasaṅkīrṇamivāsphuṭamiva
pratyakṣāparicitaṃ kiñcidrūpamābhāsamānamanubhavaviṣayaḥ,
na copāyabhedamātreṇa pratibhāsabheda upapadyate, na hi
pratipattyupāyāḥ pratipattyākāraṃ parivarttayitumīśate, na
caikaṃ vastu dvyākāramiti pratibandhasiddhiḥ | asya
prayogaḥ, yo'yaṃ kvacidvastuni pratyakṣapratibhāsādviparītaḥ
pratibhāso nāsau tenaikaviṣayo yathā ghaṭagrahāt paṭa-
pratibhāsaḥ, tathā ca gavi pratyakṣapratibhāsādviparītaḥ
pratibhāso vikalpakāla iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yathendriyaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ, tathā liṅgaśabdāvapi
yadi tadviṣayau syātāṃ tadā pratibhāsāvailakṣaṇyaṃ na syāt atastau
na svalakṣaṇaṃ spṛśata ityāha | syādetaditi | yathetyādinā
pratibhāsabhedameva sphuṭayati | parivarttayitum anyathākarttum | nanu
vastusvābhāvyameva dvirūpamastu bhinnapramāṇapratibhāsaṃ yena syādityata
āha | na caikamiti | pratibandheti | yadbhāvābhāvasādhāraṇaṃ
tadanyavyāvṛttiniṣṭhamiti pratibandhasiddhirityarthaḥ | bhāvābhāva-
sādhāraṇatvasyaiva hetoranena prakāreṇa prapañcanāt | asya prayoga
iti | ayaṃ praghaṭṭakārthaḥ, prayogamāropya daśyata ityarthaḥ | etatprati-
bandhādhīnaḥ prayogo vetyarthaḥ | vastunīti sphuṭārtham, pratyakṣaprati-
bhāsatvāvacchinnādvaiparītyaṃ na vivakṣitaṃ, tena na dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ, anyathā
parapratibhāsasyāpi pratyakṣapratibhāsatvādvaiparītyāsiddherdṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ
syāt | gavīti | svalakṣaṇe yaḥ pratyakṣapratibhāso nirvikalpakaṃ
tadviparītaṃ sacikalpakamiti na tasya svalakṣaṇaviṣayatetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yadyena sahaikaviṣayaṃ tattena sahānyūnāna-
tiriktaviṣayaṃ, yathā vāmadakṣiṇacakṣurjanye jñāne, indriyeṇa samāna-
viṣayau ca śabdavikalpāviti tayorapi tathātvāpattirityāha |
yadīti | pratibhāsabhedaḥ parasparāviṣayaviṣayakatvam | dṛṣṭavadityatra
bhāve ktaḥ | pratibhāsabhedamāha | vyāvṛttamiveti | sajātīya-
vyaktīnāmapi mitho vyāvṛttirbhāsata ityarthaḥ | asphuṭamiveti |
asādhāraṇo dharmo na gṛhyata ityarthaḥ | nanu jñānakaraṇabhedādupa-
patsyata ityata āha | na hīti | tāvatā jñāne paraṃ vaijātyaṃ syāt,
na tu viṣayabhedaniyama ityarthaḥ | bhinnakaraṇajajñānayostvayāpya-
bhinnapratibhāsatvopagamāditi bhāvaḥ | yo ya iti | vivādapadaṃ
vikalpo na pratyakṣeṇa samānaviṣayaḥ, tenānyūnānatiriktaviṣayatva-
virahitvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | samānaviṣayatvaṃ vyāpārānubandhitayā | prati-
bhāseti | pratibhāsasya bhedo nyūnādhikaviṣayatvaṃ, tadvirahaścābhedaḥ,
tadvyāpyamityarthaḥ | dṛṣṭavaditi saptamīsamarthādvatiḥ | nayanābhyāṃ dṛṣṭe
nayanayorekaviṣayatvaṃ pratibhāsābhedaśceti | cetasi jñāne | vijā-
tīyavyāvṛttamiveti | vyāvarttakagotvādisphūrttāvapi vyāvṛtterasphura-
ṇāt | etacca gotvādervidhirūpatāmate | vyāvṛttirūpatānaye tu
vyāvarttakadharmāsphuraṇāt | paraspareti | sajātīyāntarādvyāvṛttera-
sphuraṇāt | asphuṭamiti | asādhāraṇadharmāsphuraṇāt | vaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ
nirasyannāha | asya prayoga iti | kvacidvastunīti yatkiñcidviṣayā-
pekṣayā nyūnatvasya lābhāya | tathā ca yo yatpratibhāsaviṣaya-
yatkiñcidvastvaviṣayako nāsau tadviṣayaviṣayaka iti vyāptiḥ ||
idamapyavadyam | citrācitrapratibhāsābhyāṃ mitho
viruddhābhyāmekanīlabiṣayābhyāmanaikāntāt | na hi
citrādhyakṣe yannīlaṃ cakāsti tadeva paścānna kevalaṃ tadaiva
vā puruṣāntarasya | yenākāreṇaikaviṣayatvaṃ tayorna tenaiva
virodho yena ca virodho na tenaikaviṣayatvam | dharmā-
ntarākāreṇa virodho nīlamātrākāreṇa caikaviṣayateti
cet, nanvihāpi dharmāntarākāreṇa virodho gotva-
vatpiṇḍamātrākāreṇa caikaviṣayateti tāvanmātranirā-
karaṇe'siddho hetuḥ | pūrvatra siddhasādhanam | na hi
śābdalaiṅgikavikalpakāle deśakālaniyamādayopi sarva
eva dharmaviśeṣā viṣayabhāvamāsādayantītyabhyupagacchāmaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ekameva nīlaṃ samastacitrapaṭadarśinā citratvena
savṛtāparabhāgapaṭadarśinā cācitratvena pratīyate, pratibhāsabhedepi na
viṣayabheda ityanaikānta ityāha | citrācitreti | yadyapi tatra
nīle'citrabuddhirbhrāntā tathāpi pratibhāsabhedo'styevetyarthaḥ | nanu
citratvācitratvābhyāṃ virodho nīlatvena caikaviṣayateti na tatrānai-
kāntikamiti śaṅkate | yeneti | gotvavadvyaktiviṣayatayā samāna-
viṣayatvaṃ sādhayāmaḥ prasibhāsabhedaśca deśakālaniyatattvāniyatatva-
sphuṭāsphuṭatvādibhiḥ tvadupadarśitairiti tulyamiti pariharati |
nanvihāpīti | tāvanmātreti | śabdaliṅgavikalpānāṃ svalakṣaṇa-
viṣayatānirākaraṇe prasibhāsabhedo hetuḥ svarūpāsiddhaḥ, vastuni
sarveṣāṃ samānapratibhāsattvādityarthaḥ | pūrvatreti | deśakālaniyamādiṣu
pratibhāsabhedena bhinnaviṣayattvaṃ yadi sādhyate tadā siddhasādhanaṃ, na
hi ye deśāvacchedāḥ pratyakṣeṇa bhāsante te śabdaliṅgābhyāmapītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | pratibhāsabhedo yadi viṣayabhedakṛta eva vivakṣitaḥ
syāt, tadā sādhyāviśeṣaḥ syāditi svarūpata eva sa vācyaḥ, tatrāha |
citreti | na hīti | yadeva citrādhyakṣe nīlaṃ bhātaṃ tadeva kevalamapi
paścāt tasya puruṣasya nīlabuddhau na bhāsata iti nāsti, api tu
tadeva bhāsata ityarthaḥ | kṣaṇabhaṅgamūlikāṃ parasyāsiddhiṃ nivārayati |
tadaiva veti | yadekaṃ nīlaṃ yadekasya nīlabuddhau cakāsti, tadevā-
nyasya kevalaṃ tannīlaṃ na cakāstīti netyarthaḥ | yenākāreṇa nīlatvena |
yena virodhaḥ citratvena | dharmāntaraṃ citratvaṃ citravikalpe, kevala-
nīlavikalpe ca tadaviṣayatvam | asiddha iti | viruddhadharmāntare-
ṇaikaviṣayatvāvirodhāt sandigdhānaikāntikatvena vyāpyatvāsiddho
heturityarthaḥ | nanviheti | yena rūpeṇa virodhastenaikaviṣayatvasya
naiyāyikairanabhyupagamādityarthaḥ | tadeva viśadayati | na hīti |
tathā ca pratyakṣe ye dharmā bhāsante tadaviṣayakatvepi laiṅgikādi-
vikalpānāṃ dharmiviṣayatvamaviruddhamiti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | pareṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikatvādāha | tadevetyādi |
yenākāreṇa nīlattvena | yena virodhaścitratvena | athaivaṃ yatpratibhāsa-
viṣayayadarthāviṣayako yaḥ pratibhāso nāsau tenārthena tatsamāna-
viṣaya iti paryavasitā vyāptiḥ, tathā ca yadi pratyakṣaviṣayagotva-
vatpiṇḍāviṣayatvaṃ hetūkriyate tadā svarūpāsiddhiḥ, pratyakṣavacchabdā-
divikalpasyāpi gotvavatpiṇḍaviṣayatvopagamāt | pratyakṣaviṣaya-
deśādiniyamāviṣayatvaṃ, tadā siddhasādhanaṃ, deśādiniyamenārthena
pratyakṣasamānaviṣayatāvirahasya śabdādivikalpe'smābhirabhyupagamā-
dityāha | nanvihāpītyādinā | dharmāntaraṃ deśakālaniyamādi |
tāvanmātraṃ gotvavatpiṇḍākāreṇaikaviṣayatvam | pūrvatra pūrvābhihita-
dharmmāntarākāreṇaikaviṣayatāyā nirākaraṇe ||
nanu dharmiṇyeva sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhāsabhedaḥ katham | na
kathañcit | yathā yathā hi dharmāḥ pratibhānti tathā
tathā sphuṭeti pratibhānavyavahāraḥ, yathā yathā ca dharmā-
ṇāmapratipatti stathā tatha pratibhānasya māndyavyavahāro
dūrāntikādau pratyakṣepi lokānām, na tu sarvathaivā-
pratipattau |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu yadi śabdaliṅgayorapi dharmyeva viṣa-
yastadā sa evaikatra sphuṭo'nyatrāsphuṭaḥ kathaṃ bhāsatāmityāha |
nanviti | prakāśaḥ sarva eva sphuṭaḥ, sphuṭāsphuṭavyavahāraśca bahu-
tarālpataradharmaviṣayatānibandhana ityāha | na kathañciditi |
etadevāha | yathā yatheti | na tviti | yadi śabdaliṅga-
yorddharmiviṣayatā na syāttadā tatrāsphuṭatāpi na bhavedityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu pratyakṣasya sphuṭapratibhāsatvaṃ dharmiviṣayatvaṃ
tadaviṣayatvaṃ ca laiṅgikādivikalpānāmasphuṭatvamiti tadanyathānupapattyā
teṣāmalīkasāmānyamātraviṣayatvamadhyakṣasya dharmiviṣayatvaṃ ca kalpyata
ityāha | nanviti | ubhayordharmiviṣayatvepi bhūyastaddharmaviṣayatvā-
viṣayatvābhyāmeva tadupapatterna tatkalpanamityāha | na kathañciditi |
tadeva sphuṭayati | yathā yatheti | ataeva dharmiviṣayakepi
dūrāntikapratyakṣe sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhāsatvaṃ dṛṣṭamityāha | dūreti |
na tviti | asphuṭatvamiti śeṣaḥ | dharmiṇo'pratītāveva nāsphu-
ṭatvamityathaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | pratyayānāṃ sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhāsatvaṃ, na caikārthaḥ
sphuṭo'sphuṭaśca sambhavati, virodhāt, ataḥ sphuṭapratibhāsasyādhyakṣasya
sphuṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvaṃ, asphuṭapratibhāsasya laiṅgikādivikalpasyā-
sphuṭālīkaviṣayatvamityāśaṅkate | nanviti | adhyakṣāṇāṃ nīla-
pītādyākārabhedavadadhyakṣalaiṅgikayorapi sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhāsatvabhedo
viṣayabheda vinā'nupapanna ityāśaṅkate | nanviti | ityapi kaścit |
dharmiṇyeva ekasminneva dharmiṇi | bahutarālpataradharmmavaddharmiviṣayatvameva
sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhābhatvaṃ, nādhikaṃ, mānābhāvāt, tacca naikaviṣayatva-
virodhītyāha | na kathañciditi | pratyakṣe ekaviṣayepi | na
tviti | tadagrāhiṇastatrāsphuṭapratibhāsatvānupapatteriti ||
vidūrādipratyayopi pakṣa eveti cet | astu | na tu
tāvatāpi dharmadharmibhedasiddhau pratyakṣabādhasya tatsandehepi
sandigdhānaikāntikasya vā parihāraḥ, tāvatāpi prati-
bhāsabhedasyopapatteḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pakṣa eveti | tatrāpi sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhāsa-
prabhedena saddravyapārthivādipratibhāsabhedena vā viṣayabhedaṃ sādhayiṣyāma
ityarthaḥ | atadvyāvṛttiviṣayatāṃ yadi dūrādipratyayānāṃ sādhayasi
tadā pratyakṣebādha eva, vidhisphuraṇasya sādhitatvāt | viṣayabheda-
pratibhāsabhedena dharmiṇorbhede dūrāntikapratyayānāṃ dharmyaviṣayatve sādhye
bādha ityanye | taccintyam | pratibhāsabhedena viṣayabhedamātra-
sādhanaṃ tu sandigdhānaikāntikaparāhatam | pratibhāsabhedopi syānna
tu viṣayabheda iti vipakṣabādhakābhāvāt | tatsandehe dharmadharmibheda-
sandehe vā bādhasandehe vā ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu dūrādisavikalpakānāmapi dharmiviṣaya-
tvamasiddhamityāha | dūrādīti |1 yadi dharmadharmiṇorabhedaḥ
syāttadā kiñciddharmābhāne dharmyabhānaṃ syāt, na tvevam, kintu tayo-
rbhedaḥ, tathā ca dūrāntikapratyayānāṃ dharmyaviṣayatve sādhye bādhaḥ,
anuvyavasāyena dharmiviṣayatvasya pramiteḥ, bādhasandehepi sandigdhānai-
kāntikam, dharmiviṣayakatvepi kiñciddharmāviṣayakatvenāsphuṭatvopa-
pattiruktatvādityāha | na tviti ||
raghuº ṭīº | dūradūratarādipratyayā api nāsmākaṃ svalakṣaṇa-
sākṣiṇo na vā sākṣātkāriṇaḥ para tvalīkālambanā anādi-
vikalpavāsanāsamutthāḥ samāropitasākṣātkārā ityāśaṅkate |
dūrādīti pāṭhamanusṛtyavyākhyātam |
vidūrādīti | pakṣaḥ pakṣatulyakakṣaḥ | natvityādi | yamarthamanva-
bhinavaṃ tameva paśyāmīti laiṅgikapratyakṣayorekaviṣayatāgrāhako-
'nuvyavasāyo dharmmadharmiṇorabhedāt tattaddharmāgrāhiṇo laiṅgika-
pratyathasya dharmiviṣayatvānupapatyā bādhakenāpramāṇīkarttavyaḥ, siddhe ca
dharmmadharmiṇorbhede bādhakābhāvāt pramāṇenānuvyavasāyena bādhitaṃ
laiṅgikādhyakṣayorekaviṣayatvābhāvasādhakamanumānaṃ, yadā tu dharma-
dharmiṇorbhedasandehastadā bādhakasandehādāpātato'nuvyavasāyasya prāmā-
ṇyasandehepi dūrādipratyayaiḥ sandigdhānaikāntyaṃ tadityarthaḥ | atha
dūrādipratyayā api pakṣakukṣau nikṣipyante ? tadā'prayojakatvamityāha |
tāvatāpīti | dharmmadharmmiṇorabhedasādhakaṃ tu na mānamastītyāśayaḥ ||
yadi ca naivaṃ, dūratamādipratyayeṣu vaḥ samāśvāsa-
viṣayaḥ | yasyārtho labhyata iti cet | nanu lābho'pi
pūrvapūrvopalabdhānupamardanenaiva | na hi sattvadravyatvapārthi-
vatvavṛkṣatvādikaṃ paribhūya śiṃśapā labhyate |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yadi ca naivamiti | na viṣayābhedaḥ, kiṃ
tu dūradūratarādipratyayā bhinnaviṣayā evetyarthaḥ | dharmajñānaviṣayasya
prāptireva jñānasamādhīheturityāha | yasyeti | saddravyaṃ pṛthivī
vṛkṣaḥ śiṃśapeti dūrādipratyayā jāyante | tatra śiṃśapālābhepi
sadādīnāṃ lābho'stīti tāvaddharmaviśiṣṭapiṇḍagocarā eva sarve
pratibhāsā na tu viṣayabheda ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadi ca kramikasaddravyapārthivatvādipratyayānāṃ
prāmāṇyaṃ, tadā samānaviṣayatvameva, athaikasya pramātvam, tadā kasya
taditi nāśvāsaḥ syādityāha | yadi ceti | arthalābhaḥ viṣaya-
lābhaḥ | arthalābhopi sarvasyaiva kramikatattatpratyayasyāviśeṣādityāha |
nanviti | pūrvānupamarddamevāha | na hīti ||
raghuº ṭīº | dūratamādau saddravyamityādayaḥ kramikāḥ pratyayāḥ
yadi naikaviṣayā na tarhi sarve pramāṇaṃ, na khalūttarottarapratyayo-
llikhitarūparahitaṃ pūrvapūrvapratyayagocaro vastvantaraṃ nāma | athaika
eva pramāṇaṃ, ekatamastatheti kuto nirṇaya ityāha | yadi ceti |
anubhūyamānāyāmanugatākārasya vidhirūpatāyāṃ vikalpasya ca
dharmiviṣayatāyāṃ na kiñcidapi bādhakamastīti bhāvaḥ | bhāvārtha-
mabhyupetyāha | yasyeti | artho viṣayaḥ ||
yatrārthakriyāsiddhiriti cet, sarveṣāmanuvṛtteḥ kasyārtha-
kriyeti kiṃ niścāyakam | na kiñcit, kintu saṅkī-
rṇārthakriyāvirahādekameva tatra vastu, na caikasmin prati-
bhāsabheda ityeka eva pratyayastatra sālambana iti brūma
iti cet, tathāpi katama ityaniścaye sa evānāśvāsaḥ |
asaṅkīrṇāpi cārthakriyā na vyaktitaḥ, sāmagrītaḥ sarva-
sambhavāt | ataeva na santānataḥ | na hyekasantāna-
niyatā kācidarthakriyā nāma | kāñcidarthakriyāṃ prati
pratyakṣānupalambhagocara eva tathā vyavasthāpyata iti cet,
tarhi dūratamādyupalabdhā api tathā vyavasthāpyāḥ |
sarveṣāmeva teṣāṃ tāṃ tāmarthakriyāṃ prati prayojakatāyā
anvayavyatirekagocaratvāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | patrakāṃḍādiviśeṣalakṣaṇārthakriyā śiṃśapāyā
eveti tallābha evātastatpratibhāsa eva samāśvāsa ityāha | yatreti |
satvādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvapratibhāsaviṣayāṇāṃ cennopamardastadā saivārthakriyā
kasyeti niścāyakaṃ nāstītyāha | kasyeti | yadyapi bahavaḥ prati-
bhāsā dṛśyante tathāpyarthakriyā cedekaiva tadā tadviṣaya eva vastubhūto-
'nye ca pratibhāsā avastuviṣayā evetyāha | na kiñciditi |
niścāyakamityanuṣajyate | sālambana iti | pāramārthikaviṣaya
ityarthaḥ | sadādipratyayānāṃ katamaḥ pratyayaḥ prametyaniścaye pravṛttya-
nadhyavasāya evetyāha | tathāpīti | dūṣaṇāntaramāha | asaṅgīrṇā-
pīti | asaṅkīrṇārthakriyayāpi vyaktiviśeṣaniścayaḥ tadā syādyadi
sārthakriyā vyaktiviśeṣamātrādbhavenna tvevaṃ, kiṃ tu sāmagrītaḥ sarva-
sambhava ityarthaḥ | nanu tayārthakriyayā ekāṃ vyaktirmā niścīyatāṃ,
santāno niśceṣyata ityata āha | ataeveti | sāmagrītaḥ
sarvasambhavo yata ityarthaḥ | tadeva sphuṭayati | na hīti | na
hyaṃkuropi bījasantānādekasmāt, kintu tatrāpi dharaṇyādisantānā-
pekṣāyā darśitattvādityarthaḥ | nanu yadyapi sāmagryadhīnā'rthakriyā tathā-
pyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ prādhānyenāṅkuraṃ prati bījasyaiva prayojakattvaṃ
gṛhītamiti tayā muktiparyantantadeva vidhīyata1 ityata āha |
kāñciditi | tarhi dravyaṃ pṛthivī vṛkṣaścāyaṃ śiṃśapetyatrāpi
dravyatvena saṃyogaṃ prati pṛthivītvena gandhaṃ prati vṛkṣatvena patrakāṇḍā-
dikaṃ prati śiṃśapātvena tadviśeṣaṃ prati anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kāraṇa-
tvāvadhāraṇāt sarve pratyayā yathārthā ityāyātamityāha | tarhīti |
bhagīº ṭīº | yatreti | arthakriyākāritvameva sattvamiti
yasyārthakriyā tadeva sadityarthaḥ | sarveṣāmiti | arthakriyāpi
viśiṣya kasyeti na niścaya ityanāśvāsastadavastha evetyarthaḥ | na
kiñciditi | viśiṣyāniścayepyekameva tatra pramāṇamityāśvāsa
evetyarthaḥ | kintviti | dṛśyamānārthakriyā yadi sarvasya
syāttadā nānārūpā syāt, na ca tathopalabhyata iti yasyaikasyārtha-
kriyopalabhyate tadeva sālambanaṃ paramārthasadviṣayakamityarthaḥ | tathā
pīti | sarveṣāmeva sadādipratyayānāṃ tathātvādarthakriyāprayojakatva-
miti prāmāṇyerthaviṣayatvamevetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | arthakriyākāriṇa eva satvāt yasyārthakriyā
dṛśyate tadviṣayaka eva pratyayaḥ prametyāśaṅkate | yatreti | sarveṣāṃ
sadādipratyayagocarāṇām | na kiñcit, niścāyakamiti śeṣaḥ |
patrakāṇḍaviśeṣādilakṣaṇārthakriyā na sadādeḥ panasāderapi tatpra-
tayārthakriyayā tadeva niścīyata ityata āha |--pāº 2 puº |
saṅgāt kintu śiṃśapāyā evetyasti viśeṣaniścāyakamata āha |
asaṅkīrṇāpīti | na vyaktito naikavyaktimātrāt | tathā ca pūrva-
bhāvitvasya niyāmakasahakārisamavadhānasya cāviśeṣāt sarveṣāmeva
kuto na sā'rthakriyeti | yatsantānaniyatā yārthakriyā sā tasyaiva
netarasya, tatsattvepi tadanutpatterityāśaṅkya nirācaṣṭe | ataeveti |
tatsāntānikasatvepi tattatsahakāriviraheṇa tattadarthakriyāviraha-
darśanānna niyama iti | anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vijātīyakāryāṇi
prati vijātīyānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ hetuttve sudṛḍhe sadādeḥ kāraṇatāyāṃ
mānābhāvenāsattvāttadviṣayāḥ pratyayāḥ na pramāṇānītyāśaṅkate |
kāñciditi | nirākaroti | tarhīti | tathā ca vṛkṣaḥ śiṃśapeti
bījaṃ dhānyaṃ śāliḥ kalama iti pratyayā upalabhyamānasāmānya-
viśeṣabhāvāpannapatrakāṇḍāṅkuralakṣaṇārthakriyāsadviṣayatayā pramāṇī-
bhavanto'bhinnaviṣayatayā'vatiṣṭhanta iti ||
syādetat | na dharmāntarākāreṇa pratibhāsabhedo
bhedahetuḥ kintu parokṣāparokṣarūpatayā | sā hi na
dharmabhedānapyupādāya samarthayituṃ śakyā, teṣṭhapi parokṣā-
parokṣajñānodayāt, tatrāpi dharmāntarānusaraṇe'navasthā-
nāditi cet |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pratyakṣāllaiṅgikādivikalpānāṃ pratibhāsabhedā-
dviṣayabhedaṃ śaṅkate | syādetaditi | dharmāntarākāramevāha |
parokṣāparokṣarūpatayeti | nanu vastudharmāveva parokṣāparokṣatve, tadvi-
ṣayatayā pratibhāso'pi kaścit parokṣaḥ kaścidaparokṣaṃ ityata
āha | sā hīti | sā parokṣāparokṣarūpatā | teṣvapi dharmabhedeṣvapi |
dharmaparokṣatādhīnā cet parokṣatā tatrāparokṣajñānaṃ na syādevetyarthaḥ |
tatrāpīti | parokṣe dharme aparā parokṣatā'parokṣe cāparā parokṣatā
cettadā'navasthetyarthaḥ | tathā ca parokṣāparokṣalakṣaṇapratibhāsabhedā-
dviṣayabhedaḥ pratyakṣalaiṅgikādijñānānāmāvaśyaka iti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu pratyakṣalaiṅgikavikalpayoḥ parokṣatvāparokṣatva-
rūpapratibhāsādviṣayabhedaḥ syādityāha | na dharmāntareti | nanu paro-
kṣatvāparokṣatve viṣayasyaiva dharmau, tathā cāparokṣatvadharmaviśiṣṭaṃ pratyakṣasya
viṣayo laiṅgikādestu parokṣatvadharmaviśiṣṭamiti na te jñānadharmā-
vityāha | sā hīti | tvanmate teṣvapi viṣayadharmabhedeṣu parokṣā-
parokṣajñānotpatteḥ, na ca parokṣatvādāvapi parokṣatvādyantaradharma-
svīkāro'navasthiterityarthaḥ | tathā ca parokṣatvāparokṣatvayormitho
virodhāt pratyakṣalaiṅgikavikalpayoḥ pratiniyataviṣayateti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | kiṃ tviti | pārokṣyāpārokṣye parokṣāparokṣa-
viṣayakatve | na caikaṃ vastu parokṣamaparokṣaṃ ca sambhavati, virodhāt,
tathātve vā tadviṣayakasyaikasya vijñānasya parokṣāparokṣobhayarūpatā-
patteḥ | parokṣatvāparokṣatve ca rūpasparśāviva dharmiṇo dharmmabhedau
tadviśiṣṭaśca dharmī parokṣāparokṣayorvijñānayorviṣayo rūpasparśa-
viśiṣṭa iva nāyanaspārśanayorityāśaṅkāṃ nirākaroti | sā
hīti | teṣvapīti | tava mata ityādi | parokṣepi yogināma-
parokṣajñānopagamāt aparokṣeṣu ca śābdādiparokṣajñānopagamāt ||
na, tayoraviṣayākāratvāt | dvividho hi jñānadharmo
viṣayāvacchedo jātibhedaśca | tatra viṣayāvacchedabhedena
viṣayasya bhedasthitirabhedanirākaraṇaṃ vā, na tu dvitīyena,
tasya kāraṇabhedenaivopapatteḥ śrutyanumitismṛtivat | yathā
ca viṣayabhedepi kāraṇabhedādevāparokṣajātīyamindriyajaṃ
jñānaṃ tathā viṣayābhedepi kāraṇabhedādeva parokṣāparokṣa-
jātīyamindriyaliṅgajñānaṃ bhavat kena vāryate | vāraṇe
vā kāryabhedaṃ prati kāraṇabhedo'prayojakaḥ syāt, tathā
cākasmikaḥ sa āpadyeta | jātibhedo'yaṃ na tūpādhibheda
iti kimatra niṣṭaṅkaṃ kāraṇamiti cet, anubhava eva |
na hi vyavasāyakāle pārokṣyāpārokṣyasmṛtitvānubhūti-
tvāni parisphuranti, asāvagnimānayamagnimān so'gni-
māniti sphuraṇāt | anuvyavasāyakāle tu tatpratibhāsaḥ,
amumanuminomi imaṃ paśyāmi taṃ smarāmītyullekhāt |
kathaṃ tarhi parokṣo'rthaḥ pratyakṣaśceti vyavahāraḥ | yathā-
numito dṛṣṭaḥ smṛta iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pariharati | na tayoriti | parokṣatvāparo-
kṣatvayorviṣayāghaṭitatvādityarthaḥ | tadevopapādayati | dvividho
hīti | viṣayāvacchedo viṣayanibandhano yathā ghaṭajñānapaṭajñāna-
yorupādhibhedaḥ | jātibhedaḥ kāraṇabhedaprayojyānumititvasākṣātva-
vadityarthaḥ | tatreti | viṣayakṛte pratibhāsabhede viṣayabheda eva
tantram, natu jātikṛte, tatra kāraṇasyaiva tantratvāt | yathā tatraiva
viṣaye sākṣākārijñānamānumānikaṃ ca jñānaṃ, tathā tatraiva parokṣama-
parokṣaṃ cetyarthaḥ | viṣayabhedepi | ghaṭapaṭādilakṣaṇaviṣayabhedepītyarthaḥ |
viṣayābhedepīti | vahnirūpaviṣayābhedepīndriyādaparokṣaṃ śabda-
liṅgābhyāṃ ca parokṣaṃ jñānaṃ syādityarthaḥ | kāraṇeti | kāraṇabheda-
paratantro yadi kāryabhedo na syāttadā kāryyavaijātyamākasmikaṃ
syādityarthaḥ | jātibheda iti | parokṣattvāparokṣattvaṃ ca jātibhedo
na tu viṣayakṛta upādhibheda ityatra kiṃ niścāyakamityarthaḥ |
anubhava eveti | anuvyavasāya evetyarthaḥ | tadeva viśadayati |
na hīti | so'gnimāniti smaraṇākāraṃ darśayitvā trayāṇāmapi
jñānānāmanuvyavasāyākāraṃ darśayati ||
bhagīº ṭīº | viṣayāvacchedo viṣayaghaṭita upādhibhedo
yathā ghaṭapaṭajñānayorityarthaḥ | dvitīyena jātibhedenetyarthaḥ |
śrutīti | yathā parokṣaviṣayatve tulyepi śābdatvānumititvasmṛtitva-
rūpajñānagatajñānajātibhedaḥ kāraṇabhedādeva bauddhānāṃ tathāyamapī-
tyarthaḥ | yathā ceti | yadīdaṃ vairūpyaṃ viṣayabhedamātraprayojyaṃ syāttadā
bhinnaviṣayakaṃ jñānadvayamaparokṣajātīyaṃ na syāditi yathā tatra
viṣayabhedāprayojakatve kāraṇabheda eva prayojakaḥ, tathā viṣayā-
bhedepi vaijātye kāraṇabhedaḥ prayojaka ityarthaḥ | ākasmika iti |
idaṃ jñānaṃ yadi tadvijātīyaṃ na syāt tadviruddhakāraṇajanyaṃ na
syādityarthaḥ | upādhibhedo viṣayabhedaḥ | niṣṭaṅko niścayaḥ |
anubhavaḥ, anuvyavasāya ityarthaḥ | na hīti | yadi hi tadviṣaya-
dharmaḥ syāt tarhi jñānābhāvepi tadviṣayajñāna eva bhāseta, na ca
tathetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | viṣayāvacchedo viṣayaviṣayakatvaṃ | jātibhedo
viṣayāsparśī dharmaḥ, parokṣatvasyānubhavatvasaṅkarāpatyā sākṣātkārī-
tarajñānatvarūpatvopagamāt ekasminneva viṣaye śabdaliṅgādirūpa-
kāraṇavaijātyāt śābdānumititvarūpajñānānāṃ vaijātyaṃ bhinnepi
ca ghaṭapaṭādāvindriyanayanādirūpakāraṇasājātye sākṣātkāritva-
cākṣuṣattvādirūpaṃ sājātyamityubhayato vyabhicārāt jñānavaijātya-
sājātyayorviṣayabhedābhedau na tantraṃ kintvanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kāraṇa-
vaijātyasājātye evetyāha | na tu dvitīyenetyādinā praghaṭṭakena |
upādhibhedo viṣayabhedaḥ | asāviti ayamagnimāniti pratyakṣānu-
mitiśābdīnāṃ sognimāniti ca smṛtyanumitiśābdīnāṃ mitīnā-
mudayācchabdabhedopyakiṃcitkaraḥ ||
yadapyatyantavilakṣaṇānāmityādi, tadapi sandigdhānai-
kāntikam, vidhināpi tathābhūtena sālakṣaṇyavyavahārasya
nirvāhāt | tathā hyayaṃ vyavahāro na nirnimitto
nāpyanekanimitto nāpyanekāsaṃsargaikanimittaḥ, ati-
prasaṅgāt | tato'nekasaṃsargaikanimitto'yaṃ pariśiṣyate,
tathā ca tādṛśasya vidhirūpatve ko virodhaḥ, yena vyāptiḥ
syāt, pratyuta niṣedharūpatāyāmeva virodho darśitaḥ
prāgiti kṛtaṃ pallavasamullāsaiḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | anumityādidvitīyaṃ parānumānaṃ dūṣayati |
yadapīti | sandigdheti | sālakṣaṇyavyavahārahetutve hetutvepyatadvyā-
vṛtti1rūpaṃ māstvityatra vipakṣe bādhakābhāvādityarthaḥ | anyathā-
siddhimukhena sandigdhānaikāntikatvameva sphuṭayati | vidhināpīti |
vidhiratra jātiriti vyavasthāpayati | tathā hīti | nirnimittatve
nityatvaprasaṅgaḥ, anekanimittatve cānanugatākāratvaprasaṅgaḥ, aneka-
saṃjñaikanimittattve'pi tathetyarthaḥ | tādṛśa iti2 ṣaṣṭhī | vyāptiḥ
syāditi | yadatyantavilakṣaṇānāṃ sālakṣaṇyavyavahārahetustadanya-
vyāvṛttiniṣṭhamiti tadupadarśitā vyāptiḥ siddhyedityarthaḥ | pūrvoktaṃ
bādhaṃ smārayati | pratyuteti ||
heturapyatadvyāvṛtti--pāº 1 puº |
tādṛśa iti pāṭhamālambya vyākhyātam |
bhagīº ṭīº | sandigdheti | vipakṣe bādhakābhāvādityarthaḥ |
tadevāha | vidhināpīti | bādhakamāha | pratyuteti ||
raghuº ṭīº |
nāpi pravṛttyādivyavahāranirvāhakatvamapohakalpa-
nāyāḥ, anyāvabhāsādanyatra pravṛttāvatiprasaṅgāt | adhya-
vasāyādayamadoṣa iti cet | atha ko'yamadhyavasāyaḥ |
kimalīkasya vastudharmatayāvabhāsaḥ, kiṃ vā vastvātmaka-
tayā, tato bhedāgraho vastuvāsanāsamutthaṃ veti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | apohe bādhakāntaramāha | pravṛttyādīti1 |
vastu yadi vikalpe na bhāseta tadā tatra pravṛttireva tato na
syādevetyarthaḥ | anyāvabhāsāditi | vyāvṛttyavabhāsanādvastuni vṛttirna
syādityarthaḥ | jñānasya svaviṣaya eva pravarttakattvamanyathā ghaṭajñānāt
paṭe'pi pravṛttiḥ syādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | savikalpakajñānasya pravarttakatvamapi na syāditya-
pohe bādhakāntaramāha | nāpīti | jñānasya svaviṣaya eva pravartta-
vyāvṛttyādīti kvacitpāṭhaḥ |
katvāt, anyathā gojñānasyāśve pravṛttyāpatterghaṭādyaviṣayakādvikalpā-
ttatra pravṛttirna syādityāha | anyeti ||
raghuº ṭīº | apohamātrāvalambī vikalpo na svalakṣaṇaṃ spṛśa-
tīti pakṣaṃ nirasyati | nāpīti | apohaviśiṣṭaṃ svalakṣaṇa-
mālambate vikalpa iti mataṃ punaragre nirasanīyam ||
na prathamaḥ, vikalpe tadanavabhāsanāt | na dvitīyaḥ,
asādhāraṇaviṣayatayā śabdavikalpayorapravṛttiprasaṅgāt
tasyāsāmayikatvāt tasmādvikalpavastunoścakṣūrasavat
sarvathā virodha eva, sādhāraṇaviṣayatve tu vastutvāprati-
bhāsanam, tasyāsādhāraṇatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vikalpa iti | savikalpakattvena tvanmate
vastudharmāgrahādityarthaḥ | grahe vā siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitamiti
bhāvaḥ | apravṛttiprasaṅgāt anutpattiprasaṅgāt | tasyeti |
svalakṣaṇasyetyarthaḥ | ānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ svalakṣaṇe samayagrahānupapatteḥ
vikalpopyanugatadharmapuraskāreṇa syāt, na ca svalakṣaṇaṃ tatheti bhāvaḥ |
tasmāditi | vikalpasyānugatadharmaviṣayatvādvastunaścānanugatatvā-
dvirodha evetyarthaḥ | virodhameva darśayati | sādhāraṇeti |
tasyeti | vastuna ityarthaḥ | tathā ca vastvātmatayā bhānamadhya-
vasāya iti yaduktaṃ tadanupapannamiti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | vikalpa iti | nirvikalpakamātravedyasya
vastudharmasya savikalpake'navabhāsādityarthaḥ | asādhāraṇeti | svalakṣaṇa-
viṣayatayetyarthaḥ | tasyeti | svalakṣaṇasyāsāmayikatvāt saṅketā-
viṣayatvāt, tatra deśakālānanugame ānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ saṅketa-
grahasyāśakyatvādityarthaḥ | tasmāditi | tava mate deśakālānanugata-
vastubhāne nānanugatibhānaṃ tadbhāne ca nāsādhāraṇavastubhānamityarthaḥ |
avirodhe vā paryavasitaṃ vivādeneti bhāvaḥ | sādhāraṇeti |
nānādeśakālānugatālīkaviṣayatva ityarthaḥ | tasya vastutvasya
svalakṣaṇātmakasyetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vikalpa iti | vastudharmmasya vastvanatirikta-
tvādvastvabhāne vastudharmmatvabhānāsambhavācca vastvanavagāhino vikalpasya
na vastudharmmatvāvagāhitvamiti | asādhāraṇeti | vastunaḥ svalakṣa-
ṇasyāsādhāraṇattvāttadanatiriktaṃ tattādātmyamapyasādhāraṇaṃ tadviṣayatve
cā'sādhāraṇaviṣayatvaṃ syāttathā ca śabdavikalpayorapravṛttiḥ saṅketa-
grahādhīnapravṛttiko hi śabdaḥ saṅketaścānugatarūpamapuraskṛtya svalakṣa-
ṇeṣvaśakyo grahītumānantyādviśiṣyānupasthitatvācca | na cānugatasyā-
sato rūpasya satā svalakṣaṇena sambandhosti, vikalpopi cānugatama-
santaṃ bāhyamākāramālambyaiva pravarttata iti | tasya svalakṣaṇasya |
tasya vastuttvasya vastvanatirekiṇaḥ ||
na tṛtīyaḥ, pravṛttisāmānādhikaraṇyaniyamānupapatteḥ,
bhedāgrahasya sarvatra sulabhatvāt | atebhyo bhedo gṛhīta
iti cet, kimateṣu gṛhyamāṇeṣṭhagṛhyamāṇeṣu vā | nādyaḥ,
ateṣāmapi svalakṣaṇānāṃ vikalpāgocaratvāt | na
dvitīyaḥ, avijñātā1vadherbhedasyāprathanāt, prathane vā'dhya-
vaseyābhimatasvalakṣaṇādapi bhedo gṛhyeta, aviśeṣāt |
gṛhītādagraho bhedasyāgṛhītebhyastu tadgraha iti cet,
yadi dharmalakṣaṇo bhedaḥ, tadā viparyayaḥ | svarūpalakṣaṇa-
ścet, aviśeṣāt sarvatastadgraho'nyatra tādātmyagrahāt |
niḥsvarūpatvāttasya kva svarūpalakṣaṇo bheda iti cet,
agṛhītādapi tathā syāt, aviśeṣāt | niḥsvarūpa-
mapi sasvarūpamiva bhinnamiva prathitamiti cet, tat
kimadhyavaseyāpekṣayā sasvarūpamiva na prathitam, adhya-
vaseyasvarūpamiva vā sphuritam | ādye apratipattirvā
syāt, aviśeṣāt, niḥsvarūpapratipattirvā syāt,
ubhayathāpi sāmānādhikaraṇyapravṛttī na syātām |
dvitīyastu prāgeva dūṣitaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pravṛttīti | pravṛttiniyamasya śābdasāmānā-
dhikaraṇyaniyamasya cānupapatteḥ bhedāgrahāt kutra pravṛttiḥ syāt kutra
anirṇītā iti 1 puº pāº |
vāyaṃ gauriti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pratīyeta | aniyame hetumāha |
bhedeti | pravṛttisāmānādhikaraṇyaniyamo jñānaviṣaya eva pravṛtti-
ritiniyamo na syādityeke | pravṛttyā saha jñānasya sāmānādhikaraṇya-
niyamaḥ samānaviṣayatāniyamaḥ sa na syādityarthaḥ ityanye | nanu
sāmānādhikaraṇyaniyamabhaṅgastadā bhavedyadi govikalpādaśve pravartteta, na
caivaṃ, govikalpo hyagovyāvṛttoyamityākāreṇa jāyamānośvādi-
vyavacchedaṃ kurvan kathamaśvādiṣu pravarttayedityāśaṅkate | atebhya iti |
atebhyaḥ aśvādibhyaḥ | ateṣāmiti | vikalpāgocaratvāttebhyo
bhedagraho'nupapanna ityarthaḥ | avijñāteti | pratiyogyasphuraṇe bhedasyā-
sphuraṇādityarthaḥ | nanu pratiyogyasphuraṇepi bhedasphuraṇamastu ko doṣa
ityata āha | prathana iti | evaṃ sati gosvalakṣaṇādapi govi-
kalpo bhedaṃ gṛhṇīyādityapravṛttireva syādityarthaḥ | adhyavaseyeti |
(san) svalakṣaṇo gosvalakṣaṇaḥ | gṛhītāditi | grahaṇaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ
tadanantaraṃ yatsavikalpakamutpadyate, tadgrahaṇasamānapratibhāsamataḥ sārū-
pyādgolakṣaṇādbhedo na gṛhyate mahiṣādibhyastu bhedo gṛhyata eveti
govikalpo gavi pravarttayati | na tu mahiṣamātaṃgādāvityarthaḥ |
svalakṣaṇānyavyāvṛttibhyo grahaṇaviṣayattvasārūpyādbhedo na gṛhyata iti
tatra pravṛttirityanye | tanna | ubhayorgrahaṇaviṣayatvasya pareṇānaṅgī-
kārāt | viparyaya iti | apohe tātvikadharmābhāvādityarthaḥ |
yadvā grahaṇaviṣayīkṛte dharmiṇi bheda eva gṛhyate na tu bhedāgraha
ityarthaḥ | svarūpeti | yathā mahiṣādibhyo bhedagrahastathā gosva-
lakṣaṇādapi syādevāpohasyevetyarthaḥ | anyatreti | tādātmyagraha eva
bhedagrahe pratibandhakaḥ, sa cāpohasya kenāpi vastunā nāstīti
sarvatra pravṛttirapravṛttirvā syādityarthaḥ | tasyeti | apohasyetyarthaḥ |
agṛhītādapīti | tathā syāditi | bhedāgraha eva syāditya-
śvādāvapi sa eva pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ, na hi tadapekṣayā'poho na niḥsva-
rūpa ityarthaḥ | niḥsvarūpamapīti | tathā cāśvādito bhedagraha
eveti tatra na pravarttata ityarthaḥ | tat kimiti | yathā'śvāderbhinna-
miva prathitaṃ tathādhyavaseyādgosvalakṣaṇādapi kathaṃ na tathā pratheteti
tadbhedagrahāttatrāpi na pravṛttiḥ syādityarthaḥ | adhyavaseyeti | svalakṣaṇa-
svarūpamiva vetyarthaḥ | ādya iti | sasvarūpāprathā cāpratipattau niḥsva-
rūpapratipattau ca syādityarthaḥ | ubhayathāpīti | nahyapratipattau gauraya-
miti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pravṛttirvā tatra bhavatyevaṃ niḥsvarūpapratipattāva-
pītyarthaḥ | prāgeveti | svalakṣaṇasya vikalpāsaṃsparśādityuktatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | pravṛttīti | pravṛtteḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ svaviṣa-
yatvamityarthaḥ | yadvā ubhayathetyādyagrimagranthoparodhāt pravṛtteḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇyasya ca śābdasya gaurayamityādirūpasya niyamo na
syādityarthaḥ | na ca bhedāgrahāttadupapattirityāha | bhedāgrahasyeti |
atebhyo goviṣayakajñānajanyapravṛttyaviṣayebhyo'śvādibhyo goviṣaya-
vyāvṛtterbhedo gṛhīta evetyarthaḥ | avijñāteti | yadyapi pravṛttya-
viṣayasvalakṣaṇānāṃ nirvikalpakāntaravedyatvamastyeva, tathāpi bhedaviṣaya-
jñānaṃ pratiyogyaviṣayaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ | vikalpe svalakṣaṇa-
bhānānabhyupagamāt | gṛhītāditi | gṛhītayoḥ svalakṣaṇānya-
vyāvṛttyorgṛhyamāṇatvarūpasārūpyādagraho bhedasyāgṛhītebhyaśca gṛhya-
māṇatvāgṛhyamāṇatvarūpavaidharmyādbhedagraha ityarthaḥ | yadīti | tāttvika-
bhedarūpadharmavattvaṃ vyāvṛttāvalīkāyāṃ na sambhavatīti kasyāgraha ityarthaḥ |
aviśeṣāditi | vyāvṛttiviṣayāviṣayasvalakṣaṇayordvayorapyalīkāyā
vyāvṛtterbhedo gṛhyata evetyarthaḥ | anyatreti | tādātmyagrahasya prati-
bandhakatvāttata eva tadbhedagraha ityarthaḥ | agṛhītāditi | gotva-
vikalpāviṣayādaśvāditopi na tarhi bhedagrahaḥ syādityarthaḥ | niḥsva-
rūpamapi | alīkamapītyarthaḥ | bhinnamiveti | aśvādyapekṣayetyarthaḥ |
tat kimiti | adhyavaseyaṃ gotvasvalakṣaṇaṃ tadapekṣayā satsvarūpamiva
na prathitam, tattadaprathanāttatprathanepi niḥsvarūpatayā prathanādvetyarthaḥ |
ubhayathāpīti | yadyapi niḥsvarūpatayā alīke pravrttirnāstyeva,
svalakṣaṇe tu pravṛttistadapekṣayā niḥsvarūpatayālīkasya bhāne svarūpa-
lakṣaṇabhedāgrahādeva syāttathāpyaśvāpekṣayā sasvarūpatayā bhānamadhyava-
seyāpekṣayā tu niḥsvarūpatayetyatraiva niyāmakābhāvādekarūpatayā
bhāne pravṛttiniyamo na syāditi bhāvaḥ | dvitīyastviti |
svalakṣaṇasya vikalpāviṣayatvādevetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | pravṛttīti | pravṛtteḥ śābdasya cedaṃ rajatamityādeḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇyasya niyamānupapatterityarthaḥ | atebhyaḥ adhyavaseyasva-
lakṣaṇabhinnasvalakṣaṇebhyaḥ | ateṣāmapīti | na ca nirvikalpakenopa-
sthitānyatāni svalakṣaṇānītivācyam, svalakṣaṇāsparśinā vikalpenā-
pohāgrāhiṇā ca vikalpena tadubhayabhedasya grahītumaśakyatvāt anupa-
sthitasvalakṣaṇāntare pravṛtterdurvāratvāt ihopavane surasāni sahakāra-
phalānītyādivākyānniyataviṣayecchānutpādācca | gṛhyamāṇasā-
dharmyādagṛhyamāṇavaidharmyācca jñāyamānatvādapohe gṛhyamāṇebhyo bhedasyā-
graho grahaścāgṛhyamāṇebhya ityāśaṃkate | gṛhītāditi | nirākaroti |
yadīti | dharmo'nyonyābhāvaḥ | viparyaya iti | jñāyamānasyaiva prati-
yogino'nyonyābhāvogṛhyate nājñāyamānasyetyarthaḥ | jñāyamānatvācca
bhedāgrahe'nadhyavaseyasvalakṣaṇānāmapi tadānīṃ jñāyamānattvāttadbhedā-
grahāttatrāpi pravṛttiḥ syādityapi draṣṭavyam | svarūpamadhikaraṇasvarūpam |
aviśeṣāditi | svarūpasya pratiyogiviśeṣāniyaṃtritatvādaniyama
ityarthaḥ | tadātmatayāpratīyamānamadhikaraṇaṃ na tadbhedavyavahāraheturata
āha | anyatra tādātmyagrahāditi | nirddharmmake cālīke na vaidharmyasya
saṃbhāvanā vaidharmyatvena ca tasya bhānaṃ pratiyogyālaṃbanaṃ svarūpabhānaṃ ca
sādhāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ | niḥsvarūpamapīti | anadhyavaseyāpekṣayā
sasvarūpamiva, svarūpaṃ ca bhedo'tobhinnamivetyarthaḥ | ubhayathāpi ajñāne
niḥsvarūpatājñāne ca | śābdasāmānādhikaraṇyapravṛttī niyate na
syātāṃ nahyajñāyamānabhedāgrahaḥ pravṛttyādihetuḥ idaṃ rajatamityā-
divikalpasya sattva ivāsatvepi svalakṣaṇeṣu nirvikalpakāt pravṛttyādyā-
patteḥ niḥkharūpatayā jñāyamānabhedāgrahepi na tathā, idamalīka-
mitijñānādapi tadāpatteḥ | sasvarūpabhānamitikorthaḥ kiṃ svarūpa-
vattāmātrabhānaṃ atatsvarūpavattāmātrabhānaṃ vā | nādyaḥ kiṃcidi-
tarāpekṣamiti kutoniyamaḥ | dvitīye cātatsvarūpatayā bhāsamāne
kathamatebhyo bhedagrahaḥ śabdāditastvajñāyamāne vikalpaḥ kutoniyamā-
dadhyavaseyāpekṣayā niḥsvarūpamanadhyavaseyāpekṣayā ca svarūpamavagāhate
apoham | dvitīyastviti | svalakṣaṇasya vikalpaviṣayattvāyogāt ||
nāpi caturthaḥ nīlānubhavavāsanāsamutthasya pītānu-
bhavasya nīle pravarttakatvaprasaṅgāt | nānubhavaḥ pravarttakaḥ
api tu vikalpaḥ sa ca yasmāt tasyaiva viṣaya iti cet |
yasmāditi sākṣāt paramparayā vā | prathame śābda-
laiṅgikajñānānāmapravarttakatvaprasaṅgaḥ | dvitīye tu sa
evātiprasaṅgaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vastuvāsanāsamutpannatvaṃ veti pakṣaṃ dūṣayati |
nāpīti | svavāsanāparipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva sā buddhira-
paśyantyapi bāhyaṃ bāhye pravṛttimātanātīti jñānaśriyā yatsamāhitaṃ
tadapi na sambhavatītyarthaḥ | anubhavarūpā vāsanā anubhavavāsanā
tanmate tadatiriktasthāyisaṃskārābhāvāt | tathā ca pītānubhavopi
nīle pravarttayedityāha | nīlānubhaveti | pītānubhavasyāpi
nīlānubhavasamutthatvādityarthaḥ | nīlānubhavo nīlanirvikalpakaṃ,
tacca na pravarttakamapi tu nīlasavikalpaka, tacca nīlānubhavenaiva
janitamatastadviṣaye nīlasvalakṣaṇa eva pravarttayatītyāha | nānubhava
iti | śābdeti | śābdalaiṅgikavikalpānāṃ sākṣānnirvikalpakā-
janyatvenāpravarttakatvaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ | sa eveti | nīlānubhavopi
paramparayā pītasavikalpakaṃ janayatīti tasyāpi nīle pravarttakatva-
prasaṅga ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | vāsanā saṃskāraḥ sthāyī tanmate nāstīti
tajjanyajñānāntarameva vāsanā | tato nīlajñānānantarapītajñānāt
sarvasiddhāt nīle pravṛttiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ | nanu nirvikalpakaṃ na
pravarttakam api tu vikalpaḥ | sa ca yasmādanubhavādutpannastadviṣaye
pravarttayatīti niyama ityāha | nānubhava iti | śābdeti |
parokṣavikalpānāṃ vyāptisaṅketavikalpajanyatvāt tasya ca svalakṣaṇā-
viṣayatvāttatra pravarttakatvaṃ na syāt sākṣādanubhavājanyatvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vastuvāsanā vastugrahajanyaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa cātī-
ndriyo vā taduttarabhāvijñānasantāno vā | nādyo bhavadbhistadanabhyupa-
gamāt | na dvitīyaḥ nīlagrahajanyapītānubhavajanitapītavikalpā-
nnīle pravṛttiprasaṅgāt | atha vastuno grahaṇameva vāsyate aneneti
vyutpattyā vāsaneti cettajjanyo vastugrahaṇasamutthatvena tādṛśavikalpa-
tvena vā | ādye nīleti | dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate | nānubhava iti |
yasmāt anubhavāt | tasyaiva viṣaye tadviṣayasāntānike | vikalpa-
janakānubhavaviṣayasya cirātītatvāt | pravarttaka ityanuṣajyate |
nirvikalpakapṛṣṭhabhāvinaḥ savikalpakasya sākṣāttvāropamātrasya sākṣā-
danubhavajanyatvāt tamupekṣyāha | śābdeti | teṣāṃ ciramatīte-
'nubhave saparikaraśabdaliṅgajñānajanyatvāt ||
anubhavavyāpārapuraskārānniyama iti cet | kaḥ pura-
skārārthaḥ | na tāvadanubhavaikaviṣayatvaṃ vikalpena tada-
saṃsparśāt | nāpyanubhavatvāropaḥ svātmani kalpanā-
poḍhābhrāntatvāt viṣaye cābhilāpasaṃsargayogyaprati-
bhāsatvāt tathānavabhāse vā vikalpatvavyāghātāt viśe-
ṣopalabdhau cāropāsambhavāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu nīlānubhavasya vyāpāraṃ nīlavikalpa eva
puraskaroti, na tu pītavikalpaka iti na tasya nīle pravarttakattvaṃ,
kintu nīlavikalpasyaiva tatra pravarttakatvamityāha | anubhaveti |
vyāpārapuraskāraśca janyajanakabhāvavyavasthitaye tvayāpi vācya eveti
bhāvaḥ | tadasaṃsparśāditi | anubhavaviṣayasya svalakṣaṇasyāsaṃsparśā-
dityarthaḥ | nanvāropitanīlānubhavātmā nīlavikalpo nīle
pravarttayati, pītavikalpe tu vaidharmyānnīlānubhavatvānāropādityata
āha | nāpīti | anubhavatvaṃ vikalpasvarūpe vā samāropyate
tadviṣaye vā | nādya ityāha | svātmanīti | kalpanāpoḍhatvena
kalpanāvyāvṛttatvenābhrāntatvāt | na hi vikalpaḥ svātmani vastu-
bhūte kalpanā, kiṃ tu viṣaye'līke, tathā ca kathamāropa ityarthaḥ |
antya āha | viṣaye ceti | abhilāpasaṃsargayogyo vikalpa1-
viṣayo'līkaṃ tatra tvāropo na sambhavati, viśeṣadarśanapratihatatvā-
dityarthaḥ | nanu māstu vikalpo'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsa ityata
saṃsargayogyapratibhāsatvādvikalpa--pāº 2 puº |
āha | tatheti | nanu bhavatvabhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsastathāpyāropa
upapadyatāmata āha | viśeṣeti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu sākṣāt paramparayeti vā na vivakṣitam
kintu yo vikalpo yasyānubhavasya vyāpāraṃ puraskaroti sa tasyaiva
viṣaye pravarttayati, puraskāraśca upādhirūpaṃ dharmāntarameva pravṛttya-
nyathānupapattyā kalpyata ityāha | anubhaveti | tadasaṃsparśāditi |
anubhavaviṣayasvalakṣaṇāviṣayīkaraṇādityarthaḥ | āropaḥ kiṃ vika-
lpātmani tadviṣaye vā | ādye ātmanīti | vikalpasya svaprakāśa-
tayā viśeṣadarśanānnāropa ityarthaḥ | antye viṣayeti | tathā-
vidhañcālīkamevetyalīkatvena gṛhyamāṇe viśeṣadarśanānnāropa ityarthaḥ |
na caitadasiddhamityata āha | tatheti ||
raghuº ṭīº | yo vikalpo yasyānubhavasya vyāpāraṃ puraskurute
sa tasya viṣaye pravarttayatīti nātiprasaṅga ityāśaṅkate | anubhaveti |
vyāpāro dharmmaḥ | sa ca svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvamanubhavatvaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ
bhedānavagāhitvaṃ, tacca svarūpato viṣayataśca, ādyamātmano anubhava-
bhedānavagāhitvaṃ, dvitīyaṃ svaviṣayasyānubhavaviṣayabhedānavagāhitvaṃ
apārokṣyaṃ svarūpaviṣayatvaṃ sārūpyaṃ ca svalakṣaṇālīkayorekarūpa-
śālitvaṃ puraskāraścānubhavatvaprāmāṇyayorāropo'pareṣāmāśrayatvam |
sarvāṇi dūṣayituṃ pṛcchati | ka iti | puraskārārthaḥ puraskā-
rāntārthaḥ | tadasaṃsparśāt anubhavaviṣayāsaṃsparśāt | anubhavatvāropaḥ
svātmani svaviṣaye vā | ādyasyāsambhavamāha | svātmanīti |
kalpanāpoḍhaḥ kalpanāvyāvṛttaḥ prameti yāvat | ato'bhrāntatvāt
anāropatvāt gurūṇāmiva bhavatāmapi sarvajñānānāṃ1 svātmanyanu-
bhavarūpatvāt | yadvā kalpanāpoḍhatvāt asatkhyātivyāvarttakatvāditi
paramatena | abhrāntatvāditi svamatena | asvaprakāśepi tadakṣateḥ |
dvitīyasyāpi tamāha | viṣayeti | abhilāpasaṃsargayogyaṃ bāhyamalīkaṃ |
mā bhavatu vā vikalpaḥ ātmanyapyanubhavarūpaḥ sambhavatu vā anubhavatvā-
ropastatra tadviṣaye vā, tathāpi niyatapravṛttyanupapattiḥ anubhavatvasya
sarvanirvikalpakasādhāraṇatvāt, tatra nīlādyanubhavatvaṃ tu nīlādya-
grāhiṇā vikalpena grahītumaśakyamiti ||
nāpi taddharmaprāmāṇyāropaḥ tasyāniyataviṣayatve
pravṛttiniyamānupapatteḥ | paramārthasadviṣayatve ca tasya
vikalpasaṃsargaprasaṅgāt | alīkaviṣayatve cāpravṛtteḥ |
alīkasyānalīkatayā sphuraṇaṃ tu niṣiddham |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvanubhavasya prāmāṇyaṃ vikalpe samāropyate,
tenānubhavaviṣaye vikalpaḥ pravarttayatīti nātiprasaṅga ityata āha |
nāpīti | prāmāṇyasāmānyamāropyate viṣayaviśeṣopahitaṃ vā
prāmāṇyam | ādye tasyeti | viṣayaniyamābhāvāt pravṛttiniyamā-
nupapatterityarthaḥ | dvitīye paramārtheti | prāmāṇye hyupadhāyakaṃ
sarvajanānāmiti 2 puº pāº |
vastu vācyaṃ tacca na vikalpe bhāsata ityarthaḥ | nanvalīkamevopa-
dhāyakamastu | tathā ca tatprāmāṇyameva tatrāropyatāmityata āha |
alīketi | nanu vikalpaviṣayasyālīkasyānalīkatayā bhānaṃ
pravarttakaṃ syādityata āha | alīkasyeti | analīkatayā pāra-
mārthikatayā'līkasya bhānaṃ tadā bhavedyadi paramārthasadviṣayo vikalpaḥ
syāt, tacca tvayā niṣiddhamityarthaḥ | yadvā'līkasya tādrūpyeṇaiva
pratīteḥ kathamanalīkatayā bhānaṃ syādviśeṣadarśanapratihatatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | taddharmmaḥ tasyānubhavasya dharmaḥ prāmāṇyam tatrā-
ropo vikalpa āropa ityarthaḥ | tadapi yatra kvacidāropyate
niyate vā viṣaye | ādye tasyeti | tasya prāmāṇyasya | dvitīye
paramārthasati viṣaye āropo'līke vā | ādye paramārtheti | antye
alīketi | alīke viṣaye tatprāmāṇyameveti pravṛttirnna syādityarthaḥ |
na cālīkasyānalīkatayā bhānaṃ sambhavatītyāha | alīkasyeti ||
raghuº ṭīº | taddharmmaḥ tasyānubhavasya dharmmaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ prāmāṇyā-
poho vā tattatsvalakṣaṇātmakaviṣayagarbhaṃ vā tadanyāpoharūpaviṣaya-
ghaṭitaṃ vā | ādye tasyeti | tasya prāmāṇyasya | aniyataviṣayatve
viṣayāniyamitatve viṣayāghaṭitatva iti yāvat | pravṛttiniyamānu-
papatteḥ gavānyāpohasya sakalagosādhāraṇyavat prāmāṇyāpohasya
sakalānubhavasādhāraṇyāt | tadanyāpohasya taddharmmatvānabhyupagame tu na
tathā taddharmmavattvāropatvasambhavaḥ | tadanyāpohastatsvarūpameveti cet | na |
anubhavāgrāhiṇo vikalpasya tatsvarūpatadanyāpohagrāhitvāyogāt |
dvitīye paramārtheti | paramārthasadviṣayatve paramārthasatsvalakṣaṇātmaka-
viṣayaghaṭitatve | tasya svalakṣaṇasya | vikalpeti | tadagrāhiṇastad-
ghaṭitaprāmāṇyagrāhivāyogāditi bhāvaḥ | tṛtīye alīketi |
alīkaviṣayatve alīkarūpaviṣayaghaṭitatve | asattvādalīkasyānu-
bhavāgocaratvācca tadghaṭitaprāmāṇyasyānubhavādharmmatvādasadgarbhatayā viro-
dhena durjñeyatvācca na tadāropātpravṛttyupapattirityarthaḥ | asataḥ sattvā-
ropātkhaṇḍaśaḥ prasiddhyā''ropa ityapi nāstītyāha | alīkasyeti ||
nāpyanubhavāt svātmano bhedāgraha eva tadvyāpāra-
puraskāraḥ svarūpasya svato'vagateḥ viṣayabhedasya ca
prāgeva nirūpaṇāt | nāpyapārokṣyam tasyāpi svātmani
sarvajñānasādha raṇatvāt | viṣaye ca vikalpasya tada-
bhāvāt | tathābhāvepyanyatra niyatapravṛttyanupapatteḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu nīlānubhavanīlavikalpayorbhedo na gṛhyata
eva tāvataiva nīlavikalpo nīlānubhavaviṣaye nīle pravarttayatītyata
āha | nāpyanubhavāditi | atra jñānayorbhedāgrahastadviṣayayorvā |
ādya āha | svarūpasyeti | vikalpasya svaprakāśatayā'nubhavabhedenaiva
grahādityarthaḥ | antya āha | viṣayeti | alīke grahaviṣaye
pāramārthikabhedāsambhavādityādinā dūṣitatvādityarthaḥ | nanu yathā-
nubhave'pārokṣyaṃ tathā vikalpepītyeva kṛtvā vikalponubhavaviṣaye
pravarttayatītyata āha | nāpīti | anubhavavyāpārapuraskāra ityanu-
ṣajyate | apārokṣyamātrasya1 prayojakatve svātmani sarvavikalpānā-
maparokṣatayā sarvaṃ jñānaṃ sarvatra pravartayedityāha | tasyeti | nanu
yathā'nubhavasya viṣayo'parokṣastathā vikalpasyāpīti pravṛttiniyamaḥ
syādityata āha | viṣaye ceti | na hyalīkamaparokṣaṃ nāmetyarthaḥ |
abhyupetyāha | tatheti | naitat pravṛttiniyāmakamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | svātmano vikalpātmana ityarthaḥ | yasya yadya-
nubhavāt svarūpabhedo na gṛhyate tatrāha | svarūpasyeti | bauddhānāṃ
svaprakāśamaryyādayā svarūpabhedasya svataeva grahādityarthaḥ | atha
viṣayataḥ sa na gṛhyate tatrāha | viṣayeti | alīkasya viṣayasya
pāramārthikabhedāsambhavādityādinā tannirāsādityarthaḥ | nanu
vikalpo'parokṣarūpa ātmāṃśe'parokṣarūpānubhavaviṣaye pravarttayatīti
niyamaḥ syādityata āha | nāpīti | anubhavavyāpārapuraskāra
ityanuṣajyate | ātmani sarvameva jñānamaparokṣamatastena bhedāgraho-
pyanyatrāstīti pravṛttyaniyamastadavastha evetyarthaḥ | nanu yenānubhavena
vikalpasya viṣaye sākṣāttvamādhīyate tadviṣaye'nubhavaḥ pravarttayatītyata
āha | viṣaye ceti | sākṣāttvasya viṣayadharmmatvābhāvādanubhavena
tanniṣṭhasyānādhānādityarthaḥ | tathābhāvepīti | sākṣāttvasya viṣaya-
dharmmatvepi nānyajñānādanyatra pravṛttiḥ pravṛttau vā na svalakṣaṇa eva
pravartteta pravṛttau vā kadācidalīkepi pravṛttiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ ||
aparokṣa--pāº 2 puº |
raghuº ṭīº | bhedāgraho bhedagrāhitvābhāvavatvam | svarūpasyeti |
anubhavātmano bhedasya svaprakāśatayā svataevāvagamādityarthaḥ |
anubhavāgrāhakatvādvikalpena tadbhedāgrahaṇaṃ tu svalakṣaṇāntarānubhava-
sādhāraṇam | apārokṣyaṃ apārokṣyavattvam ||
nāpi viṣayasārūpyaṃ | tadabhāvāt | kā hi para-
mārthasadalīkayoḥ samānarūpatā nāma | yadi rūpaśabdo
dharmmivācakaḥ samānaśabdaścaikaparyyāyaḥ kvārthasaṅgatiḥ
prakṛte | yadi vā rūpaṃ dharmmaḥ samānaścaiko vaikajātīyo
veti tathāpi kvārthasaṅgatiḥ prakṛte | atadvyāvṛttiriti
cet | na | tasya cālīkānalīkaniṣṭhatayā ekatvaika-
jātīyatvayorabhāvāt | ābhimānikoyaṃ sārūpyavyava-
hāro na pāramārthika iti cet | na | abhimānasyaiva
cintyamānatvāt | na hi cintitaprakārān paribhūyā-
paro'bhimāno nāma |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | viṣayeti | anubhavaviṣayavikalpaviṣayayoḥ
sārūpyamapi nānubhavavyāpārapuraskāra ityarthaḥ | sārūpyābhāvameva
darśayati | kā hīti | prameyatvādināpi sā durlabhetyarthaḥ |
na hi vastvavastunoreko dharmī nāpi vastvavastunoreka ekajātīyo
vā dharma ityāha | yadīti | ubhayatrānabhyupagamādevāsaṃgateriti
bhāvaḥ | nanvatadvyāvṛttireko dharma ubhayasādhāraṇa iti kathaṃ nārtha-
saṅgatirityāha | atadvyāvṛttiriti | atadvyāvṛttireko vā eka-
jātīyo vā dharma ityanuṣajyate | atrāpyanabhyupagamamāha tasyeti |
atadvyāvṛttirūpasārūpyasyetyarthaḥ | tasyā iti pāṭhe vyāvṛtterityarthaḥ |
alīkaniṣṭhatayā naikatvamanalīkaniṣṭhatayā ca naikajātīyatvamiti
sādhyadvaye hetudvayametat | alīkānalīkaniṣṭhatayetyeka eva vā
heturubhayatra | abhimānasyaiveti | abhimāna eva nānāprakāreṇa
vikalpito, na tu tena pravṛttiniyama upapādita ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu savikalpakaviṣayālīkena nirvikalpaka-
viṣayasvalakṣaṇasya sārūpyaṃ tadvyāpārapuraskāraḥ svalakṣaṇe pravarttaka-
mityata āha | nāpīti | keti | na hi svalakṣaṇālīke
kasyacidekasya dharmmāvityarthaḥ | tathāpīti | na hi tayoreka
ekajātīyo vā dharmmaḥ samastītyarthaḥ | nanu cātadvyāvṛttistayoḥ
sārūpya syāt vyāvṛtteralīkatayā'līkadharmmatāyāṃ virodhābhāvā-
dityāha | ataditi | atadvyāvṛttiryadi vastudharmmastadā nālīkā
tathātve vā'līkadharmmatvamityāha | tasyā iti | atadvyāvṛtterityarthaḥ |
tasyeti pāṭhe sārūpyasyetyarthaḥ | alīkānalīkatayeti hetudvayam |
na hīti | tatrānupapattiruktaiveti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | viṣayasārūpyaṃ sarūpaviṣayakatvaśālitvaṃ | na
hi sadasatoḥ kaścideko dharmī dharmo vā ekaḥ ekajātīyo vā
abhyupeyate ityāha | yadītyādinā | asati vidhervirodhādvidhireva
sadasatsādhāraṇo neṣyate niṣedhaḥ punariṣyate evetyāśaṅkate | atadvyā-
vṛttiriti | yadyapi yatkiñcidatadvyāvṛttiratasminnapi, yāvadatadvyā-
vṛttistu nālīkepi | tathāpi paramārthasadyāvadatadvyāvṛttirgrāhyetya-
doṣaḥ | nirākaroti | tasyā iti | tasyeti pāṭhe tadā dharmma-
parāmarṣaḥ | alīkaniṣṭhatayā'nalīkaniṣṭhatayā ca alīkānalīka-
niṣṭhayorasatsadrūpayorekatvaikajātīyatvayorabhāvāt | sadasatoḥ saṃsargāna-
bhyupagamādityarthaḥ | nīlavikalpaviṣayasyāpi vyāvṛtterapītayāva-
dvastuvyāvṛttatvānnīlavikalpasyāpi pīte pravarttakatvaprasaṅgaḥ | uktaṃ
ca anugatatattatpadārthānabhyupagame na śakyamatadvyāvṛttisvarūpanirū-
paṇamiti |
svabhāvādeva kaścidvikalpaḥ kasmiṃścidevāsphuritepi
pravarttayati | kimatra kriyatām | sa cāsya svabhāvabhedaḥ
svakāraṇādevāyātaḥ | tatra kaḥ paryyanuyojyatāmiti
cet | tat kimapratyāsanna eva vikalpastatra pravarttayati
pratyāsattyantarābhāvāt svabhāvapratyāsanno vā vyavahṛti-
reva vā pratyāsattiḥ | na prathamaḥ atiprasaṅgāt | dvitīye
tu svabhāvenottaraṃ syāt kintu tadeva sphuraṇam | na hi
vyavahāre pravarttayitavye svabhāvapratyāsattimavadhūya jñāna-
jñeyayoraparaḥ kaścidviṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ | sadasadanirvaca-
nīyārthakhyātivādibhirapi svabhāvapratyāsatteravarjjanīya-
tvāditi vakṣyamāṇatvāt | tṛtīye tu vyaktamātmāśrayaḥ

śaṅkaº ṭīº | pravṛttiniyāmakaṃ jñānaśriyo bījasarvasvamutthāpa-
yati | svabhāvāditi | taduktaṃ jñānaśriyā niyataśaktayo hi
bhāvāḥ pramāṇapariniṣṭhitasvabhāvā na śaktisāṅkaryaparyyanuyogabhājaḥ
kāraṇaśakterasadutpattiniyamāditi | nanu svabhāvabheda eva katha-
(midṛśa)mityata āha | sa ceti | svabhāvapratyāsatterabhāvā ? dityagre
sambaddham | svabhāvapratyāsattireva jñānaviṣayayorviṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ |
sasvattva ? iti siddhā vikalpasya vastuviṣayateti siddhaṃ naḥ samīhita-
mityāha | dvitīye tviti | na hīti | nanu tadgocaravyavahāra-
janakatvameva jñānasya viṣayapratyāsattirityata āha | tṛtīye tviti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | asphuritepīti | aviṣayepītyarthaḥ | kintviti |
svabhāvapratyāsattivāde'smatpakṣapraveśa evetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | śaṅkate | svabhāvāditi | nirākaroti |
tatkimityādinā | ekasminneva viṣaye buddhīnāmicchānāṃ kṛtīnāṃ
cotpādāttattadvikalpasya cānanugatatvādanugatakāryasya cānugatakāraṇa
avyavahāra iti 2 puº pāº |
nibandhānusaº iti 2 puº pāº |
prayojyatvādatiriktasvabhāvabhede pramāṇābhāvānna tasyāpyanugatasyānugata-
kāraṇamantareṇāsambhavādanubhūyamānasya cāsambhavadbādhakasya vikalpānā-
micchādiviṣayaviṣayakatvasyāpalapitumaśakyatvātsamānaviṣayatvenaiva
pravṛttivikalpayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva iti siddhāntatātparyasaṅkṣepaḥ ||
kāraṇaśakterasadutpattivanniyama iti cet | satyam |
etaccintanīyaṃ kāraṇaśaktyāpi niyatajātiniyatayā
bhavitavyam | anyathā jvalanavikalpājjalepi pravṛtti-
prasaṅgāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu yathā pūrvasattvāviśeṣepi daṇḍād ghaṭa eva
jāyate na tu paṭastathā govikalpād gavyeva pravṛttirnāśva ityāha |
kāraṇeti | yathā daṇḍatvāvacchinnasyānvayavyatirekau ghaṭatvāvacchinnaṃ
kāryamanuvidhatte tathā gavi pravṛttiṃ prati vikalpasya jātiprati-
niyamastvanmate durupapāda ityāha | kāraṇaśaktyāpīti | niyāmaka-
mantareṇa sa evātiprasaṅga ityāha | anyatheti |
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yathā kāraṇaṃ daṇḍādi kāryeṇa ghaṭādinā
'sambaddhatvāviśeṣe'pi niyatameva kāryaṃ janayati svabhāvāt tathā
jñānamapi niyataviṣaye pravṛttiheturityāha | kāraṇeti | svabhāva-
niyamo'nvayavyatirekāvacchedake niyatarūpāvacchede satyeva syāditi
tadviṣayajñānatvenaiva pravarttakatvaṃ vācyamityāha | kāraṇaśaktyeti |
jātipadamanugatadharmmaparam | anyatheti | anvayavyatirekāvacchedaka-
rūpāpuraskāra ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | niyatajātiniyatayeti | anugatarūpāvacchinna-
yetyarthaḥ | anugatakāryasyānugatakāraṇaniyamyatvāt ||
dāhādisamarthākāravikalpajātīyaṃ tāttvike vahnau
pravarttayatīti jātirvopādhirvā niyāmaka iti cet |
na tarhi ratnamarīcinicaye tataḥ pravartteta | tajjātīyasya
daina eva pravarttanasāmarthyāt | tādrūpyeṇa tasyaiva prathanā-
diti cet | prathatām | na tu tasya pravarttanayogyatā
tatra prathananiyatā vahnisvalakṣaṇe vahnivikalpādapravṛtti-
prasaṅgāt | svīkuru vā tasyāpi tatra sphuraṇaṃ parihara
vā vahnivikalpādavahnau pravṛttimiti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu vahnirayamityākāravikalpatvāvacchinnameva
vahnau pravarttakam | tādṛśavikalpatvaṃ ca jātirupādhirvetyanyadetat |
na hi tavāpi jātyaiva kāraṇatā'vacchidyate kālākāśadiśāṃ
pratiniyatakāryaṃ pratyakāraṇatāpatterityāśaṅkate | dāheti | tata
iti | vahnivikalpādityarthaḥ | na hi vījādaṅkurasambandhāt
kuñjarotpattiriti bhāvaḥ | evaṃ ratnanicayavikalpāt vahni--
svalakṣaṇepi pravṛttirna syādityapi draṣṭavyam | tādrūpyeṇeti |
vahnitvena tasyaiva ratnanicayasyaiva | prathatāmiti | tvanmate pravṛtti-
viṣayaprathanamatantramityarthaḥ | vahnivikalpāditi | vahnisvalakṣaṇa-
prathanasya tvayā tatrānaṅgīkārādaṅgīkāre vā siddhaṃ naḥ samīhita-
mityarthaḥ | svīkuru veti | seyamubhayataḥpāśā rajjurityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu dāhādisamarthatvena jñāte pravṛttirnnānyatreti
niyamaḥ syāt paramevaṃ marīcinicayopi tathātvena jñāta evetyāha |
tādrūpyeṇeti | yadyevaṃ tadā tvanmate svalakṣaṇāviṣayakādvikalpāttatra
na pravarttetetyāha | na tviti | tasyāpi vahnisvalakṣaṇasyāpi |
tatra vahnivikalpe | avahnau ratnamarīcinicaya ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vināpi svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvamākāraviśeṣādeva
vikalpānāṃ svalakṣaṇaviśeṣe pravarttakatvānnātiprasaṅga ityāśaṅkate |
dāhādīti | ādipadāt pākādiparigrahaḥ | dāhādisāmarthyaṃ
dāhādyasamarthavyāvṛttirvahnitvam | tatsamartheti ca tattatphalārthina-
mapekṣya | satyapi vahnirayamiti vikalpe dāhādisamarthoyamiti
vikalpaṃ vinā dāhārthino'pravṛtterāvaśyakatvātsa eva pravarttaka iti
vādyabhiprāyaḥ | tadākāratā ca bauddhānāṃ mate jñānagata ākārabhedo
jātirūpo'nyeṣāṃ tadviṣayatvam | nirākaroti | na tarhīti | tato
vahnivikalpāt | tatrāpi tasyaiva pravarttakatve marīcivikalpāttadarthī
tatra pravartteta | tasyāpītipakṣe'niyamo mitho vyabhicāraśca | evaṃ
marīcinicayavikalpāttadarthī vahnisvalakṣaṇe na pravartteteti | prathatā-
miti | taditi vipariṇatenānvayaḥ | yadṛcchayā cedam | marīci-
svalakṣaṇānāṃ vikalpaviṣayatāyāḥ parairanabhyupagamāt | tasyāpi
vahnisvalakṣaṇasyāpi | tatra vahnivikalpe ||
etenākārasārūpyaṃ niyamaheturapāstaḥ | arthanīya-
sārūpyābhāvepi pravṛttidarśanāt anarthanīyasārūpya
mātrasya cātiprasañjakatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yaduktaṃ jñānaśriyā pratyāsatticintāyāṃ tadvi-
kalpopi vahnerjananākāratvavikalpollekhasyāpi tāvatā tatraiva pravarttana-
śaktijananavikalpasya na tu jalādāviti tadatideśena dūṣayati |
eteneti | marīcinicaye tataḥ pravṛttyabhāvaprasaṅgenetyarthaḥ | eta-
devāha | arthanīyeti | arthanīyaḥ pravṛttiviṣayatayā iṣṭo ratna-
nicayastasya ca vahnivikalpena sārūpyābhāvādityarthaḥ | tathāpi
vahninā vahnivikalpasya sārūpyamastyevetyata āha | anarthanīyeti |
na hi tatra vahniravalambanīyaḥ kintu vahninicaya evetyarthaḥ |
yadvā jvalanavikalpājjalepi pravṛttiprasaṅgādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu svaviṣayepi jñānasya pravarttakatve nāti-
prasaṅgaḥ yaddharmmaviśiṣṭo'rthastatraiva taddharmmaviśiṣṭajñānasya pravarttakatvā-
dityata āha | eteneti | vahnyākārajñānāttatsvarūpe vahnau
pravṛttisambhavepi marīcinicaye pravṛttirnna syāt tatra vahnitvasya
pravarttakajñānasārūpyasyābhāvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ākārasārūpyaṃ vikalpapravṛttiviṣayayorekā-
kāratvam | arthanīyasārūpyaṃ dvayoriṣṭatāvacchedakaikākāraśālitvaṃ |
tadabhāvepi rajatākāreṇa vikalpena rajatārthino raṅgepi pravarttanāt |
anarthanīyasārūpyaṃ iṣṭatānavacchedakaikākāraśālitvam | atiprasañja-
katvāt saddravyaṃ rajatamiti vikalpādrajatārthino lauhepi pravṛtti-
prasaṅgāt ||
na ca bāhyavāde jñānajñeyayorvivakṣitasārūpyasambhavaḥ
sāmagrīvaiṣamyāt | sāmye vā jāḍyacaitanyayorekaśeṣa-
prasaṅgāt | na ca sāmyepyavāntaraviśeṣāt kāryyaviśeṣa-
vyavasthā mithaḥ sāmagryananuvidhānena jāyamānatvāt |
na ca kāryyonneyaṃ sāmagrīsāmyaṃ, bāhye dhūmādyanu-
vidhīyamānasya kāraṇasya dṛśyatvāt dhūmajñānasya ca
tadvyabhicāropalambhāt | na ca tadeva kāraṇamekatra
dṛśyamadṛśyaṃ cānyatreti yuktam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | etacca sārūpyamaṅgīkṛtyoktaṃ vastutaḥ sārūpyameva
nāstītyāha | na ceti | vivakṣita iti | pravṛttiniyāmakatveneṣṭa
ityarthaḥ | sāmye veti | abhinnasāmagrīkatvena sarvamajñānaṃ syāt
jñānameva vā syādvaijātyaṃ tu na bhavedityarthaḥ | nanu jñānasukhayoryathā
sāmagrīsāmyepi kiñcitkāraṇabhedādvaijātyaṃ tathā jaḍ.acaitanyayorapi
syādityata āha | na ceti | ubhayorapi prakāśatamasorvilakṣaṇa-
sāmagrījanyatvādityarthaḥ | dhūmādyanuvidhīyamānasyeti | dhūmādinānu-
vidhīyamānasya vahnyādeḥ kāraṇasya dṛśyatvāt dhūmajñānasya ca vahniṃ
vināpi jāyamānatvāt dhūmadhūmajñānayoḥ kva sāmagrīsāmyamityarthaḥ |
nanu dhūmajñānepyadṛśyo vahniḥ kāraṇaṃ syāditi kathaṃ na sāmagrī-
sāmyamata āha | na ceti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | dūṣaṇāntaramāha | na ceti | pravṛttiniyāma-
katvenābhimataṃ jñānajñeyayoryat sārūpyaṃ tadvijñānavāda eva sambhavati,
tayoḥ sāmagrīsājātyāt, bāhyavāde tanna sambhavatītyarthaḥ |
sāmye veti | sāmagrīsāmye bāhyajñānayorvaijātyaṃ na syādityarthaḥ |
nanu tayoraikajātyaprayojakādaikajātyepi viśeṣasāmagrīto-
vāntaravaijātyamapi syādityata āha | na ceti | aikajātyaprayojaka-
sāmagrīsāmyāsiddherityarthaḥ | nanu bāhyatajjñānayoraikajātyātta-
tprayojakatvamiṣyata ityata āha | na ceti | bāhye tajjātīyatā-
prayojakadṛśyakāraṇavyabhicāreṇa jñānasya na tajjātīyatvamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vijñānavāde jñeyasya jñānābhinnatvātsāmagrī-
sājātyāt bādhakābhāvācca jñānajñeyayorākārasāmyaṃ sambhavati na
tu bāhyavāda ityāha | na ceti | na ca jñānajñeyayorekākāratā-
prayojikā kācanānugatānatiprasaktā sāmagrī yena tatsāmyepi
viśeṣasāmagrībhedātkāryabheda ityāha | na ceti | kāryasājātyo-
nneyaṃ sāmagrīsājātyaṃ dūṣayati | na ceti | vastuto bāhyabāde
vijñānasya tadviṣayatvātirikte tadākāratve na kiñcitpramāṇa-
masti yena tadbalādatīndriyameva kiñcitprayojakaṃ kalpanīya-
miti bhāvaḥ ||
yadi ca nīlimādirvijñānasya jātiviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ
tadatipatya jñeyaṃ spṛśet, jñeyasya cet kathaṃ jñānaṃ
tadviśiṃṣyāditi jātisaṅkarāpādanaprastāve cintita-
prāyam | tasmāt sphurita eva jñānaṃ pravarttayatīti
gale pādukayāpyaṅgīkārayitavyo gatyantarābhāvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ākārasārūpyādvikalpaḥ svalakṣaṇe pravarttaya-
tītyatra dūṣaṇāntaramāha | yadi ceti | ākāro hi nīlatvaṃ,
tadyadi jñānagatā jātistadā sā jñeye nīle na varttate, jñeya-
gatā cettadā jñāne kathaṃ varttatāmiti nākārasāmyamityarthaḥ |
nanūbhayatra varttatāṃ ko doṣa ityata āha | jātisaṅkareti |
evaṃ sati jñānatvānubhavatvasākṣāttvādibhiḥ sāṅkaryaṃ syādityarthaḥ |
prakṛtamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi ||
bhagīº ṭīº | ākārasārūpye dūṣaṇāntaramāha | yadi ceti ||
raghuº ṭīº | jātisaṅkaraṃ sājātye bādhakamāha | yadi ceti ||
tarhi sphurite svākāre eva pravarttayatu, tatra pravṛtta
eva cārthī tatsadṛśamarthamāsādayati prabhāyāṃ pravṛtto
maṇivaditi cet | na | abhimatārthakriyāsāmarthya-
virahiṇyapravṛtteḥ | na ca bāhye vikalpākārāropasambhavaḥ
tasya tenāsaṃsparśāt | na cākāre bāhyatvāropaḥ svarūpe
sphuratyasvarūpāropānavakāśāt | prabhāyāṃ tu maṇi-
buddhyaiva maṇyarthī pravarttate na tu tadabuddhyeti dṛṣṭāntopyā-
bhāsaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadanena praghaṭṭakena śabdaliṅgavikalpānā-
malīkaviṣayatvaṃ nirākṛtya ākāro veti sautrāntikamataṃ dūṣayitu-
māśaṅkate | tarhīti | vikalpānāṃ prāmāṇyābhimānamupapādayati |
tatreti | saṃvādātpramāṇatvenābhimāna iti bhāvaḥ | pariharati |
neti | arthakriyāsamarthepyarthe'rthakriyārthī pravarttate na tu jñānā-
kārastathetyarthaḥ | nanu bāhyerthakriyāsamarthe jñānākārāropātpravṛttiḥ
syādata āha | na ca bāhya iti | bāhyasya tvanmate vikalpenā-
saṃsparśāt | nanu jñānākāra eva bāhyatvamāropya pravṛttiḥ syātta-
darthakriyāsamarthameva yata ityata āha | na ceti | svarūpa iti |
svaprakāśena jñānākāre sphurati tatra viśeṣadarśanādāropānupapatti-
rityarthaḥ | anyaviṣayajñānādanyatra pravṛttirityatra dṛṣṭāntopi sādhya-
vikala ityāha | prabhāyāṃ tviti1 ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tadevamalīkaṃ veti pakṣaṃ nirākṛtyākāro veti
pakṣamutthāpayati | tarhīti | pravṛttisamvādamupapādayati | tatreti |
ākāre yadi jñānavṛttitayā jñāte pravṛttistatrāha | abhimateti |
jñānākārasya na dāhādisāmarthyamiti pramāpayatastadasamarthe tatra
pravṛttirnna syādityarthaḥ | nanu bāhyaniṣṭhatayā svākāre jñāte
pravṛttiriti noktadoṣa ityata āha | na ceti | bāhyasvalakṣaṇasya
vikalpenāviṣayīkaraṇāt, na cāropaviṣayājñāne tatsambhava
ityarthaḥ | na ca jñānākārasya jñānābhinnatayā svaprakāśatve tatrārtha-
kriyāsāmarthyamāropyamityapi sambhavatītyāha | na ceti | svaprakāśa-
tayā svarūpe viśeṣe jñānatvena sphuratyasvarūpasya bāhyatvasyāropā-
sambhava ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | iyatā prabandhenālīkaṃ veti pakṣaṃ nirākṛtyā-
kāro veti pakṣaṃ nirākarttumutthāpayati | tarhīti | anyatra
pravṛttau kathamanyalābha ityata āha | tatreti | maṇivaditi
dvitīyāsamarthādvatiḥ | nirākaroti | netyādi | sāmarthyavira-
hiṇi samarthattvenājñāte | na khalu lokena vahnivikalpaḥ pākādi-
samarthattvena jñāto'pi tu bahniḥ | na cākāragṛhītārthakriyāsāmarthya-
prabhāyāstviti--pāṭhaḥ |
bāhyayorabhedāropātpravṛttiḥ | āropo hi bāhye svākārasya
ākāre vā bāhyasya | ādye na ceti | tasya bāhyasya | tena
vikalpena | dvitīye na ceti | ākārākāriṇorabhedātsvaprakāśena
jñānarūpatve gṛhyamāṇe bāhyābhedāropāsambhavāt | vastuto bāhyānu-
bhavasya vikalpākārāgrāhitvāt vikalpasya ca bāhyāsparśitvādāropyā-
ropaviṣayobhayāgrāhiṇaścāroparūpatvāyogādbāhyānubhavo vā ākāra-
vān vikalpo vā vikalpāntaraṃ vā na vikalpākāre bāhyābhedā-
ropo bhavitumarthatīti | maṇibuddhyā maṇitvena prabhāyā buddhyā |
tasyāḥ prabhāyā abuddhyā | ābhāsa iti | maṇiprabhāpravṛttamaṇyarthi-
samāsādyatvenopanyasto maṇirdṛṣṭānto'bhimatādākārāvabhāsasyaiva
pravarttakatvāt viparīte bāhyāvabhāsapravarttakatve paryavasyannābhāsa ityarthaḥ |
jñānasya svaviṣaya eva pravarttakatayā bhavatāpyabhyupagamāt | atha yathā
bhavatā prabhāyāṃ pravṛttasya maṇiprāptiḥ tathāsmākamapyākāre pravṛttasya
bāhyaprāptirityabhiprāyaḥ, sopi na yuktaḥ, pravṛtto hi maṇiprabhāyāṃ
tatsannidhānāvinābhāvānmaṇimāsādayati, na cākārasya tathā sambhava
iti bhāvaḥ ||
na cākāravāde'sphurato'rthasya sattāyāṃ pramāṇa-
mapyasti | ākārakādācitkatvasya taimirikakeśādyā-
kāreṇānaikāntikatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | sautrāntikamate doṣāntaramāha | na ceti |
asphurato'rthasya nīlādeḥ | nanvākārakādācitkatvādeva viṣaya-
siddhiḥ syāt, na hi nīlasannidhānamantareṇa nīlākāraṃ jñānaṃ
kādācitkaṃ bhavet, sarvadaiva tadākārajñānaprasaṅgādityata āha |
ākāreti | kādācitkatvasyāpyākārasyārthavyabhicāradarśanādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | jñānasya sākāratvaṃ nirākaroti | na ceti
jñānaṃ hi bāhyamavagāhate na vā | ādye tata eva rajatajñāna-
mityādivyavahārādyupapattāvatirikte ākāre pramāṇābhāvaḥ | na hi
jñānaṃ rajatamiti kaścidvyavaharati pratyeti vā, parantu rajatasya
jñānamiti | dvitīye tu na bāhyasiddhiḥ | rajatamidamityādikaṃ
ca jñānaṃ rajatādikamavagāhamānaṃ rajatādisiddhirabhidhīyate |
taccenna tadavagāhi kuto rajatādisiddhiḥ | ākārātkāryātkāraṇasya
viṣayasya siddhiṃ nirākaroti | ākāreti | kāryāddhi sāmā-
nyataḥ kāraṇamātraṃ viśeṣataśca gṛhītahetubhāvaṃ siddhyati | ādye na
tena dahanādinaiva bhavitavyaṃ | dvitīye tu vināpi dahanādikaṃ
dahanādyākāravikalpopagamena vyabhicārāt dahanādyaprasiddhyā ca na
kāraṇatāgrahasambhavaḥ ||
arthakriyāsamvādasyāpi sphuritasyākāramātraśarīra-
tvāt bāhyasya cāsiddheḥ | nirālambanārthākāravacca
kvacidvāsanāvaśādarthakriyākāropi nirālambana eva
bhaviṣyatīti vipakṣe bādhakābhāvāt pratibandhasyāpya-
siddheḥ | tasmādbāhyasiddhiḥ sākāraṃ ca jñānamiti bāla-
lolupatvamiti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu bāhyārthakriyaiva bāhye pramāṇaṃ syādityata
āha | arthakriyeti | arthakriyāyā apyākāraśarīratvādityarthaḥ |
kiṃ ca yadi bāhyaṃ siddhyettadārthakriyāpi pratiniyatā siddhyettadeva
tu nāstītyāha | bāhyasya ceti | na cārthakriyā bāhye pramāṇaṃ
bhavitumarhati, tena taimirikakeśajñānavadarthakriyājñānasyāpi vāsanā-
samutthatvenopaplavayituṃ śakyatvādityāha | nirālambaneti | nirā-
lambanārthākārastaimirikakeśajñānākāraḥ | pratibandhasyāpīti | artha-
kriyākārabāhyayoḥ pratibandhasyāsiddheḥ kathamarthakriyāsamvādena
bāhyārthasiddhiḥ syādityarthaḥ | bāhyasyārthakriyaiva nāstītyapinā
samuccinoti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvarthakriyāviśeṣādarthaviśeṣaḥ kalpyata ityāha |
arthakriyeti | tajjñānasya svākāramātrasamūrttikatayā tatrāpi
mānābhāva ityarthaḥ | anākārā cārthakriyā tvayā nābhyupeyata
ityāha | bāhyasya ceti | nirālambano bāhyārthānāhitaḥ taimi-
rikakeśādyākāra ityarthaḥ | kalpanāpi svākāramātraviṣayā nārthaṃ
spṛśatīti na tatopyarthasiddhirityāha | tasmāditi | na cākārasya
sākṣājjñānaviṣayatvaṃ tajjñānajanakatayā bāhyārthenāpi paramparāsambandha
itīyameva viṣayasiddhiriti vācyam | atrāpi mānābhāvāt
vaiparītyāpatteśca ||
raghu ṭīº | mābhūt jñānagatāddahanādyākārāt kāryāddaha-
nādisiddhirddāhādestu syādata āha | artheti | sphuritasya
svaprakāśenollikhitasya | bāhyasya dāhādeḥ asiddherdāhādyākāreṇa
vijñānenāgrahaṇāt | na cāgṛhītaṃ liṅgaṃ laiṅgikamanumāpayati |
mābhūdbāhyo dāhādirdahanāderanumāpako jñānākārastu syāt na hi
vinā dāhādikaṃ dāhādyākāraṃ jñānaṃ, na ca vinā dahanādi
dāhādikamata āha | nirālambaneti | nirālambano bāhyāprayuktaḥ |
arthākāro dahanādyākāraḥ | arthakriyākāro dāhādyākāraḥ |
sandigdhānaikāntikatvaṃ sthalaviśeṣābhiprāyeṇa | prāyeṇa tu niścita-
vyabhicāratvameva | bālalolupatvamiti | bāhyavilope hi
raṅgajñānaṃ rajatajñānamiti viśeṣo na vinākāraṃ sambhavatīti

śaṅkaº ṭīº | samprati bāhyaṃ vastu veti vaibhāṣikamatamutthā-
payan tṛtīyaṃ vikalpaṃ dūṣayati | astu tarhīti | nanūktaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ
nābhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsamata āha | yadyapīti | atadrūpeti |
agovyāvṛttilakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā svalakṣaṇābhilāpasaṃsargayogyatā-
sambhavādityarthaḥ | tathā bhavatyeva abhilāpasaṃsargayogyaṃ bhavatye-
vetyarthaḥ | tāmeva pratyāsattimāha | yathā hīti || gopiṇḍa-
bhinno vā gotvajātiśūnyo vā agauriti vikalpārthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tṛtīyaṃ kalpamutthāpayati | astu tarhīti |
svarūpeṇeti | ānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ tatra śaktigrahābhāvādityarthaḥ |
tathāpīti | yadyapi vyāvṛttiralīkā na vastudharmmastathāpi
vastubhūtaiva sā taddharmmo bhaviṣyatīti nānugatadhīrbhāvarūpe sāmānye
mānamiti bhāvaḥ | tadgateti | gotvasāmānyaśūnya ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | bāhyaṃ vastu veti tṛtīyaṃ pakṣamutthāpayati |
astviti | tathāpīti | bhavatāṃ vidhirūpasyeva niṣedharūpasyāpi
gotvasya yogāt saṅketādiviṣayatvamityarthaḥ | tathā abhilāpa-
saṃsargayogyaṃ | yadyapi teṣāmasatyāḥ vyāvṛtteḥ satā sambandhasya
sattvasya vā'bhyupagame'pasiddhāntastathāpi tasya tairdoṣatvānabhyupagamāt
doṣāntaramāha | atheti ||
prathame na gavāntarepi gośabdavikalpau pravartteyātām,
aśvādivadanātmatvāviśeṣāt | atiprasaṅgaśca, mahiṣa-
mātaṅgādyagovyāvṛttyā'śvepi govyavahāraprasaṅgāt | sa
gorapi vyāvarttata iti cet | tat kimabhimato gaurgo-
rapi na vyāvarttate | vyāvarttate kintu svayamapyasau
gauriti cet | yadyagovyāvṛttirevāsya gotvaṃ tadaśvepi
samānam | anyaccettaducyatām |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | gavāntara iti | tasyāpi agotvādityarthaḥ |
mahiṣādagormātaṅgāccāśvasyāpi vyāvṛttatve govyavahāraḥ | aśvādi-
rgorapi vyāvarttata iti na tatra govyavahāra ityāha | sa gorapīti |
ekasmād gopiṇḍādaparopi gopiṇḍo vyāvarttata iti tatrāpi
govyavahārābhāvaprasaṅga ityāha | tatkimiti | gopiṇḍādekasmā-
dbhinnopi gopiṇḍo gaurbhavatyeveti tatra govyavahāraḥ syādevetyāha |
vyāvarttata iti | tadaśve'pīti | mahiṣādagorvyāvṛtto'śvopi
gaureva syādityarthaḥ | anyaditi | gotvāvacchinnapratiyogikā-
nyonyābhāvavānagaustadanyaśca gaurityarthaḥ | tathā ca siddhaṃ gotva-
miti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadyagaurekagosvalakṣaṇānātmā tadāśvādivadga-
vāntaramapyagauriti na tatra govyavahāraḥ syādityāha | prathama iti |
atiprasaṅgamevāha | mahiṣa iti | sa gorapīti | ago-
vyāvṛttopi yo goto na vyāvarttate sa govyavahāraheturaśvaśca gotopi
vyāvarttata iti na tathetyarthaḥ | tat kimiti | evaṃ gaurapi
govyavahāraviṣayo na syāt yatkiñcidgostasyāpi vyāvṛttatvādityarthaḥ |
nanu sakalagovyāvṛttimānaśvādirgauśca na tathā svatastasyāvyāvṛtte-
rityāha | kintviti | svayamapyayaṃ gaurgotvayogāt | gotvaṃ ca
yadi yatkiñcidagovyāvṛttatvam tadā'śvepyagorūpamahiṣādivyāvṛtta-
tvādgotvaprasaṅga ityāha | yadīti | anyaditi | yadi ca gotva-
jātimān gaustadā vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ siddhamevetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ekagosvalakṣaṇabhinnebhyo yāvadbhyo vyāvṛttiryataḥ
kutaścidvā | ādye gavāntarepīti | dvitīye atiprasaṅgaśceti |
atiprasaṅgastadayogye tatprasaṅgaḥ | tadupapādayati | mahiṣeti |
kathañcitprakārabhedāt | prasaṅgāditi pañcamī samarthanīyā | gotvā-
vacchinnavyāvṛttayāvadvyāvṛttirgovyavahāre nimittamityāśaṅkate | sa
iti | gotvamananugatamanugataṃ vā | ādye tat kimiti | dvitīyaṃ
śaṅkate | vyāvarttata iti | anugataṃ gotvaṃ vidhirūpaṃ cetsiddhaṃ naḥ
samīhitam | niṣedharūpaṃ cettatrāha | yadīti | agovyāvṛttireka-
gosvalakṣaṇānātmakebhyo yāvadbhyo vyāvṛttiruta tādṛśādyataḥ kutaścit |
ādye na tasya gotvaṃ tasyāpyekagosvalakṣaṇabhinnatvāt | dvitīye
tvāha | tadā'śvepīti | aśvasyāpyekagosvalakṣaṇānātmakayatkiñci-
nmahiṣādivyāvṛttatvāt | tathā ca gotvāvacchinnavyāvṛttyavacchinna-
mahiṣādivyāvṛttimattvāttatrāpi govyavahārāpattiḥ | vidheranyaccānu-
gatānatiprasaktaṃ durvacamityāha | anyaccediti | etena yāvadgovyakti-
vyāvṛttayāvadvyāvṛttirgovyavahāranimittamityapi nirastam | viśiṣya
yāvadgovyaktīnāmasarvajñāvedyatvāt ekadharmopagrahaṃ vinā yāvadgo-
vyaktivyāvṛtterdurjñeyatvāt ||
dvitīye tu tadgatadharmmavirahivyāvṛttastadvāneva syāt |
tatra ca na vivādaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadgateti | gotvātyantābhāvavadanyo gotva-
vānevetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | dharmmāntarasya sakalagovyaktivṛtteranyasyābhāvā-
dgotvasyaiva tathātvamiti vācyam tathā ca siddhamīhitamityāha |
dvitīye tviti ||
raghuº ṭīº | yatkiñcittadgatadharmmaśūnyatvamatiprasaktaṃ yāvattad-
gatadharmmaśūnyatvaṃ cāprasiddhamatastadgatagotvaśūnyatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ | tathā ca
siddhamīhitamityāha | tadgateti ||
mithaḥ sambhinnākārāḥ piṇḍā eva sādhāraṇaṃ rūpamastu
kṛtamatadrūpaparāvṛttyeti cet | na | sambhedābhāvāt | sa
hi na vāstavaḥ piṇḍānāṃ viruddhadharmmādhyastatvāt |
nābhimānikaḥ śābaleyāderbhedenaiva prathanāt | taddharmmāṇāṃ
sambhedābhimāna iti cet | na | dharmmyatiriktadharmmānabhyupa-
gamāt | abhyupagame vā paryyavasitaṃ vivādena |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kīrttimatenānugatapratyayasyānyathāsiddhiṃ śaṅkate |
mitha iti | yadāha kīrttiḥ |
pararūpaṃ svarūpeṇa yayā1 saṃvriyate dhiyā |
ekārthapratibhāsinyā bhāvānāśritya bhedinaḥ ||
tayā saṃvṛtanānārthāḥ saṃvṛtyā bhedinaḥ svayam |
abhedina ivābhānti bhāvā2rūpeṇa kenacit ||
iti | sa hīti | sambheda ityarthaḥ | piṇḍānāṃ vāstavamekatvaṃ
ābhimānikaṃ vā | ādya āha | piṇḍānāmiti | bhedenaiveti |
tathā ca kvaikattvābhimāna ityarthaḥ | taddharmāṇāṃ śābaleyādi-
dharmāṇām | sameda aikyam | śābaleyādibhinnāstvanmate dharmā eva
na santi yeṣāṃ sambhedaḥ syādityāha | neti | tebhyo bhinnāsteṣāṃ
dharmāścettadā paryavasitaṃ vivādenetyāha | abhyupagame veti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | mitha iti | anugatabuddhergopiṇḍānāmaikyaṃ
biṣaya iti na tataḥ sāmānyasiddhirityarthaḥ | bhedenaiveti | mayā
bhede bhāsamāna evābhedabuddherjātinimittakatvopagamādityarthaḥ |
yathā--pāṭhaḥ |
bhāva--pāṭhaḥ |
paryyavasitamiti | mithobhinnagosvalakṣaṇavṛttidharmmasya vastunaḥ
siddherityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ākārābheda evānugatamaterālambanamityā-
śaṅkate | mitha iti | sambhedo'bhedaḥ | ākāro dharmī taddharmo
vā | ādye sa hīti | atra hetumāha | piṇḍānāmityādi |
dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate | taddharmāṇāmiti | ananugatānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhedāva-
bhāsādanugato dharmo'bhyupagantavyastathā ca siddhamīhitamityāha |
abhyupagame veti ||
