iti | tadapekṣayeti | yeṣāṃ gabākārānugatadhījanakasvābhāvyaṃ
piṇḍānāṃ te gāvaḥ yeṣāṃ tu na tathā sāmarthyaṃ te piṇḍā agāva
ityarthaḥ | nanu tādṛśaṃ sāmarthyameva kuta ityata āha | tacceti |
etacca tvayāpi svīkarttavyamityāha | anyatheti | gotvāśvatvamahiṣatvā-
diṣvidaṃ sāmānyamidaṃ sāmānyamityanugatapratyayātteṣvapi sāmā-
nyāntaramaṅgīkriyetetyarthaḥ | kiṃ ca gotvaṃ gopiṇḍeṣveva varttate
nānyatreti tadvṛttiniyāmikā aparā kācidevaṃ tadvṛttiniyāmikā
cāparetyadhodhāvantī anavasthā syāt | sāmānye ca sāmānyāntarā-
bhyupagame corddhvaṃ dhāvantītyubhayamukhyanavasthetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvanugatamatiḥ sāmānyasiddhau mānam | sā
cānyathāsiddhaiva | ekajātīyavikalpajanakatvādupādherbhinnānāṃ vyaktīnāṃ
tadviṣayatvādityākṣipati | bhinnānāmeveti | tadapekṣayeti |
tattadgavāśvādivikalpajananasāmarthyādgavāśvādivyavahāra ityarthaḥ | nanva-
nanugatāt kathamanugatadhīrityata āha | anyatheti | tavāpīdaṃ
sāmānyamidaṃ sāmānyamityanugatamateḥ sattvāt sāmānyatvaṃ sāmā-
nyāntaraṃ syādityarthaḥ | tathā gopiṇḍeṣvapīti | sāmānyāntaraṃ
kalpyetetyanuṣajyate | gotvaṃ yadi gotvānāśraye varttate tadā'śvepi
vartteteti tadīyakvācitkatvaniyamārthaṃ niyāmakāpekṣāyāmanavasthānā-
dityarthaḥ | ubhayamukhīti | ūrddhvaṃ dhāvantyadhodhāvantī cetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | anugataṃ sāmānyamanugatavikalpajananārthaṃ vā
kalpyate anugatavyavahārālambanatayā vā | nādyo bhinnānāmapi svakāra-
ṇādhīnāt sāmarthyaviśeṣādanugatavikalpajananopapatteḥ | na dvitīyaḥ
tādṛśavikalpajanakatvasyaiva vyavahārālambanatvāt | yadi cānugata-
vikalpajanakatvādatiriktamapyanugatavyavahārālambanaṃ kalpanīyaṃ tadā
sāmānyepyanugatasāmānyavyavahārālambanaṃ sāmānyāntaraṃ kalpyaṃ tatrāpi
ca sāmānyavyavahārāt tasya ca svātmani vṛttivirodhāt tatsādhā-
raṇamaparaṃ, evaṃ tatra tatrāpītyanavasthā | evaṃ yadi svabhāvaniyata-
vṛtterapi sāmarthyasya vṛttiniyamārthaṃ sāmānyaṃ kalpyaṃ tadā tasyāpi
vṛttiniyamārthamanyadevaṃ tasya tasyāpītyanavasthetyāśaṅkate | syādeta-
dityādinā | vikalpānāṃ samānatvamākāraviśeṣaḥ |
yadyevaṃ nimittāntaramanapekṣyaikavyavahāro'tyantabhinnaiḥ,
evaṃ bhinnavyavahāra evābhinnenaikena kenacit kiṃ na
sādhyate, śaktisvabhāvāvalambanasyobhayatrāpi tulyatvāt |
athaivaṃ satyekavyavahāraḥ kvacidapi na syāt nirnimitto
vā bhavet, ubhayamapyaniṣṭam | tadetattulyam | aneka-
vyavahāropyevaṃ sati na syāt nirnimitto vā bhavet,
ubhayamapyaniṣṭam | tasmādekenaikavyavahāravadanekenāpya-
nekavyavahāra eveti sāmarthyaniyamaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yathātyantabhinnānāmabhedavyavahārahetutvaṃ tathā
abhinnānāṃ bhedavyavahārahetutvameva kiṃ na syādityekaikopi gopiṇḍo
bhedenaiva vyavahriyetetyāha | yadyevamiti | ekenānekavyavahāraścada-
nupapannastadā1 anekairekavyavahāropyanupapanna evetyāha | athaivamiti |
tulyatāmeva darśayati | aneketi | ekenaiva sāmānyena gotvādinā
gavādipiṇḍānāmanugatavyavahāra ityupasaṃharati | tasmāditi |
bhagīº ṭīº | anekenānekavyavahāra eveti niyamānabhyupagame
ekenaikavyavahāra evetyapi niyamo na syāditi svalakṣaṇamapi
tyajyatāmiti bāhyavādavyāghāta iti samādhatte | yadyevamiti |
abhinneneti | yathā sarvvatrādvaitavādibhirbrahmaṇaikenānekavyavahāro-
bhyupagamyata ityarthaḥ | athaivamiti | itarānimittako'yaṃ vyavahāro
yadi tannimittako na syāt animittako vā syādityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | sāmarthyaṃ yadi tādṛśanikhilavyaktiniṣṭhamekaṃ
tarhi kimaparāddhaṃ pratyakṣasiddhena gottvādinā, atha prativyakti bhinnaṃ
na tarhi tasyānugatavikalpotpādaniyāmakatvaṃ mitho vyabhicārādi-
tyāśayena nirākaroti | yadyevamiti |
kā gatistarhi sāmānyeṣṭhanekeṣṭhekavyavahārasya | yā
candramasyekasminnanekavyavahārasya | bhrānto'sāviti cet |
tathā--pāṭhaḥ |
ayamapi bhrānta eva | bādhakasyobhayatrāpi tulyatvāt |
sarvvatra bhrānto'stviti cet | bhedavyavahāropi tathā
kiṃ na syāt | arthakriyāsthiteriti cet | vyakti-
bhedābhedavyavasthāpakārthakriyābhedābhedavat sajātīyā-
sajātīyatvavyavasthāpakārthakriyāsājātyavaijātye api
kiṃ na paśyasi | te api bhrānte iti cet | arthakriyā-
bhedopi bhrānta iti tulyam | astvevamiti cet | tyaja
tarhi bāhyavyasanam | ayamevāśaya iti cet | tatra
vakṣyāmaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | parāpāditāmanavasthāmuddharttumāha | kā gati-
riti | yathā kadācidekenāpyanekavyavahārastathā kvacidanekenāpyeka-
vyavahāra iti pratibaṃdimukhenottaramāha | yeti | vastutaḥ
sāmānyeṣvapi taditarāvṛttitve sati sakalatadvṛttitvaṃ nityatve
satyanekavṛttitvamupādhisāmānyamekamastīti bhāvaḥ | sarvvatreti |
gopiṇḍādiṣvanugatavyavahāro bhrāntostvityarthaḥ | vedāntimata-
mālambyāha | bhedavyavahāropīti1 | arthakriyābhedāt vyaktīnā-
mapi bheda ityāha | artheti | arthakriyāsājātyavaijātyanibandhanaṃ
tarhi vyaktīnāmapi sājātyavaijātye svīkārye eva anyathā tadākasmi-
katvaprasaṅgādityāha | vyaktīti | te apīti | arthakriyāsājātya-
vaijātye ityarthaḥ | tarhi vyaktibhedako'rthakriyābhedopi bhrānta eveti
hāreṇeti--pāṭhaḥ |
vyaktibhedopi na syāditi jitaṃ vedāntibhirityāha | artha-
kriyeti | vyaktibhedopi māstu kiṃ naśchinnamityāha | astviti |
tarhi cidrūpaṃ brahmaivaikamastu kiṃ bāhyenetyāha | tyajeti | labdhāvakāśo
vedāntyāha | ayameveti | bauddhābhimānaṃ nirākṛtya tavāpyabhi-
mānamagre nirākariṣyāma ityāha | tatreti |
bhagīº ṭīº | kā gatiriti | yadyekenaivaikavyavahāra iti
śeṣaḥ | candradvayavyavahāravat sāmānye'pyekavyavahāro bhrānta evetyarthaḥ |
yadyapi sāmānye jāterabhāvepi taditarāvṛttitve sati sakala-
tadvṛttitvarūpamupādhisāmānyamastyevānugatamateḥ sattvāt, tathāpi yadi
sākṣātsamaveta eva jātirūpo dharmmastayā viṣayīkriyate tadā tadvyava-
hārasya bhramatvamuktam | sarvvatreti | gopiṇḍeṣvapītyarthaḥ | bādhakaṃ
vinā vyavahārasya bhrāntatve bhedadhīrapyabhedanibandhanā na syāt bhramatvā-
dityāha | bhedeti | vyaktīti | vyaktyekatvanānātvasiddhau yathā'rtha-
kriyaikatvanānātve mānam tathā vyaktyāśritasajātīyatvavijātīyatvayo-
rapyarthakriyāsājātyavaijātye mānamityarthaḥ | tasmādbādhakaṃ vinā
yadyarthakriyāsājātyadhīrbhramaḥ syāt tadā'rthakriyābhedajñānasyāpi bhramatve
vyaktibhedāsiddhau bāhyavilopa ityāha | tyajeti ||
raghuº ṭīº | abhyupetyāha | yā candramasīti | vastuto nityāneka-
samavetatvalakṣaṇaupādhikasāmānyanibandhano gotvādāvanugatasāmānya-
vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ | sarvatra gavādipiṇḍeṣvapi | pratibandhi-
māha | bhedeti | te arthakriyāsājātyavaijātye | bhrānte bhrāntyu-
llikhite | yadi vinaiva bādhakaṃ buddhīnāṃ bhramatvaṃ tadā bāhyavilopa-
prasaṅga ityāha | tyajeti ||
mābhūdvā'rthakriyāsājātyavaijātyāvagamaḥ | bhrāntya-
nugamopyekaṃ nimittamanādṛtya katham, tadapi hi kāryya-
mājātyaṃ sāmagrīsājātyamantareṇākasmikamāpadyeta |
anyathā tatparamparālambanamapi viḍambanameva | bhinnaistai-
stairabhedavyavahārasiddhau vyaktibhireva tathābhūtābhirabhi-
matasiddhestadanusaraṇaprayāsavaiphalyāt | tasmādāropavyava-
hārasyāpyanāropitajātyanādare asambhava eveti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | mābhūdveti | arthakriyāsājātyaṃ kāraṇa-
sājātyonnāyakaṃ māstu, kiñcijjñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ kiñcidabhrāntamityamapi
vyavasthā kāraṇasājātyanibandhanaiva syādanyathā sarvaṃ bhrāntamabhrāntameva
vā bhavedityarthaḥ | bhrāntitvenānugatamatirapi bhramaḥ syādityartha
ityanye | tadapi bhrāntatvamapi | nanu bhramatve sāmagrīsājātyā-
prayojakatvepyanākasmikatvaṃ syādityata āha | anyatheti | tatparamparā-
lambanamapīti | bhramaparamparālambanamapītyarthaḥ | tadanusaraṇaprayāso
bhramaparamparānusaraṇaprayāsaḥ | tadayamarthaḥ |
ekapratyavamarṣasya hetutvāddhīrabhedinī |
ekadhīhetubhāvena vyaktīnāmapyabhinnatā ||
ityatra pratyavamarṣasya pratisandhānasyaikatvabhramādanugatapratyayānā-
mekatvabhramācca vyaktīnāmekatvabhrama iti yā bhramaparamparā tvayoktā, sāpi
tava viḍambanameva dhikkāra eva, bhramakāraṇasyāpyanugatasya tvayānaṅgī-
kārāditi | yadvā ekapratyavamarṣasyetyekajātīyapratyavamarṣasyeti tvayā
vācyam tathā ca siddho jātikṛtānugama1 ityarthaḥ | tathā ca
tvatkārikāyāṃ tatparamparānusaraṇaṃ tajjātīyatvaparamparānusaraṇa-
mityarthaḥ | yadvā vyaktīnāṃ bhinnānāmeva sāmarthyāt sarvatrābhedavyava-
hārostu kiṃ pratyavamarṣānugatadhīparamparānusaraṇena kārikāsthenetyarthaḥ |
ekajātīyaṃ vāstavamanusaraṇīyamevetyupasaṃharati | tasmāditi | yadvā
pratyavamarṣo vyavahāraḥ | dhīrvikalpakarūpānugatadhīḥ tatparamparānu-
saraṇamaphalaṃ vyaktisvābhāvyādeva tadupapatterityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bhrāntyanugama iti | sarvvadhībhramatvavādino
bhrāntitvamapyekaṃ vastu na siddhyet tatrāpyanugatamaterbhramatvāt yadi
sāmagrīsājātyaṃ nādriyetetyarthaḥ | anyatheti | anugatadharmmānabhyupa-
game paramparayā sāmānyepi sāmānyāntaraṃ vyaktirūpamanugatavyavahāra-
heturalambanamiti yaducyate tadviḍambanameva nimittānyathopapatteḥ
svayamabhyupagamāt | yadvā'nugatadharmmānabhyupagame kāraṇatvagraha eva na
syāt ānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ vyaktau tadasambhavāt | yadvā'nugata-
dharmmānabhyupagame vyāptasya pakṣadharmmatvamityanumānamapi viḍambanamityarthaḥ |
anyathākhyātipakṣamāśrityāha | tasmāditi ||
nugatapratyayaḥ--pāº 2 puº |
raghuº ṭīº | yadi ca vinaiva kāraṇasājātyaṃ kāryasājātyaṃ tadā
yathā bhinnabhinnaireva piṇḍairabhedavyavahāraḥ tathā bhinnabhinnaireva bījādi-
vyaktiviśeṣairanugatāṅkurādikāryajananopapattāvaṅkurādisājātyānuro-
dhena bījādivyaktiviśeṣatatkāraṇaparamparāsu kurvadrūpatvaparamparākalpanaṃ
viphalameva bhavatāmityāha | anyatheti | tatparamparetyasya bījadhānya-
śālikalamādiṣvaṅkurādisāmānyaviśeṣakāryyaprayojakakurvadrūpatvasamu-
dāyo vā'rthaḥ | vinā bādhakaṃ tadbuddhīnāṃ bhramatvāyogāttadbalātsājātya-
vaijātye sādhayitvā samprati bhramasyāropyaprasiddhimantareṇāsambhavāda-
satkhyāternirāsādbhramabalādeva te sādhayannupasaṃharati | tasmāditi ||
astu tarhi jātyādau bādhakādapohasiddhiriti cet |
vyavahārasyānanyathāsiddhau kva bādhakam | anyathā vipakṣe
balavadbādhakamupanīyānanyathāsiddhiviśrāntopi svabhāva-
heturbādhakaśaṅkayāpyupahanyeta | tato bādhakavyasanamapa-
hāyānugamavyavahṛtiranyathāpyupapādyatām | na caitacchakyaṃ
gatyantarābhāvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | bādhakāt agre vakṣyamāṇāt | vyavahārasya
anugatavyavahārasya | anyathā sudṛḍhanirūpitonirūpaṇortho1 bādhyaḥ
syādityāha | anyatheti | svabhāvahetuḥ prasaṅgabhinno hetuḥ |
upahanyeta ābhāsaḥ syāt | naitaditi | anugatavyavahārasyānyathopa-
nirūpito'pyartho--pāṭhaḥ |
pādanaṃ na śakyamityarthaḥ | gatyantarābhāvāditi | anyāpohāde-
rnirastatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | jātyādāvityādipadādanekavṛttyekasaṃyogāvaya-
vyādiparigrahaḥ | vyavahārasyeti | vyavahārānanyathāsiddhereva na
bādhakamityarthaḥ | nāpi bādhaśaṅkā tasyā eva vipakṣabādhakatvāt
anyathā tava svadarśanavyāghāta ityāha | anyatheti | yadi vipakṣa-
bādhakasadbhāvepi śaṅketyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | jātyādāvityādipadādanekavṛttisaṃyogādi-
parigrahaḥ | bādhakaṃ hi śaṅkitaṃ niścitaṃ vā | ādye vyavahārasyeti |
bādhakaṃ śaṅkitam | svabhāvaheturanumāpako hetuḥ | gatyantareti |
atha koyamagaurityādipūrvoktāvyavahitagranthena apohāderanugatavyava-
hārānupapatterupadarśitatvādityarthaḥ ||
na ca bādhakamapyasti | taddhi svarūpato vā syāt
jñānato vā syāt | svarūpato'pyanupalambho vā viruddha-
dharmmādhyāso vā |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu balavadbādhakaṃ cedasti tadā prakārānta-
reṇāpyanugatavyavahāraḥ paraṃ cintayitumarhatītyata āha | na ceti |
svarūpata iti | jātyādikamevāhatya bādhyate jātyādijñānaṃ
vā bādhyata ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | svarūpato vastugatyetyarthaḥ | jñānata āropata
ityarthaḥ | yadvā tajjñānasāmānyanirāsenetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | balavati bādhake jāgrati nānyathānupapatterapi
sādhakatvasambhava iti dvitīyaṃ nirākaroti | na ceti | svarūpato
jātisvarūpe sākṣāt | jñānato jātiviṣayakajñānasvarūpatadeka-
tvādinirāsadvārā ||
na prathamaḥ asiddheḥ | sphurata eva hi sādhāraṇākārasya
śarīraṃ cintayitumārabdham nāsphurataḥ | adhyakṣe sādhā-
raṇasphuraṇaṃ vyāsedhāmo na tu vikalpe, tasya samānasaṅketa-
grahatimiranikurambakarambitadṛṣṭibhirevopapādanāt na
tvasmābhiḥ, kalpanākoṣasyānantaprasaratayā tattvāvyavasthā-
pakatvāditi cet | na | śabdānusandhānavirahepi jāya-
mānatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | asiddheriti | upalambhasya sādhitatvādityarthaḥ |
etadevāha | sphurata eveti | adhyakṣa iti | nirvikalpaka ityarthaḥ |
tanmātrameva pramāṇaṃ yata ityartha | nanu nirvikalpakābhāvepi
vikalparūpa eva jātyādyupalambhostītyata āha | na tviti |
samānaśabdasaṅketagraha eva timiranikurambastena karambitā kaluṣitā
dṛṣṭiryeṣāṃ tairevopapādanāt | na tvasmābhiriti | tattvamātradṛṣṭibhi-
rityarthaḥ | tathā ca vikalpe gavādipadasaṅketagrahādhīnā nāma-
jātyādiyojanā na tu vāstavītyarthaḥ | tadevāha | kalpaneti |
agṛhītasaṅketānāmapi nāmajātyādisphuraṇādityāha | neti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu vikalpe sādhāraṇākāreṇāsphuraṇepi
nārthasiddhistasyāvastuviṣayatvāt kintu nirvikalpādeva setyāha |
adhyakṣa iti | bhramabījamāha | tasyeti | samānaśabdo gośabdādiḥ |
evambhūtadṛṣṭibhiranyairityarthaḥ | na tvasmābhiḥ upapādanādityanuṣañja-
nīyam | atra hetumāha | kalpanākoṣasyeti | vikalpe kālpa-
nikasyaiva bhānānna tato'rthasiddhirityarthaḥ | śabdeti | (evaṃ) sati
gopadavācyānākalane'nunatirnna bhāsetetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | anupalambhaḥ kiṃ sarvathaivāntarāle vā vivicya
vā | ādye neti | adhyakṣa iti | adhyakṣameva doṣājanyatayā
pramāṇa na tu doṣasamuttho vikalpa iti bhāvaḥ | prakṛte doṣamāha |
tasyeti | nikurambaḥ stomaḥ | karambitaṃ kaluṣitam | astu
vikalpādapi vastusiddhistatrāha | kalpaneti ||
tathāpi tadvāsanāta eveti cet | kimekasaṅketa-
viṣayābhāvepi samānaśabdasaṅketagrahavāsanāvaśādekā-
kāraparāmarśastatsadbhāve vā | na tāvadādyaḥ nānā-
sāsnādimadvyaktivat svargalocanabāṇāmbukuliśādiṣṭhapi
gośabdasaṅketagrahavāsanāvaśāttathāvidhapratyayānugamaprasa-
ṅgāt | iṣṭa evāsāvartha1 iti cet | so'yaṃ sāsnādi-
matīṣu vyaktiṣu sādhāraṇaṃ rūpaṃ na paśyati paśyati tu
gośabdavācyeṣu daśasviti kimatra vaktavyaṃ nūnaṃ rucire-
vāsya2 locanamiti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | prāktanī saṅketagrahavāsanā tatrāpyastītyāha |
vāsaneti | sopi saṅketagraha eva jātyādinimittaṃ tiraskṛtya
puraskṛtya veti vikalpārthaḥ | bhinnapravṛttinimitteṣu gopadavācyeṣu
gavādiṣu tathā satyanugatapratyayaḥ syādityāha | nāneti | asā-
viti | anugatapratyaya ityarthaḥ | ekajātīyāsu vyaktiṣvanu-
gatadhīnimittaṃ kiñcinna paśyati vijātīyāsu paśyatītīcchāmātraṃ
na tu pramāṇānurodhaḥ kaścidityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | soyamiti | tathā sati lokavirodha iti
bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tadvāsanātaḥ śabdavāsanāta eva doṣāt |
daśasu svargeṣupaśuviśeṣavāgvajradiṅnayanamayūkhapṛthivīpāthaḥsu ||
iṣṭa evāyama--pāṭhaḥ |
ruciramevāsya--pāṭhaḥ |
śakyamidamitareṇāpi vaktumiti cet | śakyam, na
tu vyavahārastanmūlo viparyyāsayitum |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | śakyamidamiti | gośabdavācyeṣu sādhāraṇa-
rūpaṃ na paśyati paśyati tu sāsnādimatīti saugatenāpi śakyaṃ
vaktumityarthaḥ | śakyamiti | vāṅmātraṃ śakyaṃ, tāttviko vyavahāro-
nyathākarttuṃ na śakya ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | śakyamidamiti | gośabdavācyeṣu sādhāraṇaṃ
rūpaṃ na paśyati paśyati tu sāsnādimadvyaktiṣviti saugatenāpi
vaktu śakyata ityarthaḥ | na tviti | śābdo vyavahāraḥ saṅketagraha-
mūlakaḥ, sa ca na vyaktiṣu śakyaḥ, vyāvṛttiścānugatāpi nirastaiveti
sāsnādimadvyaktiṣu śabdānusandhānavirahiṇāmapyanugatamateranugataṃ
sāmānyamabhyupeyam, svargādiṣu samānapadavācyatāṃ pratisandadhānasyaivā-
nugatadhīriti na tadanyathāsiddhau na tatastatsiddhirityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | idaṃ idamākāraṃ | svargādiṣu na paśyati
paśyati sāsnādimatīṣu vyaktiṣviti | vyavahāro'nugatavyavahāraḥ |
tanmūlo'nugatadharmmamūlaḥ | viparyāsayitumanyathākarttuṃ | kathaṃ tarhi
svargādāvanugatadharmopagrahamantareṇānugatavyavahāraḥ, anugatapratyayāt |
sopi kathamantareṇānugatadharmaṃ, ka evamāha | kastarhyasau, gośabda-
vācyatvaṃ | prakṛtepi tathaiva kiṃ na syāt, avyutpannānāmapi sāsnādi-
matīṣu vyaktīṣvanugatagopratyayāt | na ca svargādau tathāsti | na
vānugatadharmopagrahamantareṇānantāsu vyaktiṣu vyutpattiḥ sambhavati | na
ca tāmantareṇāpūrvavyaktau padaviśeṣavācyatānibandhano vyavahāraḥ |
svargādiṣu cānugatasvargatvādinibandhanā vyutpattiriti ||
nanvetāvatāpi vikalpaḥ siddhyatu, anubhavastu katham |
savastukavikalpasiddhereva | kathaṃ tasya savastukateti cet |
śabdavāsanādikāraṇāntaravidhvaṃsāditi tūṣṇīmbhava |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | bhāsatāṃ savikalpakepi jātiranubhavaścejjātiṃ
na viṣayīkaroti tadā na sā prāmāṇikītyarthaḥ | kathamiti |
jātigocaraḥ setsyatītyarthaḥ | savastuketi | vikalpaviṣayasya bādhaka-
mantareṇānubhavaviṣayatvadhrauvyādityarthaḥ | adyayāvadvikalpa eva savastuko
na siddho'stītyāha | kathamiti | śabdeti | śabdavāsanādikāraṇa-
niṣedhe gaurayamityādivikalpānāmarthasāmarthyasamutthatvamāvaśyakam |
tathā ca gotvādikamapi vastubhūtamevetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | etadeva spaṣṭayati | nanviti | nirvvi-
kalpakādeva vastusiddhirityanugatadharmmaviṣayakasavikalpakasiddhāvapi
tasyālīkaviṣayatayā na tato'rthasiddhirityarthaḥ | savastuketi |
savikalpakasyālīkaviṣayakatvānupapattau pāriśeṣyeṇa vastuviṣayatva-
siddherityarthaḥ | etadeva spaṣṭayati | śabdeti ||
raghuº ṭīº | nirvikalpakādeva vastusiddhirna savikalpakā-
datiprasaṅgādityāśayena pṛcchati | nanviti | vikalpo'tiriktā-
nugatadharmāvalambī siddhyatu | asati bādhake savikalpakādeva vastu-
siddhirityāśayenottarayati | savastuka iti ||
antarāle kimiti nopalabhyata iti cet | upalabdhi-
kāraṇābhāvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | anupalambhāntaraṃ jātau bādhakamāśaṅkate |
antarāla iti | piṇḍayorantarāla ityarthaḥ | jātervyaktirabhi-
vyaktikāraṇam sā cāntarāle nāstīti kathamupalabhyatāmiti
pariharati | upalabdhīti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu gopiṇḍayorantarāle yadi na gotvaṃ
tadā tatrotpadyamānavyaktau gotvaṃ na syāditi tatrāpi tatsattve tadupa-
labhyetetyāha | antarāla iti | satopi tatra tasya sāsvādi-
madvyaktervyañjikāyā abhāvānnopalabdhirityāha | upalabdhīti | na
ca tatra tatsattvasādhakamānābhāvaḥ apratisaṅkramāditarkasahāyasya
sāmānyasādhakasya pratyakṣasyaiva tadvyāpakatvasādhakatvāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | jātiravyāpikā cetprācīvarttini piṇḍe pari-
dṛṣṭā pratīcīvarttini nopalabhyeta pratisaṅkramaṇādyasambhavādato vyāpi-
kaiva vācyā, tatra dvitīyamanupalambhabādhakamāśaṅkate | antarāla
iti | madhyadeśa ityarthaḥ | yadvā jātiranityā cetpūrvapiṇḍanāśe
uttarapiṇḍe nopalabhyeta tena nityā vācyā, tatrāśaṅkate | antarāla
iti | ekapiṇḍanāśānantaraṃ piṇḍāntarānutpādakakāla ityarthaḥ |
upalabdheḥ kāraṇasya vyakterabhāvāditi ||
piṇḍa eva kuṇḍe badaravat kuto nopalabhyata iti
cet | na | ananyadeśatvāt | bhedena tūpalabhyata eva,
piṇḍāntarāsaṃsargiṇi piṇḍe'nubhūyamāne tatsaṃsargitayā-
'nubhavāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tarhi piṇḍepi vivekenopalabhyatām, nopalabhyate
cennūnaṃ nāstītyāha | piṇḍa eveti | vivekenopalambho yadi
piṇḍabhinnadeśa upalambhastatrāha | ananyadeśeti | yadi ca bheda-
mātropalambho vivekenopalambhastatrāha | bhedeneti | viśeṣaṇasya
gotvasya viśeṣyasya gopiṇḍasya bhedenopalambhasya sattvādityarthaḥ |
nanvayaṃ gauriti viśiṣṭabuddhau gopiṇḍāntarameva viśeṣaṇatvena bhāsatāṃ
kiṃ gotvenetyata āha | piṇḍāntareti | piṇḍāntaraṃ sambaddhaṃ
viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavenna tvasambaddhamapītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yadi piṇḍasaṃsargi gotvaṃ tadā kuṇḍa-
saṃsargibadaravattathātvenopalabhyetetyāha | piṇḍa eveti | tathātve-
netyasya vibhinnadeśatayetyarthaḥ svarūpabhedeneti vā piṇḍasaṃsargitayeti
vā | ādye ananyeti | dvitīye bhedeneti | piṇḍādbhedenopa-
labhyata eveti iṣṭāpattirityarthaḥ | tṛtīye piṇḍāntareti | atrāpi
sampratipattirevetyarthaḥ | piṇḍāntarāsaṃsargiṇīti piṇḍatādātmya-
nirāsārtham | yadi piṇḍagotvayorabhedastadā piṇḍāsambaddha-
piṇḍāntarasaṃsargitayā nānubhūyetetyarthaḥ | tatsadbhāve veti pakṣastviṣyata
eveti na dūṣitaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tṛtīyamanupalambhamāśaṅkate | piṇḍa eveti |
vivicyopalambho hi vibhinnadeśatvenopalambho bhedena vā | ādye
'nanyeti | badarasya kuṇḍetarasvāvayavadeśatvavajjāteḥ piṇḍetarādeśa-
tvāt | dvitīye bhedeneti | piṇḍāntarāsaṃsargiṇi piṇḍāntarā-
nātmake | ekasyānekatādātmyānupapattipradarśanāya cedam ||
nāpi dvitīyaṃ bādhakam avayavisamānayogakṣema-
tvāt | jāyamānapiṇḍasambandhānupapattirapratisaṅkramātta-
trāsattvādanutpādācceti cet | kathaṃ punastatrāsattvaṃ tvayā
vyajñāyi | tatra sattve tatratyākāśāderapi gotvaprasaṅgā-
diti cet | na caitat paścādapi tatratyākāśādinā
sambadhyate | yena ca piṇḍena sambadhyate na tatra kadāpi
tannāsti | tat kuto virodhaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | viruddhadharmmādhyāso veti vikalpitavikalpaṃ
dūṣayati | nāpīti | avayavini kārtsnyaikadeśavikalpanirāsava-
dihāpi tannirasanīyaṃ na kārtsnyena varttate naikadeśena kintu
svarūpeṇetyarthaḥ | nanu jāyamānapiṇḍasambandhaḥ prakāratrayeṇa sambhavati |
piṇḍāntarādgotvasya gamanādvā pūrvameva tatsattvādvā piṇḍena saha
jāyamānatvādvā | tadetat trayamapyanupapannamityāha | jāyamāneti |
apratisaṅkramāt agamanāt | gotvaprasaṅgāditi | tathā ca tadanu-
bhavavyavahārayoḥ prasaṅgādityarthaḥ | samavāyavṛttyā tatsattvaṃ vyavahāre
tantraṃ na tu svarūpato'pīti bhāvaḥ | yadi samavāyenākāśādau gotvaṃ
syāttadā paścādapi syānna caivamityāha | na caitaditi | sambadhyate
samavaitītyarthaḥ | jātepi tatra piṇḍe gotvamākāśāsambandhyevetyarthaḥ |
tarhi piṇḍenāpi tatra na sambadhyetetyāha | yena cati | tatra jātaḥ
sambandhaścetyeka eva kāla iti piṇḍena kadācidapi na tasyāsambandha
ityarthaḥ | kuto virodha iti | piṇḍotpatteḥ pūrvamākāśādau
gotvaṃ nāsīdutpanne ca piṇḍe tatra gotvamiti virodho na
sambhavatītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | dvitīyaṃ bādhakaṃ kārtsnyaikadeśavikalpena viruddha-
dharmmādhyāsarūpam | avayavisthāpanāvasara eva dūṣyatvādityarthaḥ |
nanu jāyamānapiṇḍe gotvaṃ na gavā sambadhyate tasya niṣkriyatvāt |
nāpi taddeśe jātiḥ sthitā tasyāpi gotvāpatteḥ | nāpi piṇḍena
sambaddhaivotpadyate nityatvāditi sambandhavyāpakatrayavyāvṛttau sambandho-
'nupapanna ityāha | jāyamāneti | ākāśādideśenāsambaddhameva
svarūpasat sāmānyaṃ vyaktyā svasamavetaṃ vyajyata ityabhipretyāha |
kathamiti | tatretyanenākāśādirvvivakṣitaḥ piṇḍo vā | ādye
āpādyāpādakayorvaiyyadhikaraṇyam, na cākāśādinā sahāsambandhe
piṇḍasambandho viruddha iti bhāvaḥ | piṇḍenāsambandhastatsambandha-
virodhī, sa ca jātipiṇḍasambandhasya nityatvādeva nāstītyāha |
yena ceti ||
raghuº ṭīº | viruddhadharmmasaṃsargovayavivadihāpi nirasanīya
ityāha | nāpītyādi | nanu gotvādau jāyamāne gavi gotvasya
sambandho na rajjvādivaddeśāntarādāgamanāt niḥkriyatvāt | na
karīṣādivattatraiva sattvāt prāgapyupalambhaprasaṅgāt | na piṇḍarūpa-
vattadotpādāt prācīnapiṇḍānāmagotvaprasaṅgāt | na ca prakārāntaraṃ
sambandhopapādakamastītyāśaṅkate | jāyamāneti | tatrāsatopi
svabhāvaniyamādeva sambandho nānupapannaḥ satopi ca vyañjakavyakti-
virahādevānupalambha ityāśayavānāha | kathaṃ punariti | tatra pūrvaṃ
gotvasattve tatratyatvāviśeṣāddravyāntarepi gotvasambandhe tatrāpi gauriti
pratyayāpattirityakṣaratātparyābhyāmāśaṅkate | tatra sattva iti | gotvasya
yathākathañcitsambandho na gauritipratyayaniyāmakaḥ kiṃ tu samavāyaḥ
sa ceduttarakālaṃ dravyāntare gotvasya syātkalpyetāpi pūrvaṃ tatra
tadabhāvopapattaye gotvasyāsattvamityāśayavānāha | na caitaditi |
atha tatratyatvāviśeṣepi kkacideva gotvasamavāyo nānyatreti kuto
niyama iti cet svabhāvaniyamāditi gṛhāṇa | atha piṇḍa
evotpattikāle sato gotvasyottarakāle sambandho vinopasarpaṇādikaṃ
virudhyeta iti cedatrāha | yena cetyādi | jātaḥ sambaddhaścetyekaḥ
kāla ityabhyupagamādityarthaḥ ||
atha piṇḍamantargaḍumupādāyopalakṣaṇatayā tatreti
vyavahāraḥ, tadā tadupasarpaṇāpasarpaṇotpattivināśaireva
tadupapattī na yātītyādiraparāddheṣoriva dhānuṣkasya
kaṇṭhaḍambaraḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu piṇḍo nirūpakamātraṃ na tu tatra gotvaṃ
samavaiti tathā ca tena rūpeṇa nirūpyamāṇa gotvamākāśādau
prāgāsīccettadā govyavahāraḥ syāditi brūma ityāha | atheti |
antargaḍutvaṃ nirūpakamātram | evaṃ sati yathā piṇḍasattvāsattvādhīne
gotvasattvāsattve tathā gaurasti gaurnāsti gaurjāto gaurnaṣṭo
gaurgacchatītyādivyavahārā api piṇḍopādhikā eva, tathā
cotpādavināśapratyayo gotvabādhakatvenāśaṅkito na manāgapi pada-
mādadhāti, teṣāṃ piṇḍotpādavināśaviṣayatvāt |
na yāti na ca tatrāsīnna cotpannaṃ na cāṃśavat |
jahāti pūrvamādhāramaho vyasanasantatiḥ ||
iti kīrtteḥ virodhakīrttanasya lakṣyaṃ gotvaṃ, tacca tataḥ pracyutaṃ
vyaktau patitamityaparāddheṣutā ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanviha deśe gauriti pratīteḥ paramparayā
ākāśādināpi gotvasambandho neha gauritidhīviṣayagotvāsambandhena
viruddhaḥ syādityāha | atheti | antargaḍum nirūpakamātram na
tu gotvasyādhāramityarthaḥ | tathā ca piṇḍe gotvamiti vyavahāro
na mukhyaḥ kintu lākṣaṇika ityarthaḥ | ākāśādideśe neha gaurneha
gotvamastyāsīditi vyavahārāḥ piṇḍopasarpaṇādinaivopapannā iti na
tatra sambandhāsambandhau paramparayāpi yatra piṇḍe samavaiti gotvaṃ tatraiva
paraṃ govyavahāraṃ karotīti
na yāti na ca tatrāsīnna cotpannaṃ na cāṃśavat |
jahāti pūrvaṃ nādhāramaho vyasanasantatiḥ ||
iti kīrttyuktavyāghāto lakṣyacyutaśarasya dhanvinaḥ kaṇṭhaḍambara iva
govyaktiniṣthakarmmādīnāṃ paramparāsambandhenaivasamāhitatvāt gopiṇḍe'rtha-
sambandhasyābhāvādasambandhakāle gopiṇḍasyaivāsatvādityāha | tadeti |
raghuº ṭīº | antargaḍum sambandhaghaṭakam | upalakṣaṇatayā
paramparayā | tatreti vyavahāraḥ, kadācittatreti kadācicca na tatreti
vyavahāraḥ | taditi | upasarpaṇotpattibhyāmapasarpaṇavināśābhyāṃ ca
tayoḥ sattvāsattvavyavahārayorupapattau
na yāti na ca tatrāsīnna cotpannaṃ na cāṃśavat |
jahāti pūrvamādhāramaho vyasanasantatiḥ ||
iti kīrttikaṇṭhaḍambaraḥ | pūrvamityanena bhajate paramityapi
sūcitam | svasvāvayavakriyānimittake pūrvāparadeśatyāgāvāptī na
yāti nāṃśavadityanena pratiṣiddhe ||
tathā hi piṇḍamadhikṛtyopasarpaṇāpasarpaṇābhāvastadupa-
lakṣitaṃ deśamadhikṛtya ca sattvāsattve sāmānyasyeti kiṃ
kena saṅgatam | athāpyanutpanne piṇḍe tasyāsattvaṃ sulabha-
meva tadasattvāditi hṛdayam, tanna | svarūpasattvāsattvayo-
rdvitīyānapekṣatvāt sambaddhatvāsambaddhatve tu dvitīyāpekṣe |
tatastatrāsati nāstīti ko'rthaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu sāmānyaṃ piṇḍaṃ nopasarppati na vāpasarpati
cet tadā tadupalakṣite deśe sāmānyasattvāsattve syātāmiti maha-
dvaiśasamiti sopahāsamāha | tathā hīti | upasarpaṇāpasarpaṇābhāva
ityatra sāmānyasyetyagretanena sambandhaḥ | yadvā nanu vyakterupasarpaṇāpa-
sarpaṇāttadupalakṣite deśe sattvāsattve na sāmānyasyeti yathāśrute
sopahāsamāha | tathā hīti | piṇḍe cennopasarppaṇāpasarppaṇe tarhi
tadupalakṣitākāśadeśe sāmānyasya sattvāsattve syātāmityatyanta-
masaṅgatamityarthaḥ | nanu sāmānyaṃ svarūpataḥ taddeśādāvasti cedastu
tathāpi yaḥ piṇḍa utpanna eva nāsti tena tatsambandhaḥ kathaṃ syāt |
na hi sambandhyabhāvepi sambandha iti pūrvapakṣiṇo hṛdayamāha |
athāpīti | sāmānyaṃ svarūpataḥ sarvatra deśe kāle'stītyukte tatkatha-
manutpannena piṇḍena sambadhyatāmityapi kiṃ kena saṅgatamityarthaḥ |
nanu piṇḍānutpattidaśāyāmasatā piṇḍena kathaṃ sambadhyatāmityetadeva
praśnaviṣaya ityata āha | tata iti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tathā ca piṇḍamadhikṛtya sāmānyasyopasarpaṇādya-
bhāvaḥ tadupalakṣitaṃ deśamadhikṛtya tasyaiva sambandhāsambandhe vaiyadhi-
karaṇyamityāha | tathā sāmānyasyeti śeṣaḥ | nanu piṇḍānutpatti-
daśāyāṃ tatrāvarttamānaṃ tasminnutpanne kathaṃ tadvarttetetyāha | atheti |
tasya sāmānyasya | tadasattvāt piṇḍāsattvādityarthaḥ | nātra virodho
na hi piṇḍotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ tatra tasyāsattve svarūpasattvaṃ nivarttate, na
hi tadapi tasya sambandhāpekṣaṃ, sambandhinaḥ piṇḍasyābhāvāt sambandhaḥ
paraṃ na syādityāha | svarūpeti | nanu piṇḍānutpattikālepi
gotvaṃ svarūpasadeva nāstīti buddheḥ ko viṣaya ityāha | tata iti ||
raghuº ṭīº | piṇḍe upasarpaṇasya piṇḍāccāpasarppaṇasya cābhāvā-
tsāmānyasya kiṃ piṇḍopalakṣitadeśe sattvāsattve nopapadyete kiṃ vā
piṇḍa eva | ādye piṇḍamadhikṛtyeti | piṇḍasyopasarpaṇādibhireva
tadupapatteriti bhāvaḥ | dvitīye tu satyeva piṇḍe tatrāsattva
prāgeva nirastaṃ | tena śiṣyamāṇamasati piṇḍe tatrāsatvamāśaṅkya
nirākaroti | athāpīti | tasya sāmānyasya | tadasattvāt piṇḍā-
satvāt | sattvāsattve yadi varttamānatvāvarttamānatve tatrāha | svarūpeti |
dvitīyānapekṣatvāt piṇḍādyādhārānapekṣatvāt | na vā sāmānyasya
kadācidapyasattvaṃ nityatvāt | sambaddhatveti | yadyapi sambandho'tra
samavāyaḥ sa ca nitya eva, tathāpi tadviśeṣitaḥ samavāyo
nāstītyasambandhitvamaṅgīkṛtam ||
tenāsatā na sambadhyata iti cet | taccaivametat |
paścāt kathaṃ sambadhyatāmiti cet | tasya sattvāt asa-
mbaddhatvasya tadasattvaprayuktatvāt | tataḥ prāgasan piṇḍaḥ
paścāt kathamupapadyatāmiti codyaniṣṭhā, sā ca satkāryya-
vādamanupatatītyabhuktavāntiḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | asatā sambandho na bhavatyevetyāha | tacceti |
tasyeti | piṇḍasyetyarthaḥ | tadasattvaprayuktatvāt piṇḍāsattvaprayuktatvāt |
sambandhini sati sambandho bhavatīti sarvajanasiddhepi tatra kathaṃ
tavābhiprāya evamunnīyate | yaḥ piṇḍaḥ pūrvvaṃ nāsīt sa paścātkatha-
mutpadyata ityāha | tata iti | codyaniṣṭhā deśyaparyavasānam |
abhuktavāntiriti | sāṅkhyamataṃ tvayā na bhuktaṃ na pācitamidānīṃ
tadeva vamasītyarthaḥ | deśe kāle ca sāmānyasvarūpamasti, piṇḍopa-
gamāpagamādinā gaurasti gaurnāstīti vyavahāraḥ, yathā'vicalati
caitre daṇḍopagamāpagamābhyāṃ daṇḍī caitro nāyaṃ daṇḍīti vyavahāra
iti praghaṭṭakārthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadyapi tayoḥ sambandhaḥ samavāyaḥ sa cāstyeva
tathāpyasatā piṇḍena tannirūpaṇaṃ nāstītyāha | teneti | tasya
piṇḍasyetyarthaḥ | niṣṭhā paryyavasānam ||
raghuº ṭīº | tasya piṇḍasya | tatra ca piṇḍe sataḥ sāmā-
nyasya tanniṣṭhābhāvapratiyogitvarūpaṃ na tatrāsattvaṃ, yāvatsattvaṃ tatra
sāmānyasya sattvāt asataścābhāvādhikaraṇatvāyogāt | codyaniṣṭhā
pūrvapakṣamaryādā ||
tathāpi sāmānyatadvatoratyantabhede kathaṃ sāmānā-
dhikaraṇyamiti cet | kimidam | samānenādhikaraṇena
hi sambandhaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam tasya ca bhedena ko
virodha iti nādhigacchāmaḥ | gavāśvayorapi tathābhāva-
prasaṅga iti cet | nanu vyatirekadṛṣṭāntasthānaṃ tat na tu
virodhasthānam | tacca maitratanayopi yadi kaścidaśyāmaḥ
syāt paridṛśyamānānāmapi tathābhāvaprasaṅga iti kva
nāma durlabham |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | dharmmadharmiṇorbhedābhedavādyāha | tathāpīti |
atyantabhinnayorgavāśvayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvādityarthaḥ | atyanta-
bhedepi sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nānupapannamityāha | kimidamiti |
nanu bhinnayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇye gavāśvayorapi sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ
syāditi śaṅkate | gavāśvayoriti | na brūmo yayorbhedastayoḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇyamāvaśyakamiti, api tu kvacidbhede sati sāmā-
nādhikaraṇyaṃ tadabhāvaśca gavāśvayoriti vyatirekadṛṣṭāntasthānaṃ
gavāśvamityāha | nanviti | tacceti | tacca vyatirekadṛṣṭāntasthānaṃ
kva nāma durlabhamiti sambandhaḥ, kintu sulabhamevetyarthaḥ | saulabhyameva
darśayati | maitratanayopīti | yathā mitrātanayaḥ śyāma utsargo
na ca tāvatā śyāmatvena nirṇīto mitrātanayaḥ kvacidaśyāmasyāpi
darśanāt, śyāmatvena nirṇīto'pi mitrātanayaḥ syādaśyāmastathā
bhede sati sāmānādhikaraṇyamityukte asāmānādhikaraṇyena
nirṇītayorapi gavāśvayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na prasajyata ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | dharmmadharmmiṇorbhedābhedavādyāha | tathāpīti |
atyantabhinnayorgavāśvayostadabhāvādityarthaḥ | samāneneti | abheda
eva tadviruddhamiti bhāvaḥ | na cānyonyābhāvasya nityābhāvavṛtti-
dharmmatvenāvyāvṛttidharmmatvamanumeyam (?) | ekasyaiva bhāvābhāvayoravaccheda-
bhedaniyatatvāt tasya cātrābhāvena bādhā ||
raghuº ṭīº | dharmadharmiṇorātyantikamabhedaṃ nirasya pākṣikaṃ
taṃ nirasituṃ bhedābhedavādinamutthāpayati | tathāpīti | kimida-
mityāścarye | tadeva darśayati | samāneneti | tulyenetyarthaḥ | tathā
ca samānāni tulyāni adhikaraṇāni yasya, tattathā, tasya bhāvaḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ | yadyapi samānamekamadhikaraṇaṃ yayorityādika-
marthāntaramapyasti tathāpi tasya prakṛte asambhavāt nyāyakusumāñjalau
vistṛtatvācca neha prastutaṃ | na tviti | vyatirekayoḥ sahacāra-
mātreṇa virodhāsiddheriti bhāvaḥ ||
tathāpi viśeṣo vācya iti cet | asti svābhāviko
viśeṣo yat kiñcideva kenacit sambaddhaṃ na sarvvaṃ sarvveṇeti |
tathā'nugamaniyamopi svabhāvādeva kiṃ na syāditi
cet | ekasyānekasambandhe'nekasya caikasambandhe'virodhāt
ekānekayoranekaikavyavahāravirodhāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | viśeṣa iti | bhinnayoḥ kvacitsāmānādhi-
karaṇyaṃ kvacicca netyatra viśeṣo vācya ityarthaḥ | svabhāva evātra
niyāmaka ityāha | astīti | tataḥ svabhāvaḥ pratītisākṣika
iti bhāvaḥ | tarhi vyaktiviśeṣānugatamatiniyamo'pi svabhāvā-
devāstu kiṃ jātyetyāha | tatheti | ekasyeti | yadyeko dharmmo-
'nekasambandhī na bhavati tadā tenānugatapratyayo na bhavet, na caivam,
yadi vā'nekeṣāṃ dharmiṇāmekadharmmasambandhavirodhaḥ syāttadā tathā
kalpyeta, na cātra virodha ityartha | ekānekayoriti | ekena
yathā nānekavyavahāraḥ tathā piṇḍairekavyavahāropi na sambhavatītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | viśeṣaḥ satyapi bhede sāmānādhikaraṇyapratīti-
niyāmaka ityarthaḥ | astīti | anena bhedābhedasādhake sāmā-
nādhikaraṇyavyatirekānumāne sādhyābhāvaprayukto na sādhanābhāvaḥ kintu
svabhāvabhedābhāvaprayukta ityupādhirapyuktaḥ | tatheti | tathā ca
sāmānyaṃ tanniyāmakaṃ na siddhyeteti bhāvaḥ | atiriktasāmānye
bādhake satyeva svabhāvavādālambanamityabhipretya bādhakamuddharati |
ekasyeti | tatra ya ekaḥ so'nekavṛttirna bhavatīti vyāptirbādhikā
syāt, sā ca nāsti, svalakṣaṇasyāpyekasya hānāpatteḥ, ekasya
paramāṇoḥ ṣaṭkena yugapadyogāt | tasmādyathaikadānekasambandho na
viruddhastathā'nekatraikasambandhopītyarthaḥ | tathāpi sādhakābhāva eva
bādhakaḥ syādityata āha | ekānekayoriti | ekavyavahāro-
'nugatavyavahāraḥ | yathāsaṅkhyamanvayaḥ | tathā cānanyathāsiddhānugata-
pratyakṣameva tatsādhakamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | ekasya vijñānasya yathānekaviṣayasambandhitvaṃ
yathā cānekasya viṣayasyaikavijñānasambandhitvaṃ tathaikasya sāmānya-
syānekapiṇḍasambandhitvaṃ anekasya piṇḍasyaikasāmānyasambandhitvaṃ na
virudhyate, mānābhāṣāt, antareṇa caikadharmamanekeṣvekavyavahāro na
sambhavati kāraṇābhāvādanyathā'tiprasaṅgāccetyāha | ekasyetyādi |
eketi | yathā ekasmādanekavyavahāro nopapadyate tathānekebhyopyeka-
vyavahāro nopapadyata ityarthaḥ ||
nāpi jñānato bādhakam | tatsvarūpapratikṣepasyānubhava-
bādhitatvāt | kāraṇapratikṣepasya ca janmanaivāpāsta-
tvāt | ekatvapratikṣepasya ca viruddhadharmmādhyāsaviraha-
pratihatatvāt | pārokṣyāpārokṣyāderasiddheḥ | viṣayama-
pratikṣipya tatprāmāṇyasya pratikṣeptumaśakyatvāt tada-
pratikṣepasya ca darśitatvāt | indriyajatvapratikṣepasya
cendriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhānabādhitatvāt | sākṣā-
tkāritvaviśrānte ca tadanuvidhānasyāvyabhicārāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | mūlavikalpadvaye dvitīyaṃ vikalpaṃ dūṣayati |
nāpīti | jñānato bādhakamiti ko'rthaḥ | kiṃ sāmānyaviṣayaṃ
jñānameva nāsti akāraṇakaṃ vā nānāviṣayakaṃ vā parokṣākāraṃ vā
nirviṣayatvenāpramārūpaṃ vā anindriyajaṃ vā asākṣātkāri vā |
tatra nādya ityāha | tatsvarūpeti | dvitīyaṃ dūṣayati | kāraṇeti |
tṛtīye tvāha | ekatveti | caturthaṃ dūṣayati | pārokṣyeti |
viṣaye tāvanna pārokṣyaṃ nāpyapārokṣyaṃ tadubhayasya jñānadharmmatvāt |
tathā ca jātigocarajñānamindriyajamaparokṣamevānidriyajaṃ tu parokṣa-
miti naitat jātau bādhakamityarthaḥ | pañcamaṃ dūṣayati | viṣaya-
miti | viṣayapratikṣepādhīno hi prāmāṇyapratikṣepaḥ sa ca prakṛte
nāstītyarthaḥ | ṣaṣṭhaṃ dūṣayati | indriyajeti | saptamaṃ dūṣayati |
sākṣāditi | ayaṃ gaurityādivikalpānāṃ sākṣātvamanubhavasiddha-
matopīndriyajatvamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvanugatadharmmajñānasyānupalambho bādhakaḥ
syādityata āha | nāpīti | pūrvaṃ jñānaviṣayasyaivānupalabdhi-
rnirastetyapaunaruktyam | kāraṇeti | anugatadharmmajñānarūpakāryyasya
tatkāraṇaṃ vinānupapatterityarthaḥ | nanu viruddhadharmmādhyāsādekatvaṃ tatra
bādhitamityāha | ekatveti | nanu sāmānyaṃ naikaṃ vyaktibhedena
pratyakṣānumānaviṣayatayā tatra pārokṣyāpārokṣyaviruddhadharmmādhyāsā-
dityata āha | pārokṣyeti | pārokṣyāpārokṣye viṣayiṇo
dharmmo na viṣayasya, tathāvidhajñānaviṣayatvādevārthe tadvyavahārādityarthaḥ |
nanu jñānaprāmāṇyapratikṣepo'stu bādhaka ityata āha | viṣaya iti |
aśakyatvāditi | na cārthajanyajñānatvamabhilāpāsaṃsargitvena vyāpta-
miti vācyam | nirvvikalpakatvasyopādhitvāt aprayojakatvācca |
nanu sāmānyaviṣayakavikalpasyānindriyajatvāt prāmāṇyapratikṣepo-
'stvityata āha | indriyajatveti | vyaktijñānasyāsyaivānanyathā-
siddhānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvāt kāraṇatāgrahe tadasambhava ityarthaḥ |
na ca nirvvikalpakotpattāveva tadupakṣayaḥ taddhi yadīndriyasannikarṣā-

prathama iti | samayaviparyāsaḥ saṅketāgraho'nyatra saṅketagraho vā, na
hyanyāpohākāre saṅketagraho yena tatra pratibhāsaḥ syādityarthaḥ | dvitīya
iti | anyāpohasvarūpe vyavasāyena pravṛttiḥ svalakṣaṇe kathaṃ
syādadhyavasāyasya bhedāgraharūpatvādinā vikalpasya pūrvvameva kadarthita-
tvāt | asyaiveti | tattvato na vācyamityanenaiva śabdena tatvataḥ
kasyacidarthasyābhidhānādityarthaḥ | avacana iti | tatvataḥ kiṃ
vācyamityatra yadyuttaraṃ na deyaṃ tadā'pratibhā uttaradāne tu svavāgvi-
rodha ityarthaḥ | upasaṃhāra iti | kṣaṇikatāvādāpohavādayo-
rityarthaḥ | pradhānārthamupasaṃharati | taditi ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bauddhairatra vikalpya yaduktaṃ tatra dūṣaṇamāha
tasmāditi | yadi pratibhāsācchabdavācye praśnastadānyāpoḍhā-
kāro'nyavyāvṛttākāro vikalpaniṣṭha ityuktam | athādhyavasāyācchabdaiḥ
kiṃ vācyamiti praśnastadā'nyāpoḍhasya yat svalakṣaṇaṃ vyāvṛttistaducyata
ityuttaram | pratibhāsādhyavasāyau tu prāguktau | tattvataḥ kiṃ
vācyamiti praśne na kiñcidvastu vācyamityuttaramityarthaḥ | atra
dūṣaṇamāha | tatreti | vikalpasyākāre na śaktiḥ kintu bāhya
ityaśakyasyaivākārasya saṅketaviṣayatvasañcāra ityarthaḥ | pravṛttīti |
svalakṣaṇe pravṛttyabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ vyāvṛttau ca śabdasya saṅketāttasya jñānā-
bhāvādajñāte ca pravṛttāvatiprasaṅgādityarthaḥ | virodhamevāha |
asyaiveti | apohavādo nārthāntaramiti paribhāvayan prakṛtamupa-
saṃharati | tasmāditi ||
raghuº ṭīº | pratibhāso jñānajananam, śabdajanyajñānaviṣayaḥ
ka iti praśne atadvyāvṛtto vikalpaniṣṭha ākāra ityuttaram |
adhyavasāyaḥ pravṛttijananam | śabdajanyapravṛttiviṣayaḥ ka iti praśne ca
atadvyāvṛttaṃ svalakṣaṇamiti | tattvato vastutaḥ kiṃ vastu śabdavācyamiti
praśne ca na kiñciditi | viparyāso bāhyaviṣayiṇyāḥ śaktervikalpā-
kāre sañcāraḥ | pravṛttiviparyayaḥ niyataviṣayakapravṛtyanupapatti-
rniyāmakābhāvāt, bhedāgrahāderniyāmakatvasya nirastatvāt |
asyaiveti | kimapi vastu na śabdavācyamityasyārthasya vastughaṭita-
mūrttikatvāditi ||
|| iti kṣaṇabhaṅgavādaḥ ||
bāhyārthabhaṅgavādaprārambhaḥ ||
vijñānavādini jāgarūke bāhyameva nāsti kuta
ātmeti cet | sa tāvadidaṃ pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭāṃ kiṃ te
grāhyagrāhakabhāgayoḥ paramārthasatorevābhedo vivakṣita
utāho abhinnajātīyatvam atha grāhyāṃśasyālī-
katvamiti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | dvitīyamātmani bādhakaṃ nirākarttumutthā-
payati | vijñāneti | jāgarūka iti | bāhyanīlādisthairya-
siddhāvapi na teṣāṃ vastutvam, vastutvepi na jñānabhinnatvam | jñānaṃ
ca kṣaṇamātrasthāyi nīlapītādyākāramiti yogācāraḥ | sidhyatu
sthairyyaṃ tathā ca siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitaṃ tacca sthiracidānandasvarūpaṃ
brahmaiva, bāhyaṃ tu nīlādiprapañcamātramalīkamanādyavidyākāranikara-
pratibhāsamātramityekadaṇḍinaḥ | ekameva vijñānaṃ paramārthasanna tu
nīlādyapi vastusat, paraṃ tvanādivāsanāparīpākamātrāsādita-
nīlādyākāranikarakarambitamata eva taccitramityucyata iti tadeka-
deśinaḥ | tadeteṣāṃ jāgarūkatayā kva bāhyasyātmanaḥ siddhiśaṅkā |
bhede sati grāhyagrāhakabhāva eva nāsti na vā dharmmadharmmibhāva iti
bhāvaḥ | bāhyameveti | sāmānyābhāve viśeṣābhāvasya sulabhatvāt |
jñānānātmakasya sarvvasyaiva bāhyatvāditi bhāvaḥ | sa vijñānavādī |
idamagre vakṣyamāṇam | pakṣatayā'bhiprāyaṃ vikalpayati | paramārtheti |
nīlādi svagrāhakajñānajātīyamalīkameva veti vikalpārthaḥ | atra
prameyatvaṃ jñānatvavyāpyaṃ na vā, vivādapadaṃ nīlādi jñānatvāśrayo
na vā, jñānatvaṃ prameyatvavyāpakaṃ na vā, jñānaviṣayatā jñānatvānāśraye
varttate na veti vipratipattayaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | dvitīyamātmani bādhakaṃ śaṅkate | vijñāna-
vādinīti | jāgarūka ityanena kṣaṇabhaṅganirāsepi na tanni-
rāsa iti darśitam | bāhyaṃ jñānavibhinnameva vastu nāsti
tadviśeṣasyātmanaḥ kutaḥ siddhirityarthaḥ | sa vijñānavādī | idaṃ
vakṣyamāṇaṃ pakṣatrayam | kiṃ ta iti | grāhyaṃ pāramārthikamalīkaṃ
vā | ādyepi grāhakajñānavyaktyabhinnaṃ tayorbhede satyeva jñānajātīyaṃ
veti vikalpārthaḥ | prameyatvaṃ jñānatvavyāpyaṃ na vā | koṭiḥ
parasyālīke prasiddhā | vivādapadaṃ jñānatvāśrayo na veti
vipratipattiḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | bāhyārthabhaṅgaṃ dvitīyaṃ bādhakamāśaṅkate | vijñāna-
vādinītyādi | bāhyaṃ jñānabhinnaṃ ātmāpi ca bāhyabheda
eveti bhāvaḥ | atra jñānatvaṃ prameyatvasya sattvasya vā vyāpakaṃ na
veti vipratipattiḥ | alīkasya grāhyatvepi na prameyatvaṃ tadaṃśe
jñānasyāpramātvāditi sampradāyaḥ | etajjñānaviṣayo nīlādireta-
jjñānābhinno na veti navyāḥ |
tatra prathame sādhye yaḥ kaściddheturupādīyate saho-
palambhaniyamo vā grāhyatvaṃ vā prakāśamānatvaṃ vā
sa vyaktamābhāsaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | saheti | yadyapyabhede sahetyeva viruddhaṃ tathāpi
tadaviṣayakajñānāviṣayatvaṃ hetvarthaḥ | ābhāsa iti | kālātya-
yāpadeśādanaikāntikatvādvā aṅgulīnirddeśyagrāhyātmakatāyā jñānasya
bādhitatvāt viruddhadharmmasaṃsargapratihatatvādvetyarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | sahopalambheti | yadyapi sahārthasya bheda-
garbhatvenābhede sādhye virodhastathāpi tadaviṣayakajñānāviṣayatvaṃ
hetvarthaḥ | nanu yadi grāhyaṃ pakṣīkṛtya jñānābhede sādhye jñānā-
viṣayakapratītyaviṣayatvaṃ hetustadā naiyāyikānāmasiddhiḥ tairjñānasya
svaprakāśatvā'svīkārāt ghaṭo'yamiti jñāne jñānasyāprakāśāt |
atha jñānaṃ pakṣīkṛtyārthābhedaḥ sādhyate tathāpyarthāviṣayakapratītya-
viṣayatvaṃ heturasiddhaḥ arthapratītiṃ vināpi jñānapadāttatpratīteḥ |
atrāhuḥ | arthasya jñānābhede sādhye svaprakāśapakṣāśrayaṇānnā-
siddhiḥ | jñānapakṣatvepi na hetvasiddhiḥ | tathā hi yadi
viṣayitvaṃ jñānatvam, tadā jñānapadādapi viṣayo bhāsate | atha
jātibhedaḥ tathāpi viṣayaghaṭitamūrttāveva jñāne jñānapadaśakti-
grahāttato viṣayopi bhāsate | niyamato yadrūpaviśiṣṭe yatpada-
śaktigrahastatpadāttasyāpyupasthitiriti vyutpatteḥ | grāhyatvaṃ veti |
ghaṭajñānaṃ ghaṭābhinnaṃ ghaṭo vā ghaṭajñānābhinnaḥ etajjñāna-
viṣayatvāt ghaṭavat tajjñānavacca | jñānasvaprakāśatvānnāsiddhi-
rityarthaḥ | prakāśamānatvamiti | pūrvvaṃ grahaṇaviṣayatvamātraṃ hetvartho-
'tra tu prakāśasambandhitvamātramityapaunaruktyam | yadvā jñānaviṣayatva-
mātraṃ pūrvvahetvarthaḥ tadviśeṣasākṣātkāraviṣayatvamuttarahetvarthaḥ | atrā-
bhede sādhye prathamo heturanaikāntikaḥ pratiyogisahopalambhepyabhāva-
pratiyogibhedāt svaprakāśatāniṣedhena jñānānupalambhepi nīlādyupa-
lambhāt svarūpāsiddhiḥ jñāne'rthasahopalambhepyaprayojakatvaṃ viruddha-
dharmmādhyāsābhāvaścopādhiriti dūṣaṇe satyeva dūṣaṇāntaramāha | sa
vyaktamiti ||
raghuº ṭīº | atra grāhyagrāhakayorabhede sarva eva hetu-
rābhāsaḥ | tathā hi heturhi pakṣadharmmatayā jñāyamāno'numiti-
nimittam, anumitirapi ca pakṣe sādhyaviṣayiṇī | tathā ca parā-
marṣahetupakṣasādhyānumitīnāmabhede kuto hetuhetumadbhāvaḥ | kiṃ ca
bhinnasya grāhyatve sarvajñānānāṃ sarvaviṣayatāpattirityādirati-
prasaṃgo yadi na gṛhīto na tarhi vyāptisiddhirvipakṣe bādhakā-
bhāvāt, gṛhītaścet kathamanyenānyagrahaṇamasyaivārthasyānekapadārtha-
ghaṭitasyaikena grahaṇāditi, sahopalambhaniyamo niyamenaikavitti-
vedyatvaṃ tadaviṣayakajñānāviṣayatvaṃ vā teṣāṃ jñānasya (sva)prakāśatvāt
jñānajñeyayorabhedena jñānajñeyagrāhakābhyāṃ jñeyajñānayorapi grahaṇā-
nnāsiddhiḥ | jñeyasya jñānābhinnatve sādhye grāhyatvaṃ hetuḥ jñānasya
jñeyābhede ca ṇijarthāntarbhāvāt prakāśamānatvaṃ svaprakāśakatvamiti |
grāhyasya jñānasya grāhakajñānābhinnatve sādhye tadgrāhyatvaṃ
hetuḥ grāhakajñānasya ca tadgrāhyābhinnatve sādhye prakāśamānatvaṃ
tasya grāhakatvamiti yāvat | teṣāṃ grāhyagrāhakayoḥ svaprakāśatvānna
dṛṣṭāntāsiddhirityeke |
ekatra sākṣātkāro'nyatra jñānasāmānyamato bheda ityanye |
tathāhi nīladhavalādiparasparaviruddhākāranika-
rāvagāhi vijñānamanubhūyate tadidaṃ tasya svavadhāya
kṛtyotthāpanam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadeva spaṣṭayati | tathāhīti | yogācāra-
mate vedāntimate ca samānaṃ doṣamāha | nīladhavalādīti |
samūhālambane yogācārasya nīladhavalādyātmakatvaṃ vedāntināṃ tu
tatrānyatrāpi 1kramavannīlādijñāne virodhāpādanameva | ekasyaiva
jñānasya tanmate kramikanīladhavalādyātmakatvāt | tadidamiti |
ākāranikarāvagāhitvamityarthaḥ | svavadhāya svabhedāya ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tadidamiti | idaṃ biruddhadharmmāvagāhitvam |
tasya jñānasya vijñānavādino vā kṛtyārūpamityarthaḥ ||
kramānnīlādijñāne iti 3 puº pāº |
raghuº ṭīº | idaṃ viruddhānekāvagāhitvam | tasya jñānasya |
svavadhāya svabhedāya | kṛtyārūpaṃ jātam ||
yadi hi mithaḥ pratyanīkadharmmānullikhet kathamekaṃ
sattadātmakaṃ bhavet | na cedullikhet kathaṃ tadākāraṃ
nāma | svasamvedanasyānullikhitarūpābhāvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | pratyanīkadharmmān virodhino nīladhavalādi-
dharmmān | kathaṃ tadātmakamiti | ekasyānekātmakatvānupapatteḥ |
kathaṃ tadākāramiti | tadullikhitasyaivākāratvādityarthaḥ | nanvevaṃ
buddhisvarūpameva nāsti, tathā ca vicāroyaṃ nirāśraya iti cet
taduktam--
“bāhyaṃ na paśyati bhidātmatayā'tha sattvā-
darthakriyāvirahasaṅkaratā tvabhede |
buddhistu naśyati bhideva sattvā-
ccitrāpyato na bhidameti kimatra kurmma”
iti | maivam | buddheranubhūyamānatvāt | tasyāstu viṣayabhedā-
bhedābhyāṃ vivādāt ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tadeva spaṣṭayati | yadi hīti | nanu
viruddhasya viṣayatvepi nollekha ityata āha | svasamvedaneti |
svaprakāśapakṣe prakāśasyaiva yāvadviṣayollekhitvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tadeva spaṣṭayati | yadi hīti | athaika-
tvānyathānupapattyā'nubhūyamānamapi nānātvāvagāhitvamapalapanīyaṃ,
tatrāha | na cediti | athānullikhitopyākāro bhaviṣyati
tatrāha | svasamvedaneti | tavākārākāriṇorabhedāditi bhāvaḥ |
bhedepi virodho'gre vyaktībhaviṣyati | vastuto nānāviṣayatvamekatvaṃ
ca svasamvedanenānuvyavasāyena vā siddhaṃ na bādhyabādhakabhāvamāsādayati
avirodhādvinigamakābhāvācca, grāhyagrāhakabhāvastu vinā'pyabhedamupa-
padyamāno na taṃ sādhayitumīṣṭa iti ||
bāhyasyaivamvidhaviruddhadharmmādhyāsādbhayam, tathātvepya-
bhede'rthakriyācetanapravṛttīnāṃ saṅkaraprasaṅgāt vivecanā-
nupapattiprasaṅgācca, na tu vijñānasya, na hi
tasyārthakriyādhīnaṃ sattvam, api tu pratibhāsamātrā-
dhīnam, nāpi tatrārthakriyārthinaḥ kācit pravṛttiḥ
svarasavāhivijñānapravāhātiriktāyā arthakriyāyā-
stadarthinaścābhāvāt, vivecanābhāvaśca paramo
nirvvāhaḥ, svasamviditarū(drū)patvāditi cet |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ratnakīrtteḥ samādhimatra dūṣayitumupanyasyati |
bāhyasyaivamiti | bāhye viruddhadharmmādhyāsabhayaṃ darśayati | tathātva
iti | viruddhadharmmādhyāse'pyabhede nīladhavalādīnāṃ pratiniyatārtha-
kriyākāritvaṃ dṛṣṭameva vighaṭeta, na ca pratiniyatā pravṛttiḥ
syāt | bhayāntaramāha | vivecaneti | vivicyate hi nīlaṃ
dhavalabhinnatvena tadetanna syādityarthaḥ | na tu vijñānasyetyatra
viruddhadharmmādhyāsādbhayamityanuṣajyate | pratibhāsamātrādhīnaṃ svaprakāśa-
mātrādhīnam | nāpīti | na hi ghaṭapaṭārthino jñāne pravarttante
api tu tantukapālādāveva | nanvatrāpi bhayaṃ tadavasthamevetyata
āha | svaraseti | arthakriyā pravṛttiḥ tadarthināmapi jñānātma-
katvādityarthaḥ | nanvidaṃ nīlajñānamidaṃ pītajñānamiti vivecanaṃ
jñānepyasti, tathā ca viruddhadharmmādhyāse'pyabhede tanna syādityata
āha | vivecaneti | paramo nirvvāha iti | atyantasādhakaḥ
siddhirvvetyarthaḥ | svasamviditeti | jñānayorhi bhedagraho na
tābhyāmeva tayoḥ svamātragrāhyatvāt, bhedasya ca svabhinnatvenāgrāhya-
tvāt ata eva (na) jñānāntareṇāpītyarthaḥ | taduktaṃ jñānaśriyā--
“bhāvaṃ kañcitpuraskṛtya bhedābhedāvudīrayet |
deśakālādibhedena cinmātre tatra kaḥ krama” ||
iti | kīrttirapyāha--
“svarūpabuddhiraparairna yāti na bhinatti ca |
svaparapravibhāgo hi dhiyo yācitamaṇḍanam” ||
iti |
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu bāhye viruddhadharmmādhyāso bhedako na
jñānepītyāha | bāhyasyeti | tadupapādayati | tathātvepīti |
yadi viruddhadharmmādhyāsādapi bāhye na bhedastadārthakriyātadarthi-
pravṛttyoḥ saṅkaraḥ syāt | tathāhi paṭo yadi ghaṭābhinnaḥ syāt
tadā tadasādhāraṇārthakriyājanakaḥ syāt ghaṭārthipravṛttiviṣayaḥ
syādityarthaḥ | bhedajñānaṃ ca bāhye na syāt tannimittasya viruddha-
dharmmādhyāsasyābhedepyupagamādityāha | vivecaneti | vivecanaṃ
bhedajñānam | yadvā pratijñāhetvādivibhāgarūpavivecanaṃ na syādi-
tyāha | vivecaneti | na tu vijñānasya bhayamityanuṣajyate |
bāhye yadbhedopapādakaṃ tanna vijñāna ityāha | na hīti | tarhi
jñānasya sattvameva na syāt tvanmate'rthakriyāyāḥ sattvarūpatvādityata
āha | api tviti | tasya svaprakāśatayā svamātrapramāṇakatva-
mityarthaḥ | mātrapadamarthakriyādhīnasattvanirākaraṇārtham | nāpyartha-
kriyārthipravṛttisaṅkaraḥ, tatrāpravṛtterityāha | nāpīti | svara-
seti | svaprakāśāvacchinnajñānaparamparābhinnāyā ityarthaḥ | tathāpi
vivecanānupapattyā viruddhadharmmādhyāso bhedako'stvityata āha |
vivecaneti | nīlataddhiyorabhedādvivecanānupapattiriṣṭaiveti na
dūṣaṇam, bhede viṣayaviṣayibhāvātiprasakteḥ | na ca jñānagrāhaka-
mānasya tadbhinnasyābhāvāttadasiddhiḥ, svaprakāśatayā svamānakatvā-
ttasyetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tathātvepi viruddhadharmādhyāsepi yadyabhedastadā
dahanādudanyopaśamanamudakācca dāhaḥ syādityarthakriyāsaṅkaraḥ evaṃ
dāhārthamudake udanyopaśamārthaṃ ca dahane pravṛttiḥ syāditi pravṛtti-
saṅkaraḥ | vivecanaṃ ekāgrahe'nyasya grahaṇaṃ bhedajñānamityanye | parama
iti | bhede hi kadācidekāgrahepītaradgṛhyate, na ceha tadasti,
nīladhavalākāratvenaiva svaprakāśena grahaṇāt bhinnatvādeva ca jñānā-
ntareṇāgrahaṇāttathā ca vivecanābhāvādevābhedasiddhirityarthaḥ ||
tat kimaṅga ? pariṇataśānterāśramapadamiva vijñāna-
māsādya vyālanakulāderiva nīladhavalādeḥ śāśva-
tikavirodhatyāgo nibhṛtavairāṇāṃ tatphalatyāgo vā |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | aṅgeti sambodhane | jñānākārāṇāṃ nīla-
dhavalādīnāṃ virodha eva nāsti | virodhe satyapi vā bhedakatvaṃ
nāstīti vikalpārthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | jñāne viruddhadharmmādhyāsādyanna bhayaṃ tat kiṃ
tanniṣṭhadharmmayorvirodha eva nāsti yadvā bhavannapi sa na bhedāye-
tyāha | tat kimiti | aṅgeti sākṣepasambodhanam ||
raghuº ṭīº | tatkimityādi | nīladhavalādīnāṃ jñāne na
virodhaḥ satyapi vā tasminna jñānabhedakatvamiti vikalpārthaḥ ||
na tāvat prathamaḥ, parasparaniṣedhavidhināntarī-
yakavidhiniṣedhayoravirodhe jagati virodhoccheda-
prasaṅgāt | na caivamastvityuttarepi nirvṛtiḥ, kathama-
pyuktarūpatāyā anivṛtteḥ, tāvanmātraśarīratvācca
virodhasya | tatsiddhireva ca bhedasiddhirato na
dvitīyopi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | paraspareti | parasparavidhivyāpyaniṣedhayoḥ para-
sparaniṣedhavyāpyavidhyorvvetyarthaḥ | ādyo nīlapītādīnāmantyo bhāvā-
bhāvayorvirodhaḥ na cāvirodhe virodhocchedaprasaṅga ityāpādyā-
pādakābhedaḥ | evambhūtayoravirodhe kvāpi virodho na syāditi
sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvamāśrityāpādyāpādakayorbhedāt | yadvā nīlatvaṃ
yadi pītatvābhāvavyāpyaṃ na syāt pītavṛtti syāditi viśiṣyaivā-
pādyam | nanu virodhopi jñānābhinna evātaḥ sopi māstu,
kinnaśchinnamityata āha | na ceti | uktarūpatāyā iti |
nīlādīnāṃ parasparavirahavyāpyarūpatāyā ityarthaḥ | nanu bhavatvevaṃ
kiñcāta ityata āha | tāvanmātreti | parasparavirahavyāpyatā-
mātraśarīratvādityarthaḥ | virodhābhāve vipratipatteranudayāt kathā-
pravṛttireva na syāt na syācca jñānānāmapi mitho bheda iti
bhāvaḥ | tatsiddhiriti | virodhasiddhirityarthaḥ | na dvitīyopīti |
nimṛtavairāṇāṃ tatphalaparityāgo vetyapi pakṣo nāsti | ayameva
hi bhedo bhedaheturvā yadviruddhadharmmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇabhedo veti
tvayaivābhidhānādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | paraspareti | parasparābhāvavyāpyayorityarthaḥ |
avirodha iti | atra yadyapyāpādyāpādakayorabhedastathāpi viruddhatva-
prakārakapramāviṣayatvābhāva āpādyaḥ | yadvā nīlatvaṃ yadi pīta-
tvābhāvavyāpyaṃ na syāt pītavṛtti syāditi viśiṣyaivāpādanam |
nanu nīlapītau jñānātmakāvatajjñāne sahopalambhānna tayorvirodha
iṣṭāpattirityāha | na cavamiti | uktarūpatāyā viruddharūpa-
tāyā ityarthaḥ | evaṃ sarveṣāmavirodhe vipratipattyabhāvāt kathāyāṃ
pravṛttirna syāt, antato virodho'sti virodho nāstītyanayo-
rapyuktarītyā virodho na syāditi vyāghātāttayorviruddharūpatā
mantavyetyarthaḥ | tāvanmātreti | nīlapītayorvirodhe bhāsamāna eva
jñāyamānatvādvirodhastadubhayākārapratibhāsanādeva siddhyati, anyathā
jñānānāmapi na mitho bheda ityekajñānamātraparyavasānādadvaitamata-
praveśa ityarthaḥ | kecittvidamagrimagranthena yojayanti, tāvanmātra-
śarīratvāt viruddhadharmmamātrātmakatvāt, tathā ca viruddhadharmma-
siddhireva bhedasiddhiriti dvitīyapakṣopi nāstītyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | paraspareti | yadyapi nīladhavalādīnāmeka-
vidhāvitaraniṣedhadhrauvyepi naikaniṣedhe itaravidhidhrauvyam, tṛtīya-
prakārasyāpi sambhavāt, tathāpi parasparābhāvavyāpyatvamātre tātpa-
ryam | samudita bhāvābhāvābhiprāyeṇa, nīladhavalādyabhiprāyeṇa
cādyamātra1mityapi vadanti | parasparābhāvavyāpyayorapi nīla-
dhavalayoravirodhe'viśeṣāttathāvidhānāmitareṣāmapyavirodhāpattiḥ,
tathā ca bāhyānāmapi nīladhavalādīnāṃ gavāśvādīnāṃ ca bhedo
na siddhyet, tanmūlasya viruddhadharmmādhyāsasya nirāsāditi bhāvaḥ |
vijñānavādināṃ nedamaniṣṭamityabhiprāyikāmāśaṅkāṃ nirasyati |
na caivamiti | uktarūpatāyāḥ parasparābhāvavyāpyatāyāḥ | tāva-
nāntarīyakāntam iti 3 puº ṭippanī vartate |
nmātraśarīratvāt parasparābhāvavyāpyatvamātrarūpatvāt | anyathā
bāhyānāṃ bāhyavijñānayorvijñānānāṃ ca bhedavirahe'dvaitamatāva-
lambanam, na ca vinā bhedābhyupagamaṃ vicārārambhasambhava ityagre
vyaktībhaviṣyati | tatsiddhireva virodhasiddhireva bhedasiddhi-
statparyavasāyinī vā ||
yastu bāhye virodhaparipālanāya viśeṣo darśitaḥ
sa teṣāmevāstu | yadi hi viruddhadharmmādhyāsasya
bhedasādhakatvaṃ prati samāśvāsaḥ, kimarthakriyāpratiniya-
mopanyāsena | na cet, tathāpi kiṃ tena, sopi
hyarthakriyayorviruddhadharmmādhyāsena bhede sati syāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvarthakriyāpratiniyamaḥ pravṛttiniyamaśca bāhye
bhedaka uktaḥ, sa ca jñāne nāstīti jñānaṃ kathaṃ bhidyatāmata
āha | yastviti | bāhyepi tayorbhedakatvaṃ virodhādhīnaṃ, sa
cedvirodho jñānepyasti tadā tadapi bhidyetaiva, anyathā arthakriyāṇāṃ
pravṛttīnāñca bhedo na syādyato bāhyaṃ bhidyetetyarthaḥ | viśeṣa iti |
arthakriyāpratiniyamarūpa ityarthaḥ | sa teṣāmiti | arthakriyāprati-
niyamena bāhyānāmeva bhedo'stviti | yadi hīti | tadayaṃ
samudāyārthaḥ, viruddhadharmmādhyāso bhedako na vā, prathame jñānamapi
nīladhavalākāraṃ tato bhidyeta | antye'rthakriyābhedopi na syānna
syācca tadadhīno bāhyabhedaḥ | kimartheti | tadantareṇāpi viruddha-
dharmmādhyāsenaiva bāhyabhedasiddheḥ | na cediti | viruddhadharmmādhyāso
yadi na bhedakastadā'rthakriyāpratiniyamopi na syādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu parasparābhāvavyāpyatvamātraṃ na virodha-
śarīram, kintvarthakriyāpratibhāsaniyamamantarbhāvyetyata āha |
yastviti | kevalo yadi viruddhadharmmādhyāso na bhedakastadārtha-
kriyāpratiniyamo na syāt, na hi tasyā api bhedo'rthakriyā-
ntarabhedāt, anavasthānāt, tathā ca tāṃ vinā kevalāttatra bheda-
siddhāvanyatrāpi tatheti kimarthakriyāpratiniyamenetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | sa teṣāmevāstviti sopahāsam | sopi
arthakriyāniyamopi | arthakriyāyā arthakriyāntarānusaraṇe'na-
vasthā, na cānavasthitārthakriyāsantāno'sarvajñapuruṣavedya iti ||
anyacca yathā bāhye'rthakriyāpratiniyamo na syāditi
daṇḍastathā jñānepi pratibhāsaniyamo na syāditi
daṇḍa eva |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu yathā yadi bāhyānāṃ parasparaṃ bhedo
na syāttadārthapratiniyamo na syāditi bāhyabhedasādhane vipakṣa-
daṇḍaḥ tathā jñāne nāsti yena tadbhedoṅgīkriyetetyata āha |
anyacceti | pratibhāsaniyamo na syāditi | nīlajñānamapi
pītākāraṃ bhavet pītajñānamapi nīlākāraṃ bhavedityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kiñca yathā ghaṭapaṭayoravirodhe'rthakriyā-
pratiniyamo na syādityaniṣṭāpattirevaṃ nīlapītayoranyonya-
jñāne'nyonyaṃ na bhāsata iti pratibhāsaniyamo na syāt, nīla-
pītayorbhedābhāvāt, tathā ca tayoranyonyajñāne'nyonyaṃ bhāsetetya-
niṣṭamāpadyetetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | atha bāhyānāṃ bhede sādhye'rthakriyāniyamā-
nupapattirasti vipakṣe bādhikā na tu jñānasya bhede kimapī-
tyata āha | anyacceti ||
kva pratibhāsāsāṅkaryaniyamaḥ, sahaiva pratibhāsopi
syāditi cet, na sahānupalambhamasāṅkaryaṃ brūmaḥ, kintu
nīlasyaiva pītatvena pītasyaiva nīlatvenānupalambham |
sa eva mūlaṃ sarvavirodhānām |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu pratibhāsaniyamo na syāditi nedama-
niṣṭaṃ, nīladhavalādīnāṃ sahaivopalambhasya mayābhyupagamāditi
śaṅkate | kveti | nīlapītādīnāṃ sahaivopalambhena pratibhāsa-
sāṅkaryyepi nīlasyaiva pītatvena pītasyaiva nīlatvena bhānaṃ tvayā
neṣyate tadevāpādyate, nīlapītādīnāṃ virodhābhāvāditi pari-
harati | na sahānupalambhamiti | sarvavirodhānāmiti | bāhyepi
virodhānāṃ tadeva mūlaṃ yadekasyāparātmatayā'nupalambha ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu nīlasya pītādinā sahopalambhadarśanānna
tatpratiniyama itīṣṭāpattirityāha | kveti | na viṣayaprati-
niyamamātraṃ pratibhāsāsāṅkaryaṃ brūmaḥ, kintu pītatvenopalambhānnīla-
tvenopalambho bhinna iti, tathā ca prakārataḥ pratibhāsaniyamo
na syādekajñānābhinnatvānnīlapītayorityāpādanārtha ityāha |
saheti | sa eveti | prakārataḥ pratibhāsaniyamaḥ, prakārata eva
virodhanirūpaṇādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | pratibhāsasya niyamo'sāṅkaryam, tacca svarūpataḥ
prakārataśca, tatrādyasyāsiddhiṃ śaṅkate | kveti | sahaiveti | nīla-
pītāvagāhino jñānasya nīlapītākārayostenaiva pratibhāsanā-
dityarthaḥ | dvitīyamabhyupetya nirākaroti | neti | kintviti |
nīlākārasya jñānasya pītākāratvena pītākārasya ca nīlākāra-
tvenānupalambhaṃ tayorabhedabādhakaṃ brūma ityarthaḥ | tayorabhede hi
ekaikākārasyāpi jñānasyobhayākāratāyāmubhayākāratvenopalambha-
prasaṅgāt | sa eva ekasyānyātmanānupalambha eva | sarvavirodhā-
nām bāhyāntaravirodhānām ||
anyathopalambhānupalambhayorapyasiddhireva | yadapi
nopalabhyata ityucyate tadapyupalabhyata eva, yadidamaśvā-
dikamupalabhyate tannopalabhyata ityuktyaiva nirvṛtteḥ |
tenātmanā nopalabhyata iti cet, tat kiṃ sahopa-
lambhepi nīlātmanā pītamupalabhyate yato na virodhaḥ
syāt | tasmādubhāvapi virodhau samau kṣamau cābheda-
visarjane | kevalamekasya prauḍhiḥ subhagābhikṣukanyāyena
yadi syāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nīladhavalādīnāṃ sahopalambhādavirodhaścettadopa-
lambhānupalambhayorapi virodho na syāt, kadācittayorapi
sahopalambhasambhavādityāha | anyatheti | asiddhireveti |
virodhādhīno hi bhedo virodhaścennāsti tadaikaśeṣa evetyekatarā-
siddhirityarthaḥ | etadevāha | yadapīti | anupalambhasyābhāvā-
dityarthaḥ | maitrastvayā nopalabdha iti pṛṣṭonupalabdhamaitropyupalabdha
eva maitra ityukteranivṛttiprasaṅgādityāha | yadidamiti | nanu1
yadyupalambhonupalambhātmanā upalabhyetānupalambho vā upalambhātmanā
veti tadā tayoravirodhaḥ syānna caivamityāha | teneti | nīla-
dhavalādāvapi sahopalambhamātraṃ na tvekātmanā'nyasyopalambha iti
kathaṃ na tatra virodhaḥ syādityāha | tatkimiti | pratibhāsa-
bhedāya tatrāpi virodhadhrauvyamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi | ubhāvapi
bāhyagatajñānagatau bhedau pravṛttiniyamakṛtāvityarthaḥ | pravṛttiprati-
niyamādhīnasya bāhyabhedasya tvayāpi puraskṛtasya saubhāgyāt prauḍhi-
rasmadāpādyamānasya pratibhāsādhīnajñānabhedasya tvayā'nabhyupagamāda-
prauḍhirityarthaḥ | bhikṣuvisarjane durbhagāyāḥ prādhānyamasahamānayā
nanvayamupalambho iti 3 puº pāº |
subhagayā svayameva bhikṣurvisarjjita iti subhagābhikṣukanyāyaḥ | yadi
syādityatra tadā syāditi śeṣaḥ | yadvā yadiparamasahyastu viraha
itivanna śeṣāpekṣā ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadi ca naivaṃ tadopalambhānupalambhayorapyeka-
jñānagocaratvenāvirodhe yadupalabhyate tannopalabhyate yacca nopalabhyate
tadupalabhyata eveti tayorvirodhagraha eva na syādityāha | anya-
theti | yadidamiti | idaṃ bhūtalam | yadupalabhyate sa eva
ghaṭavattvopalambha ityuktyaiva nirvṛttirityarthaḥ | teneti | upalambhatve-
nānupalambhastattvena copalambho nānubhūyata ityarthaḥ | tat kimiti |
tarhi nīlapītayorekajñānaviṣayatvepyanyatarasādhāraṇaikaprakāravattayā
nānubhūyata iti prakāratāsāṅkaryamastyevetyarthaḥ | ubhāvapīti |
ubhau bāhyajñānavṛttī virodhau | abhedavisarjane bhede samarthau |
samatvādityekasyaiva jñānavṛttereva tasya prauḍhirbhikṣukaprasthāpanepi
durbhagāyāḥ prādhānyamasahamānayā subhagayaiva prasthāpita iti nyāyena
yadi syādityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | upalambhānupalambhayośca rūpabhedāniveśane upa-
labhyamānatvānupalabhyamānatvavyavasthā na syādanupalabhyamānatvenābhi-
matasyopalabhyamānatāyā upalabhyamānatvenopetasyacānupalabhyamānatāyāḥ
suvacatvādityāha | anyatheti | yadapi gavādikam | kathaṃ
tadupalabhyata ityata āha | yadidamaśvādikamiti | evaṃ yada-
śvādikamupalabhyata ityucyate tannopalabhyate, kathaṃ tannopalabhyate,
yannopalabhyate gavādikaṃ tadeva taditi | atha gaurgotvenopalabhyate
nāśvatvena, aśvastu aśvatvena na gotveneti na tayorabheda iti yadi
tadaikajñānagocarāvapi nīlapītākārau nīlapītākārābhyāmupa-
labhyete na pītanīlākāratvābhyāmiti tayorapi nābhedaḥ | na caikaṃ
jñānaṃ bhinnobhayākāraṃ bhavitumarhati, tavākārākāriṇorabhedā-
diti śaṅkottarābhyāmāha | tenetyādi | sahopalambhe nīla-
pītādisamūhālambane | ubhau bāhyārthajñānaniṣṭhau | etenaikameva
vicitraṃ jñānaṃ nīlapītābhyāmākārābhyāmupalabhyata iti pratyuktam,
gavāśvayoriva nīlapītākārayorapi vijñānayoḥ pratibhāsabhedā-
dinā niyatabhedasiddheḥ, anyathā tayorapi kvacit saṅkaraprasaṅgāt |
samau pramāṇapratītatvāt ||
etena vivecanābhāvopi nirastaḥ, ākārayorasa-
mbhedena vedanasyaiva vivecanatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tadevaṃ vijñānasya viruddhadharmmādhyāsādbhayaṃ
nāstīti yatpareṇoktaṃ tannirākṛtya vivecanābhāvastu paramo
nirbāha(ka) iti yatpareṇoktaṃ tannirākaroti | eteneti | prati-
bhāsabhedavivecanenetyarthaḥ | ākārayoriti | nīladhavalākārayo-
rasadbhedaścetsādhitastadā tadākārajñānasyāpi bhedenaiva vivecanaṃ
siddhaṃ yata ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | jñāne bāhyavanna vivecanamityatra dūṣaṇamāha |
eteneti | virodhopasthāpanena | nīlapītādyākārayorasāṅkaryeṇa
vedanameva vivecanapadārtha ityāha | ākārayoriti ||
raghuº ṭīº | asiddhatvena vivecanābhāvo na jñānābhedasādhaka
ityāha | eteneti ||
api ca kṣaṇikatāyamekapuruṣāpekṣayā bāhyasyāpi
kuto vivecanam | nānāpuruṣāpekṣayāpi sandigdham |
pareṇa parasyāvedanāt kva sandeha iti cet, abhedenaiva,
tattvavivecanaṃ sādhyam, tathā ca kiṃ tenopanyastenāpi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | api ca bāhyajñānayorubhayorapi vivecanā-
bhāvastulya ityāha | api ceti | kveti | bāhyasya kṣaṇikatvena
bhedagrahakāle vināśāt kva vivecanamityarthaḥ | yadvā bāhyena
sahopalambhaniyamādyathā jñāne vivecanābhāvastayostathā sahopa-
labdhayornnīlapītayostena puruṣeṇa vivecanābhāva ityarthaḥ | nanu yau
nīlapītāvekena puruṣeṇa sahopalabdhau tayostadānīmeva puruṣānta-
reṇa vivecanaṃ sambhavatyevetyata āha | nāneti | puruṣāntareṇa
tadā tayorvivecanamiti niścayo nāsti sandehastu tajjñānepi
sahopalabdhayorapi nīlatajjñānayoḥ puruṣāntareṇa vivecanasambhavā-
dityarthaḥ | nanu puruṣāntareṇa jñānayorgrāhyagrāhakayorvā bhedo
grahīṣyata ityādyākāramsandehaḥ tadā syādyadi bhedena grāhyagrāhaka-
bhāvo bhavenna caitadastītyāha | pareṇeti | jñāne vivecanānupa-
pattyā grāhyagrāhakayorabhedastvayā sādhyate tadubhayābhede ca vivecanā-
nupapattirityanyonyāśraya ityata āha | abhedenaiveti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tatraiva dūṣaṇāntaramāha | api ceti | yadi
yena jñānena saha yadupalabhyate tena saha tasyābhedaḥ sahopalambha-
niyama iti jñāne vivecanābhāvastadā kṣaṇikayornīlapītayoḥ
sahopalabdhayorna kālāntare tenaiva puruṣeṇa pṛthagupalambha iti
bāhyepi vivecanābhāva evetyarthaḥ | nanu tadaiva tayoḥ puruṣāntareṇa
pṛthagupalambho vivecanaṃ syādityata āha | nāneti | atra
niścayābhāvāt sandeho vācyaḥ sa ca jñānepīti na viśeṣa ityarthaḥ |
nanu pareṇa paravedane na viṣayaviṣayibhāvaniyāmakamiti svenaiva
svasya vedanānna jñāne tatsandeha ityāha | pareṇeti | jñānasya
svagrāhyābhede sādhye vivecanānupapattiḥ sādhanamuktam, tatrāsiddhyu-
ddhārārthamabhedenaiva grāhyagrāhakabhāva uktastatra ca sādhyāviśeṣa
ityāha | abhedenaiveti ||
raghuº ṭīº | athaikāgrahaṇe'nyasya grahaṇaṃ vivecanaṃ, na ca vicitra-
jñānagatayornīlapītākārayostathā sambhavati, svasamvedanasamvedyatvāt,
avicitrajñānagatau ca nīlapītākārāvanyāveva, ākāriṇāṃ bhede
tadabhinnānāmākārāṇāmabhedānupapatterityata āha | api ceti |
vivecanābhāvastasyāṃ vyaktau tajjātīye sarvatra vā | ādyepyekasya
puṃsaḥ puruṣāntarasyāpi vā | prathame, kṣaṇikatāyāmiti |
kṣaṇikayornīlapītayorekapuruṣīyaikajñānagrāhyayostena puṃsā vive-
canasyābhāvādityarthaḥ | carame, nāneti | ekapuruṣavedyasya
nīlādeḥ puruṣāntareṇa grahaṇe niścayābhāvāt sandeho vācyaḥ,
sa ca jñānākārepi tulya ityarthaḥ | etena tenaiva puṃsā kālāntare
bāhyasya smaraṇādilakṣaṇaṃ vivecanaṃ pratyuktaṃ veditavyam | anyenānyasyā-
vedanāttadbhinnena puruṣāntarīyajñānena na tajjñānākāravivecana-
sambhāvanetyāśaṅkate | pareṇeti | nirākaroti | abhedenaiveti |
abhedasiddhiparyavasāyinyā bhede grāhyagrāhakabhāvānupapattyaivāvivecanaṃ
sādhyam, tathā ca kimantargaḍunā'vivecanena | na caivamevāstu, tasyā
apyasiddheḥ | api ca bhinnayorna cedgrāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ, kathaṃ tarhi
bāhyayorapi sahopalabdhayornīlapītayorvivecanam | ekaikagrāhiṇā
jñānāntareṇeti cet, tadapi tato bhinnamabhinnaṃ vā | bhinnaṃ cet,
na tarhi grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ | abhinnaṃ cet, paryavasitaṃ tarhi pañcānā-
mabhedena, tadabhinnābhinnasya tadabhinnatvāt, tathā ca kuto
vivecanam | evaṃ ca sahopalambhaniyame niyamāṃśo vyartha iti
draṣṭavyam | paraṃ ca vivecanābhāvajñānaṃ vivecanaṃ gṛhṇāti na vā |
gṛhṇāti cet, siddhaṃ tarhi bhinnasyāpi grāhyatvam, vivecanasyāneka-
padārthaghaṭitamūrtikatvāt | na cet, nābhedānumāpakam, abhāva-
mātrasyānaikāntikatvāt | vastugatyā vivecanasyābhāvo nānai-
kāntika iti cet, astvidameva jñānaṃ taṃ tamarthaṃ gṛhṇāti na
veti vivicyatām | grahaṇe bhinnasyāpi grāhyatvamagrahaṇe tu na
niyama iti | evaṃ pareṇa parasyāvedanādavivecanaṃ sādhyam,
tadyadi na jñātam, kutaḥ sādhyasiddhiḥ | jñātaṃ cet, siddhaṃ
parasya pareṇa vedanam ||
tajjātīyasya tu bāhyavadvijñānasyāpi vivecana-
meveti | svasamvedanabādhito'yaṃ biruddhadharmmādhyāso
na bhedasādhaka iti uṣṭralaguḍakam, samvedanenaivāsya
sādhitatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu kṣaṇikatayaivaikā nīlavyaktiḥ pītavyaktita-
stena puruṣeṇa vivicyatāṃ, nīlajātīyaṃ pītajātīyādbhinnamiti
bāhye vivecanamastyevetyata āha | tajjātīyasyeti | tarhi nīla-
jñānajātīyaṃ pītajñānajātīyādbhinnamiti vijñānepi vivecana-
mastyevetyarthaḥ | nanu nīlapītaviṣayakaikajñānasyaikatvenānubhavā-
dviruddhadharmmādhyāsena tadbhedasādhanaṃ bādhitamityata āha | samvedaneti |
evaṃ samvedanameva hantumupakrāntaṃ tadeva bhedaṃ haniṣyati, tathā ca
kurūpo hanyatāmiti śrutvā kurūpahananāya prathamamuṣṭreṇaiva laguḍakaṃ
gṛhītamiti nyāyamanubhavatītyarthaḥ | nīlāt pītaṃ bhinnaṃ nīla-
jātīyāt pītaṃ bhinnamiti bāhyepi samvedanādhīna eva bhedaḥ
sa kathaṃ tenaiva bādhyatāmiti siddhaṃ viruddhadvayākāraṃ jñānamapi
viruddhadharmmādhyāsādbhinnamiti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bāhyatajjātīye vivecanamastyeveti jñānepi
tusyamityāha | tajjātīyasyeti | nanu nīlapītajñānasya viruddha-
dharmmādhyāsena bhedasādhanaṃ bādhitam, nīlapītayorvirodhe'nubhūya-
mānepi tadviṣayajñānasyābhedādityata āha | samvedaneti |
kurūpahananaprastāve kurūpatara uṣṭra eva laguḍaṃ gṛhītvopasthita
iti nyāyamidamanuharatītyarthaḥ | atra hetumāha | samvedane-
naiveti | nīlamidaṃ na pītamiti jñānenaiva virodhasya sādhita-
tvāt tenaiva kathaṃ tadbādhaḥ, anyathā'viruddhadharmmādhyāsena jñānaikyameva
kiṃ na sādhyate, yadi tajjñānaikyaṃ samvedanabalādāsthīyate, tadā
viruddhadharmmasyāpi tata eva siddhiriti jñānaviṣayayorabheda eva
bādhyata ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | dvitīye, tajjātīyeti | viruddhadharmmādhyāsāt
samvidbhedaḥ sādhyaḥ, sa eva tu nāstyanubhavabādhitatvādityāśaṅkya
nirākaroti | samvedaneti | evaṃ bruvataḥ katamobhiprāyaḥ, kiṃ
nīlatvādīnāṃ virodha eva nāsti, kiṃ vā vijñānasya tadvattvam
atha tadanavagāhitvam | nādyaḥ teṣāṃ virodhasya sādhitatvāt |
dvitīye tu siddhaṃ jñānānātmanopi grāhyatvam | tṛtīyetvāha |
uṣṭralaguḍakamiti | athāyamāśayaḥ, yathā bhavatāṃ nīlapītā-
dyārabdhe'vayavinyekatrānekarūpasamavāyāyogādatiriktaṃ citraṃ rūpam,
tathā'smākamapyekatra vijñāne'nekākārāsambhavādatirikta eva
citrākāra iti, sambhāvyetāpyayamidaṃ citramiti jñāne, na tvidaṃ
nīlamidaṃ ca pītamete nīlapīte mitho bhinne ityādike |
vyaktībhaviṣyati cedamagre ||
hinastu tarhi prakāśamānatā'nekatvaṃ viruddhadharmmā-
dhyāsopyekatām, tathāpyekatvānekatvavikalanīlā-
dyākāraprakāśasvarūpe kimāyātamiti cet, tadidaṃ
bhautaiḥ kṣetranināyanam | niyatākāratvameva hyekatvama-
niyatākāratvaṃ cānekatā, tannivṛttau ca na nīlā-
kāraṃ nāpi nīlapītādyākāramityanākāra-
mevāvaśiṣyate |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu nīladhavalādyekajñānakukṣāveva prakāśamāna-
tvānurodhāt praviṣṭamapi tadjñānaṃ kathamanekaṃ syānna ca tadekameva
bhavitumarhati, viruddhadharmmādhyāsādityekatvamanekatvaṃ ca vivādapada-
jñāne mānaṃ māstu jñānasvarūpaṃ tu svasamvedanasiddhaṃ durnnirasanam |
taduktaṃ jñānaśriyā--
“dvitraikavyavahāropi bhedāpohaparomataḥ |
ekānekatvavikalaḥ prakāśaḥ kevalo'tra san” ||
ityāha | hinastviti | tarhi tajjñānaṃ naikasvarūpaṃ na
vā'nekasvarūpamiti niḥsvarūpameva paryavasannamityāha | tadida-
miti | bhautairbarbaraiḥ kṣetranilāyanaṃ kṣetrakevalīkaraṇam | sasya-
rakṣāyai tṛṇe nirasanīye sasyamapi nirastameveti yathetyarthaḥ |
etadevāha | niyateti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu bādhakabalādekatvānekatvayordharmmayormitho
virodhenaikatrābhāvepi dharmmisvarūpeṇa jñānasyābhedo'stvityata āha |
hinastviti | tadidaṃ sasyopacayāya tṛṇe nirākartavye barbareṇa
sasyamapi nirākṛtamitivadityāha | tadidamiti | tat spaṣṭa-
yati | niyateti ||
raghuº ṭīº | śaṅkate | hinastviti | prakāśamānatā
anekatvamiti bhedagrāhyatvāyogāt1 | prakāśamānatā ekatvena
prakāśa ityanye | prakāśasvarūparakṣaṇāyaikatvānekatvanirākaraṇam,
tasmiṃśca sati prakāśasvarūpameva na syādityāha | tadidamiti |
bhautaiḥ anabhijñaiḥ | tadeva vyutpādayati | niyateti | tannivṛttau
niyatāniyatākārasvarūpaikatvānekatvanivṛttau | nirākārameveti |
tathā ca nīlādyākāraprakāśasvarūpa iti yaduktaṃ tadvyāhata-
miti bhāvaḥ ||
syādetat | pāramārthiko viruddhadharmmādhyāso bheda-
heturayaṃ kālpanika iti cet, evaṃ tarhi sutarāma-
yatnasiddhaṃ sphaṭikavadbodhasya nirākāraśuddhatvam, ākāra-
nikarastvanātmeva sphuratītyubhayathaiva kālātyayāpa-
diṣṭāḥ sahopalambhādayaḥ |
grāhyatvāropāt iti 3 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu nīlapītādīnāmavastutvāttadghaṭito
viruddhadharmmādhyāsopyavastubhūtaḥ katha jñānaṃ bhindyādityāha | syādeta-
diti | ubhayatheti | nīlādīnāṃ pāramārthikatve 'pāramārthikatve
cetyarthaḥ | tatra pāramārthikatve viruddhadharmmādhyāsāduktādeva bādho
jñānasya nīlādyabhede sādhye aparamārthasato jñānasyāpāramārthika-
nīlādyabhede sādhye tu sutarāṃ bādha ityarthaḥ | ubhayatheti |
paramārthasadākāratve nirākāratve cetyartha iti kecit ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nirākāraśuddhatvaṃ svātmībhūtākāraśūnyatva-
mityarthaḥ | ubhayatheti | jñānasya pāramārthikatve'pāramārthikatve ca ||
raghuº ṭīº | ubhayathāpīti | prakāśamānasya jñānā(nā)tmano
nīlādyākārasya pāramārthikatve kālpanikatve cetyarthaḥ ||
api ca āstāṃ tāvadviruddhadharmmādhyāsacintā |
yo'yaṃ grāhyagrāhakabhāgabhedo grāhyanīlādibhedo vā
cakāsti, sa kiṃ satyo'satyo vā | satyatve sa eva
doṣaḥ | asatyatve nāyamātmā vijñānasyetyanātmanyapi
sahopalambhaniyamādayogyatā ityanekāntāḥ | bhedo na
prathata eveti cet, evaṃ tarhi astu tāvat sarva-
janīnapratītivirodhaḥ svavāgvirodho vā | amiddhā-
starhi hetavaḥ | na hi bhedāprathane sahārthaṃ tadvyāpyatāṃ
vā paśyāmaḥ | tadasphuraṇepi pakṣādipravibhāgopi
katham, kaṃ ca bodhayituṃ pravṛtto'si kimarthaṃ ca, anvaya-
vyatirekāpratītau kiṃ ca hetorbalam, kutaśca viprati-
pattiḥ kīdṛśe ceti | so'yaṃ vicāramārabhate, bhedaṃ
tu sāmvṛtamapi necchati, nūnamunmattopyanena jitaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ekadaṇḍimatamantarbhāvya doṣāntaramāha | api
ceti | āstāṃ tāvaditi | doṣāntaramevātra draḍhīya iti
bhāvaḥ | sa eveti | bhāsamānasya bhedasya satyatve grāhyābheda-
sādhane bādha evetyarthaḥ | anekāntā iti | asatyasya
bhedasya grāhyatve sahopalambhaniyatatvāditi hetusattvepi sādhyasya
grāhyābhedasyāsattvādanaikāntikatvamityarthaḥ | svavāgvirodha iti |
bhedapadamuccārayato bhedo na prathata iti svavāgvirodha ityarthaḥ |
asiddhāḥ svarūpāsiddhāḥ | tadvyāpyatāmiti | tasya (vyāpya)vyāpya-
vyāpakabhāvasya bhedagarbhatvādityarthaḥ | pakṣādīti | pakṣasādhyahetu-
dṛṣṭāntādīnāṃ bhede satyeva anumānapravṛtterityarthaḥ | kiṃ ceti |
vādinorapi bhedābhāvādityarthaḥ | kimarthaṃ ceti | tattvanirṇaya-
vijayādīnāmuddeśyānāmasattvādityarthaḥ | anvayavyatirekayorapi
bhedābhāve pratītiranupapannā, pratītibhedābhāve viruddhā pratipatti-
rvipratipattirapi na syāttadabhāvācca na vivādapadapravṛttiriti
sarvathā sarvvatra bhedatajjñānayorapekṣetyāha | anvayeti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tathāhi, nīlapītaviṣayakajñānasya pakṣatve bādhaḥ,
ekasya viruddhākāratādātmyānupapatteḥ | alīkaviṣayakajñānasya
ca pakṣatve grāhyābhedasādhane bādhaḥ, analīkajñānasyālīkaviṣaya-
tādātmyāsambhavādityarthaḥ | sa eva bādha evetyarthaḥ | anaikāntā
iti | yadi kāsāñcidbuddhīnāṃ pakṣādbahirbhāvaḥ, tadaitadanaikānti-
kābhidhānam, sarvāsāṃ pakṣatve tatra sādhyābhāve bādha eveti bhāvaḥ |
svavāgvirodha iti | bhedo na prathata ityatraiva bhedaprathanādityarthaḥ |
nanu tadaviṣayapratītyaviṣayatvaṃ sahārtho vyāpyatvaṃ cābhedepi na viru-
ddhyata ityata āha | tadasphuraṇa iti | balaṃ pakṣasattvādi |
kutaśceti | bhedajñānaṃ vinā virodhajñānābhāvena vipratipatte-
rabhāvādityarthaḥ | sāmvṛtamapīti | jñāyamānamātramapītyarthaḥ |
unmattopīti | unmatto hyaniṣṭasādhane tattvājñānāt pravarttate, ayaṃ
tu bhedo vidvānapi sāmvṛtamapi taṃ necchatītyanena sa jita ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | sa eva bādha eva | evaṃ grāhyayorbhede satya-
tvāṅgīkāre grāhakasya tadubhayābhede bādhaḥ | nāyamiti bhedasya
jñānātmakatve jñānasya jñeyabhinnatvāpatteriti bhāvaḥ | vināpi bhedaṃ
tadviṣayakapratītiviṣayatvarūpaḥ sahopalambhaḥ sambhavatītyata āha |
tadvyāpyatāmiti | tannaiyatyam | taddhi tadaviṣayakapratītyaviṣaya-
tvādirūpaṃ na vinā bhedaṃ sambhavatīti | tadvyāpyatāṃ teṣāṃ hetūnāṃ
sādhyavyāpyatām, vyāpterbhedagarbhatvāditi vā'rthaḥ ||
vikalpārūḍha eva bhedo vyavahārāṅgaṃ nānubhavārūḍha
iti cet, sopi satyo'satyo vā bhāsate na veti
vikalpānnātivartate |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vikalpaḥ savikalpakaḥ | anubhavo nirvi-
kalpakam | tathā cāpāramārthika eva bheda iti bhāvaḥ | satya
iti | satyo bhedo bhāsate ca yadi tadā siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitaṃ
jñānamapi tvanmate bhedātmakaṃ syāt tadanātmakatve ca bhedepi grāhya-
grāhakabhāvasiddhiḥ | yadi ca satyo bhedo na bhāsate tadā bheda-
vyavahārānupapattirnna hyabhāsamānaṃ kiñcidvyavahriyate | athāsatya eva
bhedo bhāsate tadā tadabhedāt jñānamapyasadeva syādanyathā bhede
grāhyagrāhakabhāvasiddhiḥ | atha na bhāsate tadā na bhedavyavahāra
ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu nirvikalpakaviṣayatvena prāmāṇika eva
bheda ekatvavirodhī, ayaṃ tu kalpanāviṣayatvenāsan vyavahāra-
mātrāṅgamityāha | vikalpeti | anubhavo nirvikalpakam | sopi
vikalpārūḍhopītyarthaḥ | satya iti | satyatve kvaikasya viruddha-
tādātmyam, asatyatve tu kvālīkajñānayorabhedaḥ, bhedenaiva viṣayatve
hetavastatraivānekāntā ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | astu tarhi sāmvṛta eva bheda ityāśayavānā-
śaṅkate | vikalpeti | nānubhaveti | anubhavo nirvikalpakam | tasya
sanmātrālambanatvena kālpanikollekhāyogāt | sopīti | abhāsane
kevalasya vā bhedasya bhāsane vicārānārambhāt pratiyogyādi-
militasya ca sato'sato vā bhedasya naikasadvijñānatādātmyamiti
kathaṃ grāhyatvamiti ||
asannevāsphurannevādhyavasīyata iti cet, adhya-
vasīyata iti vivaraṇārhametat | tadviṣayavyavahāra-
jananamadhyavasāyārtha iti cet, vyavahāropi yadya-
jñānarūpaḥ, kathamasaṃstena janyatām | jñānarūpaścet,
kathaṃ niyāmakaṃ vinā tadviṣayaḥ | svakāraṇasāmagrī-
sāmarthyāditi cet, so'yaṃ vyavahṛtirūpajñānālīka-
bhedayorniyāmakāntarābhāvepi kāraṇasāmarthyamāśritya
viṣayaviṣayibhāvamicchati, na tvanubhavānubhāvyayoriti
kṣīraṃ vihāya rucirarocakagrastasya sauvīre |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | asphuranniti | ajñāyamāna ityarthaḥ | vicāra-
ṇīyamiti | vicārāsahametadityarthaḥ | jñānāviṣayepi bheda-
vyavahāraṃ karoti vikalpa ityāha | tadviṣayeti | vyavahāropīti |
tvanmate jñānātiriktasyāsattvāditi bhāvaḥ | tadviṣaya iti | bheda-
viṣaya ityarthaḥ | evaṃ sati nīlādīnāmapi jñānaviṣayatvasiddhi-
riti bhāvaḥ | vyavahārasvarūpaṃ jñānaṃ svakāraṇabalāttathotpannaṃ
yathā'līkaṃ bhedaṃ viṣayīkarotītyāha | svakāraṇeti | vyavahṛti-
rūpajñānañcālīkabhedaśceti dvandvaḥ samāsaḥ | anubhavānubhāvyayoriti
nirvikalpakavastugrāhyayorityarthaḥ | vastubhūtaṃ nīlādi svakāraṇa-
sāmarthyādeva bhinnamapi viṣayīkarotu kinniyāmakāntareṇeti
bhāvaḥ | vastuviṣayatāyāṃ svakāraṇasāmarthyasambhavaḥ kṣīramiṣṭam,
avastuviṣayatāyāṃ tadasambhavaḥ | sauvīraṃ kāñjikam1 ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu cāsanneva bhedaḥ savikalpake bhāsate, tatra
ca jñānabhinnasyaiva viṣayatvam, mayā ca nirvikalpakaṃ pakṣīkṛtya
nirvikalpakatvādeva viṣayābhedaḥ sādhyata iti nānekānta ityāha |
asannaveti | asphuran nirvikalpakāviṣayībhavannityarthaḥ | yadyajñāna-
rūpa iti | jñānabhinnasya cā'līkatvābhyupagamādityarthaḥ | vyavahṛti-
rūpajñānaṃ cālīkabhedaśceti dvandvaḥ | anubhaveti | nirvikalpaka-
tadviṣayayorityarthaḥ | savikalpakavannirvikalpakepi bhede satyeva
svakāraṇasāmarthyādeva viṣayaviṣayibhāvasambhave vipakṣabādhakābhāvā-
nnānumānamabhedasādhakamiti bhāvaḥ | kṣīramiti | nirvikalpaka-
viṣayasya sattvāt tatra kāraṇasāmarthyaṃ sambhavatīti tat kṣīramiva,
alīkaviṣayakasavikalpake tu tannāstīti tat sauvīramevetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | asphuran abhāsamānaḥ | adhyavasīyate vika-
lpena viṣayīkriyate iti prasiddhe'rthe anātmanopi bhānamasphura-
nnityanena virodhaścetyāśayena pṛcchati | adhyavasīyata itīti |
sauvīraṃ kāśmīram--pāṭhaḥ |
tadviṣayeti | tathā cādhyavasīyate vikalpena svajanyavyavahāraviṣayī-
kriyata ityarthaḥ | svakāraṇabalāyātaścāyaṃ vikalpasya svabhāvabhedo
yat kaścideva vikalpaḥ kañcidevāsantamaviṣayamapi vyavahārayati
na sarvaḥ sarvamiti bhāvaḥ |
kecittu asphuran nirvikalpakāviṣayaḥ, tatraivānātmabhānaṃ
niṣiddhamityabhiprāyaḥ | itthaṃ ca nirvikalpakatadviṣayayoreva grāhya-
grāhakābhyāmabhedaḥ sādhanīyaḥ, sahopalambhādau copalambhaḥ sākṣātkāro
vivakṣaṇīyo'to nāṃśato bādho nāpyanaikāntikamityāhuḥ |
kathamasanniti | vijñānavāde jñānātiriktamātrasyāsattvāt |
yadyapi vyavahārātmakajñānasyāsadbhedaviṣayatve siddhameva bhinnasyāpi
grāhyatvam, tathāpyanyenānyasya grahaṇe'tiprasaṅgaṃ paramukhenaiva nirā-
karttumāha | kathamiti | svakāraṇeti | evaṃ ca vyavahāravattajjanaka-
jñānasyāpyasadbhedaviṣayatvaṃ kāraṇasāmarthyādaviruddhamityapi mantavyam |
anubhaveti | anubhavaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ | tadviṣayastvanubhāvyaḥ1 |
sato hi jñānaviṣayatve indriyasannikarṣādikaṃ niyāmakaṃ
sambhavatīti kṣīratulyatā | sauvīram kāñjikam ||
bhedopi vikalpākāra eva, na tu bāhya iti cet,
yadyasannevāsau, kathaṃ vikalpākāraḥ | tadākāraścet,
kathamasanniti paribhāvaya | astu tarhi sanneveti cet,
tadviṣayaḥ sannanubhāvya iti 3 puº pāº |
nanvadvayadarśi cedvijñānam, kathaṃ bhedaprathā | ākāra-
dvayadarśi cet, kathamekaṃ saddvayātmakam | citrākāra-
miti cet, citramekamanekaṃ veti vikalpagilitameva
tava paśyataḥ | anekatve kva ekavijñānatādātmyam |
vijñānasyāpi yāvadākāramanekatve kva citrākāra-
samvedanam, svasvamātramagnatvāt | ekatve kva bhedapratītiḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu vikalpādbhinnasyālīkabhedasya viṣayatāṃ
nāṅgīkurmma ityāha | bhedepīti | kathamiti | vastvavastunostādā-
tmyānupapatterityarthaḥ | tadākāra iti | ākārākāriṇorabhedā-
diti bhāvaḥ | astviti | sanneva bhedo vikalpākārostu tathā
ca na pūrvadoṣa ityarthaḥ | advayeti | yayorbhedo gṛhyate tadubhayā-
viṣayaṃ cedityarthaḥ | na hi pratiyogyanuyoginornīlapītayora-
jñānepi bhedajñānamiti bhāvaḥ | nanu nīlapītākārayoranuyogi-
pratiyoginorjñāne satyeva bhedajñānamastu ko doṣa ityata āha |
ākāreti | tarhi viruddhadvayākāraṃ jñānamapi virodhādekaṃ na
syādityarthaḥ | ratnakīrtimataṃ śaṅkate | citrākāra(dvaya)miti |
na dvayadarśi nāpyadvayadarśi kiṃ tu citrākāramityarthaḥ | atrāpi
naiyāyikābhimataikaguṇaparaścitraśabdaḥ karburārtho vā'nekaguṇapara iti
vikalpayati | citramapīti | ekaṃ tāvanna bhavati viruddha-
dharmmādhyāsā, nnāpyanekamekajñānatādātmyābhāvaprasaṅgāt etadevāha |
anekatva iti | tava paśyata ityanādare ṣaṣṭhī tvāṃ paśyantamapyanā-
dṛtyetyarthaḥ | nanvākāranikarānurodhādvijñānamapi bhidyatāmata
āha | vijñānasyāpīti | tathā ca tvadanumataṃ citrādvaitamanupapanna-
miti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kathamiti | ākārākāriṇorabhedādityarthaḥ |
astviti | vikalpākārasya bhedasya vikalpābhinnatayā bhedaḥ sanneva,
na tvalīka ityarthaḥ | yayorbhedo vikalpaviṣayastaddvayaṃ yadi na
vikalpaviṣayastatrāha | advayeti | pratiyogyanuyoginorajñānā-
dbhedajñānābhāvādityarthaḥ | tadubhayagrahaṇapakṣe doṣamāha | ākāreti |
ekasya vikalpasya viruddhākāradvayānātmakatvādityarthaḥ | citratvaṃ
yadyekānekobhayātmakatvaṃ, tadā virodha eva | atha jñānavṛtti-
rjātistadviśiṣṭajñānādbhedavyavahāraḥ, tatrāha | citramapīti | citra-
tvajātiviśiṣṭamapītyarthaḥ | tavetyanādare ṣaṣṭhī | vikalpya dūṣaṇamāha |
anekatva iti | atha tadākāraṃ jñānamapi naikaṃ, tatrāha | vijñānasyeti |
mitho viruddhānekākārāvagāhitvānna citratvaṃ tatretyarthaḥ | ekatva iti
vijñānasyetyanuṣajyate, ekasya bhinnākāratādātmyābhāvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | syādetat | vikalpollikhito bhedo yadi tato
bhidyeta, tadā deśyetāpyanyenānyasya grahaṇam, na tvetadasti, kiṃ tu
vikalpākāra eva, na cākāra ākāriṇo bhidyata ityāśaṅkate |
bhedopīti | apiśabdānnīlādirapi | tathā ca jñānākārayoreva
nīlapītayorjñānākāro bhedo vikalpenollikhita iti na bāhya-
samvedanasaṅkathāpīti bhāvaḥ | advayadarśi nīlapītādyākāradvayādarśi |
pratiyogyanuyogyanullekhino jñānasya tādṛśavyavahārānaṅgatvādityukta-
tvāt | atha nairantaryeṇa yugapadeva votpannāni trīṇi jñānāni
bhedaṃ vyavahārayantīti cet, ekaṃ cedvijñānaṃ nānekadarśi, kathamasyai-
vārthasya siddhiḥ | anekadarśi cet, ekasyānekatādātmyavirodhā-
tsiddhamanyenānyasya grahaṇam | gūḍhābhisandhiḥ śaṅkate | citreti |
citrākāratvaṃ hi nīlapītādyatiriktākāraviśeṣaśālitvaṃ vā
nīlādyanekākāratvaṃ veti vikalpena nirākaroti | citramapīti |
kva citrākārasambedanam kva nīlādyanekākārasaṃvedanam asamvedane
kathaṃ tadbhedagrahaṇam | ekatva iti | nīlādyatiriktaikākāraśālitve
nīlapītādyanullekhe tadbhedollekho na sambhavatītyarthaḥ ||
anīlādyanekavyāvṛttikṛto'nekatvādhyavasāya eveti
cet, atādātmye kathaṃ vyāvṛttīnāmullekhaḥ | tādātmye
kathamanekatvam | ekatvepi kva tatkṛtopi bhedādhyavasāyaḥ |
ullekhoyamasya vijñānasya yadanekatvaṃ nāma, na punasta-
ttvāntaramiti cet, svarūpamasvarūpaṃ veti vācyam |
ādye anekasvarūpamekamiti ko'nyā vadedasusthāt |
dvitīyastviṣyata evāsmābhiḥ, kiṃ tu tvayeṣyatām |
bhrāntirasāviti cet, tasyāmapi svarūpamasvarūpaṃ vā
prakāśeta, prakārāntarābhāvāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | atra jñānaśriyaḥ samādhānaṃ śaṅkate | anī-
leti | taduktaṃ jñānaśriyā--
“yadi svarūpamākārāścitrataikadhiyaḥ katham |
bhedaḥ pratyarthatā buddhestadā'nyonyasya vedanam ||
mithastathāpi vyāvṛttau bāhyavastukṣaṇasthitiḥ |
bhedepyevaṃ dhiyasteṣāṃ prakāśaghaṭanā katham” ||
ityāśaṅkyāha--
“alīkamanyatve'pīdaṃ vyāvṛttyantaramīritam” |
tadetatpariharati | atādātmya iti | vyāvṛttayo yadi
jñānabhinnāstadā kathaṃ prakāśantām | jñānābhinnā eva cettadā
jñānābhedena tāsāmapyabheda eveti kva citrākāratvam | nanvastu
