yo'rthastatra vivāda ityarthaḥ | kecittadviśiṣṭajñānaṃ manvate kecittu
tadagṛhītabhedaṃ jñānadvayamiti tadarthe vivādastathā ca viśiṣṭajñānaṃ
bhramarūpaṃ yat pratiṣidhyate tadabhyupagacchatā naiyāyikena pratiṣeddhrā
mīmāṃsakena cāvaśyaṃ pratyetavyamityata āha | evamiti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | śabdeti | mātrapadenārthanairapekṣyaṃ pratīte-
ruktam | na ceti | ayaṃ vyavahāro nāstīti netyarthaḥ | tathā ca
tanmātre vivādāsambhava iti bhāvaḥ | śabdārtha iti | anyathā-
khyātipadasya gṛhītabhedajñā - - - - - - - - - jñāne viśeṣa iti
vivāda ityarthaḥ | evaṃ satīti | niṣedhyapratītiṃ vinā na
niṣedhapratītirityubhayorapyupagantṛniṣeddhroḥ pratītiyathārthatve kva
vivāda ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | śabdeti | iyamanyathākhyātiriti vāṅmātra-
mityarthaḥ | na hīti | vyavahārasyobhayavādisampratipannatvānna
vivāda ityarthaḥ | na cāyaṃ vivādo nāstīti | śabdārtheti |
tādṛśavākyasyārthe purovarttijñānasyānyathākhyātitve pratiṣedhyasyānyathā-
khyātitvasya pratītiḥ kathaṃ nāstīti | tathā cobhayavādisiddha-
tvānna vivādāvasara ityarthaḥ ||
na cānyajñānādanyatra pravṛttisambhavo'tiprasaṅgāt |
na ca tajjñānasānnidhyaṃ niyāmakamatiprasaṅgādeva | na
ca tatsahito bhedāgrahaḥ, agrahaprādhānye bhedāvivakṣāyāṃ
nivṛtterapi prasaṅgāt, taddhetorabhedāgrahasyāpi vidya-
mānatvāt | nāsau nivarttakaḥ, api tu bhedagraha iti
cenna, rajata eva nedaṃ rajatamiti kṛtvā na nivartteta,
bhedagrahasya tatkāraṇasyābhāvāt, bhāve vā viparīta-
khyātirabhinne bhedapratyayāt, tasmāt pravarttakavanniva-
rttakopyagraha eva teṣāṃ svīkarttumucitaḥ, tathā ca sa
doṣastadavastha eva |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | idānīmidaṃ rajatamiti viśiṣṭajñānamiti
sādhayati | na ceti | rajatajñānācchuktau pravṛttirviśiṣṭajñāna-
mantareṇānupapannetyarthaḥ | nanu śuktijñānasannihitameva rajatajñāna-
miti kṛtvā rajatārthī śuktau pravarttata ityata āha | na ceti |
nanvagṛhītabhedaṃ jñānadvayaṃ pravarttakamato nātiprasaṅga ityata āha |
na ceti | tatsahita iṣṭajñānasahitaḥ | tathā ceṣṭabhedāgrahaḥ pravarttaka
ityarthaḥ | agrahaprādhānya iti | iṣṭabhedo vastugatyā'stu mā vā,
parantviṣṭabhedāgrahaḥ pravarttaka iti ceducyate tadāniṣṭabhedostu mā vā
tadagrahaḥ śuktau nivarttakopi syāditi yugapatpravṛttinivṛttī
syātāmityarthaḥ | etadevāha | taddhetoriti | nanviṣṭābhedāgraho
na nivarttakaḥ, kintviṣṭabhedagraha iti, sa ca prakṛte nāstīti na
nivarttata iti śaṅkate | nāsāviti | tatkāraṇasyeti | nivṛtti-
kāraṇasyetyarthaḥ | nanu tatrāpi rajatabhedagrahostyevetyata āha |
bhāve veti | sa doṣa iti | yugapatpravṛttinivṛttiprasaṅgarūpo
doṣa ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu pratyakṣeṇedamiti śuktirgṛhyate, doṣāttatra
śuktitvaṃ na gṛhyate, tadvṛttitayā gṛhītena śuklabhāsvaratvena rajataṃ
smaryate, doṣādeva tayorbhedo na gṛhyate, etāvatā rajatārthipravṛtti-
rjāyate, satyeva rajatepi pravṛttau rajatena bhedāgrahostyeva, paraṃ tatrā-
vidyamānatayā bhedo na gṛhyate, śuktirajatayostu sannapi doṣādi-
tyevamupapattau viśiṣṭajñāne mānābhāva ityata āha | na ceti |
rajatajñānasya śuktyaviṣayatve tatra pravarttakatvaṃ na syāt, tadviṣayatāṃ
vinā tadviṣayapravṛttyajanakatvāt, jñānapravṛttyoḥ samānaviṣayatayā
hetuhetumadbhāvaniścayāt, pravṛttau vā ghaṭepi pravṛttiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ |
nanu śuktijñānasannihitarajatajñānaṃ śuktyaviṣayakamapi tatra pravarttakaṃ
syādityata āha | na ca tajjñāneti | tathāpi kadāpi ghaṭajñāna-
sānnidhyāttatrāpi pravarttakaṃ syādityarthaḥ | na ceti | purovartti-
rajatajñānasahito bhedāgrahaḥ pravṛttiniyāmaka ityapi netyarthaḥ |
bhedāgrahasya pravarttakatve kimagraho viśeṣyaḥ, agṛhyamāṇo bheda iti
bhedo vā viśeṣyaḥ, ādye satyarajatepi pravṛtteragrahamātraṃ vā pravarttakaṃ
bhedaviṣayakagrahābhāvo vā, ādye nivṛtterapīti | atra hetuḥ,
taddhetoriti | śuktau nedaṃ rajatamiti jñāne rajatābhedāgrahasya
nivarttakasya darśanācchuktau rajatabhrame pravarttakabhedāgrahavannivarttaka-
rajatābhedāgrahasyāpi sattvānnivṛttirapi syādityarthaḥ | dvitīyaṃ
śaṅkate | nāsāviti | rajatabhedāgrahasya pravarttakatve tadabhāvo
rajatabhedagraho nivarttakaḥ, sa cātra nāstīti na nivṛttirityarthaḥ |
tasyānivarttakatve nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānānnivartteta, rajate rajata-
bhedagrahe'nyathākhyātyāpatte rajate rajatābhedāgrahānnivṛttirvācyā,
tathā ca śuktāvidaṃ rajatamiti jñānepi rajatābhedāgrahānnivṛttiḥ
syādityāha | tarhīti ||
raghuº ṭīº | atha anyathātvaṃ vyadhikaraṇaprakārakatva khyātau
niṣiddhyate, taccecchādau pratītam | na ca niṣedhādhikaraṇe niṣedhya-
pratītirapyaṅgam, mānābhāvāt | śuktyādau rajatatvādiprakārakajñānā-
bhāve kathaṃ tatra rajatādyarthipravṛttiriti cet, rajatādigocarāt
pramuṣṭatattāṃśakādrajatamityādismaraṇāt | atrāha | na cetyādi |
na ca pravṛttiviṣayasya jñānaṃ niyāmakam, tatra rajatādibhedagrahepi
pravṛttyāpatterityāha | na ceti | tatsahitaḥ pravṛttiviṣayatajjñāna-
sahitaḥ | svatantropasthitasyeṣṭasya bhedāgrahaḥ | bhedāgraha iti yatra
kvacitsato bhedasya pravṛttiviṣaye'graho vā tatrāgṛhyamāṇastanniṣṭho
bhedo vā | ādye agraheti | yadyapi pravṛttau bhedasya vivakṣāyāma-
vivakṣāyāṃ ca samānameva nivṛttāvabhidhāsyamānaṃ dūṣaṇam tathāpi
vivakṣāpakṣe doṣāntaramabhidhātuṃ vikalpaḥ | 1iṣṭābhedasyāgraho vā
nivarttaka iṣṭabhedagraho vā | ādye nivṛtterapīti | antyaṃ śaṅkate |
nāsāviti | nirasyati | rajata eveti | upasaṃharati |
tasmāditi ||
atha bhedaḥ pradhānam, aṅgamagrahaḥ, tadā satyarajata-
jñānādrajate na pravartteta, idamaṃśarajatāṃśayorbhedā-
bhāvāditi svayamūhanīyam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu purovarttirajatayoryatra vāstavo bhedo
bhavati tatra bhedāgrahātpravṛttiḥ, prakṛte ca purovarttirajatayorasti
bheda iti tadagrahātpravarttata iti śaṅkate | atheti | bhedasya
prādhānyaṃ pravṛttiviṣayaniṣṭhatvam | parihāramāha | tadā satyeti |
tatra purovarttirajatayorvāstavabhedābhāvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | agṛhyamāṇo bhedo rajatapurovarttijñāna-
sahitaḥ pravarttaka iti kalpamāśaṅkya nirākaroti | atheti |
yena kenāpi bhedagrahasya pravarttakatve'tiprasaṅgādiṣṭena samaṃ bhedāgraho
vācyaḥ, sopi na yasya kasyacidatiprasaṅgādeva, api tu pravṛtti-
viṣayasyeti vācyam, tathā ceṣṭena samaṃ purovarttinā bhedasyāgrahe
satyeva rajate pravṛttirna syāt, na hi tatreṣṭapratiyogiko bhedo'sti
yasyāgrahaḥ pravarttayedityarthaḥ ||
aniṣṭabhedasyāgraho iti 3 puº pāº |
raghuº ṭīº | dvitīyamāśaṅkya nirākaroti | atheti |
athopasthite dharmiṇi svatantropasthitayoriṣṭāniṣṭayorbhedāgrahau
pravṛttinivṛttihetū iti cet, rajatayoraṅgarajatayorvā ime
rajatārajate iti grahādekatra yugapatpravṛttinivṛttyāpattiḥ | atha
yaddharmisākāṅkṣā iṣṭasyopasthitistatra pravarttate yaddharmisākāṅkṣā
cāniṣṭasya sā tatra nivarttate, ākāṅkṣā copasthitivṛttidharmāntaraṃ
yadvaśādupasthitasya viśeṣaṇasyopasthiteṣu viśeṣyeṣu kvacideva (bhavatāṃ)
viśiṣṭabuddhiriti cet, atiriktākāṅkṣāyāṃ mānābhāvāt,
yathāyathaṃ vyāpyaparāmarśāderantato bhavatāṃ tanniyāmakatvābhimatādeva
viśiṣṭabuddhyutpādaniya1masambhavāt ||
pravṛttivat pratipattāvapyubhayāgrahastulya iti cenna |
agrahasyāvivakṣitatvāt, sāmagrīviśeṣādeva tatsiddheḥ |
tattve'parisphuratīti tu niyamaḥ | na ca kvacidapi bhedā-
bhedāvubhāvapi tattvaṃ yatastathā syādityeṣā dik |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu bhramotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ śuktirajatabhedāgraha-
vattadubhayābhedāgrahopyastyeva, tathā ca bhedāgrahādabhedāropavadabhedā-
grahādbhedajñānameva kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkate | pravṛttivaditi |
abhedārope doṣasya bhedajñāne ca doṣābhāvasya kāraṇatayā na
yaugapadyāpattiḥ, na hi doṣatadabhāvayoryaugapadyamiti pari-
harati | sāmagrīti | nanvevaṃ bhedagrahe satyapi kvacidabhedāropaḥ
niyamādaniyamasambhavāt iti 1 puº pāº |
syādityata āha | tattva iti | bhedasya tatra sattvāttadagrahāda-
bhedāropo bhavatyabhedastatra nāstīti tadagra(hā)(he satyapi
kvaci)dbhedagrahaḥ prasajyata ityāha | na ceti | nanūpasthiteṣṭabhedāgrahaḥ
pravarttakaḥ, upasthitāniṣṭabhedāgrahaśca nivarttakaḥ, tatra yadyapīdaṃtvenā-
niṣṭopasthitistathāpi nāniṣṭatāvacchedakaprakāreṇa, tathā ca kathaṃ
tatra nivṛttiḥ syāditi cenna | idaṃ rajataṃ na śuktiriti
bhramānnivṛttiprasaṅgāt, tatra śuktitvenaivāniṣṭagrahāt | na ca
svatantropasthitāniṣṭabhedāgraho nivṛttiheturatra tvabhāvapratiyogi-
tvenāniṣṭopasthiterna nivarttata iti vācyam | vaṇigvīthyabhāva-
pratiyogīdaṃ rajataṃ iti bhramānna tarhi pravartteta, iṣṭasyābhāva-
pratiyogitvenaiva bhānāt | kiṃ ca ime raṅgarajate ityatra
viparītārope yugapatpravṛttinivṛttī syātāmubhayakāraṇasattvāditi
(digīti) digarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanvevamāropaniyamopi na syāt, abhedā-
ropahetubhedāgrahavadbhedajñānahetorabhedāgrahasyāpi bhāvādityāha |
pravṛttivaditi | abhedārope bhedāgrahasya hetutve'nyatarakoṭi-
prakārakatāyāṃ jñānasya na tanniyāmakaṃ, kintu sāmagrīviśeṣaḥ, na
cānyakāryasāmagrī anyakāryaniyāmikā, kāryayorabhedāpatteḥ, evaṃ
cārope'dṛṣṭaviśeṣādeva sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭānniyama ityāha |
agrahasyeti | nanvevamabhedāgraho heturapi na syādityata āha |
tattva iti |
nanu satyarajate na pratiyogyaprasiddhiḥ, purovarttini bhede
rajatapratiyogitvajñānaviṣayatvābhāvasya purovarttinīṣṭabhinnatvaprakā-
rakajñānaviṣayatvābhāvasya vā hetutvāt | atrāhuḥ | idaṃ rajata-
mityatra purovarttināniṣṭabhedagrahe'nyathākhyātiḥ, tadagrahe cāniṣṭa-
bhedāgrahānnivṛttirapi syāt | athāniṣṭatāvacchedakarūpeṇopasthitā-
daniṣṭabhedāgrahānnivṛttirna cedantvamaniṣṭatāvacchedakam, evamapīdaṃ
rajataṃ na śuktirityatrāniṣṭatāvacchedakaśuktitvenopasthitāniṣṭa-
bhedāgrahānnivartteta | atha svātantryopasthitāniṣṭabhedāgrahāt pravṛtti-
nivṛttī, abhāvaviśeṣaṇatvenānupasthitiśca svātantryam, aniṣṭaṃ ca
tatrābhāvaviśeṣaṇatvenopasthitamiti na nivṛttirata eva nedaṃ rajata-
miti jñānādrajate na pravṛttiḥ, abhāvāsaṃsargāgraha eva nakārārtha
iti nānyathākhyātiḥ | nanvabhāvaviśeṣaṇatvenopasthitāvapi pūrvaṃ
pratiyoginaḥ svātantryeṇopasthite śuktau vaṇigvīthīsthābhāvaprati-
yogīdaṃ rajatamiti bhramajñānādapravṛttyāpatteśca | kiṃ ca rajata-
raṅgayorise rajate iti bhramādiṣṭāniṣṭatāvacchedakarūpeṇa svā-
tantryobhayabhedāgrahātpravṛttinivṛttisāṅkaryāpattiḥ | na caivambidhabhrame
mānābhāvaḥ | tathāvidhasatyajñānavatpratyekabhramasāmagryorekadā sattvena
tādṛśabhramasyānubhavikatvāt | atha rajataraṅgayo rajataraṅgarajata-
bhedāgrahānna yugapat pravṛttinivṛttī | na cānyathākhyātiḥ, doṣa-
vaśāt purovarttinaṃ vihāya smṛtaraṅgarajatābhyāṃ purovarttini
bhedāsaṃsargāgrahāt | na | ekaraṅgarajatamātrajñānānantaraṃ tayoreva
yamajayorviparītabhrame'tiprasaṅgāt | anyathākhyāteśca | rajate
rajatabhedāsaṃsargāsaṃsargasyāsaṃsargāgrahānnivṛttiriti cenna | bhedā-
saṃsargāsaṃsargasya bhedasaṃsargarūpatve rajatabhedāsaṃsargāgrahādraṅge nivṛtti-
prasaṅgāt, rajatabhedasaṃsargagrahe cānyathākhyātiḥ, rajatavṛttitayopa-
sthitabhede rajatabhedena saha bhedāgrahaḥ pravṛttipratibandhakaḥ, evaṃ raṅge
nivṛttāvapīti cenna | śabdābhāsāt yugapatpravṛttinivṛttyāpatteḥ,
pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayarajataraṅgabhedayośca śabdādanupasthityā'prati-
bandhakatvāt | atha rajate nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ rajatatvāsaṃsargā-
saṃsargāgraharūpaṃ vā pratibandhakamiti cenna | anyavṛttitayopasthitasya
rajatatvāsaṃsargāsaṃsargāgrahasya rajatabhedasya ca raṅge asaṃsargāgrahā-
nnivṛttiprasaṅgāt | mānaṃ tvanyathākhyātau jñānatvaṃ viśeṣyāvṛtti-
prakārāvacchinnaviṣayatāpratiyogivṛtti, pravṛttihetupratyakṣātmaviśeṣa-
guṇatvāt, icchātvavat, bhedāgrahakāritāyāṃ rajatatvena purovarttina-
micchāmītyatrecchāyāṃ viśeṣyāvṛttinā rajatatvenāvacchedāditi
sāmānyataḥ | viśiṣya tu rajatecchājanyaśuktiviṣayakapravṛttijanakaṃ
rajataprakārakaṃ jñānaṃ śuktiviṣayakam, śuktiviṣayakapravṛttihetu-
vijñānatvāt, śuktyarthina iyaṃ śuktiriti jñānavat, tādṛśamidaṃ
jñānaṃ vā rajatatvaprakārakaṃ, rajatecchājanyapravṛttihetujñānatvāt,
rajata idaṃ rajatamiti jñānavat | na ca grahaṇasmaraṇayorviśiṣṭajñānasya
vā pakṣatve bādha āśrayāsiddhirvā | ubhayasiddhena śuktiviṣayapravṛtti-
hetutvena pakṣatvāt | anyathā sādhyatadabhāvāvādāya pakṣe vikalpe-
'numānamātrocchedāpatteḥ | na ca visamvādipravṛttyajanakatvamupādhiḥ,
tvanmate tathāvidha idaṃ jñāne rajatajñāne ca sādhyāvyāpakatvāt |
nāpi nojanyatvam, parasya jñānamātre tathātvāt, anyathā tayoreva
sādhyavyāpakatvāt | na cāprayojakatvam, iṣṭapurovarttiviśiṣṭajñānasya
pravṛttihetutvāt | uktarītyā bhedāgrahasyāpravarttakatvāt | nanu tatra
hetvabhāvaḥ, śabdasyāptoktasya nirdoṣasya vā'hetutvāt, na ca
śabdābhāsastaddhetuḥ, yogyatāviśiṣṭasya śabdasya hetutvāt, nāpi
liṅgābhāsaḥ, liṅgaviśiṣṭapakṣajñānasyānumitihetutvāt, ābhāse
ca tadasaṃsargāgrahāt, indriyasya sambaddhagrāhakatvāt | maivam |
saṃskārendriyābhyāṃ viśiṣṭadhīsambhavāt, tasya jñānadvayatve'bhedo-
cchedāpatteḥ, tasya tadekamānatvāt | na caikaviṣayatvena tayoḥ
sahakāritā, gauravāt | na cātiprasaṅgaḥ, bhedāgrahasyāpi
taddhetutvāt, pratyabhijñāyāstattāṃśe vyabhicārācceti saṅkṣepaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | bhedābhedāgrahayoḥ kāraṇayoḥ sattvātkāryayo-
rabhedabhedagrahayoryugapadutpattiprasaṅga ityāśaṅkate | pravṛttivaditi |
agrahasya agrahamātrasya | tanniyāmakamāha | sāmagrīti | athaivaṃ
yadā kadācitpuruṣatvādigrahepi sthāṇutvādyāropaprasaṅga ityata āha |
tattva iti ||
nāpi sarvasyāyathārthatvāt, tadgrāhakasya yathārthatvā-
yathārthatvābhyāmuttaravirodhāt | tat kiñcit pramāṇaṃ

śaṅkaº ṭīº | dṛṣṭāntamātra iti | hetuvinākṛtasya tasyā-
tantratvādityarthaḥ | hetūpahata1māśaṅkya nirācaṣṭe | jñānamiti |
atra bādhamāha | nyāyaviplava iti | tadeva sphuṭayati |
sarvatheti | sajātīyākarmatvaṃ sajātīyāviṣayatvam | pūrvakamapi
karmapadaṃ viṣayaparam | nanu tajjñānaṃ tajjñānaviṣayaḥ, kriyā-
tvāt, cchidāvadityanumānaṃ syādityata āha | svakarmatva
hetūpakramamāśaṅketi 2 puº pāº |
iti | viruddhatvāditi | sarvatra kriyātvasya svāviṣayatvenaiva
dṛṣṭatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | na cāsāviti | svaviṣayatvepi na
svaprakāśatetyarthaḥ | dṛṣṭānteti | mātrapadena hetvabhāva uktaḥ | na
coktatarkaviparyayānumānāttatsiddhirityāha | jñānamiti | nanu
varttamānaṃ svajñānaṃ pakṣīkṛtyānumānaṃ syādityata āha | svakarmatva
iti | anye vānumānasya jñānāntarākarmatve vyāghātaśceti bhāvaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | yā yajjātīyeti | kriyā na sajātīyakriyā-
karmetyarthaḥ | sājātyaṃ ca bhedagarbhamato na svaprakāśatvavirodhaḥ |
nyāyeti | (jñāne jñānāntarakarmatvābhāvajñānasya jñānāntarasya
viṣayatāyā avarjanīyatvāt) jñānāntarakarmatvābhāvasyānumitiḥ
svātmanyeva taṃ gṛhṇāti jñānāntare vā | ādye kuto ghaṭādijñānānāṃ
parāprakāśyatvasiddhiḥ | dvitīye tu paraprakāśyatvamapratyūhamiti bhāvaḥ |
anyadāha | cchidāvaditi | atha vyavahārasya vyavaharttavyajñānasādhya-
tvādvyavahārānurodhāttadeva jñānaṃ tadviṣayakaṃ kalpyate, jñānāntara-
kalpane gauravāt, tadeva ca jānāmītyādyākāram, tacca bāhye
yathāyathaṃ pratyakṣādirūpamātmani svātmani ca pratyakṣameva | athāstu
manoyogajanyatvādātmani tat pratyakṣaṃ, svātmani tu katham |
manaḥsaṃyuktātmasamavāyena janyatvāditi cenna | samavetanirapekṣasya
pratyāsattitve'tītānāgatajñānagrahaṇaprasaṅgāditi cet | tadviṣayatve
jñānānapekṣatvāt, yadviṣayatve yajjñānaṃ jñānānapekṣaṃ tasya tatraiva
sākṣāttvāt | dvitvādipratyakṣaṃ ca dharmīndriyasannikarṣādijanyaṃ
taddhetoreva tadastviti nyāyāt | svaviṣayatvaṃ ca jñānasya
jñānattvamiva svābhāvikamutpādakasāmagrīniyamyaṃ, tattadviṣayatvaṃ tu
na tavānugatakāraṇaniyamyam, asmākaṃ tu sambhavedapi, eka-
śaktimattvena hetutvopagamāditi |
atrāhuḥ | pratyakṣatvaṃ hi na jñānānapekṣaviṣayatāśālitvam,
tadapratisandhānepi sākṣātkaromīti pratyayāt, paraṃ tu jātiḥ,
janye ca jñāne tanniyāmakamindriyasannikarṣajanyatvameva, jāteśca
nāṃśikatvamato nānumityāderātmani svātmani ca pratyakṣatvam |
ata eva pratyabhijñāpi na grahaṇasmaraṇātmiketi |
nāpi svagrāhakeṇa, vivecanānupapatteḥ | na hi
pramāṇagrahaṇaṃ yathārthatvaikaniyatam, apramāṇepi pramāṇā-
bhimānāt | anyathā viparyayajñānādapravṛttiprasaṅgācca |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu jaḍatvena ghaṭādīnāṃ svavyavahārājanakatvepi
jñānaṃ svayameva svavyavahārajanakamastu, svasmin sati svavyavahārāda-
sati tu tadabhāvāt, svavyavahārajanakatvameva svaviṣayakatvaṃ pāri-
bhāṣikamiti cenna | vyavahārasya vyavaharttavyagocarajñānajanyatva-
niyamāt, tacca svaviṣayatāyāṃ svabhinnajñānaviṣayatāyāṃ vā satyā-
meva, tatra svajanakendriyapratyāsattyanadhikaraṇatvādeva na svaviṣayatva-
mato jñānāntaraviṣayatayaiva tasya vyavaharttavyatvopapatteḥ | svagrāhakeṇa
veti dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ dūṣayati | nāpīti | svagrāhakeṇānuvyavasāyena
prākaṭyaliṅgena vetyarthaḥ | vivecaneti | aprāmāṇyavyāvṛttaprāmāṇya-
grahānupapatterityarthaḥ | aprāmāṇyaśaṅkākalaṅkābhāvo vā vivecanam |
tathā ca prākaṭyena liṅgenānuvyavasāyena vā jñāyamānaṃ niṣkampapravṛtti-
janakaṃ na syādityarthaḥ | nanu prāmāṇyopahitajñānagrahaḥ pramāṇameva,
tathā ca kathaṃ na samāśvāsa ityata āha | na hīti | gṛhīta-
prāmāṇyameva jñānaṃ pravarttakamityabhipretyāha | anyatheti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu varttamānaṃ svajñānaṃ na mānasam, kintu
svayameva svavyavahārajanakam, svasmin satyeva svavyavahārāt, na tu
jñānāntaramapekṣate, tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt, jñānāntarā-
bhāvadaśāyāṃ svabhāvādeva svavyavahārābhāvāt, svata eva svavyavahāro-
papattau jñānāntarakalpane gauravācca, icchādivyavahāre jñānāntarā-
pekṣā'stu, vyavahārasya jñānajanyatvāt | na ca jñānamātraṃ na jñāna-
vyavahāraheturapi tu vyavaharttavyaviṣayamiti jñānavyavahāropi
tadviṣayakajñānāntarāditi vācyam | svasyaiva svaviṣayakatvāt,
yadvyavahārānukūlaśaktiyuktaṃ yajjñānaṃ tasyaiva tadviṣayakatvāt | na ca
vyavaharttavyabhinnajñānatvena vyavahārahetutvaṃ, gauravāditi |
maivam | svajanakendriyapratyāsattyanāśrayatvena svasya svānāśrayāt,
viṣayatvaniyāmakasyendriyasannikarṣāderabhāve svaviṣayatvānupapatteḥ,
kāraṇaṃ vinā kāryānutpādāt, pratyakṣājanyasya pratyakṣaviṣayatvā-
nupapatteḥ, ātmadharmapratyāsattyanāśraye pratyakṣaviṣayatāyā janakatva-
vyāptatvāt | jñānasya pratyakṣatvenendriyasannikarṣāśrayatvāt, tataśca
mānasatvāt, tasmādvivādapadamindriyajanyaṃ jñānaṃ naitajjñānaviṣayaḥ,
etajjanakendriyapratyāsattyanāśrayatvādetadajanakatvādvā, asannikṛṣṭavat,
jñānaṃ prameyamiti vyāptijñānaṃ jñānatvasāmānyapratyāsattyā svaviṣaya-
mīśvarajñānamahetukatvāt sarvaviṣayamiti svaprakāśameveti saṅkṣepaḥ |
svagrāhakeṇa jñātatānupapattyā jñānakalpanetyarthaḥ | vivecanam
apramāvyāvṛttajñānaṃ prāmāṇyajñānamiti yāvat, tasya viśeṣa-
darśanajanyajñānatvāt | nanu jñānakalpakena pramātvenaiva jñānasya grahaṇaṃ
viśeṣadarśanaṃ syādityata āha | na hīti | vastuto jñānamātra-
liṅgasya jñātatādeḥ prāmāṇyavyabhicārānna tatastadgrahaḥ | na ca
pramāhitajñātatāviśeṣāt, tasya prathamaṃ durnirūpatvāt, anyathā-
'pramāhitajñātatāviśeṣādaprāmāṇyasyāpi svato grahāpatteriti
bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vivecaneti | pramāṇamevetyavadhāraṇātmano vive-
canasya vinā viśeṣadarśanamanutpatteḥ | atha prāmāṇyagrahaviṣayatva-
rūpaviśeṣadarśanāttadbhaviṣyatītyata āha | na hīti | anyatheti |
yadyapramāyāṃ na prāmāṇyagrahastadā prāmāṇyasaṃśaya iva prāmāṇya-
niścaye'pi bhramānniṣkampā pravṛttirna syāt, prāmāṇyagraheṇa bhramā-
saṃsparśādityarthaḥ ||
tato yadi prāmāṇyamāpātataḥ sphuredapi, tathāpi
niyamahetorabhāvāt pramāṇamevedamiti niścayaḥ kutaḥ,
sa ca mṛgyate, pāralaukikavyavahārāṅgatvāt1 | śaṅkā-
nivarttanena tadapratyūhaṃ niścitameveti cet, tannivṛtti-
reva kutaḥ | pramāṇāntarāditi cet, tadapi niścaya-
phalamanyathā veti | anyathātve na śaṅkāvicchedo
niścayasādhyatvāttasya | niścayaphalatve tu yo mṛgyate
nāsau svata iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | doṣaṃ spaṣṭayati | tata iti | nanu sandehā-
dapi pravṛtteḥ kiṃ prāmāṇyaniścayenetyata āha | pāralaukiketi |
aihikī pravṛttirastu yathā tathā, pāralaukikī tu pravṛttirbahu-
vittavyayāyāsaphalā prāmāṇyaniścayaṃ vinā na syādevetyarthaḥ | nanu
svagrāhakādeva prāmāṇyagraho'prāmāṇyaśaṅkā tu kutaścinnivartsyatī-
tyāha | śaṅketi | tadapīti | śaṅkānivartakaṃ pramāṇamityarthaḥ |
anyathātve aniścayaphalatve | niścayaphalatva iti | yena pramāṇena
śaṅkāparibhavakṣamaḥ prāmāṇyaniścayo jananīyo na tadanuvyavasāyarūpaṃ
prākaṭyaliṅgarūpaṃ vetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | sa ceti | yadyapi pravṛttimātre prāmāṇya-
graho nāṅgam, tathāpi bahuvyayāyāsasādhyaniṣkampapravṛttau tatheti
bhāvaḥ | nanu grāhakasāmagryā tatprāmāṇyaniścayepi aprāmāṇyaśaṅkā-
ṅgatvācca iti 2 puº pāº |
nivṛttimātraṃ viśeṣadarśanena kriyata ityāha | śaṅketi | niścita-
meva prāmāṇyaṃ śaṅkānivarttanenāpratyūhaṃ niṣkampapravṛttijanakaṃ kriyata
iti yojanā | anyathātva iti | tathābhūtasya pramāṇatvamityapi
mantavyam | niścayeti | asau prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ | yadi jñāna-
grāhakeṇaiva prāmāṇyagrahastadā niścite nāprāmāṇyaśaṅkā, atastadanu-
rodhādanyadeva prāmāṇyagrāhakameṣitavyamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | sphuredapītyapinā svābhipretaṃ pāramārthikama-
sphuraṇaṃ sūcitam | śaṅketyādi | tat prāmāṇyam | viparīta-
koṭiśaṅkāśūnyaṃ prāmāṇyajñānameva tanniścaya ityarthaḥ | niścayaphalaṃ
prāmāṇyaniścayasya janakam | anyathā tasyājanakam | asau
prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ |
sphuraṇamātramapi tāvadastu svata iti cet, kiṃ tena |
na caitadapi, ananusaṃhitopādherupahitapratyayāyogāt |
na ca viṣayopadhānamātraṃ prāmāṇyam, tadābhāsasādhā-
raṇyāt | api tvanubhavasya sato bhūtārthānusandhānam |
na cārthānusandhānepi tasya bhūtatvamanusandhīyate,
āropitatvavyāvarttakaviśeṣaṇānanusandhānāt | ananu-
saṃhitasya cāropasādhāraṇyāt | kvacidviśeṣopyanu-
sandhīyata iti cet, na kvāpi prāthamikena | anyathā-
'nabhyāsadaśāyāṃ tatrāpi saṃśayo na syāt | abhyāsa-
daśotpanne tu anusandhānaṃ vyāptigrahajanitasaṃskāra-
samudbhavasmaraṇabalena bhavat pramāṇāntaraśarīra eva pravi-
śatīti parata evāvaśiṣyate |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tābhyāṃ prāmāṇyasphuraṇaṃ tāvadastītyataḥ
svatastvaṃ siddhamevetyāha | sphuraṇamātramiti | tato niṣkampā
pravṛttiścenna bhavati tadā kiṃ tena prāmāṇyasphuraṇenetyāha | kiṃ
teneti | nanu tathāpi tvadabhimataṃ paratastvaṃ bhagnamevetyata āha |
na ceti | viśeṣyāvṛttyaprakāratvātmakasya svaprāmāṇyasya tatrāsphuraṇā-
dityarthaḥ | prāmāṇyaghaṭakopādhyananusandhāne prāmāṇyopahitapratyayā-
sambhavādityarthaḥ | nanu ghaṭaviṣayatvameva ghaṭajñānasya prāmāṇyam,
tacca jñānagrāhakagrāhyamevetyata āha | na ceti | ghaṭabhramepi
ghaṭaviṣayakatvasambhavādityarthaḥ | tarhi kiṃ tat prāmāṇyaṃ yat
svato grahītumaśakyamityata āha | api tviti | yathārthānu-
bhavatvamityarthaḥ | yathārthatvañca viṣayatāsamānādhikaraṇaprakārāva-
cchinnatvaṃ viṣayatāvyadhikaraṇaprakārānavacchinnatvaṃ vetyarthaḥ | tarhi
tadeva svato niścīyatāmata āha | na ceti | arthaviṣayakatva-
grahepi tattvasya grahītumaśakyatvādityarthaḥ | āropitatvavyāvarttakaṃ
viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyāvṛttyaprakārakatvādi | tadananusandhānañca pūrvaṃ tadanupa-
sthitatvenetyāha | āropiteti | ananusaṃhitasyeti | tadviṣayakatva-
mātrasyetyarthaḥ | kvaciditi | ghaṭa evāyamitītaravyavacchedamukhena
jāyamānajñāna ityarthaḥ | prāthamikeneti | prathamaṃ jñānagrāhiṇā
anuvyavasāyena jñātatāliṅgakānumānena vetyarthaḥ | kathaṃ netyata
āha | anyatheti | ayaṃ vahnirevetyaparicitavahnerapi śabdādinā
jāyamāne jñāne prāmāṇyasya svayaṃ grahaṇāpatteḥ, tathā ca prāmāṇyā-
prāmāṇyakoṭikaḥ saṃśayo na syādityarthaḥ | nanu kvacidityabhyāsa-
daśāpannameva jñānaṃ brūmaḥ, tacca svato gṛhyatām, na hi tatrāpi
saṃśayo'stītyata āha | abhyāsadaśeti | tatrāpi tajjātīyatvena
liṅgenaiva prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhyate | tathāhi | ayaṃ pṛthivītvenānubhavaḥ
pṛthivītvavati pṛthivītvaprakārakaḥ, gandhavadviśeṣyakapṛthivītvaprakāraka-
niścayatvāt pūrvapṛthivītvaprakārakaniścayavat | evamayaṃ śarīra-
tvenānubhavaḥ śarīratvavatyeva śarīratvaprakārakaḥ, karacaraṇādimadvi-
śeṣyakaśarīratvaprakārakānubhavatvādityādyūhyam | tajjātīyatvaṃ lakṣaṇa-
vadviśeṣyakalakṣyajñānatvaṃ draṣṭavyam | vyāptīti | yo gandha-
vadviśeṣyakaḥ pṛthivītvaprakārakānubhavaḥ sa pṛthivītvavatyava pṛthivītva-
prakāraka ityādiprakāreṇa yadvyāptigrahaṇaṃ tajjanito yaḥ saṃskāra-
statprabhavaṃ yatsmaraṇamityarthaḥ | pramāṇāntaramanumānam, tatraivānta-
rbhavatītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu kvacidagre saṃśayābhāvāt pūrvaṃ prāmāṇya-
niścayo bhavatyeva, māyāliṅgini sati jhaṭiti parivrājakabuddhi-
vadityāha | sphuraṇamātramapīti | tādṛśasya prāmāṇyagrahasya viśeṣa-
darśanājanyasyāpramāṇasādhāraṇatayā na niṣkampapravṛttyaṅgatvamityāha |
kiṃ teneti | viśeṣyāvṛttyaprakārakatvaṃ na jñānamātragrāhiṇā gṛhītuṃ
śakyamityāha | ananusaṃhiteti | viśeṣo viśeṣyāvṛttyaprakāraka-
tvam | ananusaṃhitasyeti | tadviṣayajñānatvamātrasya cetyarthaḥ |
kvaciditi | karatalajñānādāvabhyāsadaśāpanna ityarthaḥ | prāthamikena
jñānagrāhakeṇetyarthaḥ | anyatheti | yadyanabhyāsadaśāpannadharmyeva na
gṛhītaḥ, kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ, dharmijñānasya taddhetutvāt, tadgrahe tu tatprā-
māṇyasyāpi niścayāditi kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ | abhyāseti | jhaṭiti
liṅgānusandhānaprabhavatvenāpyupapadyamānaṃ na svatastvamākṣipatītyarthaḥ |
parata eveti |
nanu svagrāhyatvepi kadācit paragrāhyatvāt svasyāpyanyā-
pekṣayā paratvāt bhaṭṭamate paragrāhyatvācca siddhasādhanam | na ca
grāhyaprāmāṇyāpekṣayā paratvaṃ prāmāṇyagrāhakasyāpi grāhyaprāmāṇyatayā
tadapekṣayā paratvābhāvāt agrāhyaprāmāṇyāpekṣayā parattve grāhyaprāmāṇya-
syāprāmāṇyopapatteḥ | kiñci prāmāṇya parato jñāyate, anabhyāsa-
daśāyāṃ sāṃśayikatvādityanumānamanaikāntikaṃ, jñāne niścite'pi
prāmāṇyasaṃśayāhitasaṃśayaviṣayatvāt | na ca jñānadharmatvena hetu-
rviśeṣaṇīyaḥ, tathā sati yatra jñānaviṣayaprāmāṇyasandehe niścita-
syāpi jñānadharmasya saṃśayitatvaṃ tatrānaikāntikam, anabhyāsadaśāyā-
miti viśeṣaṇamasiddhivārakatvādvyartham |
maivam | anabhyāsadaśāpannajñānaprāmāṇyaṃ na svāśrayagrāhyam,
svāśraye satyapi taduttaratṛtīyakṣaṇavarttisaṃśayaviṣayatvāt, aprāmāṇya-
saṃśayājanyasaṃśayaviṣayatvādvā, aprāmāṇyavat, arthe niścite'pi
na niścayānantaratṛtīyakṣaṇe'rthasaṃśayo na vā prāmāṇyasaṃśayaṃ
vineti na vyabhicāra ityarthāt | na ca svapadasya prāmāṇyamātrapara-
tvāttadagrāhyatve bādhaḥ, svapadasya sambandhiśabdatvena samabhivyāhṛta-
paratvāt, anyathā parasyāpi svatvāt svasyāpi paratvāt svataḥ
parato veti saṃśayo na syāt | vistarastvanyatra ||
raghuº ṭīº | kiṃ teneti | vinā viparītaśaṅkānirāsaṃ
prāmāṇyajñānamātrasya niṣkampapravṛttyakṣamatvādityarthaḥ | ghaṭo jñāta
iti pratyakṣaṃ na jñānasya vaiśiṣṭyamavagāhate, nayanāderātmaguṇā-
grāhakatvāt, manasaśca bahirasvātantryāt, atīndriyatvācca jñānasya,
parantvatiriktāyā eva jñātatāyāḥ, sā ca viśeṣaṇaprakārikā
viśeṣyavṛttirayaṃ ghaṭatvena jñāta ityanubhavāt | janyate ca samāna-
prakārakeṇa svāśrayaviśeṣyakeṇa jñānena | tayā cānumīyamāne
jñāne1 pramātvameva siddhyati | tathā hi | iyaṃ jñātatā ghaṭaviśe-
ṣyakaghaṭatvaprakārakajñānajanyā, ghaṭaniṣṭhaghaṭatvaprakārakajñātatātvāt, yā
yanniṣṭhā yatprakārikā jñātatā sā tadviśeṣyakatatprakārakajñānajanyā,
yathā paṭaniṣṭhā paṭatvaprakārikā jñātatā paṭaviśeṣyakapaṭatvaprakāraka-
jñānajanyeti sāmānyato, viśeṣato vā yathā ghaṭāntare ghaṭatvaprakārikā
jñātateti, avagāhate cendriyasannikarṣādivaśāt prāthamikamiva
jñātatāvagāhyapi pratyakṣaṃ dharmiṇo viśeṣaṇavattām | ata eva cāyaṃ
ghaṭo ghaṭatvena jñāta ityanubhavaḥ | ata eva cāpramāpi prametyeva
jñānaṃ pramātvenaiva siddhyati 1 puº pāº |
gṛhyate doṣavaśāt prāthamikasyeva caramasyāpi pratyakṣasya dharmiṇyasa-
dviśeṣaṇavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhitvena liṅgabhramāditi bhāṭṭāḥ |
tadasat | atiriktāyāṃ jñātatāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt | ayaṃ
mayā jñāta iti kartturiva kriyāyā apyunayabalenaiva bhānasambhavāt,
anyathākhyātivādināmupanītabhānasyāvaśyakatvāt | ata evāyamiṣṭa
ityādiranubhavaḥ | na ca jñānamatīndriyaṃ, mānābhāvāt, ghaṭamicchā-
mītivadghaṭaṃ jānāmīti pratyakṣasya sarvānubhavasiddhatvādityanyatra
vistṛtam | sāmānyato vyāptiśca yattadarthayoranugatayorabhāvenāsambha-
vinī | viśeṣato vyāptiśca sādipadārthapramāyāṃ duravadhāraṇeti |
anuvyavasāyena vyavasāye gṛhyamāṇe tadupanītaṃ yathopasthitameva
viśeṣyaṃ viśeṣyatvena viśeṣaṇaṃ ca prakāratvena tatra viśeṣaṇībhūya
bhāsate, upasthite ca viśiṣṭe viśeṣaṇaparityāge hetvabhāvāt |
viśeṣyatvaprakāratvayośca pūrvānupasthitayoreva prakāratāyā ubhayavādi-
siddhatvāt | ata evemaṃ ghaṭatvena parvataṃ vahnimattvena jānāmī-
tyādiko'nubhavo lokānām | tathā ca tadvadeva ghaṭaṃ ghaṭatvena
jānāmītyanuvyavasāyādghaṭaviśeṣyakatvāvacchinnaṃ ghaṭatvaprakārakatvaṃ
prāmāṇyaṃ tena gṛhyata iti miśrāḥ |
atra vadanti | anabhyāsadaśāyāmanuvyavasāyānantaraṃ prāmāṇya-
sandehasya sarvānubhavasiddhatvādvinā ca prāmāṇyasandehaṃ niścite
sandehasya sarvathaivānupapattestaddharmaviśiṣṭaviśeṣyakatvāvacchedena tatpra-
kārakatvamanuvyavasāyena na gṛhyata ityeva (phalabalāt) kalpyate,
ananyagatikatvāt | gṛhyate ca viśeṣyatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭaviśeṣya-
katvāvacchedena viśeṣaṇaprakārakatvam | tenemaṃ ghaṭatvena jānāmī-
tyanubhavo na viruddhyate | pramuṣṭatattāṃśakasya ca smaraṇasya ghaṭaṃ
smarāmi ghaṭatvena vā smarāmītyādikonubhavo na tu ghaṭaṃ ghaṭatvene-
tyādikaḥ, tadviśeṣyakatvatatprakārakatvayoranupasthitayoḥ prakāratvā-
yogāt sambandhavidhayaivānuvyavasāye bhānam, tena tatprakārakaḥ
prāmāṇyasandeho na viruddhyate | koṭidvayasmārakaṃ ca ghaṭatvajñāna-
tvādisādhāraṇadharmadarśanamityapi kecit ||
tatrāpyanavastheti cet, na tāvadasau dṛṣṭāntadvārikā,
prāgeva tanniścayāt | phaladvārikā tu syādapi, yadi
prāmāṇyamavaśyaniśceyamabhyupeyate | ajñātaprāmāṇyena
kathaṃ paraprāmāṇyavedanamiti cet, yathā viṣayasaṃve-
danam | astu tarhi dharmiliṅgadvārikā, tābhyā-
maniścitābhyāmananumānāt tanniścayasya ca prāmāṇya-
niścayamantareṇānupapatteḥ | na | dvaitābhāvāt | yatra hi
liṅgajñāne dharmijñāne vā tathyātathyabhāvena dvaitamupa-
labhyate tatra tathyatvāniścaye liṅgamābhāsaśaṅkākrānta-
tayā na niścīyate, yatra tu tajjñānaṃ tadekaniyataṃ
tatra tāvataiva liṅganiścayaḥ, tadābhāsaśaṅkānutthānāt |
ekakoṭiniyato hyanubhavo niścayaḥ | jñānataddharmagrāhiṇi
ca jñāne na dvaitamiti vyavasthitireva | prāmāṇya-
niścayastu tasyāpi parata eveti nyāyasampradāyaḥ | ita
eva viśeṣāttādṛśasya svata eveti tātparyācāryāḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tatrāpīti | tajjātīyatvena liṅgena prāmāṇya-
grahe'pītyarthaḥ | na tāvaditi | dṛṣṭāntībhūtaṃ yatprāktanaṃ pṛthivītva-
prakārakaṃ jñānaṃ tasyāpīdānīmeva prāmāṇyaṃ grāhyamevaṃ tatra tatrā-
pītyanavasthā tāvanna bhavati, prāgeva tatprāmāṇyagrahādityarthaḥ | nanu
tajjātīyatvādinā liṅgena yā'numitiridānīmutpadyate sāpi
gṛhītaprāmāṇyā paraprāmāṇyaṃ niścāyayatyeva, sāpi sāpīti
phaladvārikā'navasthā syādityata āha | phaladvāriketi | prāmāṇya-
syāvaśyajñeyatvānabhyupagamādeva neyamanavasthetyarthaḥ | yatheti | na hi
gṛhītaprāmāṇyameva jñānamarthaniścāyakam, tathā sati prathamamartha-
niścayopi na syāditi bhāvaḥ | dharmīti | pakṣajñānaliṅga-
jñānadvāriketyarthaḥ | anavasthāmeva sphorayati | tābhyāmiti |
dvaitābhāvāditi | prāmāṇyānumitau dharmi tāvajjñānameva, tadviṣayaṃ
ca jñānamanuvyavasāyarūpaṃ, tatra ca dvaitaṃ prāmāṇyāprāmāṇyobhayarūpatvaṃ
tacca nāsti, anuvyavasāyasya prāmāṇyaikaniyatatvāttatrāprāmāṇya-
śaṅkānudayānna tatrāpi prāmāṇyagrahāpekṣetyarthaḥ | tarhi dharmijñānaṃ
liṅgajñānaṃ vā na kvāpi parīkṣyetetyata āha | yatra hīti |
tadekaniyatam prāmāṇyaikaniyatam | tāvataiva agṛhītaprāmāṇyajñāna-
mātreṇaiva | kuta etadityata āha | tadābhāseti | dvaitābhāvāditi
saṅgrahavyākhyānamupasaṃharati | ekakoṭīti | nanvevamanuvyavasāya-
prāmāṇye svatastvaṃ samāyātamityapasiddhānta ityata āha |
prāmāṇyeti | yadi vyasanitayā tatra prāmāṇyamanumīyate tadā
tatprāmāṇyamanumānādeva gṛhyate nyāyanaye prāmāṇyasya nityānu-
meyatvādityarthaḥ | nanvanumānasya nirastasamastavibhramāśaṅkasya svata
eva prāmāṇyamiti kathaṃ ṭīkā, kathaṃ vā tavāpi tatra tādṛśameva
vyākhyānamata āha | ita eveti | tatrāpi svataḥ prāmāṇya-
maprāmāṇyaśaṅkānāspadatvaṃ ṭīkākṛttātparyaviṣayo mamāpi tadabhi-
prāyakameva tatra tathā vyākhyānamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu yadi prāmāṇyaṃ parato jñāyeta tadā
prāmāṇyānumiterapi prāmāṇyaniścayārthaṃ tatprāmāṇyānumānapāra-
mparyāt phalamukhyanavasthā vyāptipakṣaliṅgajñāne svaviṣayaniścayārthaṃ
prāmāṇyānumānapāramparyācca kāraṇamukhī sā syādityata āha |
anavastheti | tatra vyāptiniścaye dṛṣṭāntadvārikāmanavasthāṃ nirā-
karoti | na tāvaditi | vyāptigrahaviṣayadṛṣṭāntajñānasya pūrvameva
dṛṣṭāntāntareṇa niścitaṃ prāmāṇyamanyathānumitireva na syādevaṃ tatra
tatrāpītyanāditaiva tatra parihāra ityarthaḥ | phaladvārikāṃ tāmapā-
karoti | phaleti | phalaṃ prāmāṇyānumitiḥ | agṛhīta-
prāmāṇyaiva prāmāṇyānumitiḥ svaviṣayaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ niścāyayatīti
na tatprāmāṇyānusaraṇamityarthaḥ | ajñāteti | anyathā vyavasāyopya-
gṛhītaprāmāṇya eva svaviṣayaṃ niścāyayati, kiṃ viṣayaniścayārthaṃ
prāmāṇyagraheṇeti bhāvaḥ | yatheti | yathā vyavasāyādagṛhīta-
prāmāṇyādapi viṣayaniścaya ityarthaḥ | na brūmo jñānaprāmāṇyā-
devārthaniścayaḥ, kintu yatrāprāmāṇyaśaṅkā nāsti karatalādijñāne,
tatra tata evārthaniścaye niṣkampapravṛttiḥ, yatra tu prāmāṇye
jñāne'prāmāṇyaśaṅkā tatra tatprāmāṇyaniścayādeva prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ, evaṃ
yāvadaprāmāṇyāśaṅkaṃ prāmāṇyānumitiḥ | na caivamanavasthā, carama-
prāmāṇyajñānasya jñānābhāve prāmāṇyasaṃśayānavaśyambhāvāditi tu
sāram | pakṣādimukhīṃ tāmutthāpayati | astviti | dvaiteti |
yatra viśeṣadarśanagranthopasthito'prāmāṇyaśaṅkāyā abhāvastatra vyavasāyā-
devārthaniścayaḥ, dharmijñāne sādhyavyāpyatayā'vadhṛtajñāne ca nāprāmāṇya-
śaṅketyarthaḥ | jñāneti | na hyajānanneva jānāmītyanuvyavasyati, na
vā sākṣātkāri jñānamanuminomītyanuvyavasyatītyanuvyavasāye śaṅkāyā
abhāvānna tatprāmāṇyānusaraṇamiti nānavasthetyarthaḥ | evamaprāmāṇya-
śaṅkāyā abhāvāttata eva yadyapi niṣkampā pravṛttistathāpi
prāmāṇyaṃ tatrānumānagamyameva, tasya nityānumeyatvādityata āha |
prāmāṇyeti | anumānasya nirastasamastavibhramāśaṅkasya svata eva
prāmāṇyamiti ṭīkāvirodhaṃ pariharati | ita eveti | dhūmavati
vahnijñānatvamanumiteḥ prāmāṇyaniyatamanuvyavasāyenopanītam | svato
viśeṣadarśanānna tatrāprāmāṇyaśaṅketi | prāmāṇyaniścayādivā-
'prāmāṇyaśaṅkāvirahārthaṃ niścitya niṣkampaḥ pravarttata ityabhi-
prāyastasyetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | prāgeveti | dṛṣṭānte ca kvaciddṛṣṭāntāntareṇa
kvacicca prakāravyāpyavadviśeṣyatvenopasthite jñāne manasaiva prāmāṇya
paricchidyate | aprāmāṇyamiva prakārābhāvavadvyāpyavadviśeṣyakatvenopa-
sthite vijñāna iti | yatheti | dharmiṇi viparītakodyanullekhi
vijñānaṃ niścayaḥ, sa cāprāmāṇyagrahānākrāntastatkāryamarjayati,
kvaciccāprāmāṇyaśaṅkotsārakatvena prāmāṇyaniścaya upayujyate, na tu
tena vinā tasya svaviṣayaniścayatvamevāpaiti, anyathā prāmāṇya-
niścayasyāpi tathātvārthaṃ prāmāṇyaniścayānusaraṇe'navasthāprasaṅgāditi
bhāvaḥ | dharmīti | dharmī pakṣaḥ | prāmāṇyaniścayamiti | aprāmāṇya-
śaṅkākalaṅkitatvāditi bhāvaḥ | śaṅkotpādāsambhavena nirākurute |
na dvaitābhāvāditi | jñānataddharmagrāhiṇi ca jñāna iti jāgara-
sākṣātkāramadhikṛtya | nanvevamanumānasya nirastasamastavibhramā-
śaṅkasya svata eva prāmāṇyamiti ṭīkāvirodha ityata āha | ita
eveti | viśeṣadarśanagrastatvenāprāmāṇyaśaṅkānudayātsvata eveti
tattātparyamityarthaḥ | viśeṣaśca vyāpyavati vyāpakajñānatvam, tacca
liṅgopahitalaiṅgikabhānādanuvyavasāyagamyamiti ||
syānmatam | etadeva tu kathaṃ niśceyaṃ yadevambhūtameka-
koṭiniyatameva yāvatā tatrāpyanavasthitiriti cenna |
vyāptijñānasya sākṣādātmanyapravṛttāvapi sarvopasaṃhāreṇa
yamupādhimādāya pravṛttistaddharmavattvāt tajjātīyatvaṃ
hi tatropādhistacca tatrāpyaviśiṣṭamanuvyavasāyatvāt |
na ca sāmānyato niyamaniścaye tadāliṅgite viśeṣe
dvaitaśaṅkāvakāśaḥ | yathā vācakaḥ śabda iti svātmano
vācakatvaṃ na sākṣādvidhatte vṛttivirodhāt, tathāpi
sāmānyena yamupādhimadhikṛtya pravṛttaḥ śabdastadvattvāt
śabdaśabdo vācako na veti śaṅkayā na paribhūyate
nāpyanavasthetyevamihāpīti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvanuvyavasāyaḥ prāmāṇyaikaniyata ityapi
niścayaḥ kathaṃ syāttatrāpyanumityapekṣāyāṃ punaranavasthaiveti śaṅkate |
syānmatamiti | yo yo'nuvyavasāyaḥ sa sarvaḥ pramāṇamevetyanu-
vyavasāyatvāvacchedena gṛhītā vyāptiḥ prakṛtā'nuvyavasāyasyāpyanu-
vyavasāyatvenaiva tajjātīyatvena liṅgenānuvyavasāyaprāmāṇyānumāna-
mityarthaḥ | nanvevaṃ sarvatrānuvyavasāye prāmāṇyānumitirāyātetyana-
vasthaiva punarityata āha | na ceti | atrāprāmāṇyaśaṅkaiva nodeti
yatra tvanumitīcchā tatrāyaṃ prakāra ityarthaḥ | atrānurūpamudā-
haraṇamāha | yathā ceti | śabdatvāvacchedenaiva vācakatvagrahe śabda-
śabdasyāpi vācakatvaṃ paricchidyata evātastatra yathā na śaṅkā
tathā prakṛte'pītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | vyāptijñānamukhīmanavasthāmutthāpayati |
syānmatamiti | sādhyaliṅgayorvyāptijñānaprāmāṇyānumitiparamparāyā-
manavasthetyarthaḥ | sākṣāditi | yadyapi vyāptijñānamasādhāraṇa-
tadvyaktitvādirūpapuraskāreṇa na svaviṣayam, tathāpi sādhāraṇa-
rūpapuraskāreṇa tathetyarthaḥ | tatrāpīti | vyāptijñānagrāhiṇi
jñāne'pyanuvyavasāyatvaṃ sādhāraṇamevetyarthaḥ | na ceti | yatsāmānye
yanniścayastadvati viśeṣe na tatsaṃśayaḥ, vyāpyatāvacchedakarūpavattayā
jñānasyaiva saṃśayapratibandhakatvādityarthaḥ | etadevānurūpadṛṣṭāntena
spaṣṭayati | yathā ceti ||
raghuº ṭīº | nanu dharmijñānādau kuto na prāmāṇyasaṃśayaḥ, kiṃ
sādhāraṇadharmavirahāduta viśeṣadarśanāt, nādyaḥ, jñānatvādereva
sattvāt, viśeṣaśca prāmāṇyaṃ tasya darśanaṃ cānumitiḥ, sā
ca pakṣādijñānasāpekṣā, tatrāpyaprāmāṇyaśaṅkānirāsastatprāmāṇyānu-
miterityevamanavastheti śaṅkate | syānmatamiti | na kevalaṃ koṭi-
niścaya eva viparītaśaṅkāpratibandhako'pi tu vyāptyādidarśanamapī-
tyāśayena nirākurute | na vyāptīti | sākṣāt viśiṣya |
ātmani viśeṣātmani | prakṛte anuvyavasāyadharmijñānādau |
taddharmavattvāt pravṛttiriti yāvat | anuvyavasāyatveti | dharmi-
jñānatvavyāpyavadviśeṣyaka-vyāpaka-jñānatvayorapyupalakṣakam | sāmānyataḥ
prāmāṇyaniścayepi viśeṣataḥ kathaṃ na tatsaṃśaya ityata āha | na
ceti | yathā dhūmatvāvacchedena vahnivyāpyatvaniścaye'yaṃ dhūmo vahni-
vyāpyo na veti yathā vā karacaraṇādikaṃ sthāṇutvābhāvavyāpyamiti
niścaye'yaṃ karacaraṇādimāniti grahe'yaṃ sthāṇurna veti na saṃśaya
iti | vistṛtaṃ cedamanyatra | vācakaḥ śaktaḥ śabdo'rthapratyāyakaḥ ||
tarkāścātra bhavanti | yadi dharmijñānaṃ vyabhicaret,
nirālambanamasadālambanaṃ vā bhavet, niṣiddhaṃ ca tat |
yadyanuvyavasāyo vyabhicaret, tadārthakarmakopi na
syāt, jñānetarasyārthaprāvaṇyābhāvāt | yadi tajjātīyaṃ
vyabhicaret avyabhicāro na kvacidvyavatiṣṭheta | tadavyava-
sthitau vyabhicāropi na syāt, anyathākhyātirūpatvā-
ttasya, tattvasthitau cānyathātvaṃ syāt, tadavadhikatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | atreti | dharmijñānaṃ pramāṇameva, anuvyavasāyaḥ
pramāṇameva, lakṣaṇavallakṣyajñānamavyabhicāryevetyādau | prathamavyāptau
tarkamāha | yadīti | dvitīyavyāptāvāha | yadyanuvyavasāya iti |
vyabhicaret vyavasāyamantareṇa syādevetyarthaḥ | arthakarmako na bhave-
diti | arthaṃ bāhyaṃ karmatayā nollikhet, vyavasāyamantareṇa manasa-
statrāsāmarthyāt | etadevāha | jñānetarasyeti | arthapravaṇaṃ jñānaṃ
viṣayīkurvata eva tasyārthakarmatvopapatteḥ | tṛtīyavyāptāvāha |
yadi tajjātīpamiti | tadavadhitvāditi | tattvasāpekṣatvādanya-
thātvasyetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tarkāścātreti | idaṃ jñānaṃ yadi viśeṣyāvṛttya-
prakārakaṃ na syādajñānaṃ viśeṣyāvṛttiprakārakaṃ vā syāt, anuvyava-
sāyo yadi vyabhicaret jñānaviṣayakaḥ sākṣātkāro (vā) na syāt,
anarthapravaṇasyārthapravaṇatayā sākṣātkārāsambhavāt, sāmagrīvirodhāt,
gandhavati pṛthivījñānatvaṃ yadi gandhaviṣayavṛtti na syāt, jñānavṛtti
na syāditi krameṇāpādanārthaḥ | tadavyavasthitāviti | pṛthivī-
jñānatvaṃ yadyavyabhicārivṛtti na syāt jñānamātranirūpitaviṣayatve
sati vyabhicārivṛtti na syādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vyabhicaret sadviṣayakaṃ na syāt | nirālambana-
miti svamatena | asadālambanamiti bauddhanayena | atrāpādake
jñānatve satīti draṣṭavyam | anyataratvenāpādyatā ityapi kaścit |
vyabhicaret jñānaviṣayako na syāt | arthakarmakaḥ arthapravaṇakarmakaḥ |
icchāderapyarthapravaṇatvamate tu icchādyaviṣayatvenāpādakaṃ viśeṣaṇīyam |
tajjātīyaṃ vyāpyavati vyāpakajñānam | gandhavati pṛthivītvaprakārakaṃ
jñānaṃ yadi pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivītvaprakārakaṃ na syāt gandhavati
pṛthivītvaprakārakaṃ na syāt yadi pṛthivīmātraviśeṣyakaṃ na syāt
gandhavanmātraviśeṣyakaṃ na syāt yadi pṛthivīmātraviśeṣyakaṃ na syāt
gandhavadviśeṣyakaṃ na syādityādi | pṛthivītvavyāpyavadviśeṣyakasyāpi
pṛthivyaviśeṣyakatve pṛthivīpramāmātravilope pṛthivyasiddhyā pṛthivī-
bhinnāsiddhau pṛthivībhinne pṛthivītvaprakārakatvamaprāmāṇyamapi na
siddhyet | evamanyatrāpīti ||
etena svapnajāgarāvasthayoraviśeṣa iti nirastam |
asatkhyāterātmakhyāteśca 1nirākṛtatvāt, anyathā-
khyāteśca tattvakhyātivyavasthāmantareṇānupapatteriti | sā
ca jāgarepi yadi na syāt, na syādeveti |
pratiṣedhāt iti 1 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | eteneti | tathyātathyavibhāgavyavasthāpane-
netyarthaḥ | yadvā bhramasyānyathākhyātitvavyavasthāpanenetyarthaḥ | tathā ca
jāgarajñānaṃ na pramā jñānatvāt svapnajñānavadityādīnāmanavakāśa
iti bhāvaḥ | svapnajñānānāmaprāmāṇyamanyathākhyātirūpatayaiva vācyam |
sā ca tattvakhyātipūrvikaiva, tattvakhyātiśca jāgarāvasthajñānaviśeṣa
evetyāha | asatkhyāteriti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | jāgarajñānamapramā jñānatvādityapramāsādhakaṃ
pramātvopasthitau na sambhavatītyāha | eteneti ||
raghuº ṭīº | jāgarapratyayo bhrāntaḥ, pratyayatvāt, svapna-
pratyayavaditi mataṃ nirasyati | eteneti | yatkiñcijjāgara-
pratyayasya bhrāntatve sādhye siddhasādhanam, yāvatāṃ tathātve caitadanu-
mitiprāmāṇyāprāmāṇyābhyāṃ vyāghāta iti ||
tathāpi kathamanayoravasthayorvibhāgaḥ karttavya iti
cenna | lokasiddhatvāt | kimanayorlakṣaṇamiti cet,
kartṛkarmakaraṇadeśakālaprabandhabādhaḥ kākatālīyasamvāda-
vān svapnasya, prabandhe kākatālīyaḥ kasyacideva
viṣayasya bādho jāgarasyeti | etena bādhyaprabandho-
'vasthāviśeṣaḥ svapnaḥ prabandhabādhakādirvādhyamāna-
prabandhānto jāgaritamityapi draṣṭavyamityeṣā dik |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | bhavedevaṃ yadi lakṣaṇabhedo'nayoravasthayoḥ
syādityata āha | tathāpīti | nanu lokasyāpi bhedavyavasthiti-
rlakṣaṇādhīnetyāha | kimiti | ahaṃ dhavalagṛhe madhyāhne hastena
pāyasaṃ bhuñja ityatra kartrādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ bādhaḥ | nanu sarvabādhe
kathaṃ jñānaṃ nirālambanaṃ kathaṃ vā'nyathākhyātiḥ kutra vā''ropaḥ
kathaṃ vā jāgarānantaramapi kvacidapi samvāda ityata āha |
kākatālīyeti | anyathānupapattyaivāropaviṣayāṇāmantato bahi-
rarthādīnāṃ mandataratamādibhāvena śabdādyupalambhāditi bhāvaḥ |
svapnasyeti | lakṣaṇamityanuvarttanīyam | evaṃ jāgarasyetyatrāpi |
eteneti | lakṣaṇāntareṇa vibhāgavyavasthāpanenetyarthaḥ | avasthā-
viśeṣa iti | siddhopaplutāntaḥkaraṇāvasthāviśeṣaḥ, tathā svapna-
vahanāḍīviśeṣasaṃyogajaṃ jñānaṃ svapnaḥ | taditarajñānaṃ jāgaraḥ |
svapnatvajāgaratve jātiviśeṣau vā | na cānumititvādinā parā-
parabhāvānupapattiḥ, sarvasvapnānāṃ sākṣātkā(rya)risvabhāvarūpatvāt |
ata eva na smṛtitvasāṅkaryamapīti bhāvaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bādhyaḥ prabandho yasyetyarthaḥ | prabandhasya
svapnasyaiva yadvādhakaṃ tadādau yasya, bādhyaḥ prabandhaḥ svapna evānte
yasya tattathetyarthaḥ | yadyapyetadyathāśrutamavyāpakamativyāpakaṃ ca,
tathāpi svapnavahanāḍīsaṃyogajaṃ jñānaṃ svapnaḥ, tadanyajñānaṃ jāgaraḥ |
jātiviśeṣo vā | na cānumititvena parāparabhāvānupapattiḥ,
svapne'numityasiddheḥ, nidrāsahakāriṇā manasā sarvatra viṣaye
sākṣātkāritvasyaivotpādāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | lokaprasiddhasyāpi vinā lakṣaṇaṃ vibhāgo'-
1nupapanna ityāśayena pṛcchati | kimiti | svapnavahanāḍīmanaḥ-
saṃyogajanyaṃ tannāḍīsaṃyuktamanojanyaṃ vā jñānaṃ svapnaḥ | svapnavahatvaṃ
tu nāḍīgato jātiviśeṣaḥ | svapnatvaṃ mānasatvavyāpyo jātiviśeṣo
vinaiva ca smaraṇamadṛṣṭodbuddhasaṃskārasahitānmanasastādṛśaṃ jñāna-
mutpadyate | cākṣuṣatvādivadanumititvādikamapi saṃskāravaśāttatrā-
ropyata ityanye | svapnabhinnaṃ jñānaṃ jāgara iti ||
tasmāttathyameva viśvaṃ, mandaprayojanatvāttu satvarai-
rmumukṣubhirupekṣitamiti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ | tarhi
naiyāyikānāṃ jagatparirakṣaṇe koyamabhiniveśātiśaya
iti cet, sahasaiva tadupekṣāyāṃ nyāyābhāsāvakāśe
2pramāṇamātraviplavo bhavet, tathā ca nyāyaruciḥ
prekṣāvānna tattvamadhigacchediti bhiyeti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | prakṛtamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi | tarhi
vedāntināṃ prapañcamithyātvapravādaḥ kinnibandhana ityata āha |
'śakya iti 2 puº pāº |
nyāyamārgaviplavo iti 1 puº pāº |
mandaprayojanatvāditi | upaniṣadabhyāsajanitātmasākṣātkārā
vedāntino mokṣāya tvaramāṇāḥ prapañcavicāre prayojanābhāva-
mākalayantastatrodāsata ityarthaḥ | tarhi naiyāyikā api mumukṣava-
steṣāṃ kathamatrāgraha ityata āha | tarhīti | śravaṇānantaraṃ
yanmananaṃ tatrānvīkṣikīpravṛttistatra manane hetudṛṣṭāntapakṣavyāptyādi-
jñānaṃ pramārūpaṃ prayojakaṃ, pramā ca yathārthānubhavarūpeti prapañcasatyatve
paraṃ tadupapadyata iti tadartho'bhiniveśa ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | prakṛtamupasaṃharati | tasmāditi | samprati
loko'loko yajño'yajña ityādi śrutivirodhaṃ pariharati |
mandeti | utpannatattvasākṣātkārasya lokopajīvanamaphalamiti
śrutestātparyamityarthaḥ | nanvevaṃ tattvasākṣātkārāt prāk kimarthaṃ
tasya lokopajīvanamityata āha | tarhīti | lokasiddhaprāmāṇya-
nyāyenātmani mananācchaṅkākalaṅkāpagamāt dhyānādau bahvāyāsa-
sādhye pravṛttiriti tataḥ prāk tadupajīvanamityāha | sahasaiveti ||
|| iti bāhyārthabhaṅgavādaḥ ||
guṇaguṇibhedabhaṅgavādaprārambhaḥ |
astu tarhi guṇaguṇinorabhedānnairātmyam, kṣaṇika-
jñānamātrapariśeṣāditi cet, ucyate | asti tāva-
diha darśanasparśanābhyāmekārthānusandhānam | tadida-
mekaikaviṣayaṃ vā syāt, samudāyaviṣayaṃ vā, tadati-
riktaviṣayaṃ vā, vastvananurodhyākāraviṣayaṃ vā, alīka-
viṣayaṃ vā |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ātmani tṛtīyaṃ bādhakaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati |
astu tarhīti | jñānabhinna ātmā nāstītyeva hi nairātmyapakṣaḥ,
sa ca jñānātmanorabhedādeva paryavasanna ityarthaḥ | ātmā jñānā-
bhinnaḥ, tadaviṣayakapratītyaviṣayatvāt, jñānaṃ vā ātmābhinnaṃ, tada-
viṣayakapratītyaviṣayatvāditi viśeṣato guṇinaṃ pakṣayitvā guṇābhedo
guṇaṃ vā pakṣayitvā guṇyabhedasādhanaṃ vā sāmānyata eva veti | guṇa-
bhinnaṃ guṇinaṃ sādhayitumupakramate | astīti | yamahamadrākṣaṃ tamahaṃ
spṛśāmi yaṃ vā'spārkṣaṃ taṃ paśyāmītyeka evārtha indriyābhyāṃ gṛhyate,
tena guṇabhinna eva guṇī siddhyatītyarthaḥ | pratisandhānasyānyathā-
siddhimāśaṅkya nirākaroti | tadidamiti | ekaikaviṣayamiti |
rūpamātraviṣayaṃ sparśamātraviṣayaṃ vetyarthaḥ | samudāyeti | rūpasparśa-
samudāyaviṣayamityarthaḥ | tadatirikteti | avayaviviṣayaṃ vetyarthaḥ |
ākāreti | jñānākāra eva tathollikhyata ityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tṛtīyamātmani bādhakaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati |
astviti | nairātmyaṃ jñānabhinnātmābhāvaḥ | guṇitvenābhimataṃ na
tadguṇabhinnaṃ, tadaviṣayakajñānāviṣayatvāt, tadguṇavat, yadvā tadguṇa-
stadguṇyabhinnaḥ, tadguṇatvāditi vyatirekī, tathā cāśuvināśi-
jñānamate nātmeti siddham | kṣaṇikapadaṃ dvitrikṣaṇāvasthāyiparam |
vijñānamātretyanena na vijñānavādābhyupagamaḥ, rūpādyabhinnaghaṭāde-
rbāhyatvasyābhyupagamāt, tathā ca śuklaḥ paṭa iti sāmānādhikaraṇya-
dhīrapi saṅgacchate | atra pratyakṣabādhamāha | astīti | yamaha-
madrākṣaṃ tamahaṃ spṛśāmītyevaṃrūpam | tadidamiti | rūpamātrasparśa-
mātraviṣayamityarthaḥ | samudāyo rūpasparśayoḥ | vastvananurodhī
jñānākāraḥ śaśaśṛṅgajñānasyeva ||
raghuº ṭīº | tṛtīyamātmani bādhakaṃ nirākarttumupanyasyati |
astu tarhīti | guṇaguṇinorabhedāt guṇātiriktasya guṇino-
'bhāvāt | nairātmyaṃ jñānātiriktātmavyatirekaḥ | astu tarhi nityaṃ
vijñānamevātmetyata āha | kṣaṇiketi | svasamvedanasamviditebhyaḥ
kṣaṇikanīlādivijñānebhyo'tirikte nitye jñāne mānābhāvāditi
bhāvaḥ | ekārthānusandhānaṃ ekārthagrahaṇam, yamadrākṣaṃ taṃ spṛśāmī-
tyanubhavabalāt | tadidaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ spārśanaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ rūpamātraviṣayaṃ
sparśamātraviṣayaṃ vā | samudāyo rūpasparśayoḥ ||
na tāvadadyaḥ, na hi yadeva rūpaṃ sa eva sparśa iti | na
ca rūpaṃ tvagindriyagrāhyam, andhasyāpi nīlādipratyaya-
prasaṅgāt | na caikameva vastu karaṇabhedenānyathā prathata
iti yuktam, anātmakatvaprasaṅgāt, bhedābhedavyavasthā-
nupapatteśca |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | rūpamātraviṣayatve doṣamāha | na hīti |
sparśamātraviṣayatve tu tadvaiparītyenāpādanam | doṣāntaramāha | na
ceti | rūpasya tvagindriyagrāhyatve doṣamāha | andhasyeti | nanu
rūpameva tvacā sparśatvena gṛhyata ityata āha | na ceti | indriya-
bhedena janite jñāne prakārabhedānupalabdheḥ rūpatvasparśatve jātī paraṃ
bhinnendriyavedye na tu jātimadapi tatheti yadi tadā tadvastu na
rūpaṃ syānna vā sparśaḥ syāt, viruddhatvāt ityāha | anātmakatveti |
bhedābhedeti | abhinnasyaiva karaṇabhedena vibhinnaprakārakaprathāsambhavā-
dityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu rūpasparśayorabhedepi rūpasparśatve jātī
bhinne, tatra rūpatvena tadgrahaścākṣuṣaḥ, sparśatvena tu spārśana ityāśaṅkya
nirākaroti | na caikameveti | anātmakatveti | vyaktiyogya-
tayaiva jāteryogyatvādekendriyagrāhyatve rūpasparśayo rūpatvasparśatvayorapi
tathātvaprasaṅgānna rūpasparśātmakamityarthaḥ | nanu tathāpyekameva vastu
rūpāśrayatvena cakṣuṣā sparśāśrayatvena tvacopalabhyetetyabhyupagamaḥ | na ca
tadrūpamaviruddham, rūpatvādikaṃ tu viruddhamiti vācyam | rūpatva-
sparśatvayoravirodhāt, pratīteravirodhāt | na caivamandhopi nīlā-
dikamupalabheta, nīlatvādivyāvṛttiviśeṣājñānenāndhatvasambhavāt, na
hi nīlameva nīlatvam |
atrāhuḥ | anyūnānatiriktapratiyogitvena vyāvṛttyorna bhedaḥ
syāt | nīlapṛthivīśabdayoścaivaṃ paryāyatāpattiḥ, tathā satyanyatara-
padaśravaṇenānyatarapadasandeho na syāt, pṛthivyabhinnajātīyasya kathaṃ
toyatejasorabhedaḥ syāt | kiñca viruddhadharmādhyāsepyabhede
bhedocchedaḥ syādityāha | bhedeti ||
raghuº ṭīº | rūpasparśayorbhedāccākṣuṣe cetasi sparśasya spārśane
ca rūpasya bhānānupapattirityāha | na hīti | atha cakṣuṣā tvacā
rūpaṃ sparśo vā gṛhyatāmityata āha | na hi rūpaṃ sparśo vā
tvagindriyagrāhyamiti | andhasyāpīti | purovarttini śuklatvādi-
vaduṣṇatvāderapi grahaṇaprasaṅgādityapi draṣṭavyam | ekameva vastu
nayanena rūpatvena tvacā ca sparśatvena gṛhyata iti ca na yuktam,
viruddhayorekatra vṛttyasambhavāt, ekataravattāyāṃ ca niyāmakābhāvā-
dvastuna ubhayarūpaśūnyatvaprasaṅgāt, viruddhayoścaikatra vṛttau dharmiṇo bheda-
prasaṅgāt, tathāpi cābhede bhedamātrocchede bhedābhedavyavasthā'nupapatti-
rityāha | na caikamevetyādinā | atha rūpatvasparśatve ekatraiva varttete
virodhe mānābhāvāt | na caivamekataragrahe'nyataragrahāpattiḥ, jāte-
ryogyavyaktivṛttitvenaiva yogyatvāditi vācyam | bhavatāṃ rūpādī-
nāmivāsmākaṃ rūpatvādīnāṃ svayogyatayaiva vedanena pratiniyatendriya-
vedyatvopapatteriti cet, tadidamāntarālikaguṇakhaṇḍanam, dravyasya
ghaṭāderupalambhāt | na caitadapi, pavanamaṇiprabhādau mitho vyabhi-
cāriṇoḥ sparśatvarūpatvayoḥ pṛthivyādau saṅkaraprasaṅgāt, prabhāyāṃ sparśatvasya
yogyānupalambhabādhitatvāt | evaṃ nīlatvaghaṭatvādīnāṃ saṅkaraprasaṅgo-
nusandheyaḥ | api ca ghaṭe pākena śyāmasya nāśe raktasya cotpādo
dṛśyate, na ca tau jātyoreva, kālāntarepi tayorupalambhāt | nāpi
ghaṭasya, sa evāyaṃ ghaṭa iti pratyabhijñānāt | avacchedabhedena ca
bhāvābhāvayorekatra vṛtteḥ vyavasthāpitatvāt, pūrvaṃ ghaṭamadrākṣamidānīṃ
spṛśāmītyanubhavāt sparśo na rūpaṃ rūpaṃ na sparśa ityabādhitā-
nubhavācceti ||
nāpi dvitīyaḥ, sa hi ekadeśatayā vā ekakāla-
tayā vā ekakāryatayā vā ekakāraṇatayā veti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | sa hīti | rūpasparśayoḥ samudāya ityarthaḥ |
atra sarvatra bahuvrīhiḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | yadyapi samudāyasya samudāyighaṭitamūrttika-
tvāt samudāyinośca rūpasparśayorekendriyāvedyatvādanusandhānāsambhava-
stadavastha eva, tathāpi prakṛte samudāya eva na sambhavatīti prati-
pādayati | nāpītyādinā | saḥ samudāyaḥ | eketyādau catuṣke
bahuvrīhiḥ | ekadeśatvādiviśiṣṭau rūpasparśau samudāya ityarthaḥ ||
na tāvadupādānarūpaikadeśasambhavaḥ, tayoḥ prati-
niyatopādānatvāt, sambhave vā tadeva dravyamiti
paryavasitaṃ vivādena | nāpyadhikaraṇībhūtabhūtalādyā-
dhāratayā tatsambhavaḥ, cakṣuṣā hyupalabhyamāne bhūtale
rūpaviśeṣe ghaṭopi cakṣuṣaivopalabhyamāno rūpaviśeṣa-
stadādhāra iti śakyate niścetum, tayoradharottarabhāve-
naikajñānasaṃsargitvāt, tadadhikaraṇāḥ sparśādayopīti
tu kasya pramāṇasya viṣayaḥ | na hi sparśādayaścākṣuṣe
cetasi cakāsati | tvaco'yaṃ vyāpāra ityapi nāsti,
tayāpi bhūtalaghaṭasparśayorādhārādheyabhāvapratīteḥ, na ca
samudāyayostatsambhavaḥ, parasparāśrayatvaprasaṅgāt, ekā-
dhāratāyāṃ hi samudāyānusandhānaṃ samudāyānusandhāne
caikādhāratānusandhānasambhava iti | anavasthāprasaṅgācca,
bhūtalasyāpi samudāyatvaṃ kiṅkṛtamityanuyogānivṛtteḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ādyaṃ dūṣayati | na tāvaditi | tvanmate
rūpasyaiva rūpopādānatvādityarthaḥ | sambhava iti | rūpasparśayorya-
dekamupādānaṃ sa eva guṇītyarthaḥ | bhūtale rūpātmake ghaṭasya rūpā-
tmakasyādhārādheyabhāvaḥ paraṃ gṛhyate na tu sparśarūpayorapīti naika-
deśatā, tvacāpi sparśayorevādhārādheyabhāvo gṛhyate na rūpasparśayo-
rityāha | cakṣuṣā hīti | nanu rūpādisamudāye bhūtale rūpādi-
samudāyo ghaṭa upalabhyata eveti kathaṃ nādhārādheyabhāva ityata
āha | na ceti | rūparasādīnāmekādhāratānusandhānādhīnaṃ
samudāyānusandhānaṃ cet tadā'nyonyāśraya ityarthaḥ | anavastheti |
bhūtalasyāpi samudāyatvamekādhāratayaiva syādevaṃ tatra tatrāpītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | tayoriti | rūpasparśayostvanmate rūpasparśo-
pādānakatvādityarthaḥ | tatsambhavaḥ ekadeśatāsambhavaḥ | cakṣuṣā
hīti | tvakcakṣuṣorekaviṣayatayā rūpasparśayorekādhikaraṇatvenā-
grahāt, na hyādheyāgrahe adhikaraṇatvena grahasambhava ityarthaḥ |
samudāyayoriti | bhūtalātmakarūpasparśasamudāyaghaṭātmakarūpasparśa-
samudāyayorityarthaḥ | paraspareti | rūpasparśayoḥ samudāyatvamekā-
dhāratvena syāt, tenaiva caikādhāratetyarthaḥ | tayoriti | ekene-
ndriyeṇobhayājñānādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | tayoḥ rūpasparśayoḥ | tanmate rūpasya rūpameva
sparśasya sparśa evopādānam | bhinnakālayordeśadeśibhāvāsambhavopi
draṣṭavyaḥ | tadadhikaraṇāḥ rūpātmakabhūtalādhikaraṇāḥ | sparśādaya
ityādipadaṃ gandhādisamudāyo ghaṭādiritimatānusāreṇa | bhūtala-
ghaṭasparśayoḥ sparśātmakabhūtalaghaṭayoḥ | samudāyayoriti | eko
rūpasparśasamudāya ādhāro'nyaścādheya iti | paraspareti | rūpa-
sparśayostanmate vāstavasyaikadeśavṛttitvasyāsambhavādvaijñānikaṃ tadvācyam,
tathā caikadeśavṛttitāyāṃ jñātāyāṃ samudāyapratisandhānaṃ pratisaṃhite
ca samudāye ekadeśavṛttitvajñānamityarthaḥ | samudāyasyādhāratve
doṣāntaramāha | anavastheti | yadvā ādhārasya samudāyasya
samudāyatvamekasamudāyāśrayatayā ekasamudāyavṛttitayā vā, ādye
parasparāśrayo dvitīye'navasthetyāha | parasparetyādi ||
ata eva naikakālatayāpi, tayorekakālatāyāṃ
pramāṇābhāvāt, bhāve vā rāsabhakarabhayorapyekakāla-
tayā samudāyatvaprasaṅgaḥ, bhedāgrahasya prakṛtepyasambhavāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ata eveti | samudāyamityanuvṛttena sambandhaḥ |
rūparasādīnāmekendriyagrāhyatvādevetyarthaḥ | pramāṇābhāvamuktvā'ti-
prasaṅgamāha | bhāve veti | nanu rāsabhakarabhayorekakālatāyāmapi
bhedagrahādeva na samudāyavyavahāra ityata āha | bhedeti | rūpa-
rasādīnāmapi bhedenaiva grahādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | bhāve veti | tathā ca ya eva rāsabhaḥ sa
eva karabha iti pratisandhānaṃ syādityarthaḥ | na ca samudāyatvepi
bhedagrahāttatra na pratisandhānamityāha | bhedeti | rūpasparśayorapi
bhedāgrahādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | satyapi samudāyatve bhedagrahāt karabharāsabhayorna
pratisandhānaṃ tatrāha | bhedāgrahasyetyādi | rūpasparśayorapi bheda-
grahādityarthaḥ ||
ata eva naikakāryatayāpi, upādeyarūpasyaikakārya-
syābhāvāt | ekodakāharaṇalakṣaṇārthakriyetyādyapi na
yuktam, rūpādyatiriktasyodakasyānabhyupagamāt, ekaika-
syānekāhāryatve pramāṇābhāvāt, samudāyasya cāsiddheḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ata eveti | rūparasādīnāmekasya kāryasyā-
nanubhavādityarthaḥ | upādeyeti | na hi rūpādibhirekaṃ kārya-
mupādīyata iti tava mama vā'bhyupagama ityarthaḥ | nanu rūpādibhi-
rekaṃ kāryaṃ nopādīyate, tathāpi nimittamudakāharaṇāderbhavantye-
vetyata āha | eketi | udakamapi tvanmate rūpādyevetyarthaḥ | nanu
tathāpi rūpādyātmakameva tat sarveṣāṃ kāryaṃ syādityata āha |
ekaikasyeti | rūpajanye sparśajanyatāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt | tathāpi
rūpādisamudāyajanyameva tajjalāharaṇamata āha | samudāyasyeti |
tadarthamevaikakāryatvasyānusaraṇāt tatra ca pramāṇābhāvādityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | rūpādyekaikātmakamudakaṃ nānekarūpādyāhāryaṃ
mānābhāvāt, samudāyābhāvācca na samudāyasya samudāyāhāryatva-
mityāha | ekaikasyeti ||
ata eva naikakāraṇatayāpīti | nimittamantareṇa
tu samudāyavyavahāre'tiprasaṅgaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ata eveti | caturṇāṃ rūpādīnāmekaṃ kāraṇa-
matra pramāṇābhāvādityarthaḥ | atiprasaṅga iti | bhinnakālabhinna-
deśānāmapi samudāyavyavahāraḥ syādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nimittamiti | ekamupādhimityarthaḥ || tṛtīye na vivādaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tṛtīye tviti | pratisandhānasya rūpādyati-
riktavastuviṣayatva ityarthaḥ ||
nāpi caturthaḥ, sa hi vijñānanayamāśritya vā syāt
dvicandrādivadvisamvādādvā |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vastvananurodhyākāraviṣayatveti dūṣayati |
nāpīti | sa hīti || ādye tu rūpādiṣu kaḥ pakṣapātaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | yadi vijñānavādamāśrityocyate tadā rūpā-
dīnāmapi viplava evetyāha | ādya iti ||
prāpterarthakriyāsthiteśca na dvitīyopi | te dve
rūpādīnāmiti cet, na teṣām, kintu tasyaiveti kiṃ
na syāt | bādhakāditi cet, na tāvatkramayaugapadya-
virodho raktāraktavirodho vā bādhakaṃ, niṣiddhatvāt,
kṣaṇikaparamāṇurūpadravyeṇākrānteśca | sambandhābhāva iti
cet, asambandhastāvadastu | kathaṃ tadvat pratīyata iti
cet, teṣāṃ tathotpādāditi parihāro'stu tavaiva yathā
śarīraṃ cetanāvaditi | rūpādibhireva samastārtha-
kriyāsiddheḥ kiṃ tadatiriktadravyakalpanayeti cenna |
tāvanmātreṇaiva samastārthakriyāsiddheḥ kiṃ rūpādikalpa-
nayetyasyāpi vācāṭavacaso'vakāśaprasaṅgāt | pratīya-
mānatvāditi cet, tulyam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvekaṃ sthūlamityavayavigocaraṃ jñānam, tacca
dvicandrādijñānavadvisamvādīti nāvayavini pramāṇamityata āha |
prāpteriti | atrānyathāsiddhimāha | te dve iti | prāptyarthakriye
ityarthaḥ | atra vinigamanāvirahaṃ tāvadāha | na teṣāmiti |
tasyaiveti | avayavina ityarthaḥ | bādhakāditi | yadi guṇī
sthiraḥ syānna krameṇa kuryānna vā yugapat, yadi cāvayavī paṭādiḥ
syāttadā raktāraktavirodhaḥ syāditi guṇini bādhakamityarthaḥ |
etaddvayabādhakaṃ pūrvameva parihṛtamityāha | niṣiddhatvāditi |
kiñca kṣaṇike paramāṇurūpe ca guṇini naitaddvayaṃ bādhakamityāha |
kṣaṇiketi | sambandhābhāva iti | guṇini bādhakamityanuṣañja-
nīyam | guṇasamavāyāddhi guṇī bhavet, sa eva tu nāstītyarthaḥ |
sambandhābhāve rūpaviśiṣṭapratītiḥ kathamityāha | kathamiti |
teṣāmiti | rūpādīnāṃ tathaivotpādāt sambandhaṃ vinaiva viśiṣṭa-
buddhijanakatvenotpādādityarthaḥ | tavaiveti | jñānacaitanikasyetyarthaḥ |
rūpādīnāmubhayasiddhatvāllabdhaḥ klṛptaparigraha iti kiṃ guṇinetyāha |
rūpādibhireveti | nanu rūpādyanabhyupagame tavāpasiddhānta ityata
āha | vācāṭeti | pratīyamānatvāditi | rūpādyabhyupagama iti
śeṣaḥ | pratītirdravye'pi tulyetyāha | tulyamiti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | te dve iti | prāptyarthakriye ityarthaḥ | tasyaiva
guṇina ityarthaḥ | kṣaṇiketi | uktabādhakayoḥ sthairyāvayavinoreva
sambhavānna tu guṇabhinne guṇinītyarthaḥ | sambandhābhāvo bādhaka-
mityarthaḥ | atiriktasambandhe bādhakādityarthaḥ | kathamiti |
rūpādibhirasambandhe rūpādimattayā jñāyetetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | (te dve prāptyarthakriye |) kramayaugapadyavirodhasya
sthire raktatvāraktatvādivirodhasya cāvayavini bādhakatvaṃ sambhāvyeta,
na tu kṣaṇike paramāṇau rūpādimatītyāha | kṣaṇiketi | sambandhā-
bhāva iti | bādhakamityanuṣajyate || etenālīkaviṣayatāpi nirastā |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | eteneti | rūpādīnāmapyalīkatvaprasaṅgenetyarthaḥ ||
abhedasādhanaṃ bādhakamiti cet, kiṃ tat | sahopa-
lambhaniyama iti cenna | samasahopalambhaniyamasyā-
siddheḥ, pītaśaṅkhopalambhādau śvaityānupalambhepi śaṅkhopa-
lambhāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | guṇī guṇābhinnaḥ sahopalambhaniyamāditi
bādhakaṃ śaṅkate | abhedeti | samasahopalambhasyeti | parasparā-
viṣayakapratītyaviṣayatvasyeti | vyabhicāramāha | pīteti | śvaityā-
viṣayakapratītyaviṣayatvasya śaṅkhe'siddherityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | saheti | parasparāviṣayakapratītyaviṣayatvāt
guṇaguṇinorabhedaḥ sādhya ityarthaḥ | sameti | tathātve vā śvaitya-
śaṅkhayorabhedo na syādityarthaḥ | śvaityānupalambha iti | nanu rūpā-
viṣayapratītyaviṣayatvāditi hetuḥ kṛtaḥ, na cāsyā'siddhiḥ, na hi
tadīyarūpaviśeṣāgrahe satyagraho hetuḥ, kintu yatkiñcidrūpāgrahe, sa ca
siddha eva | kiñca śaṅkharūpavṛttirūpatvavyāpyajātistatra na gṛhyate,
na tu rūpamapi, tathā copakrānto guṇaguṇinorabhedaḥ siddha eva |
atrāhuḥ | asiddhipadena nātra svarūpāsiddhirabhimatā, kintu
sandigdhāsiddhiḥ, hetoranyathopapatteḥ | yadvā pītaḥ śaṅkha ityatra
śaṅkhe pītaguṇavattā jñāpyate, doṣavaśācchaṅkharūpaṃ na bhāsata eva,
pītaguṇāropeṇaivopapattau bhramāntarakalpanāyāṃ mānābhāvāt,
kadācidevaṃvidhopi bhramaḥ sambhavatīti tatparo'yaṃ granthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | śaṅkate | abhedasādhanaṃ guṇaguṇinorbhede bādhaka-
miti | yadyapi rūpāgrahe tvacā śaṅkhagrahānna sahopalambhaniyamo na
cāsāvanya eva sparśātmakaḥ śaṅkho darśanasparśanābhyāmekārthānusandhānasya
pratipāditatvāt, nirākṛtaṃ ca rūpatvasparśatvayoraikādhikaraṇyam,
tadagrahe gṛhyamāṇatvasya ca vinā bhedamanupapatteḥ, sāmagrīsājātye-
nāpādyamāno nāyanopalambhaniyamo'kiñcitkara eva, tathāpi doṣā-
ntaramāha1 | sameti | parasparāviṣayakapratītyaviṣayatvasyetyarthaḥ |
pītetyādi | na ca tatra śaṅkhasya rūpaṃ gṛhyata eva, śuklatvaṃ tu tatra na
gṛhyate doṣāt, tatra ca pītatvamāropya tādṛśavaiśiṣṭyaṃ śaṅkhe gṛhyate,
jātivyaktyorbhedasiddhistu na guṇaguṇinorabhedasiddhau bādhiketi
vācyam | tādṛśakalpanāyāṃ mānābhāvāt, āhatyaiva śaṅkhe pīti-
māropasambhavāt | na ca tadīye rūpe gṛhyamāṇa eva cakṣuṣā dravyagrahaḥ,
mānābhāvāt, śuklatvādau gṛhyamāṇa eva śuklādirūpagraha ityasyāpi
suvacatvāt sandigdhāsiddherdurvāratvācca | na ca rūpāgrahe niyamenā-
gṛhyamāṇatvena rūpābhedaḥ sādhyaḥ, rūpatve vyabhicārāt | atirikta-
rūpatvānabhyupagame tattadvyaktyagrahe'gṛhyamāṇatvasya svarūpāsiddhatvāt ||
nāsau śaṅkhaḥ, kintu śaṅkha iva, taimirikakeśavaditi
cet, aho guṇavadvidveṣaḥ, yat taimirikakeśāḥ karatala-
parāmarśapratiniyatārthakriyayorapāyānna sambhavantīti
tathā'pi sopi nāstītyāha | iti 1 puº pāº |
vyavasthāpayati, iha tu tatsambhavepi śubhratāmātrānupa-
lambhāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nāsāviti | yacca pītatvenopalabhyata ityarthaḥ |
taimirikakeśānāṃ yathā karaparāmarśasya keśaniyatārthakriyāvirahasya
cābhāvādasattvaṃ syādiha tu tadubhayamastīti kathaṃ śaṅkhaśvaityamityāha |
aho iti ||
vyāpakatvāditi cet, vastunorvyāptirupalambhayorvā |
ādye na vipratipattiḥ | na ca vyāpakānupalabdhi-
mātreṇa vyāpyatadupalabdhī nivarttete, dahanānupalabdhau
dhūmatadupalabdhyorapi nivṛttiprasaṅgāt | tatrāpi vā kiṃ
na parikalpayasi dhūma ivāsau na dhūma iti, pāvaka-
vattānupalabdheriti | tasmānna vyāpakānupalabdhervyāpya-
nivṛttiḥ, kintu vyāpakanivṛtteḥ, sā cātrāsiddheti
vācyam, tadetat tulyaṃ prakṛtepi | upalabdhestu vyāpti-
rihaiva bhagnā, śvaityānupalambhepi śaṅkhopalambhādityuktam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu śubhratā śaṅkhavyāpikā, tathā ca prakṛte
tadupalambhanivṛttau kathaṃ śaṅkhanivṛttirna syādityāha | vyāpakatvā-
diti | śubhratāyāḥ śaṅkhasyeti śeṣaḥ | na ceti | śubhratāyā
vyāpakatvepi tadupalabdhinivṛttau na śaṅkhanivṛttiḥ, na vā śaṅkhopa-
lambhanivṛttiḥ, na hi vanhyupalambhanivṛttau dhūmanivṛttirdhūmopalambha-
nivṛttirvetyarthaḥ | upahasati | tatrāpi veti | dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya
śaṅkhe'pyatidiśati | tadetaditi | ihaiveti | pītaḥ śaṅkha itya-
traivetyarthaḥ | kathaṃ bhagnetyāha | śvaityeti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kiṃ śaṅkhasya śuklatvaṃ vyāpakaṃ śaṅkhopalabdhervā
śuklopalabdhirvyāpiketyāha | vastunoriti | prakṛta iti | pītaḥ
śaṅkha ityatrāpi bhramaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | vastunoḥ śaṅkhaśvaityayoḥ | tathā ca vyāpakasya
śvaityasyānupalambhādvyāpyasya śaṅkhasya tadupalabdheśca nivṛttiriti | upa-
labdhyoḥ śvaityaśaṅkhayorupalabdhyoḥ | tathā ca vyāpikāyāḥ śvaityopa-
labdhernivṛtyā vyāpyāyāḥ śaṅkhopalabdhernivṛttiriti ||
syādetat | pīta eva śaṅkha utpanna iti cenna |
puruṣāntareṇa śvaityasyaivopalabdheḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | vaināśikaḥ śaṅkate | pīta eveti ||
raghuº ṭīº | śaṅkate | pīta eveti | sarvabhāvānāṃ kṣaṇika-
tvāt, tathā ca siddhaḥ sahopalambhaniyama ityarthaḥ ||
nāpyasama eva sahopalambhaniyamo hetuḥ anaikā-
ntāt, abhāsvaraṃ rūpaṃ bhāsvareṇa saha niyamenopa-
labhyate bhinnaṃ ceti | deśāviccheda iti cenna | asiddheḥ,
dehadehibhyāmanaikāntācca | na tayoravicchedastadanupa-
lambhepyupalambhāditi cet, tulyam, rūpādyanupalambhepi
tadvatāmupalabdheḥ | tathāpi na viparyayaḥ kadāpīti
cet, tulyam | na hi dehādyanupalambhe dehyanupalambha-
vaddehyanupalambhepi dehasyopalambhasambhavastava darśane |
pratipattiniṣpattisāmagrīsāhityaniyamena sahopalambho
vā deśāvicchedo vā syāt niyamena viruddhadharmā-
dhyāsādbhedaśceti ko virodhaḥ | dharmavirodha eva ko'treti
cet, tadupalambhepyanupalambhaḥ tadabhidhānepyanabhidhānaṃ
tanniṣedhepyaniṣedha ityādi | nīlamutpalaṃ calatītyādau
ca vyāvṛttibhedanirākaraṇe pūrvaka eva nyāyo'nu-
sandheyaḥ, anyatropādhibhedāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nāpīti | guṇena sahaiva guṇino'nupalambhepi
guṇinā sahaiva guṇopalambha ityasamasahopalambho guṇaguṇinorabheda-
sādhako'stviti śaṅkārthaḥ | atrānaikāntikatāmāha | abhāsvareti |
ghaṭarūpamālokarūpeṇa sahaivopalabhyate na ca tayorabheda ityarthaḥ |
tayorghaṭarūpālokarūpayorbhinnadeśatvamataḥ sahopalambhepi nābheda iha
tu deśāviccheda iti guṇaguṇinorabhedaḥ syādityāha | deśāviccheda
iti | pūrvahetuviśeṣaṇam | svatantro vā hetuḥ ubhayamapi guṇaguṇino-
rasiddhamityāha | nāsiddheriti | rūpasya śaṅkhadeśatvāt śaṅkhasya ca
svāvayavadeśatvādityarthaḥ | deheti | dehī tanmate jñānaviśeṣaḥ |
tathā ca dehadehinaḥ svaprakāśajñānasyāhamityupalambhādityarthaḥ |
dehadehinordeśāvicchedena pratītāvapi nābheda ityanaikānta ityarthaḥ |
anaikāntikatvaṃ pariharati | na tayoriti | (a)dehadehino-
rdeśāvicchedaḥ kuta ityata āha | dehānupalambheti | dehinaḥ
svaprakāśajñānasyāhamityupalambhādityarthaḥ | tulyamiti--rūpānupa-
lambhepi śaṅkhasyopalambhamāha | guṇaguṇinorapi deśāvicchedā-
bhāvādityarthaḥ | tathāpīti | yadyapi guṇānupalambhe guṇyupa-
lambho'sti, tathāpi guṇyanupalambhe guṇopalambho nāstītyarthaḥ |
tulya ityeva darśayati | na hīti | dehānupalambhepi dehino
jñānasyopalambho na punarjñānasyānupalambhe dehasyopalambhastvaddarśane
tvayā dehopalambhasya dehinaḥ svaprakāśakatvenopalambhaniyamasvīkārā-
dityarthaḥ | sahopalambhaniyamaṃ deśāvicchedaṃ ca hetudvayamabhyupa-
gamyānyathāsiddhimāha | pratītīti | bhede satyapi dehasattvamanya-
thopapannamityarthaḥ | tadupalambha iti | rūpāgrahaṇepi śaṅkhagrahaṇaṃ
śaṅkhābhidhānepi tadrūpādyanabhidhānaṃ śaṅkhaniṣedhepi tadrūpādyaniṣedha
iti bhede satyevopapadyata ityarthaḥ | nanu yatra yatra guṇānupalambhe
guṇyupalambhastvayocyate tatra guṇī śaṅkho na bhāsata eva, kiṃ nāma ?
aśaṅkhavyāvṛttimātramanyatra tu sahopalambhaniyama evāto na guṇa-
guṇinorbheda ityata āha | nīlamiti | pūrvaka iti | vidhi-
rūpaguṇasyāpohavādanirākaraṇāvasare samarthitatvādityarthaḥ | yadvā
nīlamutpalaṃ calatīti guṇajātikriyāsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pratīyate,
tacca samānādhikaraṇaṃ dravyameva, na cātrānīlādivyāvṛttimātra-
sphuraṇamapohanirākaraṇena tannirākaraṇādityāha | nīlamiti |
tat kiṃ sarvatra jātiguṇakriyānibandhana eva viśiṣṭapratyayastathā ca
nityatvānityatvādiviśiṣṭapratyayāḥ kathaṃ syurityata āha | anyatreti |
kvacidupādhikṛtopi viśiṣṭapratyaya ityarthaḥ | yadvā nanu sarvatra
viśiṣṭapratyaye yadi vyāvṛttibhedanirākaraṇaṃ tadā nāśvo'yamagauraya-
mityādiviśiṣṭapratyayāḥ kathamata āha | anyatreti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nāpīti | ekasyaivānyatarāviṣayakapratītya-
viṣayatvaṃ na tūbhayoḥ, tathā ca śaṅkhāgrahe śvaityānupalambhosti, tasya
ca bhede'nupapattyā'bhedakalpanā syādityapi nāstītyarthaḥ | kalpanāyāṃ
kalpyakalpakayoravinābhāvaḥ, sa cātra nāsti, ālokaṃ vinā
ghaṭasvarūpasyābhānepi tayorbhedādityāha | anekāntāditi |
deśāvicchede satīti hetuviśeṣaṇaṃ vā sādhanāntarameva vā
deśāvicchedaḥ, tadubhayamapyasiddham, śaṅkhasya svāśrayavṛttitvādrūpasya
ca śaṅkhavṛttitvādityāha | nāsiddheriti | nanvavayavabhinno
nāstyavayavīti na tayorbhinnadeśatvam, tatrāha | deheti | bauddhānāṃ
dehī ātmā jñānameva, tathā ca dehajñānaṃ svaprakāśaṃ svamādāyaiva
dehaṃ gocarayati, na ca tayorabheda ityanaikānta ityarthaḥ | nanu
tayorna deśāvicchedaḥ, tasyaikādhārāvṛttitvāt, dehānupalambhepi
dehina upalambhādityāha | na tayoriti | guṇaguṇinorapi
nāvicchedo rūpājñānepi śaṅkhādīnāṃ jñānādityāha | tulyamiti |
viparyayaḥ śaṅkhādyagrahepi rūpādigraha ityarthaḥ | na hīti | yathā
dehāpratītau dehyapratītistathā na dehyapratītau dehapratītistvaddarśana
ityanekānta ityarthaḥ | hetoranyathāsiddhimāha | pratipattīti |
ghaṭapaṭayoḥ pratītyutpattisāmagryoḥ kvacitsāhityaniyamepyabhedā-
bhāvādityarthaḥ | nanu vyāvṛttāvevāyaṃ virodho na tu dharmiṇyata eva
nīlamutpalaṃ calatītyādāvapaunaruktyaṃ bhavatītyata āha | nīlamiti |
pūrvako'pohanirākṛtāvuktaḥ | apohanirākaraṇādyathā pāramārthika-
jātivyaktyorbhedepi sahopalambhaniyamastathā guṇaguṇinorapi syāt |
atha tayornityatvānityatvādiviruddhadharmādhyāsādbhedastulyoyaṃ guṇaguṇi-
norapi, pākena ghaṭasyānāśepi rūpādernāśāditi bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | asama eveti | tasmin gṛhyamāṇa eva gṛhya-
māṇatvam | asti ca guṇini gṛhyamāṇa eva guṇasya gṛhyamāṇatva-
miti | deśāviccheda iti | deśāvicchedo'bhinnadeśatvam | abheda-
sādhanamityanuṣajyate | asiddheriti | guṇasya dravyavṛttitvāddravyasya
ca janyasya svāvayavavṛttitvāt | atiriktasya cāvayavino'sādhita-
tvāt | deheti | pareṣāṃ dehi vijñānam | tayorapi deśavicche-
dānupalambhāditi bhāvaḥ | avicchedo deśāvicchedaḥ | taditi |
dehānupalambhepi dehino vijñānasyopalambhāt deśāvicchede ca
sahopalambhaniyamasyāvaśyakatvāt tavaikatvaparimāṇayoriveti | na
viparyayaḥ na rūpādimatāmanupalambhepi rūpā(dyanu)dyupalambhaḥ | tava
darśana iti | dehavijñānasya svaprakāśatvenāvaśyamupalambhāt | kṣaṇikaṃ
dehaviśeṣamadhikṛtya cedam, tena puruṣāntareṇa dehino'nupalambhepi
na kṣatiḥ | ata evāsvarasādvā hetvoranyathāsiddhimāha | prati-
pattīti | ata eva deśadeśinornairantaryameva deśāviccheda
iti parāstam | uparyadhobhāvāpannanīlādisantānadvayenānaikāntācca |
nanūpalambhānupalambhādikaṃ na dharmiṇaḥ, paraṃ tvatadvyāvṛttibhedānā-
mityata āha | nīlamityādi | pūrvaka eveti | vāstavamutpala-
tvādikamanādṛtyānutpalādivyāvṛtterdurvacatvam | nanu yadi jāti-
guṇakriyānibandhana eva viśiṣṭavyavahāro na punaratadvyāvṛtti-
nibandhano vilīnaṃ tarhi kāryatvanityatvādiviśiṣṭavyavahāreṇetyata
āha | anyatreti ||
abhede ca dharmadharmiṇordūrādūratayā grahaṇe paṭva-
paṭunī kutaḥ | na ca puruṣabhedena tathaivānyasyotpādaḥ,
ekasya dvairūpyābhāvāt | na cānyānya evāsau, eka-
deśatayā tattvena pratisandhānāt | na ca sā bhrāntā,
bhinnadeśasya tathābhūtasya pratyāsīdatāpyanupalambhāt |
na ca nirālamba eva tadupalambho vṛkṣādideśaprati-
niyamānupapatteḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | dūṣaṇāntaramāha | abhede ceti | dūragrahaṇe
apāṭavaṃ alpaviṣayatvaṃ adūragrahaṇe ca pāṭavaṃ bahuviṣayatvaṃ na
syādityarthaḥ | nanu tathotpādādeva te syātāmityata āha | na
ceti | evaṃ sati tadvastu dvirūpamāpadyetetyarthaḥ | nanvanyaḥ paṭugrahaṇa-
viṣayo'nyaścāpaṭugrahaṇaviṣaya iti kuto vastudvairūpyamityata āha |
na ceti | ya eva dūrāddṛṣṭaḥ sa evāyaṃ vṛkṣa iti nikaṭasthena
pratyabhijñānādityarthaḥ | na ca seti | sā ekadeśatā bhrāntā
bhramaviṣaya ityarthaḥ | pratyāsīdatopi puruṣasya tatra bādhānavatārānna
bhrāntetyāha | bhinnadeśasyeti | nanu taimirikakeśopalambhavannirā-
lambana eva paṭvapaṭugraha ityata āha | na ceti | evaṃ sati
vṛkṣādistadviṣayatayā nollikhyetetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kiñca dharmiṇo yāvaddharmyaṃ tadā kathaṃ dharmajñāne
satyeva kasyaciddharmasyāgrahaḥ kasyaciddharmasya graha ityāha | abhede
ceti | bahutaradharmagrāhakatvaṃ paṭutvam, alpataratadgrāhakatvamapaṭutvam |
paṭvapaṭujñānabhedāt puruṣabhedaḥ | tathaiveti | paṭujñānapuruṣāpekṣayā
paṭurapaṭujñānapuruṣāpekṣayā tvapaṭurartha evopeyata ityarthaḥ | dvairūpyaṃ
mithoviruddhadharmadvayam | nanu paṭutvādapaṭurartho'nya eveti na doṣa
ityāśaṅkya nirākaroti | na cānyeti | tattvenābhedenetyarthaḥ |
sā ekadeśatā | tathābhūtasyaikadeśatvena pratyabhijñāyamānasyetyarthaḥ |
nirālambanaḥ pāramārthikāviṣayaḥ | pratiniyamaḥ pravṛttiniyamaḥ
pratītiniyamo vā ||
raghuº ṭīº | yatra jātyāderasambhavastatra dūṣaṇāntaramāha |
abhede ceti | dūratvenāpaṭugrahaṇamadūratvena ca paṭugrahaṇam | bahutara-
dharmagrāhitvaṃ paṭutvamalpadharmagrāhitvaṃ cāpaṭutvam | dharmigrahe ca
tadabhinnānāṃ sarveṣāmeva grahāttathātvāsambhava ityarthaḥ | atha paṭutva-
mapaṭutvaṃ ca viṣayadharmastadgrāhitayā ca grahaṇe paṭutvāpaṭutvavyavahāraḥ,
eka eva cārtho nedīyāṃsaṃ puruṣaṃ prati paṭutvenotpadyata iti tena
paṭutvena gṛhyate, davīyāṃsaṃ prati cāpaṭutveneti tenāpaṭutvenetyāśaṅkya
nirākaroti | na ceti | dvairūpyaṃ viruddhobhayarūpa(va)tva(ttva)m | dharma-
dharmiṇorabhede dharmigrāhiṇāpyekena paṭutvamevānyena cāpaṭutvameva
gṛhyata ityevāsambaddhamityapi draṣṭavyam | anyānya iti | ekaḥ
paṭurapaṭuścānya ityarthaḥ | tattvena abhinnatvena | sā ekadeśatā |
bhrāntā bhramaviṣayaḥ | evaṃ tattvamapi bhrāntamiti draṣṭavyam |
tathābhūtasya paṭvapaṭurūpasya | nirālambanaḥ sadanālambanaḥ | tadupalambhaḥ
paṭutvāpaṭutvopalambhaḥ | deśapratiniyamaḥ pratiniyatadeśaviṣayatvam |
ayaṃ hi paṭvādipratyayo niyate vṛkṣādau, nirālambanastu śaśa-
viṣāṇādipratyayo na tatheti ||
na cādhipatipratyayatvāttasyeti yuktam, anubhavānāṃ
taddeśollekhānanurodhāt, ullekhe vā sa evālambana-
pratyayaḥ, tāvanmātrānubandhitvādavalambanavyavahārasya |
na ca deśo'stvālambanaṃ na tu vṛkṣādiriti sāmpratam,
anupalabdhaviśeṣatayā deśadeśinoraviśeṣāt | na ca
davīyāṃsopi viśeṣāḥ sphurantyeva, na tu niścīyanta
iti yuktam, na hi yogavimalāñjanadhautadṛṣṭeranyasya
tārāvyūhagatayaḥ pratibhāntīti śakyaṃ pratipādayitum |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu vṛkṣādideśapratiniyato'pyupalambhaḥ spaṣṭā-
spaṣṭarūpo'nādivāsanāprabhava evetyata āha | na cādhipatīti |
adhipatiranādivāsanā, yadadhīnāḥ sthūlādivikalpāḥ sā pratyayaḥ
kāraṇaṃ yasyetyarthaḥ | vāsanāyā nirapekṣāyāḥ kāraṇatvābhyupagame'ti-
prasaṅga iti tadudbodhako'nubhavo vācyaḥ, sa ca na deśamullikhatīti
tadudbodhitā vāsanāpi na tadullikhedityāha | anubhavānāmiti |
nirvikalpakānāmityarthaḥ | nanvananubhavenāpi deśa ullikhyatā-
mata āha | ullekha iti | tarhi siddha eva vṛkṣādirdeśastatra ca
spaṣṭāspaṣṭagrahaṇaṃ ca siddhamityarthaḥ | nanvanubhavaviṣayatvepi vṛkṣādiḥ
kathaṃ sālambana ityata āha | tāvanmātreti | nanu spaṣṭāspaṣṭagrahaṇa-
viṣayo na vṛkṣaḥ, kintu taddeśa ityata āha | na ceti | spaṣṭāspaṣṭa-
grahaṇayoryathā deśini vṛkṣe virodhāpādakatvaṃ tathā deśe bhūtalā-
dāvapi tadā syāttatrāpi hi dūrādyāvadviśeṣānupalambhasyāviśeṣā-
dityarthaḥ | nanu spaṣṭagrahaṇaṃ nāstyeva yena virodhaḥ syāt, kintu
grahaṇāni nirvikalpakāni sarvatra spaṣṭānyeva, savikalpakaṃ tu sarva-
viśeṣaviṣayaṃ yatra notpadyate tadaspaṣṭagrahaṇamiṣyata iti kuto
virodha ityata āha | na ca davīyāṃsa iti | yogavimalāñjana
dṛṣṭiryogī, tadanyo'smadādistasyāpi tārāvyūhasya davīyāṃso
gatayaḥ pratibhāntīti na śakyaṃ vaktumato yaduktaṃ davīyāṃsopi
viśeṣāḥ sphuranti na tu niścīyanta iti, tanna yuktamityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu kāraṇībhūtajñānaviṣayatayā vṛkṣādi-
deśasya pratiniyamaḥ syādityata āha | na ceti | adhipati-
pratyayatvaṃ nirvikalpakatvam | tvayā deśasya nirvikalpakaviṣayatvaṃ
nāṅgīkriyate, aṅgīkāre vā sa eva pāramārthiko viṣaya
ityarthaḥ | tāvanmātramullekhamātram | na ceti | deśo bhūtalādi-
statra pāramārthiko viṣayo na tu pratiniyamaviṣayo vṛkṣādi-
rityarthaḥ | deśadeśinordharmadharmibhāvādabhede yathā dūratvāddeśasya
viśeṣā nopalabhyante tathā vṛkṣāderapīti viśeṣo nāstītyāha |
aviśeṣāditi | nanu dharmadharmiṇorabhedo dharmigrahaṇaṃ nirvi-
kalpakarūpaṃ sarvadharmaviṣayameva, savikalpakaṃ tu bahvanyavyāvṛtti-
viṣayatayā paṭvapaṭugrahaṇarūpamityāśaṅkāṃ nirākaroti | na ceti |
sphuraṇaṃ nirvikalpakam | niścayaḥ savikalpakaḥ | nirvikalpakasya
savikalpakonneyatvāttadabhāve tatsattvamaśakyaniścayamityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | kāraṇībhūtasya nirvikalpakasya pratiniyata-
viṣayakatvāt kāryabhūtasya savikalpakasyāpi tathātvaṃ na punaranādi-
vāsanāsamutthānāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādivikalpānāmityādyāśaṅkya nirā-
karoti | na ceti | svasamānākāragrahaṇajanakatvaṃ viṣayasyā''dhi-
patyam grahaṇasya ca svasamānākāraviṣayavyavasthāpakatvam, anubhavasya
kādācitkanīlādyākārānyathānupapattyā nīlādyākāraviṣayasiddheḥ,
tathā ca tathāvidhasya tathāvidho vā pratyayo'dhipatipratyayaḥ |
niyataviṣayaṃ nirvikalpakam, tattvāt tadadhīnatvāt savikalpakasya
viṣayaniyamopapatteḥ |
adhipatirnirvikalpakaṃ pratyayaḥ kāraṇaṃ yasya tattvādityapi
kaścit |
niyatākārasavikalpakajananasāmarthyaṃ nirvikalpakasyādhipatyam,
tathā ca tasya savikalpakajanakanirvikalpakasya tathātvāt savikalpake
viṣayapratiniyama ityarthaḥ ityanye |
yadi nirvikalpakaṃ vṛkṣādideśamullikhet tadā tadanurundhāno
vikalpopi vṛkṣādiviṣayakaḥ syāt | na ca bhavatāmapi (asato)
vṛkṣāderavayavino nirvikalpakaviṣayatvasya sambhavo'nyaviṣayakācca
nirvikalpakādanyaviṣayakavikalpotpāde nīlanirvikalpakāt pīta-
savikalpakotpādaprasaṅga ityakṣaratātparyābhyāmāha | anubhavānāmiti |
ālambate viṣayatāmātreṇāśrayate asantamarthamityālambanapratyayaḥ
savikalpakaṃ vijñānam, tathā ca tasyaiva kuto viṣayaniyamaḥ |
tāvanmātraṃ asadarthollekhamātram | ākare kvacidviṣayībhūtāyāṃ pratī-
tāvālambanapratyayavyavahāraḥ | deśo bhūtalādiḥ | ālambanaṃ viṣayaḥ |
anupalabdheti | paṭvapaṭupratyayasya deśivaddeśasyāpi viśeṣānupalabdhyā
davīyaso'paṭurnedīyasaśca tadupalabdhyā paṭurnānyathetyarthaḥ | sphuranti
nirvikalpakena gṛhyante | na tu niścīyante na tu savikalpakena
viṣayīkriyante ||
aniścayānupapatteśca | anubhūto hyātmā na niścī-
yata ityatra heturvācyaḥ | vāsanānudbhava iti cenna |
niḥśeṣaviśeṣavantaṃ dharmiṇamupalabhya vidūravarttina-
stadakhilasmaraṇepi anubhavavyāpārānusāriniścayā-
nudayāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | kiñca nirvikalpakagṛhītaḥ savikalpakena
na viṣayīkriyata ityapyayuktamityāha | aniścayeti | nanu nirvi-
kalpakānantaraṃ yatra saṃjñāsmaraṇaṃ bhavati tatra tadviśiṣṭajñānamutpadyate
na tu sarvatretyāha | vāsaneti | anubhavavyāpāreti | anubhava-
vyāpāraḥ sākṣāttvam, tena nikaṭe gṛhītasakalaviśeṣasya dharmiṇo
dūre'pi tadanubhavabalāt sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ syāt, tvayā ca
cakṣuṣaḥ prāpyakāritvānabhyupagamāt sāmagryantarasya sadbhāvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | kiñca tadviṣayakanirvikalpakasattve tatkāryaṃ
savikalpakaṃ syādevetyāha | aniścayeti | vāsaneti | saṃskāra-
sahakārirāhityarthaḥ | tadakhilasmaraṇa iti saṃskārodbodhadyota-
nārtham | yatrāsyākhilaviśeṣasmaraṇābhāvastatrāpi tāvaddharmiviśiṣṭa-
dharmyanubhava eva saṃskārodbodhaka iti bhāvaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | iti hetuḥ ityatra hetuḥ | tadakhileti |
smaryate'neneti smaraṇaṃ, tadakhilagocaravāsanodbodhepītyarthaḥ | anu-
bhavasya vyāpāro dharmo'śeṣaviśeṣaviṣayatvam, tadanusārī tadvān ||
tathāpi cānubhavakalpanāyāṃ sarvaḥ sarvadā sarvaṃ
jānāti na tu niścinotīti kiṃ na syāt |
bhrāntivaśāt tadviparītaviśeṣaniścaye'nubhūtaviśeṣā-
niścaya iti cenna | anubhavavaiparītye niścayasya sarvatrā-
nāśvāsaprasaṅgāt | yatra ca viparītasyāpyaniścayastatra
kā vārttā, yathā parācīnairbhāgairarvācīnānāṃ saṃyoga-
vibhāgayoriti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tathāpīti | aniścitepyartha ityarthaḥ | nanu
rajatabhrameṇāntarite śuktinirvikalpake śuktiniścayo na bhavati,
tathā ca kuto'yaṃ niyamo yadanubhūtaṃ niścīyata evetyāśaṅkate |
bhrāntīti | anubhaveti | anubhavānantaraṃ viparītaniścayaścettadā'nu-
bhavamātraprāmāṇyavādinaḥ kvāpi samāśvāso na syāt, śuktau tu
nirvikalpakaṃ na bhavatyeva, kintu smṛtarajatasya dharmīndriyasannikarṣā-
dviparītaniścaya evotpadyata iti bhāvaḥ | kiñca parabhāgārvā-
gbhāgayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau pratyakṣāpratyakṣavṛttitayā vāyuvanaspati-
saṃyogavibhāgavadapratyakṣau tatrāpi tvayā grahaṇamabhidhīyate, viparyayaśca
nāsti, tat kathaṃ na niścīyata ityāha | yatra ceti ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu tāvadviśeṣavaddharmyanubhavepi tadvirodhi-
viśeṣaniścayo bhramarūpastanniścayapratibandhaka ityāha | bhrānteti |
bhrāntiratra tatkāraṇaṃ vivakṣitam | yadyanubhavaviṣamvādī niścaya-
stadā sarvatrānubhave'nāśvāsastasya sa vikalpakonneyatvādityāha | anu-
bhaveti | yatra ceti | yatra viparītabhramastanniścayapratibandhako
netyarthaḥ | yatheti | saṃyogavibhāgau nātiriktau, kintu dharmiṇa
utpādaviśeṣāviti naye dharmiṇo'nubhavena viśeṣadarśanādviparītā-
niścaye yatra niścayastatroktarītyabhāva ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | jānāti anubhavati | bhrāntivaśāt bhrānti-
janakadoṣavaśāt | nanu niściterthe yatra bādhakamavatarati tatraiva
niścayasyānubhavavaiparītyaṃ kalpyate na sarvatreti nānāśvāso bhavatāmapi
rajatabhramasyārthavyabhicārāt sarvatrānāśvāsaprasaṅga ityata āha | yatra
ceti | na ca niyataviṣayānādivāsanāparipākavaśānniyataviṣaya-
vikalpotpāda iti vācyam | avayavijātyādervāstavatvavyava-
sthāpanāt | vikalpe'nubhūyamāne sākṣāttve bādhakābhāvāt sarvānu-
bhavasiddhe ca guṇaguṇinorbhede na kiñcidapi bādhakamiti ||
iti guṇaguṇibhedabhaṅgavādaḥ ||
atha anupalambhavādaḥ |
astu tarhi nairātmyam, anupalabdheriti cenna |
sarvādṛṣṭeśca sandehāt svādṛṣṭervyabhicārataḥ |
dṛśyatvaviśeṣaṇānnaivamiti cenna | tadasiddheḥ | paropa-
gamasiddheradoṣa iti cenna | svatantrasādhanatvāt | yadi
paraḥ sahasaiva naivamabhyupagacchet, nūnaṃ sādhanamidaṃ
mūrchet, yadi ca parādṛṣṭimavadhūya dṛśyantamabhyupagacchet,
evamapi sambhavet, na caivaṃ śakyam, tasya tadupahita-
rūpatvāditi saṅkṣepaḥ | vistarastvasanto'kṣaṇikā iti-
vadūhanīyaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | anupalambho veti yadātmani bādhakaṃ śaṅkitaṃ
tannirasyannāha | astu tarhīti | ātmā nāsti, anupalabdheḥ,
śaśaviṣāṇavadityarthaḥ | atra sarvānupalabdhimādāya sandigdhāsiddhi-
māha | sarveti | puruṣaviśeṣānupalabdhimādāya vyabhicāramāha |
svādṛṣṭeriti | nanu yogyānupalambhena pratyakṣata evātmābhāvo gṛhyata
ityāśaṅkyāha | dṛśyatveti | anumānapakṣe doṣamāha | tadasiddhe-
riti | tvayā''tmano dṛśyatvānabhyupagamāt, abhyupagame vā siddhaṃ naḥ
samīhitamityarthaḥ | naiyāyikaistāvaddṛśyatvamaṅgīkriyate, tathā ca
kathaṃ tadasiddhirityāha | pareti | svatantreti | tarkaḥ parābhyupa-
gamādhīnapravṛttirna tu svatantra(sādhana)manumānamapītyarthaḥ | nanu kuto
vyavastheyamityāha | yadi ceti |
‘so'pi yāvat parāsiddhaḥ svayaṃ siddho vidhīyate |
bhavettatra pratīkāraḥ svato'siddhe tu kā kriyā’ ||
ityarthaḥ | sahaseti svārasikānabhyupagamavāraṇāya, anyathā'pa-
siddhāntāpatteḥ | mūrchediti | svarūpāsiddhaṃ syādityarthaḥ | nanvanu-
mānamapi parasiddhena pravarttatām, ko doṣaḥ, tvadanabhyupagamastvapa-
siddhāntabhayādeva vādinā na karttavya ityata āha | yadi ceti |
paro'pi darśane sati dṛśyatvamabhyupagacchet na tu tadantareṇa dṛśyatva-
mātramityarthaḥ | tasyeti | dṛśyatvasya darśanopahitatvādityarthaḥ |
vistarastviti | asanto'kṣaṇikāḥ kramayaugapadyarahitatvādityatrā-
śrayāsiddhirbādho vā, tathā''tmā nāstyanupalabdherityatrāpītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | caturthamātmani bādhakaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati |
astu tarhīti | dehādibhinno nāstyātmā, anupalambhādityarthaḥ |
atra sarvathānupalambho vivakṣitaḥ svānupalambho vā | ādye sarvatreti |
yadyapyanupalambho jñānamātrābhāvaḥ svarūpasanneva heturiti tatra
sandehābhidhānaṃ na yuktam, tathāpyātmā nāstyanupalambhādityanenaiva
śabdena jñānamātrābhāve virodha iti bhāvaḥ | antye sveti |
tvadadṛṣṭasyāpi vastunaḥ sattvādityarthaḥ | nanu na vyabhicāraḥ,
yogyatayāṃ svānupalambhasya viśeṣaṇatvādityāha | dṛśyatveti | tvayā
tasya dṛśyatvānabhyupagamādabhyupagame siddha ātmetyata āha | tadasiddhe-
