riti | naiyāyikaistathā'bhyupagamāt parasiddhena dṛśyatvaṃ svānupalambhe
viśeṣaṇamityāha | pareti | tarka ivānumānamapi parasiddhena na
pravarttate, svato'siddhe tu kā kriyetyāha | svatantreti | nanvanu-
mānamapi parasiddhena pravartsyati viśeṣābhāvādityata āha | yadi
ceti | parānumānadūṣaṇārthaṃ yadi naiyāyiko na tathā'ṅgīkuryāt,
tadedaṃ sādhanaṃ na syādityarthaḥ | yadi ceti | parairātmano
dṛśyatvasvīkāre anupalambho neṣyata iti tathā prasiddherevetyarthaḥ |
tasyeti | dṛśyasya dṛṣṭyupahitatvādityarthaḥ | nanu śaśaśṛṅgasyevāsa-
tkhyātyupasthitasya niṣedhaḥ syādityata āha | vistarastviti |
asatkhyāterdūṣitatvāttatrāpi śaśe śṛṅgaṃ nāstīti niṣiddhyate na tu
śaśaśṛṅgam, nāstyātmā ajātatvāt śaśaśṛṅgavadityatrāśrayasiddhya-
siddhibhyāṃ vyāghātaḥ, pratiyogyaprasiddhyā śarīrādāvapi dharmiṇi
tanniṣedho'śakya ityarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | turīyaṃ bādhakamāśaṅkate | astu tarhīti |
anupalabdhirna jñānamātrābhāvo nāstyātmetyeva jñānāt, parantu
sākṣātkārābhāvaḥ, tatrāha | sarvādṛṣṭerityādi | sandehādityā-
pātataḥ, vyatireka eva ca vyaktībhaviṣyati | vyabhicārastvatīndri-
yānabhyupagamena śakyaparihāratvānnodbhāvitaḥ | naivam na svādṛṣṭe-
rvyabhicāraḥ | svatantreti | prasaṅgo hi parābhyupagamasiddhena hetunā
pravarttate, parābhyupagame'niṣṭaprasañjanarūpatvāt, nānumānam, taduktam |
‘yastu hetuḥ parāsiddhaḥ svataḥ siddho'bhidhīyate |
bhavettatra pratīkāraḥ svato'siddhe tu kā kriyā’ ||
iti | sopahāsamāha | yadi ceti | sahasā apasiddhānta-
bhayaviraheṇa | yena yaddṛśyaṃ tadanyena tasyādṛṣṭirasattvasādhikā tenaiva
vā | nādyaḥ, vādyadṛśyasya prativādibuddhyādeḥ sattvopagamāt |
dvitīye tu yena yaddṛśyaṃ taddṛṣṭestatra sattvādasiddhirityāha | yadi
ceti | etena yogyānupalabdhyā tanniṣedha ityapi pratyuktam |
dṛśyaṃ dṛśyatvaviśiṣṭam | taṃ ātmānam | tasya dṛśyatvaviśiṣṭasya |
itivat ityatreva | yathā sthirasya dharmiṇaḥ siddhyasiddhyorbādhāśrayā-
siddhibhyāṃ tatrāsattvasādhanamaśakyaṃ tathā''tmanyapīti | kiṃ cāsattvaṃ
nātyantābhāvapratiyogitvam, siddhasādhanāt | nāpi sarvakālāva-
cchedena sarvadeśavṛtteratyantābhāvasya pratiyogitvam, sarvatra deśe
sarvasya kālasyāvacchedakatvāsambhavāt, kvacidanyatrāpyaprasiddheḥ, asa-
tkhyāternirāsāt, ātmani siddhasādhanācca | nāpi prāgabhāvadhvaṃsa-
pratiyogitvam, ghaṭādāvavivādāt | ātmani ca vītarāgajanmā-
darśanādityādinā nyāyenānāditvasiddhyā'nādeśca bhāvasya kāraṇā-
bhāvād dhvaṃsāsambhavena bādhāt, sādhakavirahācca, meyatvadravyatvāde-
raprayojakatvāt | nāpi sattāyā jātervirahaḥ, ghaṭādāvivātmanyapi
tatsādhakasya pratyakṣasya sambhavāt, tathātvepi ca dharmiṇo'napāyāt |
ata eva na deśakālasambandhavirahaḥ, tatsādhakamānabādhitatvāt,
sādhakābhāvācca | ata eva na svarūpasattvavirahaḥ, svarūpasiddhyasiddhibhyāṃ
vyāghātācca | ata eva ca na prameyatvābhāvaḥ, sādhyāprasiddheśca |
nāpi prameyatvavyāpakārthakriyāviraheṇa tadabhāvasādhanam, tvayā
kevalavyatirekiṇo mānatvānabhyupagamāt, vyāpteḥ pakṣadharmatāyāścā-
siddheḥ | asya ca jñānasya prāmāṇye vyāghāto'prāmāṇye tu
kuto'bhimatasiddhirityādi svayamūhanīyam ||
athātmasadbhāve kiṃ pramāṇam | pratyakṣameva tāvat,
ahamiti vikalpasya prāṇabhṛnmātrasiddhatvāt | na
vāyamavastukaḥ sandigdhavastuko vā, aśābdatvāda-
pratikṣepācca | na ca laiṅgikaḥ, ananusaṃhitaliṅgasyāpi
svapratyayāt | na ca smṛtiriyam, ananubhūte tadanupa-
patteḥ | anādivāsanāvaśādanādirayamavastuko vikalpa
ityapi na yuktam, nīlādivikalpasādhāraṇyāt | iha
vāsanāmupādāyānāśvāse pramāṇāntarepi kaḥ samā-
śvāso yato nīlādivikalpeṣu samāśvāsaḥ syāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu sādhakabādhakamānābhāvādātmani sandehaḥ
syādataḥ sādhakamāha | pratyakṣamiti | āgamānumānayorapi
ātmani sattve pratyakṣasyopajīvyatvāttadeva prathamamuktam | nanu
śaśaviṣāṇapratyayavadahamiti pratyayaḥ syādityata āha | na ceti |
bauddhaiḥ śabdādivikalpānāmavastukatvābhyupagamādāha | aśābdatvā-
diti | sandigdhavastukatāyāmāha | apratikṣepāditi | nāyaṃ
sthāṇuritivannāhamiti pratikṣepābhāvādityarthaḥ | na ca laiṅgika
iti | yadyapi laiṅgikamapyasatkhyātirūpameva tanmate, tathāpi
hetvantaramapyāha | ananusaṃhiteti | nanvādhunikī vāsanā-
mūlānubhavamapekṣate natvanādirapītyāśaṅkya nirākaroti | anā-
dīti | tarhi nīlādyapi pāramārthikaṃ na syādanādivāsanā-
vaśādeva teṣāmapi sphuraṇasambhavādityāha | nīlādīti | tadeva
sphuṭayati | iheti | ātmanītyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | ātmani bādhakoddhārepi sādhakaṃ vinā
sandehaḥ syādityātmatattvasyāvivekastadavastha evetyāha | atheti |
yadyapyātmani śabdānumāne api māne stastathāpi tayoḥ pratyakṣopa-
jīvakatvāt pratyakṣameva mānamāha | pratyakṣamiti | na ca
tadasiddhamityāha | ahamitīti | nanvasannapyayaṃ vikalpaḥ śaśa-
viṣāṇavikalpavadavastukastathātvena sandigdho veti na mānamityāśaṅkāṃ
nirākaroti | na ceti | bauddhanaye śabdādivikalpā vyāvṛttimātra-
viṣayatayā'līkaviṣayā yathā'yaṃ tathetyarthaḥ | apratikṣepādabādhā-
dityarthaḥ | nanu śābdatvalaiṅgikatvābhāve'pyanādivāsanājanyatayā
śaśaviṣāṇavikalpava(ttayā)dasatkhyātirūpaḥ syādityāśaṅkya nirā-
karoti | anādīti | ayamahamiti vikalpaḥ yadi bādhakā-
bhāve'pi tathā tadā nīlādivikalpānāmapi vāsanāmātrajanyatva-
sambhāvanayāpi savastukatve kā pratyāśetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | pratyakṣameveti | tatrātmā na tāvatpratyakṣato
gṛhyata iti bhāṣyaṃ punarāpātato vipratipannaṃ prati ahamiti
pratyakṣaṃ śarīrādibhinna ātmani pramāṇayituṃ na śakyata ityeta-
tparam | avastuko vastvananurodhī vyāvṛttiviṣayakaḥ | tādṛśo hi
vikalpaḥ śabdālliṅgātsāderanādervā vāsanātaḥ, na cāyaṃ tathetyāha |
aśābdatvādityādinā | satyapi ca śābdatvādau nāvastukatva-
mabādhādityāha | apratikṣepāditi | vināpi bādhakamavastukatve
nīlādivikalpānāmapi tathātvaprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ | ananubhūta
iti svamate, ajñāta iti paramate | ayaṃ ahamiti vikalpaḥ |
vāsanāvikalpasantānayoranāditvānna bījāṅkuravat kāryakāraṇa-
bhāvāsambhava iti bhāvaḥ | sandigdhavastukatvaṃ nirasyati | iheti |
yadyāntare'hamiti vikalpe vastvananurodhivāsanāsamutthatvasambhāvanayā
savastukatvasandehastadā bāhyeṣvapi nayanādisamuttheṣu vikalpeṣu tayaiva
tatsandehātkvacidapi vikalpe savastukatvanirṇayo na syādityarthaḥ ||
tasmādvāsanāmātravādaṃ vihāyāgantukamapi kiñcit
kāraṇaṃ vācyam, taccāptānāptaśabdau vā liṅgatadābhāsau
vā pratyakṣatadābhāsau veti | tatra yathā prathamamadhyama-
prakārābhāvānnīlavikalpaścaramaṃ kalpamālambate tathā-
'hamiti vikalpopi | tatrāyaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvitve
sākṣādeva savastukaḥ, tadābhāse tu mūle'sya pāramparyāt
savastuteti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | tasmāditi | nīlādyupaplavabhayādityarthaḥ |
prathamamadhyameti | pūrvadūṣitatvādityarthaḥ | caramamiti | pratyakṣa-
tadābhāsapakṣamityarthaḥ | pratyakṣābhāsamūlatāyāmapi savastukatāmāha |
tatreti | ahamiti vikalpasya nirvikalpakajanyatve nīlādi-
vikalpavat savastukatā, pratyakṣābhāsamūlatve tu paramparayā mūlabhūtaṃ
pratyakṣamabhyupeyaṃ pramāpūrvakatvādāropasyetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | pratyakṣābhāsamūlakatve savastukatvamupapādayitu-
māha | tatreti | ahamiti | vikalpo yadi vastuviṣayā-
vyavahitapūrvavarttinirvikalpakasambaddho yadi vā pratyakṣābhāsajanya-
stathāpi paramparayā āropyarajatādinirvikalpakapūrvakatvenobhayathāpi
savastukatvamastyevetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | pratyakṣaṃ nirvikalpakam | sākṣāt nirvi-
kalpakātiriktavyavadhānamantareṇa | pratyakṣābhāsamūlakatvepi savastukatvaṃ
vyavasthāpayati | tadābhāsa iti | pāramparyādvastuviṣayakanirvi-
kalpakapṛṣṭhabhāvisavikalpakaprabhavavāsanāprabhavasmṛtijanyatvāt ||
na ca bāhyapratyakṣanivṛttāveva nirmūlatvam, buddhi-
vikalpasyāpi tathātvaprasaṅgāt | tatra svasamvedanaṃ
mūlamihāpi mānasapratyakṣamiti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanu yadyātmāsti tadā nīlādivadbahi-
rindriyavedyaṃ syādityata āha | na ceti | nanu buddhiḥ svayameva
svasmin pramāṇaṃ na tvātmā tathā, tasya jaḍatvādityata āha |
tatreti | mānasamiti | vedanamityanuṣajyate | tathā ca mānasa-
pratyakṣasiddha evātmetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | nanu pratyakṣasya bahiḥkaraṇajanyatvadarśanāccātra
ca tadabhāvānna pratyakṣatvamiti vāsanāprabhavatvameva syādityata āha |
na ceti | yathā'nyasya svaprakāśyakatvepi buddhistvanmate svaprakāśā
yathānuvyavasāyo'ntaḥkaraṇajanyastathā''tmapratyakṣamapītyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | bāhyaṃ bahirindriyajaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nirvikalpakam |
nirmūlatvam mūlabhūtavastuśūnyatvam | buddhīti | upalakṣaṇaṃ cedam |
sukhādivikalpānāmapi mānasapratyakṣamūlakānāmavastukatvaprasaṅgo
draṣṭavyaḥ | sādhitaṃ ca sukhādīnāṃ jñānātiriktatvamākare ||
śarīrādivastuko bhaviṣyatīti cenna, nirupādhi-
śarīrendriyabuddhitatsamudāyālambanatve'tiprasaṅgāt | sva-
sambandhiśarīrādāvayaṃ syāditi vācyam, tatra kaḥ
svārtha iti vacanīyam | ananyatvaṃ svatvaṃ sarvabhāvā-
nām, tathā ca yadā tenaiva tadanubhūyate tadā pratyetuḥ
pratyetavyādavyatirekādahamiti syāt | ata eva
ghaṭādayo na kadācidananyānubhavitṛkā iti na
kadāpyahamāspadamiti cet, evaṃ tarhi tvanmatepyahaṃ
pratyayaḥ śarīrādāvāroparūpa eva, tataḥ pratyetu-
ranyatvāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nanvayamahaṃ pratyayaḥ śarīra eva sthaulyādi-
sāmānādhikaraṇyenāhantvagrahādityāśaṅkate | śarīreti | evaṃ
sati caitraśarīrepi maitrasyāhaṃ pratyayaḥ syāditi | svasambandhinītyanta-
rbhāvya pratyayaśaṅkāmāha | nirupādhīti | buddhicaitanikatatsamudāya-
caitanikavādināvapi tulyanyāyena pratyākhyātuṃ tadantarbhāvena
śaṅkitam | tatreti | svapadenātmaiva vācyaḥ, tathā ca siddhaṃ naḥ
samīhitamiti bhāvaḥ | ananyatvaṃ anyonyābhāvātyantābhāvavattva-
mityarthaḥ | evaṃ sati sa evātiprasaṅga ityata āha | tathā
ceti | pratyetā yatra pratyetavyastatrāhamiti pratyaya iti nātiprasaṅga
ityarthaḥ | buddhicaitanikaṃ pratyāha | evaṃ tarhīti | śarīrādeḥ
pratipattṛbhinnatvādityarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | atiprasaṅgāditi | caitrasyāpi maitraśarīre-
'hamiti dhīḥ syādityarthaḥ | tatreti | ātmānaṃ vihāyeti śeṣaḥ |
ananyatvamiti | yadanyonyābhāvātyantābhāvavattvaṃ yasya tattvaṃ svatva-
mityarthaḥ | tadeti | pratīterevāśrayo yadā pratīyate tadā'hamiti
vyavahārastatretyarthaḥ | buddhyātmatāvādinaṃ pratyāha | evantarhīti ||
raghuº ṭīº | kaḥ svārtha iti | yasyātmanaḥ sambandhi yaccharīraṃ
tasya tatrāhaṃ gaura ityādikaḥ pratyaya iti niyamo nātiriktātma-
sadbhāvaṃ vinetyarthaḥ | yathā bhavatāṃ svasminnātmani ahaṃ jāne ahaṃ
sukhītyādikā buddhistathā'smākamapi svasminneva śarīre setyā-
śaṅkate | ananyatvamiti | yathāśrutamananyatvaṃ sādhāraṇamatasta-
dvivecayati | tathā cetyādinā | naiyāyikādīnāṃ sāmānyato-
'hantvamātmatvameva, tattadahantvaṃ tu tattadātmatvam, svāśraya eva ca
pratīterahamāspadam, tatrāsvaprakāśe svāśrayatvaṃ svarūpasanniyāmakaṃ
svaprakāśe tu jñāyamānamapīti mantavyam | tataḥ pratyeturiti |
ahaṃ pratyayo hi yadi sākṣādviṣayasamuttho yadi vā viṣaya-
savikalpakapṛṣṭhabhāvī ubhayathāpi pūrvabhāvinaṃ viṣayamapekṣate, na ca
bhavatāṃ tasya kṣaṇikasyodīcyapratyayāśrayatvam, nāpi tadupādānatvam,
atyantavisadṛśasyāprakṛteśca bhavatāmupādānatvāsambhavāditi | na ca
pratītyāśrayatvopādānatvābhyāmanyat pratyetṛtvaṃ nāmeti ||
buddhau mukhya eveti cenna | tasyāḥ kriyātvenānubhūya-
mānāyā bhinnasya kartturahaṃ cchinadmītivat ahaṃ
jānāmītyanubhavāt | nīlādipratyetavyākāravat prati-
pattyākāropi pratipatterevāyamātmā tathā bhāsata iti
cet, tarhi pratyetavyapratipattyākārayostulyayogakṣema-
tvāt siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam | astu svopādānamātra-
miti cenna | tatpratibhāsane tadākārasyāpi pratibhāsa-
prasaṅgāt, ākāramantareṇākāriṇo'navabhāsāt |
pravṛttisantānānyī buddhisantānaḥ pratipattā, vayaṃ
tamālayavijñānamācakṣmaha iti cet, astu tarhi
pravṛttivijñānopādānamanādinidhanaḥ pratipattā | sa
kiṃ santanyamānajñānarūpastadviparīto veti cintā'va-
śiṣyate, niḥśeṣitā cāsau prāgiti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | buddhistatropādhirityāha | buddhāviti |
ahantvādhikaraṇe kriyātvena bhāsamānā buddhirnāhaṅkārāspadaṃ bhavitu-
marhatītyāha | tasyā iti | nanu yathā nīlādibuddhau nīlādi-
rākārastathā pratipatterākāro'hantvaṃ pratipattau bhāsata iti śaṅkate |
nīlādīti | evaṃ yathā nīlādiḥ pratītibhinnastathā prati-
pattāpi pratipattibhinna eva tasyākārastatra bhāsata iti siddhaṃ naḥ
samīhitamityāha | tarhīti | nanvahamākārāyāḥ pratipatteryā
pratipattirupādānabhūtā saivāhantvena bhāsata ityāha | astviti |
svopādānamātramahaṃ pratyayaviṣaya iti śeṣaḥ | svopādānaṃ hi
nīlādivijñānaṃ yadi tadā tadullikhadvijñānaṃ nīlādyapyullikhet,
tathā ca kvāhaṃ pratyaya ityāha | tatpratibhāsana iti |
ākāreti | pravṛttivijñānākāro nīlādistamantareṇākāriṇa
upādānasya nīlādivijñānasyānavabhāsanādityarthaḥ | ālaya-
vijñānamupādānapadenocyate tasya cāhaṃtvamātramākāra iti na
nīlādibhānaprasaṅga ityāha | pravṛttīti | anādinidhana iti |
santānābhiprāyam | prāgeveti | kṣaṇabhaṅgaprakaraṇa evetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | na jñānātmakatvamahamarthasya jñānakriyākartṛtvena
tasyānubhūyamānatayā tato bhedādityāha | tasyā iti | nanu yathā
nīlādibuddhau nīlādyākāratvaṃ tathā jñānarūpasyaivātmano'hamiti
dhīviṣayatvam iti na jñānabhinnātmasiddhirityāha | astviti |
tarhyahamiti jñāne tadupādānanīlādipravṛttivijñānaviṣayetiprati-
pattau pratipattrākāratvaṃ bhāsata ityāha | nīlādīti | tāvatāpi
nīlādivatsvajanyajñānabhinna ātmā siddha evetyāha | tarhīti |
nanvayaṃ yasyā buddheryadupādānaṃ sa evātmā pravṛttivijñānabhinnani-
rviṣayānādyanantaḥ pratipattā siddha eva, sthairye paraṃ vipratipattistacca
sādhitamevetyāha | astviti | yadyapyālayavijñānasya kṣaṇikatvā-
nnānādinidhanatvam, tathāpi pratipattṛtāvacchedakarūpavadrahitaḥ kālo
nāstīti bhāvaḥ | prāgeveti | kṣaṇabhaṅganirāsenetyarthaḥ ||
raghuº ṭīº | mukhyo yathārthaḥ | saiva buddhiḥ pratipattrī tatpūrva-
bhāvibuddhyantaraṃ vā | tadapi nīlādyākāraṃ svamātrasākṣikaṃ vā |
ādye tasyā ityādi | svasya svāśrayatvasvopādānatvayorasambhavā-
dityarthaḥ | antarā vijñānavādī pratyavatiṣṭhate | nīlādīti |
tathā cāhamākāropi jñānasvarūpameveti nātiriktātmasiddhiriti
bhāvaḥ | siddhaṃ jñānātiriktaviṣayavyavasthāpanāt | dvitīyaṃ
śaṅkate | astvityādi | ahamāspadamiti śeṣaḥ | upādānaṃ
sajātīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ buddhyantaram | mātrapadena vijātīyaṃ samavāyi-
kāraṇamatiriktamātmānaṃ vyavacchinatti | ākāramiti | tavā-
kārākāriṇorabhedāt asmākaṃ tu viṣayaviśiṣṭasyaiva vyavasāya-
syānuvyavasāye bhāsanāt | tṛtīyaṃ śaṅkate | pravṛttīti |
pratipattā pratipatterupādānam | astvityādi | upādānaṃ pareṣāṃ
sajātīyaṃ kāraṇamasmākaṃ samavāyi | anādinidhanaḥ samāna-
kālīnānekāvṛttisarvakālasambandhitāvacchedakarūpavān | tacca rūpaṃ
pareṣāṃ tatsantānatvam, asmākaṃ tu tattadātmatvam | pratipattā
ahamāspadaṃ pratipattyāśrayo vā | prāgeva kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅgena ||
kaḥ punaratra nyāyaḥ | pratisandhānam | tathyamida-
mityasiddhamatathyañca viruddham aviśiṣṭamanaikāntika-
miti cenna | hetvarthānavabodhāt | nahi pratyabhijñāna-
mātramatra vivakṣitam | tat kiṃ kāryakāraṇayoreka-
santānapratiniyamaḥ | so'pi viruddha iti cet ?
eṣo'pi na vivakṣito naḥ | kastarhi ? pūrvāparadhiyā-
mekakartṛtayā viniścayaḥ | eṣo'pi tāsāmupādāno-
pādeyabhāvenā'pyupapadyata iti cenna | sthairyasthitau
tadabhāvāt | kṣaṇikatve'pi naikajātīyatve sati
tadutpattirevopādānopādeyabhāvaḥ | śiṣyācāryadhiyā-
mapi tathābhāvaprasaṅgāt |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | atreti | sthirātmanītyarthaḥ | nyāyarucimpratyu-

tathā ca prayogaḥ ahamiti pratyayālambanaṃ sthiraṃ tādrūpyeṇa

patterityarthaḥ | so'pīti | kāryakāraṇasantānasya bhedaniyatatvā-
dityarthaḥ | āśayamudghāṭayati | pūrvāparadhiyāmiti | yo'haṃ
rūpamadrākṣaṃ so'haṃ sparśaṃ spṛśāmi yo'haṃ ghaṭamanvabhavaṃ so'haṃ taṃ
smarāmi iti pratyabhijñānamanekakartṛkādvyāvartamānamekakartṛkatāyāṃ
viśrāmyatītyarthaḥ | pūrvaṃ pratyabhijñāyamānatvaṃ sthairye'nvayaprādhānyenaiva
śaṅkitamityavirodhaḥ | anyathāsiddhimāha | eṣo'pīti | dhiyā-
mupādānopādeyabhāvavyatirekaprayuktaḥ caitramaitrayoḥ pratisandhāna-

dhiyāmupādānopādeyabhāvābhāvādityarthaḥ | abhyupagamavādenāha |
kṣaṇikatve'pīti | sājātye sati kāryakāraṇabhāva evopādāno-

naiketi | na ca sākṣātkāraṇatvaṃ vivakṣitamiha tu vacanādidvārā
taditi vācyam | smṛtyanubhavayostadabhāvāt ||
bhagīº ṭīº | yadyapi kathādaśāyāṃ pratyakṣamapyanumāna-
cchāyayaiva prayojakamiti samayaḥ tathā'pi nyāyāntaramāha | prati-
sandhānamiti | sa evāhamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ jñāturabhedasādhaka-
miti bhāvaḥ | tathyamiti | yathārthaṃ pratyabhijñānamasiddhamayathārthaṃ
bhedaparyavasāyitvenābhedaviruddhaṃ tanmātraṃ ca jvālādāvanaikāntika-
mityarthaḥ | kāryakāraṇayoḥ pūrvāparapratyayayorityarthaḥ | so'pīti |
tasya bheda evopapatterityarthaḥ | pūrveti | yo'haṃ rūpamupalabdhavān
so'haṃ spṛśāmīti pūrvāparayorekakartṛkatāsākṣātkāro'nekakartṛkā-
dvyāvṛtta ekakartṛkatvaṃ sādhayati | tathā hyantimabuddhiḥ pūrvabuddhyu-
pādānopādeyā tāvatkāle sthāyikartṛkā vā ekakartṛkatayā
pratyakṣaviṣayadhītvāditi vyatirekītyarthaḥ | nanu tathā pratisandhāna-
vyatireke kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāva upādhirataḥ pratisandhāne kāryakāraṇa-
bhāvaḥ prayojaka ityanvaye'nyathāsiddhiḥ, kartṛbhede'pi vilakṣaṇo-
tpādabhrameṇaiva pratisandhānarūpotpādādityāha | eṣo'pīti |
sthairyapakṣe bhāsanaṃ mitho nopādānopādeyabhāva ityāha | sthairyeti |
nanu sajātīyakāraṇasyaivopādānatvādbuddhīnāṃ tathātve na virodha
ityāha | kṣaṇikatve'pīti | yadi kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sākṣādviva-

mparayā sa vācyastatrāha | śiṣyeti | śiṣyācāryabuddhyorapi jñāna-

mantavyam | yadyapyupādheratiprasaktatve'pi sādhyavyāpakatvamakṣatameva

apratisandhāne kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvasyāvyāpakatvāt ||
raghuº ṭīº | syādetat siddhyatu kṣaṇabhaṅgo mā vā saitsīt sthiraḥ

dhiyāmautsargikasya prāmāṇyasyāpavaditumaśakyatvāt, tathā'pyanu-
mānamudrayā tasya gamakatve doṣamāśaṅkate | tathyamityādi | tathyaṃ
yathārtham | viruddham | amedabhramasya bhedavyāptatvāt | aviśiṣṭaṃ
pratyabhijñānasāmānyam | anaikāntikaṃ jñānādau | tatkimityādi |
kiṃ vitarke | vivakṣita iti vipariṇatena śeṣe'nvayaḥ | kārya-
kāraṇayoḥ smaraṇānubhavayoḥ | so'pi viruddhaḥ santānasya bheda-
vyāptatvāt1 | pūrveti | yo'haṃ ghaṭamadrākṣaṃ so'hamidānīṃ taṃ
smarāmīti pūrvāparadhiyāmekāśrayatvaniścaya ityarthaḥ | nanvayaṃ niścayo
niścetuḥ pūrvāparakālāvasthāyitve hetuḥ pūrvāparapratyayavatorabhede vā,
ādye jñānamātrasya gamakatve śeṣavaiyarthyaṃ, dvitīye tu bhramasādhāraṇo-
'yaṃ vyabhicārī2, pramārūpastvasiddhaḥ, sākṣātkāro'pi caupanayiko-
'śe'laukikaścānekāntaḥ sarvāṃśe laukikastvasiddhaḥ iti | maivam |
parapratītiḥ pūrvapratītyāśrayāśritā pūrvapratītyāśraye sākṣātkriya-

so'haṃ spṛśāmi yo'hamaspārkṣaṃ so'haṃ smarāmīti pūrvapratītyāśraye
bhedaniyatatvāditi 2 puº pāº |
pareṣāmasiddhavyāptikaṃ cetyadhikapāṭhaḥ 3 puº dṛśyate |
parapratyayavattvagrahaṇāt | sākṣātkāraśca laukiko grāhyaḥ | yo'haṃ
ghaṭamadrākṣaṃ so'haṃ spṛśāmīti pratisandhānaṃ kartṛbhede'nupapadyamānaṃ
pūrvāparapratītyorekakartṛkatvaṃ vyavasthāpayati pratyetavyādananyasyaiva pratyetu-
rahamāspadatvāt nahi bhavati caitro'haṃ yamadrākṣaṃ maitro'haṃ taṃ
spṛśāmīti punarākaracchāyāvāhī panthāḥ |

kecit |
yadvā pratisandhānena pratisandhānaprayojakaṃ smaraṇamabhihitam |
anyadṛṣṭasyānyena smaraṇe'tiprasaṅgāt, yaduktaṃ “nānyadṛṣṭaṃ smaratyanya”

bhavasya svāśraye smṛtijanakatvāt sthirātmasādhanaṃ, tatra ca saṃskārasya
tathātvāttaditi bhedāt |
santanyamāne'pyātmani ekasantānāntaḥpātitvanibandhano'ha-
māropaḥ prācīne pratyetari, tadabhedāropaścārvācīne, tatra codīcya-

manubhavitṛsantānaniyatamityāśaṅkate | eṣo'pīti | vyatirekiṇā
pratisandhānenaikakartṛkatve sādhye vyatireke upādānopādeyabhāvasyopādheḥ
sambhavāt sandigdhavyatirekitvamityāśaṅketyākare ṭīkākṛtaḥ |
atra ca ekasantānāntaḥpātināṃ jñānānāṃ satyapyupādānopādeya-
bhāve prāyaśo na pratisandhānamiti sādhyāvyāpakatvamagra eva vyaktī-
kariṣyata iti hṛdayam |
sthairyeti | sthairyavādināṃ sthiradravyasyopādānatvāt | kṣaṇikatve-
'pi | kṣaṇikavādimate'pi | tadutpattiḥ tasmādutpattiḥ kāryya-
kāraṇabhāvaḥ, sā cet sākṣādvivakṣitā, tadā antaritayoḥ sāntā-
nikayoratathābhāvādapratisandhānāpattiḥ, atha paramparāsādhāraṇī
tatrāha | śiṣyeti | tathā ca tatrāpi kadācit pratisandhā-
syāt vivakṣādīnāṃ vyavadhāyakatve sāntānikānāmapi tathātva kena
vāraṇīyam |
bhedāgrahe satīti cenna | prakṛte'pi tadabhāvāt |

bhagīº ṭīº | nanvabhedāgrahaviśiṣṭasya tasyaivopādhitvaṃ tena
buddhyorbhedagrahe kāryakāraṇabhāve'pi śiṣyācāryabuddhyorna pratisandhāna-
mityāha | bhedāgraha iti | yo'hamadrākṣaṃ so'haṃ spṛśāmīti
cākṣuṣaspārśanabuddhyorbhedasya pratisandhānasthale'pi grahānnaivamityāha |
prakṛte iti | buddhitvena tu bhedāgrahaḥ śiṣyācāryabuddhyorapyastīti
bhāvaḥ | śarīreti | śiṣyācāryayostu śarīrabhedagraha evetyarthaḥ |
upasthitena śarīreṇa bhedāgraho'nupasthitena vā | ādye bhinneti |
janmāntaraśarīrasyānupasthitena pratisandhāne bālasyeṣṭasādhanatānu-
mityabhāvādādyapravṛttirna syādityarthaḥ | antye'nupalabdheti | parasya
vā kāraṇapitṛśarīreṇānupasthitena bālasya bhedāgraho'styeveti pitṛ-
buddhipratisandhānāpattirityarthaḥ | na ca bhedāgrahamātraṃ niyāmakaṃ
liṅgādinā śarīrabhedagrahe'pi pratisandhānāditi bhāvaḥ | na vā
sajātīyaṃ kāraṇamityupādānakāraṇamativyāpakatvādityāha | ghaṭeti |
eketi | upādānopādeyatvabhāva ityanuṣajyate | tasyeti | upā-
dānopādeyayoḥ samasamayatvābhāvādityarthaḥ | atiprasaṅgamevāha |
śarīreti |
raghuº ṭīº | upādānopādeyabhāvamātraṃ na niyāmakamapi tu
bhedāgrahaviśiṣṭaḥ sa ityāśaṅkate | bhedāgraha iti | bhedāgrahaḥ kiṃ
pūrvāparajñānayoruta tadvatoḥ tatrāpyālayavijñānayorjñānāvacchedaka-
śarīrayorvā, ādye prakṛte'pīti | pūrvāparajñānayorbhedasyākalanāt |
na dvitīyaḥ | śiṣyācāryīyasthale'pi tatsattvāt | tṛtīyaṃ śaṅkate |
śarīreti | tatrāpi vyaktibhedasyāgraho vaijātyasya vā, dvitīye'pi
vastuto vaijātyasya vaijātyatvena vā | nādyaḥ | bālyādibhedena bhede1
pratisandhānāt | dvitīye bhinneti | smaraṇapratisandhānamadhikṛtya
cedam, tathā ca prāgbhavīyaśarīravaijātyasya caitratvāderaihikaśarīre
grahaṇāt pūrvajanmānubhūtasyeṣṭasādhanatādeḥ smaraṇaṃ na syādityarthaḥ |
tṛtīye'nupalabdheti | pituranupasthityā tadvaijātyatvasyāgrahāditi |
pitṛjñānasyāpi paramparayā śarīradvārā putrajñānanimittatvādeka-
kartṛkatvaniścayarūpapratisandhānapakṣe'pīdaṃ draṣṭavyam |
bhedasya grahe'pi iti 2 puº pāº |
kecittu jātismarasya prāgjanmānubhūtapratisandhānaṃ bhavadbhirapyu-
peyate tanna syādityartha ityāhuḥ |
anye tu upasthitāccharīrādabhedasyāgraho'nupasthitādapi vā,
ādye bhinneti | dvitīye'nupalabdhetītyāhuḥ |
lakṣaṇe'vyāptimapyāha | ghaṭeti | eketi | niyama upādāno-
pādeyabhāvasya | ekādhāratve sati kāryakāraṇabhāva evopādāno-
pādeyabhāva ityarthaḥ | tasyeti | tasya--ekasyādhārasya1 | ādhāra-

kāryakāraṇabhāva ityarthaḥ | śarīreti | śarīrāvayave śarīra-
buddhyādyorabhimānādityarthaḥ |
yadvā eketi | ekasya kāraṇasyādhāratayā niyama upādānatvasya,
tathācādhārādheyayorjanakajanyabhāva ityekamanyacca prāgukta lakṣaṇamiti
bhāvaḥ | tasya | janakajanyayorādhārādheyabhāvasya | itthañcāgre
samānadeśatāsādeśyayorādhārādheyabhāvaparatvam |
etena--
“abhrāntasamataikāvasāyaḥ prakṛtivikriye |
tatau hetuphalasyopādānopādeyalakṣaṇam” ||
iti nirastam |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | abhrānteti | hetuphalasya tatau santatāviti
dvayamupādānopādeyalakṣaṇam | kintadityāha | abhrāntaḥ samatayā
ekādhārasyeti 2 puº pāº |
ekāvasāyaḥ ekākārāvasāyaḥ sabhāgasantānopādānopādeyalakṣaṇaṃ,
visabhāgasantāne tu prakṛtivikārabhāva ityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | eteneti | avyāpakatvenātivyāpakatvena ca |
hetuphalabhāvasya, tatau santatau | tathāca kāryabhāve satyabhrāntaḥ
samatayā sādṛśyenaikāvasāyaḥ tatsadṛśajñānamekatvajñānaṃ veti sabhāge
lakṣaṇaṃ, visabhāge tu prakṛtivikriye, prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ | atra

vyāptiḥ, ekatvāvasāyamātramativyāpakaṃ mitho lakṣyāvṛttitvenānanu-

ghaṭo'yaṃ ghaṭo'yamiti yatsamatayā ekāvasāyo'nugatāvasāyastenātra
sājātyaṃ niścitamityarthaḥ | samataiva durnirūpetyāha | atheti |
sājātyañcettadā''tmāśrayaḥ sājātyenaiva sājātyanirūpaṇāt, sādeśya-
ñcet tadā ekādhāratākhaṇḍanenaiva nirastetyarthaḥ | nanvekasantāna-
tvameva sājātyaṃ tacca sabhāgavisabhāgayostulyamityāha | eketi |
nimitteti | puñjāt puñjotpattistathā ca pūrvarūpasya rūpaṃ pratyu-
pādānatvaṃ rasaṃ prati nimittatvamiti tvadabhyupagamarītyā rūpasyāpi
rasaṃ pratyupādānatvaṃ syādityarthaḥ | tadutpattiśabdenopādānopādeya-
bhāva eva vivakṣita ityato nātiprasaṅga ityata āha | upā-
dāneti | tathā ātmāśraya ityarthaḥ | ekakartṛkatvavyāvṛtyā prati-
sandhānavyāvṛttiḥ siddhāntinoktā | tatra pareṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāva
evopādhirupanyastastatra ca pratisandhānābhāvo hetuvyatirekaḥ sādhya-
vyatirekavyāpako vaktavya upādhiśca1 tatra sādhyavyāpako vaktavyastatra
ca śiṣyācāryadhiyoḥ pitāputradhiyośca pratisandhānābhāvo'sti na
tu kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāva upādhiriti sādhyāvyāpakatvamupādhau
dūṣaṇamuktaṃ, upādānopādeyabhāvalakṣaṇakhaṇḍanantu prasaktānuprasaktika-
mityavadheyam |
bhagīº ṭīº | sabhāgeṣu--sajātīyeṣu | prāgiti | ekā-
dhāratvanirāsenetyarthaḥ | nimitteti | tathā ca tatrāpyekakartṛkatayā
upādhirastu iti 3 puº pāº |
pratisandhānaṃ syādityarthaḥ | yadyapi nātra ghaṭapaṭādau pratisandhāna-
mupakrāntaṃ, kintu pūrvāparapratyayayorekakartṛkatvena pratisandhānamukta-
nibandhanamityupakrāntaṃ tathāpi lakṣaṇāmātradoṣatvenedamuktam | ātmā-
śrayeti | tasyaiva tallakṣaṇatve pratisandhānamevopādhiḥ syādityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | dūṣaṇāntaramāha | kāṣṭhasya ceti | etadapi
sabhāge santāne upādānopādeyabhāvāvadhāraṇamapi | kutaḥ | sādeśya-
mekādhāratvaṃ yathopavarṇitaṃ prāk, śiṣyācāryabuddhyoratiprasaṅgena, vāstava-
sādeśyābhāvena ca nirastaṃ | pratisandhānaniyāmaka upādānopādeya-
bhāvaḥ pratisandhānameva ca sa ityātmāśrayaḥ |
tadyogyateti cet ? saiva keti cintyam | śakti-
viśeṣa iti cet ? sa tāvanna pratikṣaṇaniyataḥ | yathā
hi tena tatkartavyaṃ tathā tādṛśā'pi tatkartavyamityapi
niyama eva, anyathā tena tatkṛtamityapi na niśrīyeta |
kṣaṇasya durunneyatvāt | tathā ca nirīhaṃ jagajjāyeta,
ākasmikañca kāryasya tādṛśatvamāpadyeta, tathā ca na
niyama upalabhyeta1 | nāpi pratisantānaniyataḥ
(śaktiviśeṣaḥ) viśeṣābhāvāt |
upapadyate iti 1 puº pāº |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | saiveti | pratisandhānayogyatāyā eva vicārya-
māṇatvānna saiva lakṣaṇamityarthaḥ | śaktiviśeṣa iti | buddhīnāṃ sa
tādṛśaḥ śaktiviśeṣo yena pratisandhānaniyamaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāve
satyupapadyate śiṣyācāryadhiyośca sa nāstīti na pratisandhāna-
mityarthaḥ | sa tāvaditi | śaktiviśeṣo hi kāraṇatvameva tanna
prativyaktigrāhyamaśakyatvādananugamācca1 | kiṃ ca yā vyaktiśca kāraṇaṃ
tajjātīyā'pi vyaktiḥ kāraṇameveti niyama eva | na cākāśaḥ
śabdakāraṇaṃ nacākāśajātīyaṃ tatra jāterabhāvāditi vācyam |
anvayavyatirekagrāhyakāraṇatāyā evaṃrūpatvāt | prakṛte tu dharmi-
grāhakamānasiddhetyadoṣāt | anyatheti | jāteḥ kāraṇatvānava-
cchedakatve | kuta etadityata āha, kṣaṇasyeti | nanu nopalabdhe
kāraṇatvaṃ ko doṣa ityata āha tathā ceti2 | iṣṭasādhanatā-
'niṣṭasādhanatājñānābhāvāt pravṛttinivṛttī na syātāmityarthaḥ |
nirīhaṃ niśceṣṭaṃ hitāhitaprāptiparihāralakṣaṇakriyāśūnyamityarthaḥ |
ākasmikañceti | kāraṇatāvacchedakarūpaṃ vinā kāryatāvacchedakarūpaṃ
pratiniyataṃ na syādityarthaḥ | mā bhūtko doṣa ityata āha | tathā
ceti | dhūmajātīyaṃ vahnijātīyajanyamiti niyamo nopapadyete-
tyarthaḥ3 | tathā ca buddhitvenaiva kāraṇatā vācyā pratisandhānaṃ prati,
tacca śiṣyācāryabuddhyorapīti bhāvaḥ | pratisantānaniyata iti |
danugamarahitatvācceti 3 puº pāº |
anyatheti 2 puº pāº |
nopalabhyetetyartha iti 3 puº pāº |
śaktiviśeṣa ityanuṣañjanīyam | viśeṣābhāvāditi | śiṣyā-
cāryabuddhisantānayorvyāvartakadharmābhāvādityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | tadyogyateti | tathā ca pratisandhānayogyatā-
lakṣaṇa upādhirityarthaḥ | saiveti | yogyatāvacchedakaṃ rūpameva
nānugatamityarthaḥ | sa tāvaditi | pratikṣaṇaniyatasvarūpatvena vyabhi-
cārānna kāraṇatvagrahaḥ, yā vyaktiryadvyaktijanyā tatastajjātīyā
vyaktistajjātīyajanyeti vyāpteḥ | na cākāśajanyaśabdavyaktyā vyabhi-
cāraḥ ākāśasyaikatvāditi vācyam | anvayavyatirekagrāhyakārya-
kāraṇabhāve tathā niyamāt | tatra ca dharmigrāhakamānasya tadgrāha-
katvādityarthaḥ | yadyevaṃ na syāttarhyekakṣaṇikabhāve'nvayavyatireka-
grahāśakyatayā kāryakāraṇabhāvāgrahāt kvacidapi pravṛttinivṛttī
na syātāmityāha | anyatheti | tādṛśatvaṃ niyatajātīyatvam |
viśeṣeti | kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāve'pi śiṣyācāryabuddhivyāvṛttānu-
gataniyāmakarūpābhāvādityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | śaktīti | yadyapi pratisandhānānukūlā śaktiḥ
pratisandhātaryeva, na pratisandheye, tasya cirātītatvena tatrāprayojaka-
tvāt tathā'pi tasya śaktiviṣayatvaṃ tathā cānusandheyānusandhātṛbhāva
evopādānopādeyabhāva iti bhāvaḥ | tādṛśā tajjātīyena kāraṇena |
tat tadajanyaṃ tat tatkāryajātīyam | tadajanyaṃ tajjanyajātīyaṃ
kāryamavaśyaṃ tatsamānajātīyakāraṇajanyamityarthaḥ | tathā ceti |
prativyakti kāryakāraṇabhāvasya anāgatakāryavyakteranupasthityā grahītu-
maśakyatvāt sāmānyena rūpeṇa tadagrahe iṣṭāniṣṭopāyatāgrahasya
kāraṇasyābhāvāt kvacidapi pravṛttinivṛttī na syātāmityarthaḥ |
tādṛśatvaṃ niyatajātīyatvam | niyamaḥ kānicideva kāryāṇi
kiñcijjātīyānītyākārakaḥ |
pratisandhānaśakteḥ prativyaktiviśrāntatve apratisandheyāprati-
sandhātṛvyaktyorupādānopādeyabhāvo na syāt tatra tādṛśaśaktau
mānābhāvādityapi draṣṭavyam |
viśeṣābhāvāditi | viśeṣo niyāmakaḥ śakteḥ sāmarthyasya
niyāmakamavacchedakaṃ vinā niyatadravyavṛttitvāyogāt jñānatva-
santānatvayoścātiprasaktatvāt |
astu vaijātyamiti cenna | anupalabdhibādhitatvāt
nahi śiṣyācāryanīladhiyormātrayā'pi jātikṛtaṃ
viśeṣamupalabhāmahe | adṛśyatvādayamadoṣa iti cenna |
dṛśyasamavāyinyā jāteradṛśyatvānupapatteḥ | upapattau
vā dhūmādāvapi avakāśaprasaṅgāt | tathā cāvāntara-
sattvavadavāntaradhūma eva vahneḥ kāryaḥ syāt iti śaṅkā-
kalaṅkitatvāt na (ca) dhūmasāmānyamagniṃ gamayet |
evametat | ādyasyaiva tathābhāvāditi cenna | tatrāpi
śaṅkāyāstadavasthatvāt | tasmāt kāraṇasya vaijātye
pramāṇasiddhe kāryasya sausādṛśye'pyavāntarajātibhedaḥ
kalpyate, hetuvaijātyasya phalavaijātyaṃ prati prayojaka-
tvāt, aprayojakatve tasyā''kasmikatvaprasaṅgāt |
kāraṇasājātye'pi kāryasya vaijātyaṃ sahakārivaijātye
paryavasyatīti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ | anyathā prakṛte para-
loko'pi na siddhyet | acetanopādānakamapi jñāna-
mavāntarajātīyaṃ syāt, acetanamapyavāntarajātīyaṃ
jñānopādānaṃ bhavet, dṛśyajātyabhede'pi kiñcideva
nimittaṃ bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkāyāḥ samutthāpayituṃ śakya-
tvād iti |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | adṛśyatvāditi | ekasantānikabuddhiṣveva sa
viśeṣo'sti parantu nopapadyeta ityarthaḥ1 | vyaktiyogyatāniyatatvā-
jjātiyogyatāyā anyathā vahniprayojyā kācijjātiḥ piśāca-
janyadhūmādviśeṣā bhaviṣyatītyapi śaṅkyetetyarthaḥ | evametaditi |
dhūme'pi vaijātyaśaṅkā bhavatyeva kintu prathama eva vahniprabhavo dhūmo
vahniṃ gamayatītyarthaḥ | ādyo'pi dhūmaḥ piśācādeva kiṃ iti
śaṅkāyāstatrāpi sadbhāvādityāha | tatrāpīti | nanvevaṃ tṛṇāraṇi-
maṇisthale'pi vahnau vaijātyaṃ na kalpyetetyāśaṅkyopasaṃharati |
tasmāditi | atra hetumāha | hetuvaijātyasyeti | atraiva vipakṣa-
daṇḍamāha | ahetukatva iti | nanvātmamanaḥsaṃyogajanyamapi jñāna-
nopalabhyetetyartha iti 3 puº pāº |
sukhādi kathaṃ vijātīyamityata āha | kāraṇeti | indriyā-
rthādisahakārivaijātyaprayuktaṃ tadvaijātyamityarthaḥ | vaibhāṣikaṃ pratyāha |
anyatheti | yadi kāraṇavaijātye kāryavaijātyaṃ na kalpyeta, kārya-
vaijātye kāraṇavaijātyaṃ na tantraṃ, tadā buddhisantānamātrādaviśiṣṭāda-
viśiṣṭasukhaduḥkhātmakaparalokasiddhirapi na syādityarthaḥ | yadvā
anyatheti | ekasya karturanabhyupagama ityarthaḥ | aniyamaścettatrāha |
acetaneti | jñānopādānakāt jñānādajñānopādānakaṃ vijātīya-
meva kiñcijjñānaṃ bhavedityarthaḥ | acetanamapīti | ghaṭo'pi
kaścidvijātīyo jñānopādānakaḥ syādityarthaḥ | dṛśyajātyabheda
iti | dhūmatvāvacchinna eva kaścidvahneḥ, kaścitpiśācādbhaviṣyatīti
dhūmādvahnyanumānaṃ na syādityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | vaijātyamiti | viśeṣa ityanuṣañjanīyam |
anyonyabuddhivyāvṛttaṃ tattadbuddhisantāna eva vaijātyam tallakṣaṇaṃ
pratisandhānaprayojakatāvacchedakamupādherityarthaḥ | ādyasyaiva dhūmājanya-
dhūmasyaiva | tathābhāvaḥ vahnikāryatvam | tatrāpīti | ādyadhūme'pi
na vahnitvena vahniḥ prayojakaḥ, api tu tatprayojakajātyeti śaṅkāyā
ityarthaḥ | nanvevaṃ yogyā'nupalabdhyā tārṇatvādi vahnigatamapi na vaijātyaṃ
kalpyetetyata āha | tasmāditi | na ca yogyā'nupalabdhistatrā'pi
kāraṇabhedavyaṅgyatvāttajjāterityarthaḥ | nanvihāpi pratisandhānarūpa-
kāryavaijātyāt kāraṇavaijātyaṃ kalpyatāmityata āha | kāraṇeti |
ekāśrayarūpasahakāribhedenaiva tadupapannaṃ na kāraṇavaijātyakalpaka-
mityarthaḥ |
yadyapi pratisandhānāntarāyogyatayaiva tadapekṣavaijātyasya yogyā-
nupalambhasiddhiḥ, tathāpi svabuddhisantāne eva tajjāteryogyānupa-
lambho'tra vivakṣitaḥ |
paraloko'pīti | paraloke saugatairapyanantā jñānadhārā'bhyupa-
gamyate sā na siddhyet acetana eva kutrāpi jñānadhārotpādābhyupa-
gamādvaijātyamāśritya ihaiva buddhisantativirāmādvetyarthaḥ | acetaneti |
buddherbuddhyupādānakatve'pi kācidbuddhistādṛśī na syādityarthaḥ |
acetanamiti | acetanasya jñānānupādānatve'pi kiñcidacetanaṃ
jñānopādānaṃ syādityarthaḥ | dṛśyeti | tathā ca niścitakārya-
kāraṇabhāve vahnidhūmādāvapi prayojakāntarasambhāvanayā kārya-
kāraṇabhāvāniścayāt kvāpi pravṛttirna syādityarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | asti vaijātyaṃ santānāntaravyāvṛtto jāti-
viśeṣaḥ, sā jātirdṛśyā adṛśyā vā, ādye anupalabdhibādhitatvā-
diti | dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate | adṛśyatvāditi | nirākaroti |
dṛśyeti | dṛśyaṃ samavāyi yasyāstasyāḥ | yogyavyaktivṛttitvenaiva
jāteryogyatvāditi bhāvaḥ | tathāceti | sattva ātmā pareṣāṃ
kṣaṇikavijñānarūpaḥ | yathā kāraṇeṣu dṛśyeṣu jñānaviśeṣeṣu prati-
sandhānajanakatāvacchedikā jātiradṛśyā, evaṃ kāryeṣvapi dṛśyeṣu
dhūmaviśeṣeṣu vahnijanyatāvacchedikā jātiradṛśyā syāditi śaṅkayā
dhūmasāmānye vahnijanyatvāgrahānna tena kāryeṇa kāraṇasya vahneranumānaṃ
syādityarthaḥ | tathābhāvāt vahnijanyatvāt | tatrāpīti | ādyo'pi
dhūmo na tattvena vahnijanyo'pi tu tadavāntarajātyeti śaṅkāyāḥ
sambhavādityarthaḥ | nanvevaṃ tṛṇāraṇyādijanye'pi vahnau vaijātyaṃ na
syādityata āha | tasmāditi | sausādṛśya iti | āpātato-
'nupalambha upapāditaḥ | tasya phalavaijātyasya | ākasmikatveti |
kāraṇasya vyabhicāreṇākāraṇatvaprasaṅgo'pi draṣṭavyaḥ | nanvevaṃ dravya-
jātīyopādānakānāṃ saṃyogavibhāgādīnāṃ ātmajātīyopādāna-
kānāñca sukhaduḥkhādīnāṃ mitho vaijātyaṃ na syādata āha |
kāraṇeti | anyathā yadi vinaiva pramāṇaṃ vaijātyakalpanena kārya-
kāraṇabhāvakalpanaṃ tadā paraloko'pi (paro vartamānādanyobhūto
bhāvī ca loko'pi) na siddhyet ihaiva 1jñānasantānoparama-
sambhavāt anādinidhanaśca jñānasantāno bhavadbhirupeyate | 2nanu
jñānasya jñānopādānakatvāt jñānasantānasya sāditve ādyajñānā-
nutpattau santānānutpattiprasaktirata āha | acetanaviti | kiñci-
dvijātīyaṃ jñānamajñānopādānakamapi syādityarthaḥ | athājñānasya
jñānopādānatve ghaṭāderapi tathātvāpattiḥ, nimittatāyāścopā-
jñānasantānaviśrāmāditi 1 puº pāº |
upādānajñānasantānānuparame kathamupādeyatatsantānoparama ityata

tatropādānaṃ syāt tathā ca taduparamādupādeyasantānoparamaḥ | acetanaṃ
yadi jñānopādānaṃ tarhi ghaṭādikamapi kiṃ na tathetyata āha | acetana-
mapīti | 2 puº pāº |
dānatvavyāptatvāt | ajñānasya ca jñānānupādānakatvāt, santānasya
sāntatve'ntimasyārthakriyākāritvaviraheṇāsattvāt santānasyaivāsattva-
prasaṅga ityāśaṅkādvayaṃ nirasyati | acetanamityādi | jñānasyo-
pādānamiti tatpuruṣeṇādyāyā jñānamupādānaṃ yasyeti bahuvrīhiṇā
dvitīyāyā āśaṅkāyā nirāsaḥ | nanvevaṃ jñānajātīyamākasmikaṃ
syādabhihitahetūnāṃ viśeṣa eva viśrāmāt ata āha | dṛśyeti |
astu tarhi sahakāribhedānniyama iti cet ? sa
evaikaḥ karteti gīyate | athaika eva kartā na tu tādṛk
sahakāriparampareti kuto viśeṣāditi cet (na),
tatkartṛkatvaṃ bhinnakartṛkebhyo vyāvartate na tu tādṛk 1saha-
kāritvamityato viśeṣāt | kutaścidevamapi syāditi
cennanu sa eva viśeṣaścintyate | 2sa ca tatsvabhāvatvaṃ
vā, tajjātīyatvaṃ vā, tatsahakāritvaṃ vā, tādṛk saha-
kāritvaṃ vetyato nātiricyate | tatra prathamo'sambhavī |
dvitīyo'tiprasañjakaḥ | caturthe niyāmakābhāvaḥ | tata-
stṛtīya eva pariśiṣyate gatyantarābhāvāditi |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | atiprasaṅgāpādanena bhagnaḥ paraḥ pratisandhāna-
niyāmakaṃ śiṣyācāryabuddhivilakṣaṇaṃ śaṅkate | astu tarhīti |
siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitamiti siddhāntyāha | sa eveti | pratisandhāna-
sahakāritvaparampareti 2 puº pāº |
na ca iti 1 puº pāº |
niyāmaka ityarthaḥ | nanu siddhe'pi pratisandhātari tadabhedasiddhiḥ
kathamiti śaṅkate | atheti | pratisandhānabalādeva tadekatvaṃ tādṛśasya
niyāmakatve caitradṛṣṭamapi maitraḥ pratisandadhīteti pariharati |
taditi | evamapīti | tādṛśatvamapi pratisandhānaniyāmakaṃ syādi-
tyarthaḥ | parihāramāha | nanviti | tatsvabhāvatvamiti | pratikṣaṇa-
niyataśaktibhedātmakatvamityarthaḥ | tajjātīyatvamiti | buddhisantāna-
mātrajātīyatvamityarthaḥ | tatsahakāritvamiti | buddhisantāne'pyekasya-
sahakāriṇaḥ sāpekṣatvamityarthaḥ | tādṛgiti | klṛptasahakāri-
vijātīyatvamityarthaḥ | asambhavīti | kṣaṇāntare'pi kāryadarśanādi-
tyarthaḥ | atiprasañjaka iti | śiṣyācāryabuddhisantāne'pi pratisandhāna-
prasaṅga ityarthaḥ | niyāmakābhāva iti | caitradṛṣṭe'pi maitrasmaraṇa-
prasaṅga ityarthaḥ | tṛtīya iti | tadekasahakāritvamityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | sa evaika iti | pratyabhijñānaviṣayaḥ saha-
kāribheda ityarthaḥ | nanvabhinna eva pratyabhijñānaviṣayaḥ syādi-
tyāha | atheti | bhinnakartṛkebhyaḥ pratisandhīyamānebhyaḥ ekakartṛkatvaṃ
jñāne nivartate na tu paramparetyāha | tatkartṛkatvamiti | anya-

jñātavāniti ya eveṣṭasādhanatāmanubhūtavān sa evopadeṣṭā na vā

tajjātīyatve bhinnatvasyānapāyādityarthaḥ | na tarhīti | yattveka-

tvānubhavānna viṣayabhedastavopādhirityarthaḥ | nanu buddhitvena bhedāgrahaḥ

karturbhedenāpi pratisandhāne tvasiddheḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | athaveti | apiśabdena prāguktamasambhavaṃ smārayati |
ayamupādānopādeyabhāvaḥ | upādhiḥ prayojakaḥ | sa hi nirapekṣo
vā tathā syāt, sāpekṣo vā | ādye tatreti | tatra pratisandhāne |
tāvanmātrasya upādānopādeyabhāvamātrasya | tathāhītyādi | tat
pratisandhānaṃ satyamasatyaṃ vā, ādye ādya ityādi | anākalanāt |

grahe'pyālayavijñānasyāviṣayakasya bhedāgraho'stītyarthaḥ | tadantaḥ-
pātīti | ahamityākāraḥ pravṛttivijñānaviśeṣa evālayavijñāna-

tvāttadananubhavo'siddhaḥ nahyatiriktasvātmanyahamityullekho na tvālaya-
vijñāna ityatra niyāmakamadyāpi | maivam | ahamāspadasyāti-

yadvālayābhimatasyābhedollekhādasatibādhake sthiratvasiddhāvātmasiddhi-
rityatra tātparyāt |
sadapyālayavijñānaṃ pravṛttivijñānopādānaṃ na vā, antye
paraspareti | parasparamālayavijñānapravṛttivijñānābhyāṃ yatpratyā-

yadvā anu paścāt sandhānabandhaḥ saṅghaṭanaṃ pūrvāparapratyayānāmekaviṣayatva-
grahaḥ sa na syādityarthaḥ | nanvatreṣṭāpattiḥ | na hi dvayorapi pravṛtti-
vijñānālayavijñānayoḥ pratisandhāyakatvamapi tvālayavijñānasya,
tathāca viśiṣṭavyatirekarītyā'bhimatātmasiddhireva | maivam | pravṛtti-
vijñānaviṣaya ālayavijñānena na pratisandheya ityatra tātparyāt |
tathātve'pīti | upādānopādeyabhāvānāpannayorapi pratisandhāna
ityarthaḥ | ādye pravṛttivijñānamapi tadupādānaṃ na vā, ādye
ubhayorapīti | tadvadevāvayavyāderaṅgīkāre'pasiddhānta ityarthaḥ |
nanvidamāpādanaṃ śabdasāmyamātrāt | tathāhyekaṃ vijñānaṃ yadyaneka-
jātīyakāraṇajanyaṃ syāt kimāyātamanekavṛtteravayavyādeḥ na hi
tasyānekasajātīyajanyatā anaṅgīkāranidānaṃ, kintu kārtsnyaikadeśa-
vikalpādiḥ | maivam | kāryakāraṇabhāvasyāpi sambandhaviśeṣatayā
tasyā'pyanekavṛttitvavirodhāpādanāt | yadvā yadāśritaṃ kāryaṃ
jāyate tadevopādānaṃ āśritatvaṃ ca dharmiviśeṣaḥ svarūpabhedo veti
nāsāmyam |
dvitīyamāśaṅkya nirācaṣṭe | na ceti | ālayavijñāna-
santāna evopādānaṃ pravṛttivijñānantu na kasyāpyupādānaṃ, kintu
nimittamātramiti nānekopādeyamekaṃ kāryamityapi nāsti, tathā
sati pravṛttivijñānaṃ nimittakāraṇamapi na syādyannimittaṃ
tadupādānamiti bauddhasiddhavyāpterityarthaḥ |
nanu neyaṃ vyāptiḥ na hi yasya yadīyaṃ nimittatvaṃ tasya
tadīyamupādānatvamapi, ghaṭanimittakāraṇadaṇḍādau vyabhicārāt |
atha yannimittaṃ tatkvacidupādānamitivyāptiḥ, tarhi pravṛttivijñāne-
nālayavijñānavijātīyaṃ santānāntaramevopādīyatāmityarthāntaram |
kiñcāpavarge pravṛttivijñānasyopādānatāṃ vināpi sarvajñavijñānā-
dikaṃ prati nimittatvaṃ saugatairabhyupagamyate anyathā caramavijñāna-
syāpi sajātīyajñānāntaropādānatāyāmanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ |
atrāhuḥ | yadi vijñānena vijātīyaṃ santānāntarameva jananīyaṃ
tadālayavijñānena pravṛttivijñānopādeyaṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ pratisandheyaṃ
tadā ca na svopādeyasyaiva pratisandhānaṃ tathā cātiprasaṅgaḥ | na ca
pravṛttivijñānameva pratisandhāyakaṃ tathā satyālayavijñāna eva mānā-
bhāvaḥ | na ca vyāptau vyabhicāraḥ caramavijñānasyāpi yogijñānaṃ
pratyupādānatvāt |
vipakṣabādhakamāha | anyatheti | anupādānatve nimittatā-
mātramupagamya prāpya sabhāgavisabhāgayorapyanupādānatve sarvatra tathā-
tvānnirupādānasya ca santānasyābhāvāt sarvatra santānocchedaprasaṅga
ityarthaḥ | omitīti | anupādānasya nimittatvābhāvādasattvaprasaṅgaḥ,
arthakriyākāriṇa eva sattvāt, tadasattve tadutpattikriyāvirahe
tadrūpasyāpyevamityarthaḥ | tasmāditi | etāvatā pravṛttivijñānamupā-
dānameva na bhavatīti dūṣitam | idānīṃ vijātīyasantānaṃ
taditi nirasyata ityarthaḥ | na pratisandhāna iti | pravṛttivijñā-
nopādeyenānyena saha vijñānasyopādānopādeyabhāvābhāvādityarthaḥ |

anubhavitṛsantānavaijātyaṃ veti caramapakṣamutthāpayati | vaijātyantviti |

nanu viṣayoparāgavyatireko nāsti | kiñca kāraṇajñānākāraḥ

noktadoṣa ityata āha | sarvākāratvamiti | ekasya pāṭavāpāṭava-

na ceti |

samāsādayet, na tu viparyayāt | yastu bhogaṃ, so'pi
tathā ityanukūlameva pratikūlatvena gṛhītaṃ mandaiḥ | anya-
trānurajyeta, anyatrāpi dviṣyāditi tu na dṛṣṭaṃ govaidyake-
'pīti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | ayamīdṛśa iti | ātmā nityavibhurityarthaḥ |
heyatve hetumāha | ātmadarśī hīti | anātmadarśina iti |
duḥkhavantamātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva tadduḥkhahānecchā mumukṣā sā ātmadarśina
evetyarthaḥ | etadevopapādayati | na hīti | sukhaṃ vā āptumiti
dṛṣṭāntārtham | abhiyogaḥ | sukhāptiduḥkhahānānukūlo vyāpāraḥ |
nāstikyamiti | nāsti karma nāsti karmaphalamiti niścayavattvaṃ
nāstikyaṃ, tataḥ kimityata āha | tacceti | viṣayatṛṣṇā tāvada-
gamyāgamanābhakṣyabhakṣaṇāpeyapānādyabhilāṣaḥ tatpariplutaṃ taduparaktamanarthaṃ
narakahetubhūtamadharmaṃ bahu janayedityarthaḥ | na cedevamiti | yadi
nāstikyaṃ na draḍhayedityarthaḥ | sukhaṃ jīvediti | bhakṣyapeyādāvavi-
gānataḥ pravṛttiparaḥ syāt | taddhetau | mokṣahetau | tatparipanthinaṃ
bhogābhilāṣam | viparyayāt mokṣaparipanthisevanāt | so'pi tatheti |
bhogaparipanthinaṃ pariharedityarthaḥ | anyatrāpīti | samīhitādanyatretyarthaḥ |
niḥśaṅkapralāpā iti 1 puº pāº |
govaidyako gocikitsakaḥ, so'pi hi gavāṃ pāṭanaploṣaṇādisāhasa-
manutiṣṭhatyevetyarthaḥ ||
bhagīº ṭīº | iyatā prabandhenātmatattvavivekaḥ siddho'pi na
mokṣahetuḥ, pratyuta virodhīti niṣphalaḥ prayāsa ityata āha | siddho-
'pīti | ātmā heyaḥ saṃsāranidānarāgadveṣahetutvāt śarīrādivat |
naivāsya bhāvanaṃ mokṣahetuḥ vairāgyahetujñānatvāt duḥkhajñānavat |
ātmajñānaṃ na mokṣahetuḥ rāgadveṣahetujñānatvādityarthaḥ | tathā sati
mokṣasādhane'pi pravṛttirna syāt, tasyā iṣṭasādhanatādhījanyatvādātmā-
bhāve ceṣṭasādhanatvābhāvādityāha | anātmeti | abhiyogaḥ prayatnaḥ |
pratyutātmano'stitvadhīreva rāgādihetuḥ, paralokabhāgino niṣiddha-
karmabhokturabhāve'niṣṭasādhane'pi pravṛtterapratyūhādityāha | iyañceti |
nāstikyaṃ nāsti karmaphalamiti niścayaḥ | bhogamiti | upakāraṃ
manute ityanuṣajyate ||
raghuº ṭīº | sukhaṃ cāvāptumiti dṛṣṭāntārtham | abhiyogaḥ
prayatnaḥ | nāstikyaṃ nāsti paralokaḥ nāsti karmaphalamiti niścayaḥ |
tacceti | paralokādyabhāvaniścayanivartakasya1 narakabhayasya viraheṇa
rāgavaśānniḥśaṅkamabhakṣyabhakṣaṇādyācārānnarakasantatirutpadyata ityarthaḥ |
viparyayānmokṣahetoranupādānāt mokṣaparipanthinaścāparīhārāt |
niścaye nivarttakasya iti pāṭhaḥ |
bhogamiti | upakāraṃ manute ityanuṣajyate | anyatrābhilaṣita-
hetoranyatra1 abhilaṣitaparipanthinaśca2 ||
tathāpi duḥkhahetutvādindriyādivadasau hīyatā-
miti cet ? yādṛśo duḥkhahetustādṛśo heya eva,
sopādhiśca tathā | nirupādhirapi hīyatāmiti cet ?
na | aśakyatvāt, niṣprayojanatvācca | na hi tasya
hānaṃ vināśo nityatvāt | nāpi viprayogo vyāpaka-
tvāt | nāpyapratipattiḥ, yathā yathā tadarthaṃ yatnaḥ, tathā
tathā pratipatteḥ | upekṣāta iti cet ? kṛtaivaitāvantaṃ
kālamupekṣā, tathāpi taddhānāsiddheḥ | niṣprayojanaṃ
caitat, sopādherhi tyāgo duḥkhahānāya, nirupādhestu
kimartham | punaḥ sopādhitvaśaṅkayā iti cet | na |
bījābhāvāditi | kutaḥ punarupādeyaḥ ? tathā sati
bhāvanākrameṇa niḥśreyasasiddheḥ | kimasyopādānaṃ ?
vivekaḥ | kutaḥ ? anātmanaḥ śarīrādeḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | sopādhiriti | śarīrādisambhinna ityarthaḥ |
aśakyatvāditi sphorayati | na hīti | viprayogo viprakarṣaḥ | aprati-
pattirityatra hānamityanuṣañjanīyam | upekṣāta ityatrāpratipatti-
rityanuṣañjanīyam | kṛtaivaitāvantamiti | ātmapratipattāvupekṣā
anyaditi 1 puº pāṭhaḥ |
ceti 1 puº nāsti |
kṛtā śravaṇādau yatno na kṛtastathā'pyātmahānaṃ na siddhamityarthaḥ |
niṣprayojanatvāditi vivṛṇoti | niṣprayojanaṃ ceti | kimarthamiti |
heyamiti śeṣaḥ | sopādhitveti | punaḥ śarīrādiprāptyāpattiśaṅka-
yetyarthaḥ | bījābhāvāditi | saṃsārabījaṃ dharmādharmau tadabhāvādeva
na punarāvṛttirityarthaḥ | nirupādherātmanaḥ pratipattyarthaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kimartha-
miti pṛcchati | kuta iti | mananārthaṃ nyāyānusaraṇena1 manane jāte
bhāvanayā nididhyāsanena sākṣātkārānniḥśreyasasiddhyarthamityāha |
tathā satīti | nityavibhutayā hānavadupāttasyaivopādānamapyaśakya-
mityāha | kimiti | viveka iti | bhedena jñānamityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | sopādhiriti | śarīrendriyādyupādhimānityarthaḥ |
aśakyatvaṃ vivṛṇoti | na hīti | nāpīti | yadyapi vyāpakasyāpi
vibhāgarūpo viprayogo'styeva, tathāpi punastasya saṃyogāntaramāvaśyaka-
miti bhāvaḥ | yathāyatheti | svātmaviṣayāpratipattyarthaṃ yatnastadviṣaya-
jñānajanya ityātmapratipattiravarjanīyetyarthaḥ | upekṣāta iti | ātma-
pratipattyarthaṃ na yatna upeyata iti ātmajñānaṃ na syādityarthaḥ |
kṛtaiveti | yatnābhāve'pyātmajñānasyāvaśyakatvāccharīrādibhinnātma-
jñānasya cādya yāvadavṛttatvena saṃsārasyaiva sattvādityarthaḥ | punariti |
mokṣe'pyātmano nidānasya sattvāt punarduḥkhādimattvaśaṅkayā mokṣa
ityarthaḥ | bījeti | tatsattve'pi muktasyādṛṣṭābhāvādityarthaḥ | bhāvaneti |
śarīrādibhinnātmanididhyāsanenetyarthaḥ | kimiti | hānavadupā-
dānamapyātmano'śakyamityarthaḥ |
nyāyānusāra iti 2 puº pāº |
raghuº ṭīº | upādhiḥ śarīrādiḥ | viprayogo vyavadhānaṃ,
vaideśyaṃ vā | upekṣāta iti | ātmanaḥ pratipattaye yatnābhāvādaprati-
pattirityarthaḥ | kṛtaiveti | yatnābhāve'pyahaṃ gauro'haṃ sukhītyādiprati-
patteḥ santanyamānatvādityarthaḥ | tattvajñānavirahe'pi saṃsārasyānu-
vartamānatvāditi bhāvaḥ | nityavibhorātmano hānavadupādānamapya-
śakyamityāśayena pṛcchati | kimiti |
kiṃ punaratra pramāṇaṃ ? nyāyaḥ, āmnāyaśca | śarīrameva
hi tāvanmūrdhābhiṣiktamanātmānamātmānaṃ manyamānasya
tadupādāya tadanukūlatrailokyaviṣayā tṛṣṇā vijṛmbhate,
tathā tatpratikūlaviṣayo dveṣaḥ | na caitatkevalātma-
darśinaḥ sambhavati, nirupādheḥ putravittalobhābhāvāt,
tairanupakāryyatvāt, chedakledadāhaśoṣādyanupapatteḥ vidhi-
niṣedhānadhikārācca | janmajātivayovittasaṃskārā-
dyupagraheṇa tatpravṛtteḥ | tato'nātmanyātmagraho nidānaṃ
saṃsārasya, mithyājñānaṃ ca tattvajñānānnivartate, tacca
śravaṇamananādikrameṇotpadyate, kāraṇanivṛttau ca kāryaṃ
na jāyate, utpannaśca dharmādharmapracayo bhogena kṣīyata
iti nyāyārthasārasaṅkṣepaḥ ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | atreti | anātmanaḥ śarīrāderbhedenātmā prati-
pattavya ityatra kiṃ pramāṇamityarthaḥ | nyāyamatra saṅkṣepato darśayati |
śarīrameveti | śarīramevātmeti manyamānasya tadanukūle rāgastat-
pratikūle ca dveṣaḥ sadā syādityarthaḥ | rāgābhāve hetumāha | putreti |
taiḥ putrādibhiḥ | dveṣābhāve hetumāha | chedādīti | kevale tvātmani
chedādiduḥkhānubhavo nāstīti na taddhetuṣu dveṣa ityarthaḥ | nanu kevalātma-
darśino'pi vidhiniṣedhabalādyāgahiṃsādau pravṛttinivṛttī syātā-
mevāta āha | vidhīti | tatpravṛtteriti | vidhipravṛtterityarthaḥ |
janma uccābhijane, jātiḥ brāhmaṇatvādiḥ, vayo dīrghāyuṣṭvaṃ, na caita-
tsarvaṃ vītarāgasya kāmyamityarthaḥ | tata iti | tathāca tadvivekārthaṃ
mumukṣuṇā yatitavyameveti bhāvaḥ | nanu rāgadveṣayorapi mithyājñānaṃ
nidānaṃ tatsaṃskārasya cānādeḥ kathamuccheda ityata āha | mithyā-
jñānamiti | tattvajñānameva kuta ityata āha | tacceti | nanu
nivartatāṃ mithyājñānaṃ, tathāpi rāgadveṣayośca kuto nivṛttirityata
āha | kāraṇanivṛttāviti | kāraṇasya mithyājñānasya nivṛttyā doṣo
doṣanivṛttyā ca pravṛttistannivṛttyā ca janma, kāryaṃ nivartate no-
tpadyate ityabhimatam | tathāpi pūrvotpannadharmādharmābhyāṃ punaḥ saṃsārā-
pattistadavasthaivetyata āha | utpannaśceti | nyāyānusāreti | etadarthaṃ
mananānukūlanyāyānusaraṇamityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | atreti | ātmavivekasya mokṣasādhanatve ityarthaḥ |
śarīrameveti | tavāhampratyayasya sārvalaukikatvādityarthaḥ | etat
rāgadvevaghattvam | tatra rāgādvyavacchettumāha | nirupādheriti | putrādeḥ
śarīraghaṭitatvādityarthaḥ | dveṣābhāvamupapādayati | chedeti | janmeti |
janma śarīraṃ, jātirbrāhmaṇatvādiḥ, saṃskāra upanayanādiḥ, vidhi-
niṣedhaśāstrayorjātyādipuraskāreṇetyarthaḥ | yadyapi bhinnātmadarśino-
'pīcchādveṣau sambhavata eva, śarīrādisambandhenātmanyeva sukhaduḥkhayo-
rutpādāt | tathāpi na dharmādharmabattvaprayojakau, sa ca kevalātmadarśinaḥ
krameṇa nivartata iti bhāvaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | atra śarīrādiviviktātmajñānasya mokṣahetutve |
śarīrasya prādhānyaṃ naisargikāhaṃpratyayaviṣayatvāt | etat tṛṣṇādveṣa-
jṛmbhaṇam | janma śarīraṃ | tata iti | mithyājñānavata eva rāgadveṣābhyāṃ
pravartamānasya vihitaniṣiddhānuṣṭhānādapūrvadharmādharmopacayāt saṃsārā-
vicchedo, na tu tattvajñānavato vītarāgādikasya | nanu tattyajñānavato'pi
śarīritvādbalavattaraviṣayopanipātāt sukhaduḥkhatadbhogotpādāttadadhīnau
rāgadveṣau durvārau | alaṃpratyayādinā na tau tathā ca śrutiḥ “asakto
rajyannadviṣaṃṃścopabhuṅkta” iti cet ? astvevam | tathāpi bhogenopātta-
karmakṣayārthaṃ pravarttamānasya vihitaniṣiddhānuṣṭhānādapūrvadharmādharmopacayo
durvāra iti cedatrāpīdamevottaraṃ anātmanyātmagraho nidānaṃ saṃsārasyeti
mithyājñānavāsanāsahāyaṃ hi karma dharmādharmajananakṣamamiti |
nanu mithyājñānavāsanāyā dharmādharmajanakatve mānābhāvaḥ | atha
bhogena karmakṣayārthaṃ pravṛttasya tattvajñānavato'pyapūrvadharmādharmotpāde
mokṣāsambhavāt śrutiprāmāṇyānyathānupapattyā tatsiddhiriti cenna |
āhatyaiva tattvajñānasya dharmanāśakatvāt | ‘nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karma
kalpakoṭiśatairapi’ iti smṛternaivamiti cet | na | prāyaścittenāpi
duritanāśāt | na ca tasyādhikārasampattireva prayojanaṃ, adhikārā-
virodhinyapi pātake tadvidhānāt, kvacicca prāṇāntikasyāpi tasya
vidhānācca | na ca janmāntarīṇamapi pātakamadhikāraṃ viruṇaddhi |
na ca prāyaścittācaraṇaduḥkhameva pātakaphalaṃ, narakāderiva tasya
tatphalatvenāśravaṇāt, prāyaścittavidhānavaiyarthyācca, tena vināpi nara-
kāderiva tasyāpi galepādikayā duritenaiva sampādanīyatvāt, na
khalu nivṛttaye karmajanyamaniṣṭaṃ vidhīyate, api tu karmaṇo'niṣṭasādha-
natvaṃ bodhyate, vinā prāyaścittācaraṇaduḥkhaṃ tattanmahārauravādinara-
kopabhogenāpi pāpasyāvināśaprasaṅgācca, “tasmādenasaḥ pūto bhavati”
tarati brahmahatyāṃ “yo'śvamedhena yajate,” “brahmahatyāṃ vyapohati”
ityādiśrutismṛtibhyo duritanāśasyaiva prāyaścittaphalatvāvagamācca | ata
eva gṛhadāheṣṭyādivannaimittikameva prāyaścittamiti parāstam |
phalāntarakalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāt, kīrtanakarmanāśāpāragamanādīnāmapi
dharmanāśakatvasyāgamikatvācca | smṛterāgamabodhitanāśakānāśyakarma-
paratvāt, bodhayati cāgamo jñānasyāpi karmanāśakatvaṃ, tathā ca śrutiḥ
“bhidyate hṛdayagranthiśchidyante sarvasaṃśayāḥ |
kṣīyante cā'sya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare” ||
iti | smṛtirapi
“jñānāgniḥ sarvakarmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute tatheti” |
atrāhuḥ | śrutyā hi jñānasya na karmakṣayajanakatvaṃ bodhyate
parantu jñānānantaryaṃ karmakṣayasya, tacca klṛptakāraṇabhāvabhogadvāraiva
upapadyamānaṃ na kāraṇatvavyavasthāpakam | na ca vyabhicāreṇa bhogo
na tattvajñānasya dvāramiti vācyam | yugapadanekadehasampādanīya-
bhogānāṃ tadadhīnatvāt | janyajanakabhāvaḥ paramasti na vetyanyadetat |
samānādhikaraṇabhogaprāgabhāvāsamānakālīno bhogastattvajñānena
janyata ityapi kaścit |
smṛterapi vahneḥ paramparayā bhasmajanakatvavat jñānasyāpi viśiṣṭa-
bhogadvārā karmanāśakatvamityatra karmapadamukhyārthatvānurodhāt tattva-
jñānena pratibandhādvihitaniṣiddhakriyāto na dharmādharmotpāda ityatra vā
tātparyaṃ, na tvāhatyaiva jñānasya karmanāśakatve, “ācāryavān puruṣo
veda tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye'tha sampatsya” ityanyathopa-
varṇayitumaśakyāyāḥ śrutervirodhāt | tadarthaśca tasyātmasākṣātkāravataḥ
tāvadeva ciraṃ vilambo, yāvanna vimokṣye vimokṣyate upāttakarma-
rāśeḥ sakāśāt phalopabhogena, atha tasmin sati sampatsye
sampatsyate kaivalyeneti | vākyaśeṣaśca bhavati “bhogena tvitare
kṣapayitveti” | athāhatyaiva tattvajñānaṃ dharmādharmapratibandhakaṃ na tu
mithyājñānavāsanāsamunmūlanadvāreti cet | na | śarīrabhinnātma-
sākṣātkāraviśeṣavirahamapekṣya lāghavena śarīrāhaṃvāsanāyā vipa-
rītāhaṃvāsanāyā (viparītavāsanāyā) eva vā kāraṇatvāditi |
āmnāyasārasaṅkṣepastvaśarīraṃ vāvasantamityādi |
tadaprāmāṇyaṃ prapañcamithyātvasiddhāntabhedatattvopadeśa-
paunaḥpunyeṣu anṛtavyāghātapunaruktadoṣebhya iti cet |
na | satātparyatvāt | niṣprapañca ātmā jñeyo mumu-
kṣubhiriti hi tātparyaṃ prapañcamithyātvaśrutīnām |
ātmana ekasya jñānamapavargasādhanamityadvaitaśrutī-
nām | durūho'yamiti paunaḥpunyaśrutīnām | bahiḥ
saṃkalpatyāgo nirmanaskaśrutīnām | ātmaivopādeya
ityānandaśrutīnām | gāruḍavadanuṣṭhāne tātparyaṃ
prakṛtyādiśrutīnām, tanmūlānāṃ sāṅkhyādidarśanānāṃ
ceti neyam | anyathā [“jaiminiryadi vedajñaḥ kapilo
neti kā pramā” |] [tāvubhau yadi vedajñau vyākhyābhedastu
kiṃ kṛtaḥ ||] iti ||
śaṅkaº ṭīº | 1nirupādherātmana upādāne āmnāyaṃ saṅkṣepato
darśayati | aśarīramiti | vāvasantaṃ cirakālaṃ vasantaṃ priyāpriye
sukhaduḥkhe na spṛśata ityarthaḥ | tadaprāmāṇyamiti | āmnāyāprāmāṇya-
mityarthaḥ | prapañcamithyātvapratipādakāmnāyasyānṛtatvaṃ prapañcasya pratyakṣata
evopalabdheḥ | siddhāntabhede, “sadeva saumyedamagra āsīnnāharāsīnna
rātrirāsīdityādau” siddhāntabhedapratipādanādvyāghātaḥ | tattvopadeśe
siddhāntabhedopadeśe ātmopadeśe vā “triḥ prathamāmanvāha triruttamā”-
mityādau vā paunaruktyamityarthaḥ | tāsāṃ śrutīnāmanyatra tātparyānnaite
doṣā ityāha | neti | tadeva darśayati | niṣprapañceti | idānīṃ
siddhāntabhedapratibhāsaśrutīnāmanyaparatvaṃ darśayati | bahiriti |
gāruḍavaditi | śarīrādito bhinnaṃ svakīyaṃ tattvamajānata
evātmanastattvajñānārthaṃ praṇidhānaṃ vidheyamityetadarthaṃ sāṅkhyamatotthānaṃ,
tatrāpi hyacetanāyā eva prakṛtermahattattvasya vā cetanoparāgapratipādanaṃ,
yathā jāṅgalikenācetanasyaiva daṣṭasya kaṣṭena caitanyamutpādyata ityarthaḥ |
anyatheti | yadi na tātparyabhedakalpanamityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | tadaprāmāṇyamiti | tadityāmnāyaḥ, prapañco
ghaṭādiḥ, siddhāntabhedaḥ śrutāvevādvaitādiḥ | tattveti | ekasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ
nirupadheriti 2 puº pāº |
punaḥpunarupadeśa ityarthaḥ | etattrayaṃ yathāsaṅkhyamanṛtatvādau hetuḥ |
anṛtatvaṃ bādhitārthakatvaṃ | yadyapi paunaruktyaṃ nāprāmāṇye hetuḥ, satya-
syāpi punaḥpunarabhidhānasambhavāt | tathāpi niṣphalatvenā'nāptatvaṃ
sūcitaṃ, taddṛṣṭāntena vedāntasyāpi vedatvādaprāmāṇyaṃ sādhyamiti bhāvaḥ |

iti | yaddharmāvacchinnasādhane sādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyamityarthaḥ |

anvayeti |
etena yāvadbhirdarśanairvipakṣabādhakāvatārastāvanti bhūyāṃsi darśanāni

yadyapi tarko'pi vyāptimūlaka iti tatrāpi tarkānusaraṇe'navasthā |

sa ceti | ātmāśrayādīnāmapyaniṣṭaprasaṅgarūpatayā govṛṣanyāyā-

dūṣakatābījasāmye'pi lakṣaṇabhedasyāvirodhāt | lakṣaṇaṃ ca svāpekṣā-

tacca tricaturādisādhāraṇam | āpattiprayojakarūpavattayā''pādyā-

raghuº ṭīº | viparyaye sādhyaṃ vinā sādhanasattve'virodhena
bādhakābhāvena pratyetavyo bādhakena ca nirākartavyaḥ | anvayaḥ sādhya-

sākṣātparamparāsādhāraṇamātmāśrayatvameva duṣṭau bījaṃ | vyavahāre puna-

gobalīvardanyāyena pṛthagupanyāsaḥ |
atha nyāyadurbalasya pratibandīkaraṇaṃ, yadutaivaṃ śaśa-
viṣāṇasyāpi siddhiḥ syāt, dṛśyamātraniyatatvāt
pratyakṣabādhasya, na ca dṛśyatvanivṛttereva viṣāṇatva-
nivṛttiḥ, avyāpakanivṛttāvavyāpyanivṛtterayogāt |
viṣāṇagatakāryatvaprayuktatvācca dṛśyatvavyāpteḥ, tena tanni-
vṛttāvapi nākāryasya śṛṅgasya nivṛttiriti | tacca mahārtha-
sidhyā kṛtakṛtyasya na paribhraṃśāya, niṣprayojanaviṣaya-
tvāt | tathāpi sambhāvitasyākīrtibhiyā nopekṣāmarhati
pratibandiriti cet, tarhi mā bhaiṣīriyamunmocyate |
tathāhyarthaḥ svaśiraḥśṛṅgasādhanapravṛtta idaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ,
kiṃ te viṣāṇaśabdenānyadeva kiñcidabhipretaṃ romādi-
viṣāṇajātīyaṃ vā dravyam ? | prathame siddhasādhanaṃ, loka-
virodhaśca | loke tadviparītasyaivārthasya viṣāṇaśabde-
nābhidhānāt | dvitīye tvanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ saṃsthāna-
viśeṣakāryatvāt vyavahāralakṣaṇāyāstadabhivyakteḥ kathaṃ
tadrahiteṣu paramāṇvādiṣu tatsambhavaḥ | sambhave vā kathaṃ
na tatra ghaṭatvādikamapi | omiti bruvataḥ kathaṃ na
jātisaṅkaraprasaṅgaḥ, kāraṇaṃ vinā kāryasambhavaprasaṅgo
vā, na vānvayavyatirekau kāryakāraṇabhāve pramāṇamiti
sarvaṃ samākulamevākulamateḥ | tasmādatīndriyaṃ nityaṃ
vā viṣāṇameva na bhavati yacca viṣāṇaṃ tat pratyakṣa-
bādhitameva kutastadanumānāvakāśaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | nyāyena durbalo nyāyadurbalaḥ, nyāyenāsmatprayuktena
durbalasya saduttarāsphuraṇena hīnaśakteriti vārthaḥ | sugamamanyat |
mahārthasiddhyeti | mahārtha īśvarastatsiddhyā tatra tvayā dūṣaṇānabhidhānāt |
paribhraṃśo bhaṅgaḥ | niṣprayojaneti | nahi pratibandirdūṣaṇaphalā,
nāpi sādhanaphaletyarthaḥ | mā bhaiṣīriti | prāṇitvādinā svaśira-
syapi viṣāṇasiddhibhayaṃ mā kārṣīrityarthaḥ | ata evoktamarthāditi |
loketi | lomādau loke viṣāṇapadaprayogābhāvādityarthaḥ | tadvi-
parītasyeti | lomādibhinnasyetyarthaḥ | viṣāṇatvaṃ jātirghaṭatvādivat
saṃsthānaviśeṣavyaṅgaiva, tathā ca yatra saṃsthānaviśeṣo nāsti tatra
viṣāṇatvamapi nāsti, sambhave vā paramāṇuṣu ghaṭatvapaṭatvādikamapi
syādityarthaḥ | paṭatvādikamapi tatrāstu ko doṣa ityata āha |
omiti | tādṛśāvayavasaṃyogaṃ vināpi yadi viṣāṇarūpaṃ dravyaṃ syāt,
tadā'kāraṇakāryotpattirityāha | kāraṇamiti |
yadvā saṃsthānaviśeṣamantareṇā'pi yadi viṣāṇatvābhivyaktiḥ syāt
tadā'kāraṇakakāryotpattirityarthaḥ |
na ceti | anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tādṛśāvayavasaṃyogasyaiva viṣāṇā-
rambhakatvaṃ viṣāṇatvābhivyañjakatvaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ tattiraskāre kāraṇatva-
niścayastu kvāpi na syādityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | evamiti | yadi nādṛśye pratyakṣabādha ityarthaḥ |
mahārtheti | mahānarthaḥ prayojanaṃ viśvasṛṣṭyādi yasmāt, sa īśvara
ityarthaḥ | avāntaratvāttannedānīṃ samādheyamiti bhāvaḥ | omiti |
yadi vyañjakābhāve'pi tadvyaṅgyajātimatvaṃ tadā vyañjakābhāve'pi mitho
viruddhajātīnāmekatra pravṛttau jātisaṅkaraprasaṅgaḥ syādityarthaḥ | kāraṇaṃ
vineti | vyañjakajñānābhāve vyaṅgyajñānāpatterityarthaḥ | sarvamiti |
śṛṅgatvaṃ dṛśyameva yogyānupalabdhyā bādhyate, tatsādhane ca pratyakṣabādhaḥ |
parātmā tu parasyāyogyo'pi ceṣṭayā'numīyata iti na tatra yogyā-
nupalabdhirbādhiketyarthaḥ |
tathā'pyatīndriyaṃ śṛṅgaṃ mūrtatvāt kuto na siddhyatītyāha | tasmā-
diti | śṛṅgatvasya dṛśyasantānavyaṅgyatvādatīndriyasya vyatirekāgrahā-
dvyatirekiṇo'pravṛtteḥ tvanmate kevalānvayī nāstyeva vipakṣe bādhakā-
bhāvāccetyarthaḥ |
raghuº ṭīº | tadviparītasya tadbhinnasya | vyavahāreti | vyavahāro
lakṣaṇaṃ cihna yasyāstasyāḥ kāryasya kāraṇasiddha(cihna)tvāt | tadrahiteṣu
vyañjakābhivyaktivyavahārarahiteṣu | tatsambhavo'bhivyaṅgyasambhavaḥ | kāraṇaṃ
vineti | ghaṭādijātīyaṃ prati saṃsthānaviśeṣasyānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
kāraṇatvā'vadhāraṇāt |
evaṃ tarhi nityaṃ jñānamityapi vyāhatam | indriyādi

cet | na | atadbhāvatvāt atadākṣepakatvācca | na hi

śaṅkaº ṭīº | evaṃ tarhīti | indriyādivikāramantareṇaiva
jñānatvābhivyaktau tavāpi doṣāḥ samānā evetyarthaḥ | atadbhāva-
tvāditi | jñānatvanityatvayoḥ parasparavirahalakṣaṇastāvanna virodhaḥ
na hi jñānatvābhāva eva nityatvaṃ nityatvābhāvo vā jñānatvamityarthaḥ |
kuta evamityata āha | nahīti | janakastrītvaṃ mātṛtvamajanakastrītvaṃ
ca vandhyātvamatra janakatvājanakatvayoryathā parasparaviraharūpatvaṃ na tathā
prakṛta ityarthaḥ | kathaṃ na tathā prakṛta ityata āha | acetanānā-
miti | acetanānāṃ nityatvābhāvavatāṃ ghaṭapaṭādīnāṃ cetanatvaprasaṅgo
jñānatvādhikaraṇatvaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ | nanu parasparavirahākṣepakatvaṃ virodho-
'stvityata āha nāpīti | nityamapi bhavatu jñānaṃ ceti vipakṣa
bādhakamiha nāstītyarthaḥ | nanu yadyajjñānaṃ tatsarvamanityameva dṛśyate
yacca nityaṃ tanna jñānātmakaṃ dṛśyate tathā ca nityaṃ jñānamityapi
vyāhatamityata āha | darśaneti | nityamanityaṃ vā yadarthapravaṇaṃ1
tadevajñānaṃ na tu darśanādarśane tantramityarthaḥ | tathā ca vivādā-
dhyāsitaṃ na jñānaṃ nityatvādākāśavadityatrārthāpravaṇatvamupādhiḥ |
vivādādhyāsitaṃ jñānamanityaṃ jñānatvānmatavadityatra janyatvamupādhiḥ,
dharmigrāhakamā2nābādho veti bhāvaḥ | rūpatveti | anyathā yadrūpaṃ
tadanityameveti vyāptyā jalaparamāṇurūpaṃ na sidhyet | tatra sahacāra-
darśanavyabhicārādarśane cakṣurmātragrāhyavyaktitvaupādhike yathā, tathā
prakṛte'pītyarthaḥ | grāhyatvamiha grahaṇayogyatvaṃ | nanvindriyādivikāra-
vyaṃgyatvanivṛtyā tatra jñānatvaṃ nivartatāmata āha | na ceti |
arthapravaṇatvamarthanirūpaṇādhīnanirūpaṇatvaṃ svarūpasaṃbandhena saviṣayatvaṃ vā
icchādau tu viṣayeṇa na svarūpasaṃbandhaḥ kiṃtu jñānameva saṃbandha iti
bhāvaḥ | tasyeti | indriyavikāramātrasyārthapravaṇatvanirapekṣasya jñāna-
tvābhivyañjakatve sukhādīnāmapi jñānatvaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ |

bhagīº ṭīº | indriyādītyādipadādātmamanaḥsaṃyogādi tasya
vikāraḥ kāryaṃ | virodhaḥ parasparābhāvarūpatvaṃ parasparābhāvākṣepakatvaṃ
vā, ādye | tadabhāvāditi | antye | atadākṣepakatvāditi |
acetanānāmiti | nitye cetane'nityatvābhāvādityarthaḥ | nāpīti |
svabhāvākṣepe virodho mūlaṃ, sa ca jñānatvanityatvayornāsti, jñāna-
manityamiti vyāptiḥ vipakṣe bādhakābhāvānnāsti, anyathā sukhaṃ
duḥkhasambhinnameveti vyāpteḥ svargādi na siddhet, na hyanityatvameva
jñānatvavyavasthāpakaṃ, kintu
saviṣayakatvameva jñānatvavyavasthāpakaṃ tu |
saviṣayakatvaṃ, tacca nityatve'pyavivakṣitaṃ, yathā cakṣurmātraguṇatvameva

vikāramātraṃ na jñānatvavyañjakamatiprasaṅgāditi saviṣayatvaviśiṣṭaṃ
tat tasya vācyaṃ tatra ca vyarthaviśeṣyatvamityāha | na ceti |
raghuº ṭīº | evaṃ tarhīti | vyāhataṃ viruddham | virodhaṃ

cetanaṃ--jñānaṃ | jñānabhinnānāmanityānāṃ jñānatvaprasaṅgāt | jñāna-

mantavyam |
atha kṣudropadravāḥ | kevalasya kartṛtve viśvasya
vaiśvarūppavyāghātaḥ, satatotpattiprasaṅgaśca | adṛṣṭāpekṣāyāṃ
kalpanāgauravam, tata eva tadutpatteḥ | svārthaṃ pravṛttā-
vanīśvaratvaprasaṅgaḥ | parārthaṃ pravṛttāvaduḥkhamayasargaprasaṅgaḥ |
evameva pravṛttāvacaitanyam | ekatve pramāṇābhāvaḥ |
anekatve tvasārvajñyam, pratiniyatasāmagrīvijñatvādi-
tyevamādayaḥ |
śaṅkaº ṭīº | upadravāṇāṃ kṣudratvaṃ siddhyasiddhiparāhatatvam |
kevalasya adṛṣṭanirapekṣasya | vaiśvarūpyam vaicitryam | tathā ca sarva-
mekajātīyaṃ syādityarthaḥ | satateti | ekasya na kramaḥ kvāpītyarthaḥ |
kalpanāgauravamiti | īśvarakalpanāgauravamityarthaḥ | tata eveti |
adṛṣṭādevāṅkurādyupapatterityarthaḥ | svārthamiti | svasukhārthaṃ pravṛttau
sukhavattvena saṃsāritvāpatterityarthaḥ | evameveti | prayojanaṃ vinaivetyarthaḥ |
pramāṇābhāva iti | nahyuktamīśvarānumānaṃ tadekatvamapi viṣayī-
karotītyarthaḥ | niyateti | kṣitikartustadupādānamātrābhijñatvam |
aṅkurakartuśca tadupādānamātrābhijñatvamityasārvajñyamityarthaḥ |
bhagīº ṭīº | kṣudratvamupadravāṇāṃ siddhyasiddhivyāghātāt | svārtha-
miti | svārthasya sukhādirūpasyādṛṣṭajanyatayā tadaṅgīkāre'smadādivat
saṃsāritvaprasaṅgaḥ ityarthaḥ | evamiti | svārthaparārthānuddeśenetyarthaḥ |
ekasyeśvarasyānyeśvarakāryā'kāritayā tadupādānādyanabhijñatvādityarthaḥ |
ādigrahaṇādatathātve'nātmatvamityādi |
raghuº ṭīº | svārthamiti | svārthasya sukhādeḥ, tajjanakādṛṣṭasya
ca sattvātsaṃsāritvaprasaṅgaḥ | evameva prayojanamanuddiśyaiva | pravṛttau
kāryajanane |
tatra kāraṇacakrasyaikamupādāya śeṣavaiyyarthyaprasañjane
sarvavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ | anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ siddhakāraṇa-
bhāvasya na vaiyarthyamiti cet ? anumitakāraṇabhāva-
syā'pyevam, pramāṇasiddhatvāviśeṣāt | yacca yadanuguṇa-
tvena kalpitaṃ tasya tenaiva viphalīkaraṇe sarvatrādṛṣṭa-
mupādāya dṛṣṭavaiphalyaprasaṅgaḥ | tathāca tadapi na syāt |
pramāṇābhāvāt | dṛṣṭena hyadṛṣṭamunnīyate | parārthaṃ ca
pravṛttiḥ, svārthābhāvāt | na ca duḥkhasṛṣṭyā kāruṇyāpa-
vādaḥ | janakādhyāpakacikitsādiṣu vyabhicārāt |
atha daurjanyādeva kinnaivamiti cet | na | doṣā-
bhāvāt | tadabhāvaśca mohābhāvāt | tadabhāvo'pi
sarvajñatvāditi |

pariharati | tatreti | adṛṣṭamupādāyeśvaravaiyarthyāpādāne karaṇa-

īśvaro nādṛṣṭenānyathā siddhaḥ kartuṃ śakya ityarthaḥ | tadapīti |
adṛṣṭamapītyarthaḥ | janaketi | pitrādayaḥ putrādihitārthaṃ putrādau
duḥkhamutpādayantyevetyarthaḥ | daurjanyaṃ kauṭilyam |
bhagīº ṭīº | tatreti | nanu kāryaṃ sahetukamiti vyāpteḥ
kādācitkatvasya hetutayā'nyathā siddhatvāt | na ca hetutvenaiva karturapi
prayojakatvaṃ, kāryaṃ sahetukaṃ kādācitkatvādityatropādānādinaiva
siddhasādhanāt | maivam | upādānādivat kartṛvyatirekādapi

sataḥ sukhasya kvacidapyanupalambhādarśanena tatsattve manoyogādisattvenāvaśyaṃ
tatsākṣātkārāt pratibandhakābhāvādityarthaḥ | vedāntināntu tadeva
svaprakāśavijñānarūpaṃ, satyaṃ vijñānamānandaṃ brahmetyādiśruteḥ | śakyaṃ
kṛtikarma | nirvṛttirutpattiḥ | pūrvarūpaparityāgena rūpāntaraprāpti-
rvikāraḥ | pūrvarūpāvirodhena rūpāntaralābhaḥ saṃskāraḥ | prāptiḥ sambandhaḥ |
sukhasya nityatve'pi ātmatvādivattasyāpyātmani nityasambandhavattvāt |
vedāntināṃ punarātmanā samaṃ sukhasya sambandhastādātmyameva syāttacca
nityameva | nityaṃ sukhaṃ svato'śakyamapi sākṣāt kriyamāṇatayā śakyaṃ
tathaiva ca kāmyaṃ ajñāyamānasya sukhasyākāmyatvāditi mataṃ nirasyati |
na jñeyamiti | anityatve veti | pūrvasya jñānasya vināśāduttarasya
kāraṇābhāvādanutpatteramuktatvaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ | upādhyantareti | janyasya
vināśitve bhāvatvasyaiva niyāmakatvādityarthaḥ | tatprāptiḥ tayornityayo-
rjñānasukhayoḥ prāptiḥ sambandhaḥ | atra mokṣadaśāyāmavidyāvidhvaṃse |
nanu naiyāyikānāmatiriktā'vidyābhyupagame'pasiddhānta ityata āha |
na hītyādi | mānābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ | tadvidhvaṃsanaṃ ceti |
prāptāprāptavivekena tatraiva puruṣārthatvaparyavasānāt tasya jñānasukha-
sambandhatve mānābhāvāt jñāyamānatvasya jñānaviṣayatvānatirekācceti
bhāvaḥ | tannityaṃ sukhaṃ | abhisandheḥ kāmanāyāḥ | utkṛṣṭasukhe
kāmanāyāṃ tadasampattāvapakṛṣṭe'pi tatra kāmanā jāyata iti | atra
dṛṣṭāntamāha | alābha iti |
yadyapi “pareṇa nākaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ vibhrājate yadyatayo
viśanti” | “vedāhametaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntamādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt” |
“tameva viditvā'timṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate'yanāya” |
“sa yo ha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati, nāsyābrahmavitkule
bhavati” | “tarati śokaṃ tarati pāpmānaṃ guhāgranthibhyo vimukto'mṛto
bhavati” | “brahmavidāpnoti paraṃ” | “tataḥ paraṃ brahma paraṃ bṛhantaṃ
yathā nikāyaṃ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaṃ viśvasyaikaṃ pariveṣṭitāramīśaṃ taṃ jñātvā
amṛtā bhavanti” | “yasmāt paraṃ nāparamasti kiñcit yasmānnāṇīyo
na jyāyo'sti kiñcit vṛkṣa iva stabdho divi tiṣṭhatyekastenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ
puruṣeṇa sarvam” | “tato yaduttarataraṃ tadarūpamanāmayam” | “ya
etadviduramṛtāste bhavanti athetare duḥkhamevāpiyanti” ityādinānā-
śrutibhyaḥ parameśvaratattvajñānasyaiva mokṣahetutvaṃ pratīyate |
dve vidye veditavye tu śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat |
śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati ||
dve brahmaṇī veditavye paraṃ cāparameva ca |
śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati ||
ityetābhyāmapi śrutismṛtibhyāṃ parabrahmatadbodhakāgamatattvajñānasya
na tu kuto'pyāgamāt svātmatattvajñānasya | tathāpi mokṣe janakasya
svātmagocaramithyājñānavāsanāsamucchedasya svātmasākṣātkārādevot-
pātāt tadvārā tasyāpi mokṣahetutvamiti vadanti |
tadasaṅgataṃ | yadi tattvajñānādacireṇaiva mokṣo yadi vā karmaṇāṃ
bhogena kṣayādubhayathāpi vāsanocchedasya mokṣajanakatve mānābhāvāt |
bhogena karmakṣayārthaṃ vihitaniṣiddhayoḥ pravartamānasya dharmādharmānut-
pattāvupayujyate vāsanoccheda iti cedupayujyatāṃ | nacaitāvatā mokṣa-
janakatāsiddhiḥ |
tattvajñānavato dharmādharmayoḥ prāgabhāvasya sattve tayorutpādo durvāraḥ |
asattve tu tadabhāvādeva notpāda ityapi kecit |
vastutastu “na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavati,
ātmanastu kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavati” ityādinā īśvarāsambhavi-
priyatvākhyānena jīvātmānamupakramya “ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ”
ityādipratipatticatuṣkaṃ vidhāya “etāvadare khalvamṛtatvam” ityuktaṃ
phalāvaśyaṃbhāvadyotanāya kāraṇe kāryopacārāddarśanādirevāmṛtatvamityuktaṃ
ataḥ śrutita eva svātmajñānasya mokṣahetutāsiddhiḥ | yacca tatra tatra
tasmin vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatīti tadātmasākṣātkārāt
sārvajñyaṃ syāditi bodhanāya | yadapi tadanantaraṃ “etasyaiva mahato
bhūtasya niḥśvasitametad yadṛgveda” ityādīśvaradharmakathanaṃ tadapi jīve-
śvarābhedabodhanāya | yathā “yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante”
ityādinā īśvaraṃ prakramya “tattvamasi śvetaketo” iti jīveśvarābheda-
pradarśanaṃ tadubhayamapi īśvarābhinnatayā ātmabhāvanaṃ mokṣaheturiti
jñāpanāya | śrutyantaraṃ “kaściddhīraḥ pratyagātmānamaikṣadāvṛttacakṣura-
mṛtatvamicchan” | tarati śokamātmaviditi vedācca pratyagātmaśabdo
jīvaparaḥ | “śānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ samāhitaḥ śraddhāvitto
bhūtvātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyed” iti | “ātmānamanviccha guhāṃ
praviṣṭam” ityādiśrutayaśca |
ātmānaṃ cedvijānīyādayamasmīti pūruṣaḥ |
kimicchan kasya kāmāya śarīramanusaṃjvared || iti
śrutibhiḥ svātmajñānasya pravṛttyabhāvadvārāpi hetutvamuktaṃ | īśvara-
jñānasya hetutābodhakaśrutirapi tattvamasyādivākyasvarasādīśvarābhinna-
svātmajñānaparaiva | vedānteṣu jīveśvarābhedāttajjñānaṃ tattvajñānameva |
nyāyanaye tu tayorbhede'pyabhedabhāvanaṃ śrutibalānmokṣaheturiti dhyeyam |
yattu vedāntibhirjīveśvarābhedāt priyatvamupapādyeśvaraparatvamuktaṃ
tatteṣāmeva śobhata iti | mokṣastu nātyantiko duḥkhadhvaṃsaḥ | duḥkha-
manutpādya tasyotpādayitumaśakyatvāt tadupāye pravṛttyanupapatteśca | kathaṃ
tarhi duḥkhasādhane śirāchedanabhedanādau tapoyogādau ca pravartanta iti
cet | balavattaramarthāntaramuddiśya na khalu tamevānarthaṃ vināśayituṃ taṃ
tatsādhanaṃ vā kaścidupādatte | yadāhuḥ--
prakṣālanāddhi paṅkasya dūrādasparśanaṃ varam | iti
anyathā'navaratameva śirābhedanorastāḍanādau pravarteta na nivarteta
ca duḥkhaikasādhanādbalavattaraduḥkhasantānasādhanādvā tato'pi tāvad
duḥkharāśerutpāde tadvināśasyāvaśyakatvāt | nāpyasau tattvajñānasādhyaḥ |
klṛptādeva duritādduḥkhasya bhogācca tadvināśasya sambhavāt tābhyāṃ
ca vinā tattvajñānasahasreṇāpi tayorutpādayitumaśakyatvāt |
samānādhikaraṇaduḥkhāsamānakālīnaduḥkhadhvaṃsatvaṃ ca na janyatāvacchedakaṃ
mānābhāvāt | anyathā śukādiduḥkhāsamānakālīnaduḥkhadhvaṃsa-
tvādinā maitrāsamānakālīnaghaṭatvādinā ca janyatāprasaṅgāt | satyāṃ
mithyājñānavāsanāyāṃ pravartamānasyāpūrvadharmādharmasañcaye saṃsārānuccheda-
prasaṅga iti cet | etāvatā tattvajñānasya tādṛśavāsanāvināśadvārā
dharmādharmānutpādaprayojakatvaṃ syānna tādṛśaduḥkhadhvaṃsajanakatvaṃ, duḥkhajanme-
tyādikaṃ sūtraṃ kāraṇābhāve kāryotpādābhāvasyaiva bodhakaṃ, utpannayostu
dharmādharmayorāhatya tattvajñānādvināśo bhogadvārā vetyanyadetat | nāpi
duḥkhātyantābhāvaḥ, tasyāsādhyatvāt | siddho'pi grāmapaśuhiraṇyādivat
svasambandhitvena sādhyaḥ sambandhaḥ tasyātyantiko duḥkhadhvaṃsa iti cet |
na | prāptāprāptavivekenātyantaduḥkhadhvaṃsa eva sādhyatvaparyavasānāt |
tasya cāpuruṣārthatāyāḥ pratipāditatvāt | na vā tasya tatsambandhatve
mānamasti | asti duḥkhenātyantaṃ vimuktaścaratīti śrutiriti cet |
na | tasyāstathātvābodhakatvāt | saṃsāriṇāmapi suṣuptyādau vyāpaka-
duḥkhātyantābhāvavattvācca tasmādātyantiko duḥkhasādhanadhvaṃsa eva mokṣaḥ |
duḥkhasya sādhanaṃ ceha tannidānaṃ duritaṃ, ātyantikatvaṃ ca taddhvaṃsasya
svapratiyogisamavāyivṛttiduritādhikaraṇakṣaṇāvṛttitvaṃ | atha duḥkha-
sādhanadhvaṃso na svataḥ puruṣārthaḥ, duḥkhaprāgabhāvamuddiśyaivāhikaṇṭaka-
nāśādau prāyaścittādau ca pravṛtteḥ | na ca muktasya duḥkhaprāgabhāvasambhavaḥ,
tasya nāśyatve duḥkhotpattiprasaṅgāt, anāśyatve prāgabhāvatvavirodhāt |
pratiyogyanupapatteśceti cet | na | prāgabhāvasyāsādhyatvāt | tasyo-
ttarakālasambandhaḥ sādhya iti cet | na | sambandhidvayātiriktasya
tasyānabhyupagamāt | sambandhinaścaikasyāsādhyatvāt | anyasya ca
svakāraṇādhīnatvāt kaṇṭakādināśasya tatsambandhajanakatve mānā-
bhāvāt | prāgapi tatsattvāt | tatsattve'grimakṣaṇe sattvaṃ tena vinā'pi
cāgrimakṣaṇe'vaśyamasattvamityevaṃrūpameva yogakṣemasādhāraṇaṃ tatsādhyatvaṃ
pravṛttyādyupayuktamiti cet | na | mānābhāvāt | pūrvakālavyāvarta-
kasyāgrimatvāvadherdurvacatvāt | satyapyahikaṇṭakādau cirakālaṃ duḥkhā-
nutpādadarśanāt | ekadā sakalakarmaṇāṃ vṛttilābhāsambhavena vināpi
prāyaścittaṃ duḥkhaprāgabhāvasyāticiraṃ sattvasambhavācca | taduktaṃ--
‘nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karma kalpakoṭiśatairapi’ iti |
sukhaduḥkhābhāvatatsādhanānyatvena duritanāśaḥ kathaṃ puruṣārtha iti
cet | yathā hi sukhatveṣṭasādhanatve icchāyāḥ, duḥkhatvāniṣṭasādhanatve
ca dveṣasya prayojake, tathā dviṣṭābhāvatveṣṭābhāvatve api icchādveṣayoḥ |
ata eva yasya yatra duḥkhe dveṣaḥ tasyaiva tadabhāve icchā, yasya yatra
sukhe icchā tasyaiva tadabhāve dveṣa iti sarvānubhavasiddhaṃ yathā cecchāṃ
prati svarūpayogyatājñānameva kāraṇaṃ phalānupadhānanirṇayastu prati-
bandhakastathaiva dveṣaṃ pratyapi | saṃśayaniścayasādhāraṇaṃ phalopadhāyakatvajñānaṃ
vā tathā | viśiṣṭaśca duritadhvaṃso bhavatyuddeśyo janyate ca tattva-
jñānena | tattvaṃ tu janyatāvacchedakaṃ na vetyanyadetat |
syādetat acīrṇaprāyaścittānāṃ duritānāṃ vinā bhogaṃ nāśa-
yitumaśakyatvāt tadavasthaivāpuruṣārthatā iti cet | na | karma-
nāśāpāragamanādivat prāyaścittādivacca tattvajñānasyāpi dharmā-
dharmanāśakatāyāḥ śrutismṛtisiddhatvenāhatyaiva tata eva tannāśāt |
yathāhi śīte pāthasi pīte tṛṣā śāmyati śītalataraṃ saro'va-
gāḍhavato nidāghaduḥkhaṃ vyapaitītyādau jalapānādestṛṣādyupaśamahetutvaṃ
svarasataḥ pratīyate tathā--
bhidyate hṛdayagranthiścchidyante sarvasaṃśayāḥ |
kṣīyante cā'sya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare ||
“tadyatheṣīkātūlamagnau protaṃ pradūyetaivaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ
pradūyante asyātmavidaḥ” |
ityādiśrutāvapyātmajñānasya pāpādināśakatvaṃ na cā'ntareṇa bala-
vattaraṃ bādhakamapākartumīśāmahe svarasasiddhaṃ śruterartham | atha 1klṛpta-
kāraṇabhāvabhogadvāraiva sambhavati tattvajñānasya karmanāśakatve sākṣā-
ttathāttvaṃ na kalpyate kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāditi cet | na | tattva-
jñānasya bhogājanakatvāt | kāyāraṇyanirmāṇadvārā tattatheti cet |
na | tatrāpi tasyāhetutvāt | vinaivātmatattvajñānaṃ tapoyogarddhi-
prabhāvādeva saubharipramṛtīnāṃ kāyāraṇyanirmātṛtvāt | tathātve'pi
tattvajñānasya vyabhicāreṇa janakatāyā bādhitatvāt | durghaṭaśca bhogena
karmaṇāṃ kṣayādapavargaḥ | anantānāṃ viṣamavipākasamayānāṃ karmaṇāṃ
yugapadvṛttinirodhavad yugapadvṛttilābhasambhave'pi kalpaśatādikramakāla-
bhogyanarakasantānajanakānāṃ karmaṇāmacirakālīnabhogena nāśayitu-
maśakyatvāt | na ca tāvatsaṅkhyanarakajanakatvameva teṣāṃ śrutyā tathā-
tvābodhanāt | tasya tāvadeva ciramityādi śrutyātmavido'pi bhogena
klamakāraṇabhoga iti 2 puº pāº |
karmaṇāṃ kṣayo bodhyata iti cettasyāḥ prārabdhaśarīrakarmaviṣayatvāt |
anyathā virodhaprasaṅgāt | ata eva bhogena tvitare kṣapayitveti
vākyaśeṣo'pi | itare prārabdhaśarīre pāpapuṇye | asūtrayacca bhagavān
bādarāyaṇo'pi | tadadhigama uttarapūrvādyayoraśleṣavināśau tadvyapadeśāt |
bhogena tvitare kṣapayitvā sampadyata iti | tasyā''tmano'dhigame
uttarasyādyasyāśleṣaḥ pūrvasya vināśaḥ aśleṣavyapadeśaḥ yathā puṣkarapalāśa
āpo na śliṣyante evamevaṃvidi pāpakaṃ karma na śliṣyata iti |
evaṃvidi ātmatattvavidi | darśitau ca vināśavyapadeśau vedeṣu
purāṇeṣu ca | aviśeṣeṇa punarātmajñānasya karmanāśakatve hiraṇyagarbha-
manūddālakapramṛtīnāmātmajñānavatāṃ ciratarakālajīvitvaṃ na syāt |
śrūyate caiṣāṃ śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu tattvajñatā mahākalpakalpa-
manvantarādijīvitā ceti | avagamyate ca yathā puṣkarapalāśa
ityādiśrutito'pyātmatattvavido'pi dehādimattvam | evaṃ ca tattva-
jñānena karmaṇi nāśayitavye prārabdhaśarīraṃ karma pratibandhakaṃ, bhogena
ca tasmin vinaṣṭe tadātmakāttatsamakālīnādvā tattvajñānādvidya-
mānākhilapāpapuṇyavināśaḥ | itthameva ca tāvadevetyādiśruti-
bodhitaṃ bhogajanyakarmanāśānantaryyaṃ mukterupapadyata iti vadanti |
svīyaduritasāmānyadhvaṃso mokṣaḥ sa cātiriktaḥ sāmānyābhāvo na
bhogādeḥ sādhyaḥ | api tu tattvajñānasyaivetyapi kecit | rīti-
ruktaivānusartavyā |
svasamānādhikaraṇaduḥkhādhikaraṇakṣaṇāvṛttirduḥkhadhvaṃsaḥ svīyaduḥkha-
sāmānyadhvaṃso vā mokṣaḥ tasya cotkaṭatarecchāviṣayatvāt tatsādhanatayā
pratiyogino duḥkhasyāpyupādeyatvamityapi kaścit |
apare tu nityasukhābhivyaktirmuktiḥ | na ca saṃsāriṇāṃ nityasukhe
mānābhāvaḥ |
“ānandaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ tacca mokṣe pratiṣṭhitam” ||
iti śrutereva mānatvāt | paramātmano bandhavanmokṣasyāpyabhāvāt |
ānandamiti śrauto liṅgaparityāgaḥ rūpaṃ dharmaḥ, astyarthāc-
pratyayāntatvenānandayuktaṃ svarūpamiti vārthaḥ | mokṣe--tadīyayāva-
dduritasantānavināśe | tathā ca śrutiḥ
tāvadevāsya ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye atha sampatsya iti |
na vimokṣye na vimokṣyate upāttaduritarāśeḥ sampatsye sampatsyate
kaivalyeneti pratiṣṭhā ca sākṣātkriyamāṇatvaṃ saṃsāritādaśāyāṃ sato-
'pyānandasyānupalabhyamānatvenāsatkalpatvāt | sannapi yogyaḥ kathaṃ
tadānīṃ na gṛhyata iti cet | anyathānupapattyā duritasya prati-
bandhakatvakalpanāt | gṛhyate tu tattvajñānenāhatya bhogadvārā vā
duritasya vināśe | astu vā tattvajñānameva tatsākṣātkārasya kāraṇaṃ
sa ca tattvajñānenādṛṣṭadvārā janyate adṛṣṭāntarasya tadajanakatvāt |
janyabhāvamātrasya adṛṣṭajanyatvāt | janyasukhasākṣātkāramātrasya dharma-
janyatvāt | avinaśyadavasthameva cādṛṣṭaṃ bhāvajanakaṃ anyathā bhogena
vināśyamānādapi tasmādbhogāntarotpādaprasaṅgāt | astu vā vinaśya-
davasthamapi tat tathā | jāyatāṃ caikasākṣātkārādanantaramaparaḥ |
nāśyatāṃ cādimo'ntyena svarūpayogyasyāpi tasya na nāśopadhāyakatvaṃ |
sahakārivirahāt | kāraṇanāśasya ca na jñānanāśakatvaṃ | vyabhi-
cārāt | kalpyatāṃ vā tattvajñānadhvaṃsādikameva kiñcitsākṣātkāra-
vināśapratibandhakaṃ | niviśatāṃ vā bhāvatvavat nityasukha-
sākṣātkārānyatvamapi vināśitvāvacchedakakoṭau | santu vā anantā
eva śarīratattvajñānasukhasākṣātkārasantānāḥ vaiṣayikādisukhavimukhā-
nāmeva ca mokṣe'dhikārānnānarthavāsanāsamutthānam | aśarīra-
mityādiśrutestu aśarīrasya sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca notpadyate | nityasukha-
sambandhasya niṣeddhumaśakyatvāditi prāhuḥ |
ānandasya pratiṣṭhitatvaṃ sarvānandāntarātiśāyitvaṃ | tathā cānantā
eva śarīratattvajñānasarvātiśāyisukhatatsākṣātkārasantānā ityanye |
syādetat, ātmā tu kiṃ svaprakāśasukhasvabhāvo-
'nyathā veti pṛcchāmaḥ | śrāddho'si cedupaniṣadaḥpṛccha |
madhyastho'si cet, anubhavaṃ pṛccha | naiyāyiko'si cet
na vaiṣayikasukhajñānasvabhāva iti niścinuyāḥ | tada-
tirikte tu sukhajñānavyavahāre bījābhāvāt tadvyava-
hārābhāvaḥ anugrahābhiṣṭhaṅgendriyaprasādādilakṣaṇaṃ hi
kāryaṃ tadvyavahārabījaṃ, arthapravaṇatvaṃ smṛtisaṃskārādikāryaṃ

tasmāt--
śruteḥ śrutvā''tmānaṃ tadanu samanukrāntavapuṣo

upāsīta śraddhāśamadamavirāmaikavibhavo

bhāsante yānāśritya karmamīmāṃsopasaṃhāraḥ cārvāka-

kāraḥ, yamāśritya traidaṇḍikamatopasaṃhāraḥ, yogācāra-

saheti, sā cāvasthā na heyā | tatpratipādanārthaṃ na
paśyatītyāhurekībhavatītyādi taddhānārthaṃ nādvaitaṃ nāpi

mokṣanagaragopurāyamāṇatvāt | nirvāṇaṃ tu tasyāḥ

nirantaramanucintayennididhyāsanaviṣayaṃ kuryādityarthaḥ | kiṃbhūta-
mātmānamupāsītetyata āha | vihataheyavyatikaramiti | ātma-

ityabhimāna ityarthaḥ | nanvetāvatā cārvākamatamevāyātamata āha |
taddhānāyeti |
karmabhirmṛtyumṛṣayo niṣeduḥ prajāvanto draviṇamīhamānāḥ |
athāpare manīṣiṇaḥ paraṃ karmabhyo amṛtatvamānaśuḥ |
atra hi paraṃ karmabhya ityanena karmaparatāṃ nirasyātmaparataiva

ṣañjanīyaṃ | tadvivekāyaiva kapilasya prakṛtipuruṣavibhāgāya
sūtrāṇītyarthaḥ | asya sāṃkhyadarśanasya mananena paricchidyamānasyātmanaḥ
smaryamāṇebhyo bahirarthebhyaḥ svayameva bhedaṃ pratipadyate yasyāmavasthāyāṃ

śrutiḥ | nanviyamapyavasthā heyaiva manasā pratiyogitvena tadānīṃ

advaiteti | ekamevādvitīyaṃ brahmeti matopasaṃhāra ityarthaḥ | iyamavasthā
na paśyatītyādinoktā | nanviyamapyavasthā heyaiva draṣṭṛtvābhāvavattayātmanaḥ
pratipādanādata āha | taddhānārthamiti | iyamapyavasthā nādvaitaṃ na
vā dvaitamityādinā tiraskāryatvenābhimatā dvaitādvaitābhyāmapi
tridaṇḍimatānupraveśāt | dvaitādvaitavicārodāsīnena manasā kevalātma-
sākṣātkāra ihābhimata ityarthaḥ | tata iti | kevalātmasākṣātkārā-
vasthāyāṃ yuñjānasya yoginaḥ savāsanamithyājñānasamunmūlanāt |
kevalo'pi na vikalpyate | na savikalpakena viṣayīkriyata ityarthaḥ |
kiṃ tu nirvikalpakamātramātmanyudeti | taduktaṃ yadā punarātmā
nirvikalpake cetasi bhāsate tadā'pavarga iti | ata eva ca carama-
vedāntopasaṃhāraḥ | tatra hi svaprakāśacidrūpātmasvarūpameva muktiriti
pratipādanāt | tannirvikalpakarūpajñānaṃ na vāk viṣayo nirdharmatvāt |
na manoviṣayo'janyatvādityāha | yato vāca iti | sā cāvastheti |
ātmanirvikalpakaviṣayibhāvāvasthetyarthaḥ | kuta ityata āha |
mokṣeti | gopuraṃ puradvāraṃ mokṣanagarapraveśadvārabhūtatvādityarthaḥ | tasyā
iti pañcamī tasyāḥ sakāśānnirvāṇamityarthaḥ | nanu nirvikalpakasattve
kathaṃ muktiḥ, na ca tannāśakavirodhiguṇāntaramastītyata āha |
svayameveti | na tu virodhiguṇāntarāt kintvadṛṣṭanāśaviśiṣṭāt
kālāt tannāśa ityarthaḥ | taduktaṃ vārttike kālātsaṃskārādveti |
nyāyadarśanopasaṃhāra iti | yamāśrityeti | yāmavasthāmanurudhya ghaṭādi-
sattvavyavasthāpanamārabhyātmagocaranirvikalpakotpattaye pramāṇaprameyādi-
ṣoḍaśapadārthopavarṇanam | ata evāpavargacaramakāraṇātmatattvasākṣātkāra-
kāraṇanityatvajñānaviṣayatvaṃ prameyalakṣaṇamāhuḥ | nanvetādṛśasyopa-
saṃhārasya mūlaṃ nāstītyata āha | tatpratipādanārthamiti | niṣkāmo
viṣayeṣvasnaṃ pratyayavān | ātmakāma ātmagocaramananasākṣātkāraparaḥ |
ātmakāmaḥ sañjātātmasākṣātkāraḥ | brahmaiva san--nirañjanātmasvarūpaḥ
san brahmaiva samabhyeti--kevalātmarūpo bhavati | kaivalyamāsādayatī-
tyarthaḥ | na tasyeti | tataḥ paraṃ jīvanamaraṇe tasya na bhavato na
saṃsaratītyarthaḥ | tatraiva samavalīyante--kevalātmarūpatayā vyavatiṣṭhante

netyupasaṃharanneva śaṅkāṃ nirasyati | tasmāditi | teṣāṃ darśanānā-
mutthāne paramekavākyatā, na tūpasaṃhāre'pi, bhrameṇa siddhāntā-

kadācidevopapadyate iti śeṣaḥ | lakṣyaprāpako dhanurmārgo yadi
bhavatīti | tathā cāyameva mārgastatheti bhāvaḥ |

dgrāhyaśūnya ityarthaḥ |
